links_reviews_text: I wore this twice in one week I liked it so much. It worked well with black and was a good look for a conservative office. Will rent again.
I love this jacket. I've rented it 2 times and will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great for work! Loved the fitted navy blazer!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and not too heavy for a summer/spring blazer.
This was cute, fashionable and comfy
Nice cropped navy jacket. Comfortable, not itchy, and transitional spring jacket.
Would definitely rent again but probably a size 2

links_reviews_title: Nice! Arm length runs short but I needed a size 6 actually
links_reviews_text: Wonderful

links_reviews_title: A bit boxy but a great work blazer
links_reviews_text: I loved the slight fringe/ raw hem around the sleeves!
This is a beautiful jacket that works with both navy and black pants/skirts. Runs a little small, and I was glad to have sized up so I could layer it over long sleeved dresses.
This is a great blazer for work - pairs well with gray and navy. It's on the warmer side so better for cooler weather.
Can also dress down. Great work piece.
True to fit. Beautiful cut.
Pretty jacket. Well made. Just didn't fit right for me
The fit was great even for not being petite. It looked great with nice jeans for a professional business casual look.

links_reviews_title: Classy, versatile jacket for every kind of occasion.
links_reviews_text: Great for throwing over a suit or pair of jeans. Super comfortable and easy to pack (I brought it on a vacation so I could wear over a t-shirt and jeans and not look like a slob). Matches everything as it is an inoffensive navy/black combo. Only annoyance was the inner lining. It was too large for the jacket so it peeks through at the end of the sleeves.
Loved this jacket. Wore several times for work, got tons of compliments. Great neutral tweed, good weight, nice fit. Only complaint is it does snag very easy.
Style runs very short and small and that's not my style in jackets.
The jacket was super flattering and could easily be dressed up or down. I thought it would be heavier weight but it was really light and comfortable. Would buy it if it weren't so expensive.
Perfect addition to any work outfit. Wore at a conference with white high waisted slacks and a black blouse. Adorable
Nice business jacket that would go into the evening.

This was smaller than I thought it would be but the real problem was the wear and tear. Lining in the sleeves was too long (like falling out of the sleeve) and some of the ribbing on the front wasn't racked down anymore. Totally would have worn it more if it had been in better condition
It's beautiful, I wore it several times. I'd buy it if it wasn't so expensive.
Love this jacket. I wish the purchase price wasn't so high

Very nice blazer, fitted, went well with light gray trousers. Not sure it will stand up to lots of wear some of the trim was separating from the fabric, the hook closures don't stay closed very well so wear a cami underneath.
Boxier style, fits great. Good quality fabric. Color is a deep navy/purple with a gray trim.

links_reviews_title: High quality, very warm and cute
links_reviews_text: True to size. Was not expecting it to be as warm as it was. It was a heavier fabric so good for cooler days. Very high quality, looked great. Loved.
Nice, stylish, true to size Material is not thin, textured look
Nice quality jacket.
Love this dress. So comfy and easy to wear. It ran a little big, I could've gone down a size.

Rented this for everyday, it's cute but nothing too special. I chose to wear the neck open rather than buttoning it because it felt a little too "little house on the prairie" with it closed. Runs true to size

I have rented a couple of Kate Spade dresses now. I'm a fan of this brand. I rented this dress to wear to work. It was the standard size that I normally get and I'd say that it ran just a little big I could've probably gone down one size. Regardless of it being a bit oversized it was still very beautiful and I got a ton of compliments on it. I really like the elastic in the waist you don't have to worry about it fitting in the waist area and it's very roomy in the chest which is normally an issue for me.

links_reviews_title: Fun, easy dress for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: This dress was pretty, fun, easy, and comfortable! I loved it!
Great dress for work, can be worn with top buttoned or open. Great length for work, lots of compliments.

This dress was my favorite rental so far! It was a bit large in the waist as it has some elastic but it is flowy so you can't tell at all. I got so many compliments! Perfect for a breezy summer day work and outdoor cocktails afterwards. Could dress up if you wanted, but was so flattering even with sandals. You'll love it.
This dress was a great length for work, and the print was cute. I also liked the button closure on the front, but this size was too big for me in the chest area. I wish I would've sized down.

This dress is really versatile - it's great for work and then a night out. You could also wear it with sandals or tights and boots if it's cooler. It's slightly low cut so a camisole makes it work appropriate.

This dress is so flattering. The neckline is great and where it tightens at the waist gives you the perfect shape. The fabric and print are beautiful. I wore this dress twice, once without tights and the next time with tights. Both looks were great. I wish I could buy this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect date night transition to spring piece!
links_reviews_text: This dress was very flattering on- loose and flowy on the bottom but the cinched waist shows your shape. The neck and wrist had pretty cinched detailing as well. I wore this for a date night-others had said they wore it to work- however I felt the neckline was a bit low - I wouldn't feel comfy without a cami underneath for a professional setting. Length was just above the knee. Great for spring, love the floral print!

One of my favorite Kate Spade dresses. Lightweight and comfortable with elastic waist and elastic cuffs. Length is longer, this dress is probably better suited for tall girls. I'm 5'8 and it skims my knees.
I rented this for my trip to Madrid, and I love it! So comfortable and easy for travel. Would rent again!
Love this dress so much! Fits very true to size, makes your waist look smaller and is very comfy material. Would defiantly rent again for everyday wear.

This dress fit me perfectly and wasn't too short (which is a problem I have a lot)! It was so pretty and feminine and I felt great in it. The high neck and keyhole detail on the front gave it a unique look. The dress was perfect for my friend's rehearsal dinner! Highly recommend especially for my tall ladies!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, even better customer service!
links_reviews_text: I selected this dress as a last-minute replacement after my first three choices weren't going to work for the cold weather that was anticipated. SO. GLAD. I. DID. This dress made me feel like a million bucks! The fabric is lightweight and luxurious, but heavy enough to wear with tights and/or boots in winter weather. The button at the neckline can be secured for a keyhole look, but this was for date night so I left it open. The smocked waist has a LOT of give; I could have sized down but I felt secure with the little bit of extra fabric in the right places. Super happy with RTR's impeccable service, too! My first three dresses just wouldn't work, and I had three new dresses on my doorstep by 10am the next morning.

Loved everything about this dress, the colors were bright and cheery, the fabric was soft and comfortable and it fit my curves well without being revealing. Perfect for work, will likely rent this one again.
Another great Kate Spade dress. Floral is pretty and the fit is great.

I absolutely loved this dress and am seriously contemplating buying it. It's a super forgiving and flattering fit for plus sized gals and made me feel beautiful. Great for work, everyday, or a dinner/date night out.
I did wear a top under the dress at work. Perfect to go out for dinner after.
Beautiful dress... So feminine! The print is lovely and the fit so comfortable. I'd rent it again!
I loved how comfortable this dress was to wear and my boss complimented me on it and said I should keep it! It stretches, which is ideal for my curvy figure. I would rent this again!

Fit perfectly Comfortable although the dress is polyester si while not itchy it isn't soft. The elasticized waist and wrists are really comfy and the waist allows for expanding after eating lol. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! So comfortable, professional, and fun.
links_reviews_text: Great fit and comfy for work.

links_reviews_title: Cute but fit off on me
links_reviews_text: Pretty print, conservative for work, looks good with tights for cooler weather. Comfortable. Can button or unbutton the neck for 2 different looks. Fit was off on me (I wore a small), sleeves fit but the waist sat high and the elastic would creep even further up to under my bust, making it look like a very short maternity dress. Maybe the medium would have been better?

Unfortunately didn't end up wearing because the fit under the armpits was way too tight and made the dress uncomfortable. If I sized up I think I would have worn, the pattern is cute but didn't love it.
This dress is high quality and the pattern is lovely for fall, but it just wasn't special. The waist is stretchy and forgiving, which was nice, but I felt a little frumpy overall.
Definitely loved this dress! Very comfortable and the length is perfect. Being tall I always worry about dresses being too short, this was perfect. (Just be careful of wind!)
Would have fit better into the 6 because the shoulders of the 4 were a bit tight on me. But this was a great quality material, fun print, and overall comfortable for work!

links_reviews_title: Easy, comfortable dress but a bit large
links_reviews_text: This dress was fine but nothing special. I rented a M because I was concerned the waist in the S would ride up based on other reviews, but I think the S would have been better. It just felt big and like a lot of fabric. However, it was easy to wear and a pretty pattern so I might rent again and size down.
Super cute work dress - received a lot of compliments all day.
This dress has been my least favorite from all the Kate Spade dresses. The pattern on the fabric is just odd and looks cheap. Didn't wear it.
It great and the material just felt great
I wore it twice! Once to a baby shower and once to work. I loved that you could button the neck for a more conservative look and unbutton for happy hour after work. You wont regret renting this one.
This dress has a flexible waist band. It was perfect for work in the winter with a cami and leggings!
I was extremely baggy so I did not wear it. I am normally a size 8/M and I ordered the M.
Nice fit true to size

links_reviews_title: Rented for Thanksgiving day and it was very cute, floral, good for event.
links_reviews_text: Wore leggings with it since it's winter and it was perfect length. It was lower cut then I was expecting but it didn't need a cami
Fit great, got a lot of compliments.
Fit well, very comfortable. Wore it with flats and tights and boots. Great dress

This dress is a win-win. I could wear it on days I felt bloated and on days I felt really skinny! I wore it to work as well as out on dates with my significant other. It fits very well and looks amazing on practically anyone!

links_reviews_title: Wore this many days at home
links_reviews_text: This fell just above my mid-thigh while the sleeves extended about four inches beyond my fingers. This may have typically been too oversized for my liking but in the current WFH scenario, it made for a cozy fit and a beautiful color for all those zoom calls!

links_reviews_title: Comfy and Cute with some pop
links_reviews_text: I love this sweater and so did everyone else! I usually wear a medium and got a large even with knowing that it was oversize. This is a true true oversize so I would say stick to your size because I had to roll up my sleeves because they were way too long.

links_reviews_title: Great pop of color but really big!
links_reviews_text: So this is a sweater (top) but it was so large is swallowed me up and I decided to be funky and make it a sweater dress for happy hour. Did get lots of compliments on the color but the sleeves were SO long and I had to keep rolling them up and it was a bit itchy. Fun but not practical

Nice oversized sweater with cool bright colors. Definitely very oversized (big through the body, in the length, and very long arms) so order your size or down. There are zippers on either side which are kind of cool (it looks nice if you unzip them a couple of inches to give it a side vent), but they were also sort of jingly so it’s a toss-up on those for me. Material is as expected for acrylic/wool blend - soft-ish. There is a bit of a stiff tulle material that is stitched inside along the shoulder seam - I assume this is to keep the shoulders from stretching out, but it is VERY itchy. I am usually not bothered by things like that but I did find it quite scratchy.

This was an unexpected hit with both myself and my followers. The color combination of the blue and red is unique and interesting. I loved the oversize fit, especially the long sleeves. Really cool if you want to stand out in a crowd or wear something no one else is wearing. Follow my RTR rental journey @luxeandlouche to see everything else I rent on a daily basis!
I loved the color and fabric, but the sleeves were super long. And I have long arms! I wish I had thought of a way to stylishly roll them. I'd rent again.
I always love an oversized sweater and I particularly like the unique colors of this one. Perfect for a chilly day.
This sweater is described as being oversized but this was rediculously huge!! The arms especially

links_reviews_title: Bold and cozy! Perfect for fall
links_reviews_text: Great oversized sweater. Fun colors and fit as expected (its meant to be big). Had a blast wearing this!
Loved the color and the side zippers. Runs large. I wear an x-large and this was more then roomy

links_reviews_title: Not that soft, has weird zippers, SO HUGE
links_reviews_text: Size down
I'm 7 months pregnant and 5' 8" and this sweater still felt like it was too large in a size small. I didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this - wore it as much as humanly possible with leather spanx. Cute and casual.
links_reviews_text: Very oversized - would go size down.
Love the oversized sweater: comfy and cozy. The sleeves are bit too long! The side zipper is cute as well

links_reviews_title: the color is great on this chunky sweater
links_reviews_text: i loved the color and the length of the sleeves, but it just didn't look great on me. i think this may perfect for a super tall person with no hips, which is not me.
easy cozy oversized!
Wish I could buy it. Easy to throw and still feel cute in a sweater
This is cute over leggings for hanging out. It runs VERY big, and the sleeves are VERY long. It is cozy and warm and comfortable.
really pretty sweater, the color was gorgeous although didn't love the sleeve fit or color.

links_reviews_title: The color pop every grey winter day needs
links_reviews_text: Significantly slouchy; warm without feeling stuffy. The red zippers at the hip make this pullover extra fun. I don't think I've ever worn this color blue before and am still wondering what lipstick shades work best with it.

links_reviews_title: I kinda love how oversized it is
links_reviews_text: I sort of love how oversized this is. And it is super comfy and cute. My only problem is that I wore it to work, and the bunched up sleeves are slightly annoying

As other reviews have stated, this is a very over-sized sweater. If you're looking for a nice, warm, comfy over-sized sweater, this is the one. The color pops out and when worn with black leggings, it's very cute. The sleeves are very long - now, the super long sleeves are in fashion but mind you, it does get annoying and gets in the way. I ended up folding my sleeves while wearing this sweater. It's VERY WARM, I wore this at a 30-something degree sunny Chicago winter weather and it still kept me warm! (Of course, if you stay out there too long it's going to get eventually cold) I would rent this again.
The sleeves are long, but issa look :)
Oversized and comfy. Great for winter. But a little itchy for me as I tend to be sensitive to wool. But I wore it with a long-sleeve shirt and felt great.

links_reviews_title: Ski wknd and needed some comfy but fashionable sweaters - fit the bill.
links_reviews_text: This is cozy and comfy, but not something to wear if you're looking for a flattering figure sweater. It's long in length and sleeves. I wore it on a ski wknd as apres with leggings and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater to throw on in the winter
links_reviews_text: It is an oversized fit so the sleeves were longer - it has super cute zipper detail on the side but the garment tag kept flopping out when the zips were up. Not cute!
I knew the sleeves were meant to extend past my hands... But i didn't realize this want a look i liked! I kept rolling/cuffing them slightly.
It fits big and baggy, but that is just the way I like it! This sweater received a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Sooooo many compliments! Loved this sweater.
links_reviews_text: The bold colors help you stick out. I'm 6ft and wore a medium. The sleeves were quite long, and even if I sized down to a small they probably would have covered my hands.
Wore to brunch, no trouble eating with the sleeves. At 5'3 could've gone a size smaller for length.

I knew this would be oversized - but it's huge. I like the colors, but the yarn looks pretty worn and fuzzy - not what I would expect for RTR. Overall I just found this to look pretty cheap and plain - not something I would rent again.

Definitely oversized as shown on the model. The color is beautiful and cute zipper detail on each side that I didn't see in the pictures. The sleeves are oversized as well; didn't want to stay pushed up. Not super soft so wore a tank underneath. Got so many compliments on this at work today with skinny jeans and booties.

I understood this was going to be very oversized when I rented it and I was hoping for that. I didn't expect it to make me look so very broad and large. I think you definitely need some height to pull this off if you are on the larger and bustier side. I ended up not wearing this because I just wasn't comfortable. I gave it two stars because it was incredibly soft and I really did like the zippers on the sides.

links_reviews_title: I know it's called over sized but...
links_reviews_text: Yes, the style clearly says over sized. However I felt the length of the sleeves was borderline impractical. It's a beautiful color, very warm, and I love the zipper accents. Just be warned that this is not something practical to wear if you plan on eating, or anything else with a lot of hand use. Still 4 Stars for the quality.

Sweater runs big, but that's the look. I could have gone with a small but a medium worked fine. The chunky knot and vibrant colors make is beautiful. I wore to run errands with black leggings and Nike Air Maxes. I like how you can play with the side zippers too.
Runs very large. I loved it otherwise!
Love this sweater! Color is so fun and bright. While oversized, not unflattering and zippers on side add a fun edge. Got lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Oversized and comfortable. Colors remind me of Dr. Seuss.
links_reviews_text: Fabric is a bit itchy and sleeves kind of got in the way of everything.
Flattering and comfy, easy to wear

Oh how I love these. I wore them to my son's baseball game and again to an NFL football game. This pic was taken after a full day of wear and as you can see they did not loosen up and give me saggy butt. I rarely rent things twice but I might have to order these again!!

These pants are SO much darker than they appear online! It actually makes me wonder if the correct color/wash is actually pictured... not a problem for me, but be aware if you're expecting a lighter print. The fit on these is a little large. Lots of stretch and very comfortable for running between kids' sporting events on the weekend, but because they were a bit big, too could wear only once before they were too stretched out to stay up well. Consider ordering down a size!

These pants were nothing exciting. They fit really well and were a little shorter than I normally like. Good amount of stretch, don't particularly care for those kinds of pockets because if the pants don't fit correctly they stick out. wore once to work
These pants were so soft and fit snug which I was ok with. They didn't stretch out over time which was a huge plus! Would definitely rent them again.

links_reviews_title: I wore these for casual day at work.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. I was afraid they would be too long since I'm short, but the length was good. They were super comfortable and stylish. I ended up buying them!
Not a winter jean

These pants were an amazing fit. The color was off - it's such a dark olive green that you can't tell it's camo at first. Still cute and perfect for everyday Jean. Didn't stretch out after multiple wears.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for everyday at the office.
links_reviews_text: Hugged my curves perfectly. Slight stretch in the fabric but didn't get baggy over the course of the day. Also hemmed to a great length for my short legs
Rented these twice now. They are comfortable, fun, and fit true to size.
Love the camo (darker than they look in picture) but they fit oddly. Good length even for being short but the legs were tight and the waist and below were not fitted and just a weird look
Love these pants, they fit great, super comfy. The green color is darker than the picture shows.
Cute pants, but runs small and doesn't have any stretch to the waist. Order 1 size up from what you'd normally wear.
These jeans fit great and can be dressed up or down easily depending on your look.

These pants are very comfortable and fit nicely, overall they are great. Beware the colors do not look like the photos..they are extremely dark! Like other reviews say, it's hard to even tell they are camo print at first.

links_reviews_title: Just wore them to work one day!
links_reviews_text: They were a little tight for me and so the pockets gaped a bit. They were wearable though! Very cute.

links_reviews_title: Color is much deeper than in the picture, definitely a deep army green.
links_reviews_text: Super fitted skinny jeans, very flattering. Just the color was so dark that it wasn't immediately obvious it was camo

links_reviews_title: Sorry for the selfie. But I absolutely loved this and this is all I got
links_reviews_text: Fits perfect and true to size
Perfect for going out in cold weather. Great for dancing. Clean fit sophisticated look slight crop.
Interesting color block pattern. Nice fabric, lots of stretch. Very versatile.
Very high quality material. Holds you in place but still recommend good under garments
The material reminded me of work appropriate scuba material. Runs a little small since a medium fit me well. Fitted through the body so best for tucking in.
Beautiful bold colors. My only complaint is the fit was a bit off - I think due to the material. It felt like it wasn't snug on my body as smoothly as it could have been
Perfect weight for fall weather, super comfortable.
Super cute on. People said I looked like a model.
Loved everything about this.
Body-con, work appropriate attire. May be deessed down with loafers or oxfords. Comfortable and chic.
Very tight fit. I ordered XL and shoulders size was right for large, but body was too tight (more like a small/medium). Good colors and style. Couldn't wear because was too tight.

links_reviews_title: great time walking around the city looking fab!
links_reviews_text: rode up a little bit as I was walking, but very cute with a pair of jeans.

links_reviews_title: Wore as separate and with the matching skirt
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments. Very comfortable and flattering. Will rent again for sure.
I liked everything about this too but it just didn't quite look right on me.

links_reviews_title: I love this color block look.
links_reviews_text: The sweater was fantastic. I wore it on several days during the month. It fit right into my regular day wear. I wore it with my black Paige pants I rented as a full outfit.

I'm more pear shaped and the cropped slacks that are in style now make me look very stocky. These pants paired with some heels make my legs look long and are very flattering. I will most likely be buying these!
These fit great in the seat, waist, and thighs, but were super long on me at 5'3. However , they were easily worn with my 3 inch heels for work with some fashion tape for a 4-inch hem.

links_reviews_title: Great work pants. Comfy and professional
links_reviews_text: Love these but it is hard to match them due to their color. Black was my go to

I rented this suit for a conference and it was gorgeous. The hem fell out of one of the pant legs and I had to do some quick fixing and ironing to make it work, but it was still a winner. I could have done a 6 in the pants, but the 8 was comfy and great for sitting all day.
Perfect color for fall or winter, lightweight comfy trouser, perfect true to size fit
Love the color. Little short for me, being 6'1" but wore with a small sandal heel and looked decent. Wished I could have taken out the hem and it would have been perfect. True to fit!
I love that it is wrinkle free material. I love the length however, the material was not that great.

Pretty color, but size was too small for me to wear with my curvy hips. I couldn't wear them because they were way too tight across the hips. Not sure a size 12 would have helped as the waist would likely be too large.
The thighs and butt were definitely snug, length was great with heels.
Love the color - fit was a little loose in the crotch but nothing Too noticeable

links_reviews_title: Great work pants; long for me
links_reviews_text: The fabric weight, color, and cut of these pants is fantastic. The 6R ran slightly large so I'm hoping some day the 4 is available to try. I'm 5'2" and had to wear 4" heels to accomodate the length.
I got the size 8 for the length, so the waist was a little big but they still looked great! Very comfortable for work and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great work pants. Love this brand.
links_reviews_text: Great work pants! Long for regular and worked fine, but would want long next time. Would rent again.

These pants were so comfortable! Fit true to size (I was a little concerned because I have a muscular lower half and have trouble finding flattering pants) and have a flattering fit. Will be renting again.
Unfortunately these were too small.
I'm 5'7" and still need 4" heels with these pants but I loved the fit so I bought it :)

links_reviews_title: Not Theory's traditional inseam sought by taller people
links_reviews_text: Theory has been my go-to "off the rack" for years due largely to their regular sizes having longer length sleeves and pant legs. Although these are described as their classic cut, the material is noticeably thinner and inseam is inches shorter. Nice color though - might be great with the jacket on more petit RTR users
Good fit.. Nice cut. Great color. Good for fall. Matches everything
These pants have an elegant cut and drape, and they are full length. The material is thin, and could be more pleasing to the touch, which is the only reason I didn't give them 5 stars.
Love Theory! Great sexy fitted flare work pants. Beautiful color!

I had to wear heels with these pants, which is my least favorite, but I loved them so much I made the sacrifice. They have an extremely flattering cut to them and I got a lot of compliments on them. I have an athletic build, so they were a little tight across my quads, but they have enough stretch in them that is wasn't too much of an issue. Overall, I debated on purchasing them and hemming them, but ultimately decided to just return them.
Too low waist for my preference, but overall fit is excellent. Length wise I'm 5'8 and without shoes they are about 2 millimeters from touching the floor
I love Theory pantsuits, but the legs were too long for me. Otherwise, they would have been really cute.

Usually love a flare, especially for work but these don't feel quality. They came to my ankle which made heels look a little silly and didn't elongate my legs like a good flare should. They also were really thin and scratchy. Not into these.

links_reviews_title: These are cute but ran small for me. I'm 5'3 and even with heels these would be too long for me.

links_reviews_text: I wore this suit for an interview and received a lot of compliments. It made me feel confident and stylish. The color is great and the material is comfortable. The pants are a little long but worked well with high heels. I would love to own this!

Found this in the RTR store, tags still on, and fell in love. Wore it twice to work, once with a white blouse and once with a peachy blouse that has some maroon designs on it. It's such a flattering cut and as a tall girl I'm always looking for pants that don't look cropped on me--these are perfect for that. They also didn't lose their shape throughout the day, they didn't feel too loose even when I wore them for the second day. The only drawback is the material isn't as soft as some other dress pants I've worn, but overall I will definitely be renting these again.

links_reviews_title: Love the fit. So darn cozy! I wish I could wear this everyday.
links_reviews_text: The fit was awesome & it works with heels or sneakers. Work & drinks appropriate -- a win!
Just fit around my breast. Had to get a belt as it made my torso look long. I loved the look with the belt!
Fit perfectly! Lots of room for chest and hips but cinched at the waist so it's flattering. Material is like a flannel so better for the cold. Great length for petites!
Super comfy + if you don't button the top two buttons it can be sexy, as well. I wore it to the theatre + will be wearing it when I'm home for the holidays!
Was pleasantly surprised with this fit. It's a thicker fabric, and while my girlfriend said I looked like a business lady mechanic, I got ALL the compliments.

I've never worn a jumpsuit before, but after trying this on at the RTR store, I was shocked it looked good. As a short person, finding something with a good length is a constant struggle. Happily surprised that it worked out. I added a belt to break up the top and bottom. My boyfriend didn't really understand this outfit, but agreed it looked cool.

links_reviews_title: Great fit even for longer torso; work and play appropriate
links_reviews_text: I wore this jumpsuit to work, and it was great! It was not only comfortable (especially in the crotch, where jumpsuits can be iffy for longer torsos), but it was also fashionable and a little sexy! When I took the photo, I actually unbuttoned one of the top buttons which I'd had buttoned all day. The little extra skin was great. I also originally wore for most of the day with cute flats, and then switched to a block heel. I think this can be dressed up or down, and be more casual or more sexy depending on how you accessorize. I'm definitely considering buying for versatility.
Wore this out, it is not ideal for tall girls as it rode up and the legs fell mid calf.

Loved this! The fabric feels like flannel and is very comfortable and warm on a cold day. The jumper is very fitted and very flattering. I wore this several times and got many compliments. It's a great put together look without even trying. Great rental!

Wasn't sure about the pinstripes at first, but this got SO MANY compliments! I kept it more buttoned up for work, then lower for a night out, and it worked both ways. Great length for a petite (I'm 5'3")

This is probably better for someone in the 5'7 or below range. At 5'9 the rise felt short, despite my torso being rather small. It was cute enough, but won't rent again. The legs seemed to stick on my calf and I kept trying to pull it down or shake my leg.

I wore this to a photo shoot for work. Photographs great and pretty comfortable, but a bit awkward fitting on tummy/hips area. Maybe meant for someone a little shorter than me. All in all, will wear /rent again!
Great for everyday fits like a glove
Love the fit. Going to keep it.

Loved wearing this out to dinner with heeled booties! It was so comfortable and didn't ride up in weird places. The pinstripes made me feel kind of like I was wearing a prison jumpsuit, but hey, I felt great in it! My husband took one look at me, laughed, and started signing the chimney sweep song from Mary Poppins......but again, I felt great wearing it, so I let that one go.

I liked that the fabric was a bit thicker for the winter season. Cut look and liked that it was easy to get in and out of with front buttons and zipper. Did find the overall fit a little short, wouldn't suggest if you're over 5' 7" as the torso would be to short.

links_reviews_title: Great work to night out outfit!
links_reviews_text: Great fit except the sleeves were a bit long but I tucked them underneath and that worked well. I wore this outfit for work and a girls night out. Got compliments on both occasions!

links_reviews_title: I felt almost too cool for school in this jumpsuit. So much fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: I have a large bust and short torso and this fit me surprisingly well. I hate having my arms and shoulders constricted in any way, but that was not an issue. Fit comfortably, but still looked tailored. The fabric was thicker and more comfortable against my skin than I expected. I want to keep it!
Very comfortable and cute for work when paired with heels
Comfortable and easy one-piece jumpsuit. Super versatile - worn it by itself or with a turtleneck underneath for warmth. The fit is perfect with cinched in waist and shorter inseam. Love it

The fit was so flattering! Gave me hips and a waist I never knew I had! I didn't think I would like this because it was a little formal, but after wearing it and all the compliments I might just buy it!
Fit great. I understand the majority of feed back. I am 5'8.5 and it fits pretty well length wise. It was fitted not too great!

links_reviews_title: Not as exciting as I had hoped.
links_reviews_text: Great over all jumpsuit - a bit bland though.

Loved this piece, super cute and a nice stretchy/dressy fabric, very comfortable. Heaver fabric, would have been a bit warm if it was hot out. On fit, it was too high waisted for my body... I have a longish torso and low waist, and it felt like the waistband hit right under my boobs! (Okay, I'm exaggerating... just wrong proportions for my body.) Was sad to send it back without wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Great version of boiler suit/jumpsuit trend
links_reviews_text: Good transitional piece for early spring/late winter, with solid fabric and long sleeves, but cropped pant leg. Got a lot of compliments when I wore it. The pinstripe goes from day to night well. A little tight in crotch if you have a long torso!
Much longer on me at 5'2" the length was at my ankles.

At first I thought it looked like PJs but add some nude pointed two suede heels and it looked perfect!!!! I plan to wear to work and out on a date :) super cute!!! Not low cut. I’m a solid size 4, and the small was spot on.

This fit very true to size. The elastic waist allows this to be very comfortable! Perfect for short girls like me know enjoy a cropped pant that doesn't go up too far. I got compliments all day. The material is also soft and very breathable.
A little loose, wish I went a size smaller. I'm petite, and the length was a little past my ankles
Comfortable and great for work. TTS
With my height and weight the fit was perfect. I was told I looked "on point" :) The military style and pinstripe was professional yet edgy for work.

links_reviews_title: Pinstripe jumpsuit a nice change for a casual friday look!
links_reviews_text: I liked this pinstripe jumpsuit and am so glad I went with the larger size. I don't think I would have been able to squeeze into the Medium. Very cropped, I felt similar to the picture although the models are usually so tall that I didn't think it would be as cropped on me. It was. Nice thick material, cute pinstripe pattern. Buttons down the front and ability to roll sleeves. Not low cut in any way, a little tight around the middle for me, but enjoyed wearing it as a switch up for a casual Friday look.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. Great fabric and well made
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size for an 8 dress size and great if your are shorter since the pant leg is cropped.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not amazing. Short gals beware
links_reviews_text: Definitely better for a taller person. The leg opening ended up making me look like I add just accidentally shrunk a long jumpsuit. Not hitting mid-calf or cute ankle showing length.
I'm usually an 8 but because of the front zipper i sized up because I have a larger chest. The 8 would have been fine! The dress got so many compliments from my colleagues
Cute dress. Loose fitting and comfortable. Got a lot of compliments on it. Mine didn't come with the belt though.
This dress arrived without a belt, but as you can see I have this super cute belt that just made it all flow together. I got several compliments. And the bonus, there are usable pockets.
I loved this dress even more than I expected to! It's super comfortable, has pockets and is just adorable. There is some nice stretch to the material. Loved it overall.
Super basic work dress. Didn't get any compliments on this one. I sized up to a 6 and the fit was fine. 5'2, 135lbs, 34dd. Wouldn't rent again.
Fit a little large but SO SO CUTE!!!!

The cut of this made me look a bit wider in the hips than usual (the pockets are also a bit puffy which doesn't help) but I still loved wearing it. Worked great going straight from work to a party. Didn't come with a belt so wore my own.
Easy to wear and warm on a cold day .
Easy to wear work dress with exaggerated funky pockets. Wouldn't wear it regularly, but was definitely a fun piece to mix up the work wardrobe. Would rent again.
A line, comfortable light weight material, however a little short to wear without tights

Mine came without the belt but RTR gave me a heads up. I asked For a replacement fully expecting to send it back without wearing it but it was so cute I had to try it on. It fit perfectly and I didn’t even miss the belt. I don’t even like silver but I really loved this dress. I received compliments all day.

I really wanted to love this dress, but it was not meant to be. I adore the concept of large front pockets (and dresses with pockets in general), but at my height (5'), they sat right on my hips and made me look extra wide. Otherwise, I liked the dress. It was true to size, great for work, and very comfortable. I got a lot of compliments!
I loved this dress! It was very professional but also fashionable! Fit was great.

Only the 6 was available and im usually a 4, and while it was a little big, it still looked amazing! Pockets are great! Zipper in the front actually works so you dont need anybody's help zippering up the back!! Perfect for a "desk to dinner" outfit! I paired with a biker jacket to show off the dress underneath and black tights and boots for winter! It is a great length too (i'm 5'10") it hit mid thigh. And so comfortable!
This fit perfectly. I wish I owned multiple dresses in this cut.
Loved this dress though it didn't come with the belt. Sleeves were long on me but the cuffs are a fitted knit so it was ok.

Wore this for a work presentation and absolutely loved it! I wore a size 4 but could probably wear a size 2 next time as the arms were a little big. I received so many compliments. Cute and sexy yet perfect for work. Totally will rent again!
This fir like a glove but was so comfortable. It looked very nice and I loved the pockets!!

links_reviews_title: Stunning and professional -- loved this dress!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, which is classic and professional. The material is heavy, great for cooler temperatures, and I think the zippers and pockets give it a fun look. The belt has NO give, so it really has to fit your waist for it to work (I had on tights and some shaping underwear, to be frank). But once on, it's pretty comfortable (I wore it all day, including on a bus and for several hours of driving). The sleeves are a bit odd, with almost sweatshirt-type wrists - seems a bit out of place for the dress - but it's not really noticeable. I wore this twice, once for work and once for a conference, and would have purchased it if it wasn't so expensive.

I'm a reporter and started using RTR to switch it up a bit and save some money from constantly having to update my wardrobe. Totally obsessed. This dress fit perfect and was lots of fun with the pockets. I paired it with some funky tights. I'm only 5'1' and it fell a little lower than mid thigh. Usually regular sized dresses are too long.
Really great fit. Lovely cut and fabric so it gives a nice silhouette. A tad longer than I wanted but I am quite short! Will definitely rent again!
This dress has the most amazing fit! A zipper in front and a zipper in back and cute belt and fun, functional pockets. I love this dress so much and recommend renting it. It is fun and professional.
Loved this dress. Fit was prefect! So many complements all day long. Planning to keep this one in my closet for awhile.
I found this to be an awkward fit. The pockets look great in the RTR pic, but in real life they just popped out awkwardly. I chose not to wear it.
I wore this to the office, then straight to a night out and it was perfect in both scenarios! Great fit, design and color! It had pockets which was awesome! Will definitely rent again!
I felt like this dress looked a little like a jacket. It fit perfectly and was very well received. Loads of compliments.
I thought the sleeves were a little long, but otherwise very flattering. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for the summer/fall transition
links_reviews_text: I couldn't love this dress more. I wore it to work and then for a night out. There is some stretch to it. Im usually between a 4/6 and i liked the fit of the 6. The sleeve length was perfect as well!
I loved this dress. It came brand new with the tags! I wore it to work and was complimented all day. Ran true to size.
I wore this to work with booties and black tights. Compliments for days. The pockets are key and have such a cute contrast edge. Super comfy too.
This is a cute dress but impossible to wear. It is tight throughout and the back zipper is only operable partway. I couldn't get it over my shoulders without struggle. Order at least one size up.
My favorite rental so far. I'm normally a 6 but the 4 was perfect. So sexy so comfortable got compliments all day
I loved the 60s vibe, and the dress fit well, but the placement of the pockets on my hips made me look heavier than I am.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but not a show stopper
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size, soft material, ribbed cuffs added a slightly edgy detail. No complaints, just not a wow. Perfectly fine for a day at work.
Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Oh shoot! I forgot to wear the belt.
links_reviews_text: Still looked cute. I have to say, Jason Wu clothes are some of the best made items I've tried. They have a lot of lovely design details and are always a flattering fit. This wasn't the most remarkable of all his pieces, it's a bit subdued, but I still got compliments and it's still classy (even though it's on the short side).

links_reviews_title: Great piece. Wanted for a work meeting which got Cancelled. Will order again during the fall
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size
Wore this out and was super warm and comfy. Not overly dressy but perfect for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: Perfect work dress with a pair of patterned tights.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly. A little hard to zip up on your own. Feels great on. many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to church and work both when I had it. It was a great length and I loved it.
links_reviews_text: I wore it without stockings and black heels, and then again with opaque black hose and thigh high boots.
It was fine, nothing super exciting

links_reviews_title: Great pattern and material, big on bottom
links_reviews_text: I was afraid this pattern would be too couch-like, but in person it was great. The dress was comfy and the scuba fabric nice. My only issue was that it was a little large on the bottom half for me.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering work dress for all seasons
links_reviews_text: I relied on my Spanx to make this dress wearable, but size was perfect. Floral pattern is lovely and the velvet accent on the zipper helps it pop
It looks better in person and fits well. I would rent it again. Many compliments

links_reviews_title: Love the floral print! Dress is fitted- fabulous rental!
links_reviews_text: Very appropriate for the workplace. Easy to wear all day.
Great fit
I'd size down!

links_reviews_title: True to size, gorgeous fall/winter dress
links_reviews_text: The pattern is beautiful, colors are great and it's cut perfectly for women with hips. If you are more slender on the bottom, you may consider sizing down but for hourglass, true to size!
Kind of scuba material so no wrinkles. Wore for an all day work event and it held up beautifully. Conservative style with a velvet back zipper to add some flair and fun.
I loved this dress. Appropriate length for work, showed off my figure and had little touches of velvet to spruce it up! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, but it wasn't what I was expecting
links_reviews_text: Fit and style of this dress were great. I'm 5'4'' and maybe it was a smidge long, but overall I liked the fit. Easy to move around in too. My only downside was the print (even though I received a ton of compliments). I thought it was softer/more muted. Not saying it was harsh; just more defined then I thought.
I have a straighter build, but this dress created beautiful, flattering curves. The fabric is thick and stretchy--very forgiving.
This was a scuba type quality fabric, and I loved it. It was perfect length. The back zipper was lined in velour fabric, which I really enjoyed!

links_reviews_title: Pretty pattern, a tad busy, but feeling very sexy!
links_reviews_text: This ran a bit tight in my mid section and the pattern is a bit busy and bold... but I did feel very sexy and well put together today. The jacket toned down the pattern and hid my tummy a bit on a rainy fall day. Will most likely rent again!
Cute dress with a fun pattern, loved the thick material. Felt like it was a little snug, but definitely still wearable with shape wear and a good bra.
Not usually a print person but I liked the colors. Comfy tho a little tight across the busy. Loved the zipper detail. Material felt a little scuba-ish. May rent again via unlimited.
Nice fit. Quality material. Lovely print. Back zipper isn't my favorite, but it works.
Perfect for work and I received so many compliments

links_reviews_title: Perfect day to evening winter dress
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. The detail of the velvet stripe down the back is gorgeous and totally affirms the winter floral vibe. It also makes it the perfect day to evening dress...wore it to work with a blazer and removed blazer for a cocktail party. I am between a 10 and 12 and the 12 for perfectly. Lots of compliments at work. Overall a gray dress!

I rented this for a 70th birthday party. The dress was very pretty, the pattern is bold, but in a fun, happy way. And I loved the velvet ribbon running down the back. If I had any criticism, it was that the hips were a bit roomy. It had a curvy cut--it was definitely my size, but perhaps best for those with hips.
fits well. feels comfortable.
This dress has the best fat and was so comfortable. It looked beautiful it was perfect for work, I got compliments all day.

links_reviews_title: Tight on top, large on the bottom. Not for straight or athletic builds.
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for my pretty standard 8 top, but the hips were way large. I'm talking an extra inch on either side. So this may be the piece for you if you're more a curvy on the bottom or a pear. HOWEVER, the print and color was gorgeous and I was sad to have to return it unworn.

I wore this to a work luncheon and a conference. Nice thick forgiving fabric - no shape wear needed! The classic shape and length were perfect for professional attire and the pattern subtle. I wore it alone and also under a suit jacket. Would rent again!
I am a 16, but this isn't flattering unless you have a flat stomach and hips. LOVED the pattern and velvet zipper detail
I wore this to work and I was uncomfortable for much of the day because the dress was shorter than I would have liked and it felts tapered on the bottom

I LOVED this dress on the model, but I just didn't love it on me. I felt like it made my middle really stick out more than other dresses. The fabric is a light scuba material and I felt like it gave me extra padding. I sent it back without wearing it. What a bummer.

Wore this to work and then a work-related party. Received many compliments. Nice structure, but still a good amount of stretch. There's a nice detail on the back - velvet ribbon running up the full length with the zipper.

links_reviews_title: Cute comfy dress I wore to work with a black belt and tights!
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a 4 / small. Got the medium given I wanted a more flowy comfortable dress - worked well with a belt! The belt was needed to add a bit of shape. Overall solid dress that worked well for work. Understated print and comfortable. Would rent again for these proposed
Was very cute belted. Bought it!
Loved the ruffles at the cuffs and on the bottom. The dress is really flattering, hides any imperfections.
This dress has a cute sleeve and hem detail, but otherwise it just hangs on your body. The V neck was so low on me I have to wear a shirt underneath. This is a solid option for a work dress.
This dress is comfortable and super fashionable. It makes me feel great and I receive tons of compliments on my fashion sense because of it. It's my new favorite dress!

In love with this dress! Doesn't have the most flattering shape on its own so I belted it and paired it with tall black boots. Wore it to work but it's perfect for transition to happy hour! Will rent again
I wore this out for a date and got so many compliments. Perfect length, fun print and all around great pick. I could even see this transitioning to fall with some cute booties and a leather jacket.
Rented to wear to work. I paired it with a belt to make it more formfitting!
Wore this up to 28 weeks pregnant. Got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Dress was great, able to zip open or closed. Cons: you can't roll up sleeves.

I didn't realize the front of this was zippered which I didn't love the look of. I'm usually more of a small in dresses but the XS fit. My hips are on the bigger side and so it was tight around that area but everything else fit well. Was a cute dress for a day at work, but wouldn't have purchased this dress.

Sized down and could have probably worn my true size but the small was nice too. The front zips up and down which I couldn't tell from the photos. Wrists are a little snug but buttons can be adjusted if needed. Might rent again in the fall.
This isn't a maternity dress but it has great stretch and the color really complimented a beautiful sunny day!
Fits loose very flattering pretty ruffles

links_reviews_title: Loved this - wore it three times in one weekend!
links_reviews_text: This dress was breezy and easy. I wore it once to work with heels, the next day with booties and a leather jacket for dinner, and the following day with a jean jacket and more casual booties. It was so versatile and I loved it more than I would have thought! For being loose, it wasn't shapeless. The hem and sleeve ruffles really gave it that extra umph.

Rented with my unlimited for an afternoon get together. Was so cute and comfortable. Loved how the v neck is a zipper so you can adjust based on how low you want it to be - great for petites where v necks are often too low. Great pattern, which I thought was much nicer in person - yellow flowers on a black background and not so overwhelmingly yellow. Wore with black tights and booties. Highly recommend.
Wore this for my anniversary date and loved it. The sleeves are fun and stay in place. It's a little boxy, but that's the look. It has wonderful movement and is very comfortable. Print is great!
Gorgeous design and appropriate for a work banquet
Such a fun dress, the zipper on the front is a 3/4 zip. If you add a belt you can add a nice waist to the dress, otherwise it hangs like a shift dress.
Great fit. Love it so much. Good for work, play, everyday. Also, super cute when paired with an over sized black blazer
Gorgeous fabric and very flattering style.
Fit great and was so comfortable to wear all day at the office.

links_reviews_title: better in person than in pics
links_reviews_text: Pretty print and very lightweight fabric. The dress looks better in person than in the stock photo. It has a nice swing to it and is more flattering than I expected given it is kind of boxy. It was just borderline too short for work - at 5'5, the XS came about 4-5in above my knee. Still doable.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, light fabric, lots of room
links_reviews_text: This dress is a bit tenty, but looks put together while making you feel like you're in PJs- great for long hours at the offic.

links_reviews_title: I wore it to my sons 5th grade commencement .
links_reviews_text: loved the dress. fit perfectly and was effortlessly stylish.
Loved this dress. I paired it with heels for work and black booties for evening.

I got A LOT of compliments on this dress which is odd because I didn't know how I felt about it when it got here. I almost returned without wearing but TBH it was laundry day and I was running low on my own stock. The pattern was a little busier than it looks on screen and the zipper neck it just kind of bizarre. Well apparently no one else thought so because people were complimenting me on the dress all day. It was very comfortable and not sheer at all. One thing I have to say about this dress is the genius way they did the bell sleeve. Usually a bell sleeve will flop all around which can be annoying. There are hidden buttons behind the "bell" on the sleeves of this dress that make it tight to your wrist - no flopping. Brilliant.

I wore this dress to work. I ordered XL because I knew the fabric would not have any given. It was a bit big in the arms and body, but I worried if I ordered L that it would have been too tight on my hips. I unzipped the front and wore a lace cami. I would rent again.

I'm not sure how I ended up with an XL and next time will go down a size. I wore it with a gold Tory Burch chain belt and it was so cute. I received tons of compliments. It's pretty blousy and much better with a belt.
I wore this 4 different times over the course of my rental: a lunch meeting, date night, dinner party and a group outing. So versatile and super flattering. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Really cute dress, length is great for work and also everyday wear
links_reviews_text: Didnt realize the top has a zipper on the front, it's not a V neck, so you can zip it all the way up to the neck or down a bit for a V neck.

links_reviews_title: Cute pattern, but way too baggy
links_reviews_text: This dress runs big, so you may want to go down a size. I felt like I was drowning in it when I put it on. The fabric is thinner than what you would think. Not flattering.

This dress overall just wasn't my style. I was trying to step out of my comfort zone but the pattern was too much for me in person. The dress was boxy and I felt like I was wearing a sack. Maybe a belt would have helped??
LOVED this dress! I paired it with a thin black boots and heelied booties. Got tons of compliments!

i'm typically btwn 2/4 and this XS was too large. it is a shift dress and shld be large, but this was massive, made it look like i was wearing a curtain. i wldnt recommend this to ppl my size or smaller. size down at least 2 sizes otherwise.
Fit great, looked great, felt great!
Love the color got many compliments, perfect for the holidays! Was a bit roomy but that was just because I went with large

links_reviews_title: Nice color, didn't love the material
links_reviews_text: I really like the color of this, but I wasn't a fan of the chunky ribbing. I prefer a smaller ribbing, which would allow it to look a bit more sleek. Just a personal preference. I think I may have preferred an XS as I like my turtle necks to be more form fitted. I did get multiple compliments on the color, though. Overall, I would consider renting again but it wasn't my favorite.
Great color and fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: A perfect red sweater for the Angel's game
links_reviews_text: I'm sometimes between S/M and the small fit perfectly. It feels luxurious, no itching or tugging at the neck.

This sweater is really bright and fun. I enjoyed wearing it. The lines are very flattering on the top. I think if you're looking for a tight fit you should size down. The medium was a bit big on me but I liked how it fit.
Perfectly true to size, lots of compliments. Paired with RTR'd Nanette Lepore pencil skirt.
Fits slightly big, however, the color is super bright and fun. The sweater is thick and comfortable. would rent again.
I probably wore this 3-5 times. It got perfectly, brought together so many outfits and was very comfortable. Fun retro vibe and lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great cut with unique details in the weave.
links_reviews_text: Reddish orange color. Ribbed texture weave with flattering curves. Easily could be worn for business casual. Really enjoyed.
OMG comfortable, truly flattering, FABULOUS color!!! I received SO many compliments at work today for the color/sweater. Truly a 10/10!
Great compliments on the out fit

links_reviews_title: a little bright, but still a good staple
links_reviews_text: This top was a little bright and a little more orange than I expected. It also ran a tad large, but still was a comfy fit and appropriate for work.
The large fit very well even though I usually wear a 10. The color is a bright red-orange--perfect for brightening dreary winter days. I kept this one for a while because of its versatility.
Flattering, nice pop of color, and suggest to all for easy winter wear

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing this! Very comfy and easy to match with other items in my wardrobe.
links_reviews_text: Only word of caution is be careful what hanger you use to hang it up, the shoulders stretch to the hanger so when you wear it there is a small bit of space that's left. Eventually it conforms to the shape of your shoulder throughout the day, but just something to note.
Wore a lot over the holidays. Would have given 5 stars if it was a little longer!
Such a pretty color and fits true to size. Sadly I couldn't wear this for very long. It was SOOOO itchy. I never have problems with clothing feeling itchy so beware!!
just a plain, bright red sweater (with slightly long arms). eh.
good fit
Wore this to a casual brunch. Def a fun rental but not worth the price to buy. Fits true to size and very soft.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a work Happy Hour
links_reviews_text: This was so fun to toss on at the end of the work day to kick off happy hour. I even set it out on a table near the kitchen around 4pm as a subtle reminder ;) Several people commented on how cute it was and asked where I got it. Fit was perfect, super soft, not itchy at all.
Would live in this! Fun to have a statement sweater
Very soft! Fit perfectly!
This was a fun sweater for a casual Friday, but watch your hair placement, my husband was quite concerned initially when he saw me wearing this.

Such an adorable sweater! I wore this to brunch and a gold tournament and received compliments and laughs all day long. Love that it's super soft cashmere and fitted enough to transition from day to night. 100% will rent again!
Short in the front but very cute for a girls trip.

I wear medium in tops/sweaters but chose the small based on other reviewers. Glad I did. It was not tight on my upper arms or stomach. It is SO soft and in was in great condition. It's a little short, but not cropped. I wore a tank top under it. Great with jeans, or leggings. I dressed it up w/ jewelry one night. Used it all weekend. It is thinner sweater material, but plenty warm. You'll love it!

I like the sweater, but I don't drink a lot of cocktails, so I rented it specifically for when I knew I would. Haha! The sweater was warm, but runs big. I wish I had gotten a size small because it made me look larger than I would like.
Wore to the Taylor Swift concert. So sassy. So fun. Material was warm and not itchy at all. The neck line is super flattering. Not too tight! Runs a bit smaller but glad I got a large.

I LOVE this sweater. It's fairly light weight, fits perfect and the saying on it is great. I kept this one for a while and wore it multiple times when I rented it. I wish I could buy it. LOVE LOVE LOVE!

links_reviews_title: Super cute for a fun night out. Loved it.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and really nice quality.
Loved this sweater. It's thin and very soft which makes it wearable for cooler summer evenings! I wore it to happy hour and it was a huge hit

I was so happy this was available to rent for a vacation where I would be visiting a Whiskey Library and Vegas for a bachelorette party. The sweater I received was clearly worn a bunch, so it was loose but still well-fitting. It was probably smaller when it started out, which is ok because I have a large chest and Milly sweaters often run small on me in that area. Would rent again!
No complaints! Nice material. Definitely a statement sweater that draws a lot of compliments!
Super cute top for a winter vacation in Jackson Hole. I sized down, as suggested, and the XS fit perfectly. It was cozy and only slightly itchy.

This sweater is great! It's really soft and cozy, and oh so adorable. I got a ton of compliments - my best friend's husband even commented on it. It's a bit cropped, so I had to layer a tee or tank underneath. Will definitely rent again!
So many compliments, very flattering
So soft and comfy. Lots and lots of compliments. Many friends told me I should buy it. I would if it was less expensive. Great length for me too.
This fit true to size and was super soft!

Really comforrable friday day yo night sweater. Cant wear it a lot, as it is so memorable. Grew a tab itchy towards the end of the night. Runs TTS, i had the M (only size avail), but should have gotten the small as the M was slightly slouchy. Love it, will rent again.
A little short for my liking but received lots of compliments. Very fun for a day in Vegas. Beware if you are tall.
Big hit. Got a lot if compliments on this one. Wore it for apres ski :) Fit - bit small and cropped - i wore a tank underneath.

I have been eyeing this sweater for awhile now and it is hardly ever available for unlimited. The small was not available so i rented the XS. This was still loose on me with the smaller size. I wore it as a top under a leather jacket. The fabric is really soft.

This sweater is so soft! I thought it might be itchy, but I found it to be really comfortable. I'm 3 weeks post-partum and thought this sweater was hilarious. Definitely a great rental piece that I'll wear a lot before sending back!
Ordered in a medium for a nice relaxed fit for a day date with my husband while our son was in school. Perfect for a mid week brunch! Totally want to order it again, and maybe purchase it this time!
Loved this cashmere sweater. Perfect on a cool day of running around for errands. A bit cheeky to wear in the mornings while dropping kids off but its not like I'm having cocktails then.

links_reviews_title: So many "where did you get it??" compliments!
links_reviews_text: Adorable, true to size, easy to style up or down. 5 stars for Milly, per usual.
Cute and basic, but I only wore it once.

The fit was exactly as expected! This paired perfectly with leather pants and heals for a cute party look! Perhaps could have worn a small if I needed a fitted look, but the medium was perfect fit and length with pants.
Fun cashmere sweater. On the short side so I wore a layering tee underneath. Comfy/not ichy. Font is skinny.
True to size, medium made it more cozy so a small would be more fitted. Loved the medium feel!
Total conversation starter. Cozy and warm and super cute!
Easy sweater. I little stretched around the bottom but still ok. Friends loved seeing it on Zoom happy hours.
Such an adorable sweater. A little shorter than I expected. Possibly over processed but easily wearable.
Way too short in arms and torso for a tall girl. I'm 5'9 and it was almost cropped so I did not wear. Too bad because it is so soft and so cute.

links_reviews_title: A fun sweater- but fit was just okay
links_reviews_text: The words on the sweater inspire many happy comments- this was fun. But the design was a little shapeless.... neither form-fitting nor over-sized. It hit me right at the waist & just kind of hung there.
I’ve worn this sweater at least 3 times already - considering keeping it. It is AMAZING! Thin enough to wear under a jacket, fitted but not too much so you can wear a shirt under it - and so fun!

links_reviews_title: Great top and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: It fits true to size and feels good on the skin. Not itchy at all.

links_reviews_title: Easy work option for foggy San Francisco
links_reviews_text: Paired with jeans and flats for super easy work item, also wears well to happy hours : )
Fit perfectly, the v-neck was a little revealing, but still felt appropriate and didn't need a camisole under it.

This fit of this dress is very forgiving, so be open to getting a size up or down from your usual if yours is not in stock. Colors are vibrant, length is perfect (maxi, but doesn't touch the floor even without heels). The fabric is silky and breathable. Would be so perfect for vacation or just for some summer fun
Loved this gorgeous dress! True to size fit. Casual enough for a pool coverup and fancy enough for dinner.

Perfect for our Morocco vacation. It packed well and barely wrinkled. Thin enough to be breezy in the heat, yet offered good coverage for around town. The colors are gorgeous and the tassels added a fun element. I loved this dress.
Too low cut for me to wear without a bandeau bra. Like the tassels!

So first of all this dress was not see through. I read the reviews and was a bit nervous that it was going to be a coverup only situation. I'm not sure if it was this sizing being so large that it made it not shear? I had no issue with this. The dress is silk, easy to wear and the tassels look nice/expensive. Loved this one.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rentals, perfect at 29 weeks!
links_reviews_text: This was one of my favorite rentals ever and felt both comfortable and special. It was very lightweight and worked for summer, even in 100 degree heat. I sized up to be safe at 29 weeks pregnant and it worked well. I would go with my regular size if I was not pregnant.

I wore this as a coverup but (and I think anyone using RTR should invest in these items!!) it can be worn as a regular dress with nude underwear even though it is quite sheer. It's very fun and I enjoyed wearing it. I think the cinch waist is a little hard to tie with the heavy tassels. It is a little oversized so I would say go true to size or smaller if you want it to be tighter, but the comfy flow of the dress is what makes it magical to me

Beautiful colors, fabric, and tie details. Length was perfect for my 5'5" height with flats/sandals. Only downside was the bust ran pretty large. I wasn't able to tie it tight enough to make a difference in that regard

Honestly, when I rented this I thought it was a everyday dress. It is not, it made of a thin rayon or silk fabric that is see through. All said, it makes a beautiful cover up for pool days. I received many compliments. I might have even purchased if it wasn't out of my price range.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous vacation choice and great for petites
links_reviews_text: Excellent fit, but you have to like the oversized look. Beautiful silk fabric. Gorgeous choice for vacations and daytime in spring and summer.

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing the dress for a dinner date. No open reservations on Valentine's Day!
links_reviews_text: Thought the dress was beautiful, although low cut!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, but only as a cover up
links_reviews_text: The print on this is absolutely gorgeous. I brought it on vaca thinking I could wear it to a Christmas cocktail party but it turned out to be completely sheer. Only really works as a cover up or when dining in a casual beach/pool setting. However very comfortable and unique! My dress didn't have tassels on the ties by the way.
I read in the reviews that this dress runs big so I rented an XS instead of an S. It was perfect. I suggest sizing down. This dress does run big. It is gorgeous! I will rent this again!!!

links_reviews_title: Elegant vacation dress in beautiful fabric!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, did not feel as though the fabric was too sheer as some have described, though I wore when dark. The drawstring just below the chest can be adjusted, so while I would have typically ordered the XS, I got the only available, S. It worked just fine. The fabric quality is excellent - wore it straight from the suitcase, with minimal wrinkle.
When I first put it on, I loved it so much I considered buying it. However, the static electricity is crazy!! Definitely made it uncomfortable and impractical to wear. Sad :(
Great colors and fabric. I felt comfortable and cute

As other's described, this is a thin, 100% silk dress. Too fancy for a beach cover up but perfect for a hot day in August. Loved the fun tassels and hippy look- way out of my usual comfort zone. The string at the bust needs to be double knotted, as the silk cord slips and loosens. Lots of boobs on me, but it added a little sass to a very loose fitting maxi. Length was perfect for flats on my 5'5" frame- even better with a platform sandal. Winner!
Wore this to a party at the end of my second trimester. Tie at a perfect location for bump. Was cute and comfortable, lots of compliments.

I enjoyed this dress. Yes, it's sheer, but the pattern sort of hides that. I had to go with a L because my normal M wasn't available. Because it had a cinched tie waist, I was able to make it work, but it would have been much better in my normal size. The v-neck is very low and did not work for me without a cami underneath the dress. Not sure if my normal size would have worked better or not. It's not one of those throw on fun summer dresses that you can wear over and over again bc it's just a bit dressier, but I did enjoy.

This dress is fabulous! It was my second rental from this designer and I couldn't have been more pleased! The favorite feels so nice as it is silk. The print is vibrant and with all the colors in it, it is easy to coordinate accessories with it. It flows when you walk, the tassels are huge, but you can get away with it with the busy pattern. The length was perfect on me. I got lots of compliments on the dress. I hope to rent this one again.

There’s nothing wrong with this dress, but there’s also nothing super right about it either. It's a sweater dress in a somewhat unattractive camel color. I didn't hate it enough to send it back without wearing it, but I certainly didn't need to keep it any longer.

links_reviews_title: Wore this everyday and to work.
links_reviews_text: Super cute and perfect winter outfit! Really easy to throw on and go. It's a little shapeless/baggy so you have to style appropriately. If you're aware of that it's a really cute piece!

links_reviews_title: Like wearing a nightgown to work ><
links_reviews_text: Wore a large so it would be super oversized. Would typically wear a small. Loved this under a big furry brown coat.
Got many compliments on this sweater dress. Fit was okay overall.
The rich Carmel color of this sweater dress is beautiful. This is an oversized piece, which worked well for my purposes on casual Friday and the weekend.
Good fit, holds shape, comfy and easy to wear. Just not a show stopper.
Not the most flattering look but a good basic winter dress
Loved the color and fit. It was just a bit itchy!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rentals ever!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Great combination of chic and comfort for the office.

I wore this to a dinner with friends and it was great outside on the balcony at night. Wore it with black tights and back winter ankle boots. Also wore it to work. Got really hot in it inside the office though.
The color and silhouette reminded me of Franciscan monks but in all seriousness it was very comfy. The material was super thick which was perfect for the coldest day in NY.
This dress reminded me of Renee Ruso in The Thomas Crown Affair: rich camel color, classic silhouette. It definitely felt lux and cozy. Perfect for a January work trip to NY

links_reviews_title: Comfy dress. Perfect for nyc winter!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to work and then out to dinner. Very comfy, but the second wear it was stretched out a bit.

This is what I love about RTR — I never would’ve bought this dress for myself, but I got to rent it and wear it for the day. I went a size down in this dress, but honestly think I could’ve gotten my normal size and been fine as well. REALLY warm and comfy, not itchy at all. Belted it and paired with ankle boots.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater dress for work or weekend
links_reviews_text: Paired it with a belt to give it shape.. I really liked the color and pockets...didn't feel too hot either...
I loved everything about this sweater dress. The material is soft and very warm, although it definitely relaxes a little during the day. Straight fit, beautiful color. Will rent again, or may buy!
This dress is really cute, but very warm! So keep in mind if you're planning on wearing it with tights/indoors
It was a little big. Wore something under it becuase even thought it's not itchy, it is not soft.
This was just okay. I didn't feel fantastic in it. Other reviews stated that this runs large. I did not find that to be the case. If you have curvy hips this may fit tighter on you - it did on me.
The back is not too low and the lace looks stunning in person. Would recommended stick on bra! Would rent again!
Loved this dress and received many compliments! It's a bit loose & only hugged me at my hips/butt. I liked the looser fit but consider sizing down if you're wanting a tight look overall.

I wore this a day when the temperature was 15 degrees and I had to drive for 8 hours and I was both warm and comfortable I was also surprised that I didn't feel like I was wearing a tent. It certainly isn't form fitting but I felt like you could still tell there was a body underneath If you're thinking about trying it go ahead and get it. I don't think you'll be disappointed

I love Caara dresses, but this one is really thick and heavy which I found to be unflattering. Maybe mine had been washed? I also found it to run a bit small like most caara dresses. Too hot for indoor imo

I was super excited for this rental but the quality was awful and for the size I rented it was almost like someone had washed it! I reviewed others around my height and the arm and dress length were great on them! Arm length was definitely more 3/4 length and it was way above my knees at 5'11 (again....on others my height it didn't look that way!). Super disappointed yet again with one of my rentals. I hope they retire the one I was given especially since it was super pilled.
I loved this dress so much, I just might have to buy it! It is so flattering and comfortable!
I wore this to travel on a 2 hour car drive to our mini-moon at Sea Island after our wedding and was perfect for getting a drink by the bar when we arrived and comfortable enough for the car ride.
perfect casual dress for everyday
Wore a medium at 30 weeks pregnant (currently a 36 D bust at 155 lbs). It didn't fit as shown because of my bump, but was flattering nonetheless. Kept me warm in the early "spring" NY March.
stretches a little and loses its shape late in the day. great work dress
Tight on the arms, large in the bottom, REALLY long and heavy fabric. Very unflattering. Maybe cute on short petite but didn't pull off the "oversized" look on me.
The material was a little heavy.
Cute and cozy dress perfect with tall boots

links_reviews_title: thick knit sweater dress for everyday
links_reviews_text: Very cute, boxy fit, awesome turtleneck which can extend more like a scarf if needed. More brown than orange. Would rent again for a cute winter look.

links_reviews_title: Very stylish; belt was a must for me!
links_reviews_text: I think with just the right figure you could totally wear this unbelted but as someone who is too endowed to be supermodel slim but not curve enough to be hourglass, I definitely found a belt necessary! It is also a bit itchy so if you are one of those people who is hot when everyone else is reaching for a sweater, it can get a little uncomfortable. However, the fitnwas right on and I DID feel very effortlessly stylish!

Based on the photo I assumed this would work for my tall frame - not so. It hit me at a weird spot at my knees thus making the pockets too high. It also had less stretch than I would have expected and was tight. Basically all wrong for a tall curvy girl.

links_reviews_title: Cute but I don't think I was tall enough to pull it off.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for the silhouette and causal look. I ordered a small, my usual size, and it seemed a little big but I think the XS would have been too snug. I'm 5'7 so not super short but I felt that it would look better on a taller framed person, hit me well below the knee unlike the picture. Was nice and heavy material and the cow neck was a nice touch.
This is very cute and trendy! I wore it unbelted and it looked very flattering. It did get a little hot working as a teacher with it but overall, would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I thought it was very comfortable and chic. I got a lot of compliments baggy without looking weird
links_reviews_text: Thick material- so it gets hot quick

I wore this dress probably no less than 4 times. I loved the material, not itchy. The dress is warm, which is perfect for the cold winter months. I wore this dress with boots and another time with tights and booties. The dress is super comfortable and perfect for a woman on the go!
It's a loose and slouchy fit. Looked great with a pair of colorful rights and cream short heeled booties.
