Was pretty cute, in my opinion a weird length between being too short to wear with leggings and too long to wear with jeans. But alas, wore with leggier for a comfy Sunday look.
The fabric is very comfortable, but like other reviewers have said it is a bit clingy and shows everything. Also I wasn't quite sure what to do with the neckline.
I loved the length of this. It looked great with legging like dress pants. The material is very comfortable! I felt good wearing this to a work convention.
Wore this to work at 22 weeks pregnant. Loved it!
A little pricey for a sweater or I would have purchased. Unique feel and gorgeous color.

links_reviews_title: Surprised by how much I loved this simple sweater!
links_reviews_text: Reviews said this was cuter in person than online, and after renting I agree. Looks like a basic sweater online, but in person it is the prettiest purple color and a very soft and comfortable fabric signs super flattering fit. I rented an XS when I'm usually a S, and it fit fine. Loved it and didn't want to take it off.
This does run a bit big. But it is alway the look of it. I liked it and got compliments on it

links_reviews_title: So cute I wore multiple times!
links_reviews_text: I initially rented this for a stylish work look. K ended up wearing it to work, dinner, on a daytime date, and to the mall. I absolutely loved it! It's a baggy fit and kept me warm in the winter air. It looks really cute with jeans and with leggings + boots. The fabric is soft and not scratchy at all. Not very thick and easily able to wear under a coat.
Nice warm turtle neck. Great material with a hint of purple. Wore with boots and leggings to work and comfortable enough for a casual Dayan home too.
This was fun to wear. It was comfortable and so cute. I loved it with my white corduroy pants. I will wear again before sending it back. I usually wear medium tops and this fit very good.

links_reviews_title: It looked more flattering than seemed
links_reviews_text: It looked very large and baggy. But in reality was very nice on. Felt good and warm. I dressed it up with the sleeveless cardigan for dinner.

I wasn't wowed when I first opened it but I ended up wearing this rental the most. It's a great staple item. It's great paired with leggings. As a previous reviewer stated, it hugs every bump so it's best not to wear it with pants or jeans that have belt loops/ zippers as it just shows those bumps. It's very soft and I received a lot of compliments on it. The side slits are nice also.
Length was great. Sleeves were long. It was comfortable. Wore to a conference when needed to be comfortable sitting all day.

links_reviews_title: Might have to buy this one!
links_reviews_text: This sweater looks super cute with leggings and boots. It is also incredibly soft and the color is beautiful

links_reviews_title: Love the color and the fit!
links_reviews_text: Perfect with leggings

Wore this on a trip to the local zoo with my family. I didn't particularly care for this sweater, overall. I wore with leggings and tennies but it could be dressed up too. I usually am right in the middle of a size small and XS. I rented the XS which may have been why it seemed clingy. The material was thin but I did like the side slits. A couple people told me they liked my sweater so that has to count for something!

I wore this for a casual thanksgiving with leggings and boots. It was comfortable and just lose enough. I tried to wear jeans underneath but then all of the lines from the buttons and pockets were showing though the fabric. Definitely need to wear leggings or something smoothing with this.

I wore this with leggings while WFH and loved how cozy it was. I am 5'2 and the side slits come up high enough that the leggings definitely should be pants if you go out in public - this is not a piece that covers your butt. But it's soft and cozy and a nice lightweight sweater in early spring in New England.
Sleeves are really short. Not terribly flattering. Didn't wear.
Great with leggings and boots, wore multiple times.
Rented this for everyday/weekend wear, and it was a great rental. It worked really well with leather leggings and booties, or jeans and sneakers. Really soft and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I wore this sweater for a maternity photo shoot.
links_reviews_text: This fit beautifully! Skimmed over a third trimester belly perfectly, very flattering. The sweater was also soft and not too bulky.
Item was damaged. Had the designer emblem that was sewn on dangling by one corner. Arrived that way.

links_reviews_title: Wore for vacation and for work
links_reviews_text: This is SO COMFY and looks cute with leggings and boots. You can dress up or down. I'm a solid size 6 and the medium fit perfect.
Loved the fabric and fit. Very comfortable.

This sweater is so soft and comfortable. I wore it work for a client presentation with leggings and heeled boots to dress it up a bit. Highly recommend if you want a sweater you can easily wear. One note, it is a bit more purpley/pink and heathered looking than pictured.
Casual pretty
Love this sweater! Wore with leather leggings and boots, lots of compliments. And it’s super soft!
This sweater isn't anything flashy but it's cozy and comfortable. Best worn with leggings. It comes down well past the waist line, which I liked. It's a great staple item.

This is my second time to rent this sweater! I love the feel and color. It fits nicely for my 190 lb 5'2" body. The XL is true to size. This sweater can be worn for everyday or dressed up for a night out.
It looks just like the photos and is comfy. Nothing special :)
Great length, good quality fabric
Soft and comfortable fit. It hangs a little bit, but that’s the way it’s supposed to fit. Cuter than I expected.

links_reviews_title: Great for everyday. Comfy and can be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'6" 105lbs and straight/narrow and this was loose in the shoulders. Not so much it made much of a difference for a rental, but would definitely prevent me from purchasing/wearing multiple times.

links_reviews_title: Soft and comfy material, perfect for cold and rainy-day weather! Received compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit well. There is a small embellishment on the lower left corner on front. Light-weight material yet warm. Soft, non-abrasive material.
This sweater is very comfortable and warm! The perfect item to throw on for a relaxed night out.
Wore it to work on a few rainy days. I paired it with either leggings or jeans. Great top if you want to be comfortable and professional.
Perfect for weekend and lounging around. Extremely soft and fits to your curves.
Nice soft ribbed light weight sweater. I wore over black leggings and boots.
Soft, comfortable and flattering.

Loved this dress for #work! Fit like a glove in all the right places. I'm not a fan of my tummy section so the asymmetrical hemline and the stripes helped out with this. I would definitely rent again!
Curve hugging fit but the nice substantial fabric helped keep it all together. Turned out a little sexy for work but enjoyed wearing it to an event.

Loved loved this dress. Great fit and the fun hem adds flair and fun to an otherwise normal black dress. Fabric is nice and thick, so it's great for cold weather, too. Wore it to work and then a happy hour after. Perfect!!

What could have been a basic dress gets elevated by a fun, flounced ruffle hemline! Just a bit of a "Morticia Adams goes to work" vibe, but not at all tight! Made for my pear shaped figure, narrower shoulders and a wider bottom. Regular bra friendly, no Spanx necessary, super comfortable. Perfect weight/style for between seasons, thinking of pairing with boots and a jacket for colder temps. Very figure flattering. And oh, the compliments!
Didn't want to send it back but had to. Absolutely LOVED this dress & wore it 3xs! Received too many compliments to count!
Form fitting and comfortable with a polo neckline. Beautiful length and fit. Will rent again for work!
Loved this
Was a great dress for work. Conservative but form fitting I felt very professional

links_reviews_title: This is an all-around winner. Wore it to an interview. Could wear it for work, events etc
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Not too snug anywhere and very flattering. Husband loved it too.

links_reviews_title: Work to dinner. Comfortable and classy.
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a 2 to 4. This dress is heavy, stretchy and forgiving. It can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion.
Very flattering

links_reviews_title: this was my first rented dress on renttherunway
links_reviews_text: this dress is so well made, and fit like a glove. I liked the heavy material. wore it to work and got compliments all day!
Snug dress with very nice, quality material. I didn't wear it to work.
super cute and fits well
The fit is flattering yet super comfortable. Will rent again!

I wore for a formal work meeting. I liked the fabric, tailoring and neckline. But It was a bit longer than I would have liked for business attire and I didn't like seeing the open snaps on the neckline.
Very pretty and unique
I rented this dress for work. I loved it! Fabric perfect and flattering. I received so many compliments. I ended up buying!

Loved the style. Very comfortable. Wore to a work conference and got a bunch of complements. However, it runs BIG. I am usually between a 4 and a 6, and was drowning in the 4. Will rent again in the 2.

links_reviews_title: First time at a comedy club.
links_reviews_text: I loved the . way it fit not too loose and not too tight. great length.

links_reviews_title: Great for work or Sunday brunch
links_reviews_text: Form fitting but not too tight or sexy. Fell mid calve. Loved the ruffle added a nice feminine touch

Shoshana just knows how to make dresses for women’s bodies and this was no exception. Wonderful fabric, elegant and comfortable, paired beautifully with blazers and sweaters. I also wore with heels and boots, depending on what the weather was doing. Almost bought this one!
not a good fit for my body type

links_reviews_title: I BOUGHT it because I liked it so much!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is fab and its very flattering. It has a little stretch and I received lots of compliments. I like that you dress it up our down. It's an every season LBD!

links_reviews_title: Classy, comfortable, and great fabric for travel
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress for work. The fabric is stretchy and won't wrinkle (I travel for work so this is important). I had never worn this brand before so I sized up but I definitely did not need to. Overall, I enjoyed this dress and would rent it again!
I thought this was going to be too plain, but it was stunning. Got so many compliments. Very easy fabric, heavy enough to cover the bumps. Spanx are a must though.

links_reviews_title: I’m 27 weeks pregnant and this was super cute and comfy. Highly recommend it for work.
links_reviews_text: Great material, durable fabric and comfortable for my growing belly.

The pic makes it look like the dress has a V neck, but it doesn't it has snaps that secure it into a low faux turtleneck looking neckline. Undoing the snaps makes the neckline look strange (not like a v neck)

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a big interview. Comfortable, classy, and unique. Loved it
links_reviews_text: Fits snug to complement curves, but still work appropriate. A little big in the chest, but buttons were a nice touch. Great asymmetrical hemline
great material, good weight to it. 14 was too tight so I looked like a human sausage link. lovely dress - I'm super sad it didn't fit!

It was a bit overwhelming on me. I couldn't get the top to open up like it does the model, in a collar like fashion. Mine kept closing up, though it was unbuttoned. I felt very conservative and serious in it.
Fits just right. Loved the fabric it hugs where it should and flows at the bottom. So comfy to wear for an all day work and a night out!
Shoshanna always fits me well and this dress did not disappoint.

I'm a full 4 and a scant 6 - fit in the shoulders but waist was really large. Wondering if perhaps the particular one I got had lost its fit? Photos of others look great! Disappointed because I love the idea of this dress.

links_reviews_title: Love it. Wear it to work and got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Right fit and cover the flaws
Sending it back...not worth ordering
This dress is very flattering. The material is thick enough to hide any body imperfections but is not too thick to feel hot. I really enjoyed wearing this dress.

links_reviews_title: Great tailored, yet, super comfortable fit.
links_reviews_text: As a realtor, I'm moving all day long. In and out of my car, up and downs stairs. This dress is structured, yet, moves with you. Perfect wrinkle-free dress in a stylish cut. I loved the length the sleeves and the skirt length keeps it professional.
Great fit. Very flattering. Hard to zip and hook by myself.
Could have sized down.

This is a very pretty blouse. It is well constructed, the fabric is perfect, and it fit curves well. As you can see from the picture, if you are short like me, you might be able to see under the arm holes a little bit.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, fun sleeves, a little sheer
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a girls night out. It was a fun flowery top. I did wear a tank top under because it was a little sheer.
Works for busty women or those who are nursing. Cute top for work. Will prob wear to a dinner party tonight too.

The color is lovely, a peachy pink that's great for spring/summer. The fabric is super light, so the flutter sleeves have a lot of lovely movement. It's cut pretty straight, even in plus sizes--it fit across my shoulders and chest, but was a little tight across my stomach and top of hips. It's only cut to just below belly button, though, so the bunching was minimal. Super sweet top! Would rent again.
Lightweight and loose top, perfect for summer. I'm in between sizes and went with my smaller size and it fit well under the arms and just has an overall loose fit. Cute style and print
Loved the fit on this top. Was a bit see through, so wore a tank under it, otherwise it was a great blouse. Easy to dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: Pretty colors, perfect with jeans. Light weight silk not see through.
links_reviews_text: M was perfect.
Material was excellent, thin but not wrinkly. Versatile - looks good with jeans and work slacks.
Great to brighten the day during quarantine

links_reviews_title: Runs small and is short for someone with larger chest

links_reviews_text: Easy fit, true to size on the shoulders and loose throughout the body. Wrinkles easily if you care about that! Very flattering
The sleeves are my fave part about this shirt. It is so light and airy, Id but it if it wasn't so expensive! It's beautiful and perfect for work.

Nice shirt, but extremely thin. I had to change my bra multiple times because even wearing one in a similar color it still showed through I also noticed that the shirt kept riding up through the day and I had to continue to pull it down. It was a nice wear once rental but I probably wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The color was very flattering, and I liked that it was colorful but not necessarily "loud". Wore it tucked in with green high-wasted pants, and felt like a really good combo. I considered keeping this one since I wore it several times.
Great length and amount of tightness. I really loved this shirt.
I wore this to work with slacks and it was perfect. Very cute and comfortable.
The material is a little see through, but otherwise it's a beautiful top!

I could tell from the cut of this shirt that I should size down from a small to an extra small, and I was glad I did. I like flow in my shirts but not the super flow that a lot of people wear so the XS was the perfect size for me. It was lightweight and pretty! I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Blouse was very flouncy and fun to wear
links_reviews_text: RTW CHOSE SIZE AND IT FIT VERY COMFORTABLY. A COLORFUL COMFORTABLE FUN PIECE TO WEAR.
It's a really cute top. Just wish it was longer being plus sized. It kept riding up.
It fits true to size in the sleeves and the chest, but unfortunately this blouse was very short on me. I couldn't tuck it in and it was hitting well above my hip. Did not end up wearing it

This top was great in hot weather because the fabric is light and flowy. I wore it with dress pants and heels for work and with jeans and sandals for a more casual look. I chose to tuck in the front to make it a little less boxy & liked the look. It was a pretty pattern, definitely appropriate for spring and summer.
Great top for summer - very light weight and super versatile for work and weekend. One issues, the clasp on the back was a little tricky to close by myself.
Was the perfect fit.
Very pretty and light. Great summer top
Didn't love
Beautiful silk print. Can easily dress up or down. I wore to work with slacks and then kept it on with jeans for an after work get-together and felt pretty all day.

links_reviews_title: smaller fit and shorter than expected.
links_reviews_text: Length is shorter that I expected. I prefer to cover my upper arms and this style did not. I ended up not wearing it.
I loved the loose fit in the tummy. The sleeves were super cute & fun. Was great for work with a skirt then again for evening happy hour in shorts. Super versatile.
I love this top! It is little large in the armholes but I don't know if my bust could have handled smaller. Wore with white jeans and periwinkle shorts. Got lots of compliments!
Light flowy
This top fits true to size. It is a bit sheer, so I wore a cami underneath for work. Beautiful summer print and nice fabric. Also loved the flowy sleeves. Would rent again.
Easy to wear and added a tank underneath as the arm area is larger and bra shows. Many compliments and will rent again

links_reviews_title: Fits big, but very pretty color and print
links_reviews_text: This is a loose fit blouse; I should have sized the smallest XXS, but got an XS. JCrew REALLY inflates their sizes, which I forget. It's wide and boxy. Slightly sheer. I wore it to work though, with white jeans. Very cute and doesn't seem to wrinkle much.

links_reviews_title: Beware THICK & PUFFY sleeve and wide cut
links_reviews_text: I got really excited when I started opening this package. The color is gorgeous and the fuzzy texture is really thick and cozy. I normally wear smalls and mediums and I ordered a medium in this, thinking I would wear it more oversized since it is cropped. It was way too huge and too much fabric to wear any more oversized than the designers originally intended. I assume sizing down would be best. I will reorder in a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: I've been wearing this every chance that I can.
links_reviews_text: It's a little baggy and oversized, but I'm tall so that has worked. For a sherpa coat, it's incredibly warm. I've worn coats like this in the past that did not actually provide any protection from the elements and that has not been the case with this item.

Despite being bulky and too big, I still wore it and loved it. Had enough room to wear a heavier sweater underneath. Wore it at night in the mountains and stayed warm. No pockets. Would rent a small next time.

I fell in love with this jacket and wore for over 3 months before returning as the weather turned colder. Got many compliments on the jacket whenever I wore it and was the perfect cool coat to throw over any outfit. It is very oversized which I loved but would be hard for a shorter or more petite frame. I am a fan of the brand and so glad RTR stocks them. This is why I love this service so I can be in trend but not commit to high price items when I will only want for one season.

I've been obsessed with Toteme since before I had a celebrity spotting of designer Elin King in my Paris hotel in 2017. It was a dream come true to wear one of her designs without buying. This jacket is incredibly stylish, well tailored, and not at all basic. Love the taupe, the pile of the faux fur, giant lapel & sculpted back. Worked perfectly on me, a 5'2" size 14 petite. It would be warm enough for winter, but was also nice on a brisk fall day.
Very tight at chest area. But overall very cute, recommend 2 sizes up.
I liked the color of the dress a lot but the chest area was def a bit tight. Helped me not eating too much tho.
Was perfect for a day out! I loved the way it fit on my body type. Perfect length. A little low cut, but not too bad. I got lots of compliments!! Would recommend.
I am petite person so this dress fit me perfectly. The dress is even nicer in person.
Went to a friends party! Loved every bit of this dress! It was perfect for a summer night!

links_reviews_title: Adorable dress but crazy small in the chest/ribs
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress until I zipped it half way up and the zipper stopped moving! I sized up based on reviews and I needed to size up one more. I am usually a size 2 and needed a 6. Other than that, it's really really cute!
Fits VERY small.

links_reviews_title: Runs small at true waist but so cute!
links_reviews_text: Super cute dress, zipper closure in back that hits a difficult zip spot where the white detailing is, also very tight right there as their is no give. I bounce between 2/4 and the 2 was too tight in the true waist bc of the no give. Super cute dress though!! Would rent in next size up.

links_reviews_title: So tight around the ribs couldn't zipper it up! I normally wear a 0 or 2.
links_reviews_text: Sent back without wearing
Pretty dress but was a little too hippie for my style! If it is your style the details are great!

links_reviews_title: BEAUTIFUL dress for any summer event!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much and felt so pretty and girly in it! However, it definitely runs small. I ordered a 0 and 2 because I'm always a 0 in dresses, but even the 2 was a bit snug in the waist, bust, and armpit area. I still wore it but definitely could've used a 4 for a more comfortable fit. I'd say go up a size or two, but still a gorgeous dress!

links_reviews_title: love this dress! so fun and wore it for a cinco de mayo party!
links_reviews_text: love everything about this dress. i'm 5'8" 145lbs and wore a size 4. the band around the high waist is very fitted, so it was a bit tight there, but everywhere else fit great! definitely better for smaller chested peeps

links_reviews_title: Really cute, but ran small so I was not able to wear it.
links_reviews_text: Dress ran small.
Light and dirty dress. Should have sized up, very tight in waist.
Extremely tight in the ribcage and couldn't zip it over the waist detail. Couldn't wear it unfortunately.
Loved the dress but could not fit into the 2. I'm typically a 0-2

links_reviews_title: Great in theory but weird fit
links_reviews_text: Loved the pattern but not flattering on me- tight around rib cage and very difficult to find a bra that would work
I'm 5'5 120 and ordered the 2 based on other customer reviews. This was very tight around the ribs and extremely low cut. I couldn't wear the dress as much as I wish I could have.

links_reviews_title: Neckline on this was VERY low, around three inches below my nipples. Obviously I had to wear a cami.
links_reviews_text: Very tight around the waist, which I like. The sleeves are very full which made it hard to be productive or eat.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to wear on Cape Cod
links_reviews_text: Runs small. I normally fit into a 2, but I couldn't fit into it. Although, my mother told me I looked like someone from Candy Land wearing it, and not in a good way. Might look better on someone who is not as petite as me!
The dress is really beautiful and great material. I usually wear a size 4, but unfortunately I could not zip the dress up because it was too small.

I didn't actually wear this dress because it has nice lining which makes it a little hot for Florida weather right now. I will definitely rent this again when it gets a little cooler. the sleeves are so cute

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress -- but WAY too small
links_reviews_text: I was so looking forward to wearing this — the shape is just adorable. Saloni typically runs pretty small, but this was beyond. I am between two sizes, ordered the larger of the two, and still couldn't zip it all the way. I wish I'd read the reviews before, since this is a common thread. My advice: size TWO up.

I typically wear a size 2 in dresses. Based upon reviews saying the dress runs small i sized up to a size 6. I could not even get the dress over my hips, let alone zip up. Sizing is WAY off. Had to return. Adorable dress just sized poorly.
I sized up for this dress and the 2 was still very tight in the waist, but very roomy elsewhere. Would be a better fit on an hourglass figure.
I don't know how this dress was sized but it is definitely NOT true to size. I'm a 2/4 normally and I couldn't even zip up the 4! Disappointing because it is so cute! SIZE UP!!
Super tight across the middle of back. The top and bottom portion zipped with plenty of room. Otherwise gorgeous material and style. Had to return without wearing
I rented this for a work event and I got so many compliments that I think I'm going to buy this. It's cotton yarn so it's super soft. The cut is on the boxy side.
I'm in love with this sweater. It's soft and the color is creamy. The colors are fun and vibrant! This is my third time renting it, so clearly I'm in love!

links_reviews_title: THE sweater for a weekend that includes a Women's March!
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were a tad short, but otherwise a good fit. Eye catching sweater which definitely inspired compliments. Fun to wear. Cotton makes it layerable and multi season.
Rent this! I was tempted to buy.

This sweater is my first purchase from RTR! I rented it for a trip to play in a mahjong tournament in Moscow, and it served me very well. It was warm+cozy (important for being in Russia) but not scratchy (important for hours of sitting in one place playing mahjong); and I got lots of likes+compliments on the fun pattern!
Will rent again. Didn't get a good pic but it was a great sweater

links_reviews_title: What a cozy way to smash the patriarchy
links_reviews_text: Grabbed this on a whim at the RTR store and I'm so glad I did. It was warm and cozy! I ended up wearing it twice, including to volunteer at a feminist writing workshop. Literally wear your feminist heart on your sleeve. Fit is TTS to slightly small.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for breast cancer awareness month
links_reviews_text: Received NWT super comfy and soft. This material was not scratchy. Received tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Cute design, but not well made
links_reviews_text: Loved the look of this sweater but the red parts of the design looked like it was falling apart. The knit was very loose. It had the tags on so it hadn't been worn before- I think that's just the design of the sweater.

links_reviews_title: Ron Weasley's mom hand knitted me a female empowerment sweater and its very cozy
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear, comfy, cute!
I really liked this sweater. It was super comfy and soft. It runs a bit big.
This sweater fit perfectly. 5'2", 108lbs. The roll neck wasn't too high, the body is not a trim fit but not boxy either. Got compliments on the pattern as well.

links_reviews_title: Adorable sweater with lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I should have sized down to xs

Comfy and warm. Cotton so not itchy at all. Fits true to size. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is that I don't think the quality is great as some of the threads in the design seemed to be fraying and it seemed fairly new.

I read others' reviews and saw that they listed the sweater as running small. The next size up fit well (I like sweaters to have a bit of room without being really baggy). It's great quality and a really fun print. I will probably buy.
Great fit and comfy and just a great sweater to wear for fun! Considering buying
True to size, so many compliments. I'm buying it! Might be too short for someone taller or with a long torso but I'm 5'3 or 5'4 and it's great.
The perfect sweater- a thick knit, very warm.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this pro lady sweater. I wore it to a Planned Parenthood event and got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I didn't love the rolled neckline but otherwise, it was a great sweater.
Perfect cozy sweater that makes you feel super cool!

Loved these pants for a work look. Paired with a black blazer with gold buttons and it worked perfectly. Fit is true to size. They are thick, warm pants too so if you're looking for something light these might not be it.

links_reviews_title: I wore these trousers and jacket to a conference in Palm Desert. Professional and hip.
links_reviews_text: The trousers fit well, with a slightly loose comfortable "boyfriend" feel. I'm short and the length was great.

I love the suit! It makes me feel extra confident at work. I love the thick material, the crop cut, the complex and interesting pattern on the fabric. The only thing I wish it was different is it doesn't have loops for belt and the waist is a little big for me while the rest of the pants fits great. Since I can't wear a belt and the pants slide down as I walk (not crop length anymore).

These are great for a cold New England day. They are very warm and very comfortable. They did stretch quite a bit through the day so if you're between sizes, consider sizing down. The one thing that I really didn't like was the way the pockets stick out. I wore a longer shirt to cover them. That being said, I'd probably rent these again for the comfort.
Pants and jacket fit exceptionally. Heavy fabric; great for winter.
These fit perfectly, and were SO soft. Not wool (although they look it) so not itchy. Very comfortable and looked fantastic.

Great winter pant as they are lined and very warm! The waist was just a little large so I had to adjust them up a bit while wearing. Ok work pant. Not the most flattering fit but wore them twice because of the warmth factor
AmaZing fit! Very warm. Wore twice.
Feel rich, thick material but cut to move without bunching. I love them and will own them.

links_reviews_title: great everyday work pant, nice heavy fabric
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit - as other reviewers have mentioned this pant is larger around the waist while being thin in the legs. For me, it was a perfect relaxed fit. I considered buying these.

links_reviews_title: Perfect work winter pants with a bit of flare
links_reviews_text: Thick material, fit was perfect , flattering but still felt comfortable and chic.
Great fit and loved for a conference!

links_reviews_title: These did not fit well i did not wear them
Size was a little too large
links_reviews_text: Nice fabric but pants were too big in the waist for me
I loved these pants so much I think I might buy them. Fantastic fit in the hips and thighs and, at 5'3", it was just the right length to wear with pumps to work.
These look super stylish, the horizontal stripe elongates the legs. The fabric is nice and structured and the piping on the front gives that extra something something

links_reviews_title: very think warm fabric, well made
links_reviews_text: Good quality warm pants, BUT even though these are cropped, they really don't work for a petite frame. The leg shape and leg openings are pretty unflattering at low ankle length.
Nice pants and fit well overall but were a little short in overall length. I am 5'7" so if you are any taller, consider that
Loved these... thick and great for winter.

links_reviews_title: Great cut, very nice tailoring, cozy textile - I felt good wearing these
links_reviews_text: The fit for me was excellent. I am 5'5" with short legs, so these were not ankle pants as shown on the model. However, they were not too wide, nor too narrow, pretty much straight leg, which meant the longer length worked fine. Very nicely tailored. Felt put together wearing them.
These fit perfectly and were a nice heavy fabric to help combat the cold. I would definitely rent them again.

I think these are great pants. They are thick, so cold days only, but cozy and comfortable while looking sharp. I am tall with long legs. I preferred them cuffed at the ankle. I wore with a black sleeveless turtleneck tank and black heeled ankle boots. I found myself wanting the matching blazer to go with.
Cute pants and easy to style. Wore to work and was very comfortable all day. Definitely runs a little large - wish I sized down.

These pants run at least a full size large and are rather long. I wore them for a day and wasn't comfortable. The fly zipper doesn't go up enough and leaves an awkward gap between it and the button, the pockets stick out A LOT no matter what you do to try and contain them, and the fit/cut made my butt look completely flat.
strange fit for someone with hips

links_reviews_title: Very sharp! nice weight, loved the stitching/details. Material is very nice.
links_reviews_text: These fit really cute. I got a lot of compliments. I used double sided tape to adjust the length- they were slightly too long. Loved them! Wish I could have gotten the jacket too.
This suit fit like a dream, has the softest fabric and makes you feel like a million bucks - love, love, love.

I rented the blazer and corresponding trousers for an interview for a surgeon job within an academic surgery department. This suit combination fit true to size, was incredibly comfortable, and was conservative without being drab. The pants were ankle length at an inseam of 28, not cropped as the picture appeared. I was able to wear booties with a slight heal and they didn't look too short or weird. (I'm 5'8") The jacket has two buttons and nipped at the waist just right, so I had curves rather than a fat boy look or a gapping jacket. The suit was also comfortable without being too warm, perfect for a northeast interview in December. This will be interview suit as I look for other jobs, and am considering purchasing.
Warm, very high quality slacks. I wore them every chance I got for weeks. They were long on me, so I had to wear boots, which limited me a bit. But I loved them.
Runs a little big
Loved these pants! But they run large and didn't fit. It going to rent them again in a smaller size, because they're so soft and warm. Really comfy!

I really liked the pants but they definitely run large! I'm usually between a size 0-2 and ordered the 2 since they're work pants. Well I could've fit another person inside with me that's how big they run. I still wore them anyways since they are so structured they stayed up but highly recommend sizing down if you're in between sizes. Maybe even going 2 sizes down..

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a cold winter day
links_reviews_text: These were perfect for work when it was chilly since they are thicker and have a wool feel. I wore it with a beige silk top and nude shoes and it looked great but you could do black turtle neck and black booties or pumps

links_reviews_title: These are high quality, heavy, beautiful slacks.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly on my size 14 frame. They are full length on me -- not cropped like on the model. I ordered the accompanying jacket. These pants feel luxurious.

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments from co-workers and from people on the street!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and the fabric has a little stretch which was super comfortable. These are great fall/winter pants.

links_reviews_title: So Comfortable I wore them on an Airplace
links_reviews_text: These are amazing pants. Fit very well in the hips. Soft and good quality material. The pockets are a little shallow, but hey! At least it has pockets. Will definitely be renting again!

These are my favorite work pant rental to date. They are so soft and fit perfect in all the right places. I traveled with them for work and wore them for 12+ hours - they never lost shape or creased/wrinkled. A dream pant.

links_reviews_title: High-quality fabric, warm, comfortable, professional. I want to live (and sleep) in these pants.
links_reviews_text: These pants are longer than they appear in the model's photo. The pattern is flattering, and these pants are seriously comfortable. I am very tempted to buy these, and would if they were a little cheaper.

links_reviews_title: Oversized but a great hooded jacket
links_reviews_text: I liked this oversized jacket! I probably could have gone down one size but I like it's detailing l, the cropped silhouette was great with a dress and a pit of boots! Would also pair back great to high waisted jeans!
Kept me extremely warm during a fall football game.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fuzzy jacket for the winter
links_reviews_text: With being 6'1 sleeves and length were a little short otherwise the jacket was perfect. Very warm for a Minnesota winter (Brainerd was -20, yikes).

Rented this so I'd have something comfy-cozy to wear at my parents over Christmas and I haven't taken it off since I've been here! This is the coziest jacket ever. The pockets are a perfect accent to the shearling and i just never want to take it off okay!? See more pics at @thanksitsrtr
Loose fit, runs large

links_reviews_title: Ridiculously big for me, did not wear
links_reviews_text: It was way too big for me to wear out. But the coat seems fairly thick and warm.
The sleeves are a little short and the cut of the jacket is boxy and big. It was great for everyday wear warm and comfortable because of the sweatshirt like material that lines the jacket
Looked dirty
I should have gotten the xsmall
REALLY boxy fit but it was super comfortable and I got a lot of compliments
Short and wide fit, pretty sturdy jacket
Fit was oversized but that was what I was going for so it worked. I could have sized down to XS and it would have still been oversized. Jacket itself is gorgeous and cozy.

Jacket has absolutely no shape. The arm pits hang really low so there's excessive amount of fabric. I think this would work on someone who is tall and in a smaller size. Definitely not for short chubsters like myself.
Great jacket. Ran a bit large, but could be worn with heavy sweaters underneath.

links_reviews_title: Oversized fit that keeps you warm & a hood to keep the hair dry from rain or frizz from the beeeze
links_reviews_text: Definitely an oversized piece, but still a great addition over any outfit. Much thicker, comfier, and cozier than your usual overcoat/jacket (which I couldn't complain about). Kept me warmest when I thought otherwise in this cold weather.
Ran big

I wish I would have sized down to the XS. I'm usually a 4/6 up top and the S/M was huge on me. I was in Portland for a work trip and I stayed warm - so that was a plus. Would be super cute on a ski trip walking around shopping.
very casual, warm, wide fit.

links_reviews_title: I've worn it to work twice and to run around town. Works for everything!
links_reviews_text: Super cute - runs big. Would definitely buy in XS

links_reviews_title: Didn't make it out of the house.
links_reviews_text: As others described the fit is very boxy- I thought sizing down might do the trick but XS was still very short and wide. Good luck friends!

links_reviews_title: Super Warm and perfect for cold weather vaca.
links_reviews_text: Hood was nice touch, easy to dress up or down.
This jacket has an over sized fit, but I loved it. It is so warm and comfortable.
cute!
Love the details and look of this jacket, but I would say this is a M-L not a S-M.
Super boxy, cropped fit with short arms. cute, but the torso is so oversized, it looks almost funny on my petite frame. I did wear it with a chunky sweater and it was great.
Like it a lot. Very boxy. Cropped. Wish the sleeves were longer but I guess that's part of the cut. Very thick and warm.
This is way oversized and not flattering. The shoulders on the S/M were halfway to my elbows and the bottom stuck way out in the back.
I was worried this would be a flop, but was super pumped to find it working perfectly with a high waisted bottom! Love the classic style with a twist.

links_reviews_title: Cropped and cute except for the back.
links_reviews_text: It's a bit cropped but at a cute length. Fit is pretty true to size. The issue for me was the back. It ties but bulged out a ton in a really awkward way where the tie was and I just couldn't really make it work good enough to want to wear it.

Loved this top for dinner during my vacation. It is definitely a crop top but not too short. I usually don't like to show my tummy and it covered most of my torso so I felt fine even during dinner. Very light breezy material for warmer weather. Colors are bright and beautiful!
Loved this Milly top with white jeans on vacation. Bottom of blouse hit right at my jean line and I didn't feel like I was showing too much skin. Ran true to size.
Loved the tie in the back.
Loved this top. Wore it to an after dinner work event and date night. I'm only 5'1" so it was not so cropped on me. The tie on the back is adorable and adds shape.

I wore this to a work-sponsored baseball game; it was polished enough to wear to work but also casual and breezy enough for the game. It's definitely a loose fit, but it's still flattering (and fit comfortably over my larger chest!). Wear it with high-waisted pants! I have a short torso and it still feels pretty cropped.
Perfect for a July 4th rooftop party

I'm only 5'1" and I rented this thinking it would be cute for work in the summer. I couldn't wear it to work because it was so short in the length that it showed my mid drift. It was a cute top, I wore it to a baseball game instead, then returned it.

I thought at first, oh no it will be one of those too high on my waist but with white shorts it looked amazing. The back has these cool straps that knot. Collar cute. Buttons hidden. Outstanding. I love this blouse it was perfect for summer day. I want to rent more of Milly
Very cropped

Loved this cropped top! The blue check is so pretty. Rented it for work but ended up wearing it on the weekend because it wasn't work wear appropriate for my office. It is cropped in the front and more of a high-low shirt than it appears in the model photos. It's great with high-waist jeans or pants. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great color. Definitely a crop, but not terribly short.
links_reviews_text: The loose bottom was nice for hot days. Looked great with high waisted white shorts on the weekend and with high waisted slacks and a linen jacket for work.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear, too short and boxy
links_reviews_text: The title says it all- a tad boxy and too cropped. I like shorter shirts that hit at the waist or just above but because this is cut boxier it makes it go up higher than I wanted. Pretty color and pattern, nice quality cotton.
This shirt is adorable, I'm so sad that I could not wear it. Unfortunately it was just too cropped at the belly for my body style.

links_reviews_title: Wore for everyday events. Could be won with almost anything.
links_reviews_text: Cute top. Make sure you love the pants you put with it because it is pretty short at the waist. Super cute top, super comfy.
perfect for summer, love the tie on the back.
This shirt has a cute tie in the back, and is just enough cropped without being too revealing. Great for a BBQ!

This top was about 1 inch too short for me to feel comfortable in high waisted jeans with my postpartum belly. However, it is so cute. I ended up wearing it tucked into a black skirt, but will rent again to wear with jeans once I feel better about my core.
I'm 5'2 and have a short torso and even with high-waisted jeans this was way too short.
So cute and I got compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great cut and print for spring/summer
links_reviews_text: Loved this top. Best worn with high waisted pants because it hits just at the hips. Very cute
Got lots of compliments on this. Very cute but boxy
I liked the top, but not as much as I did in the photo. It was too big, really hung wide in the back with the tie. Just not my style, really. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: It fit perfectly, was a fun pattern, perfect for vacation in hot weather.
links_reviews_text: Did not show too much of my stomach. Was not a tight fit, but was flattering.
This is a cute crop top. It fits true to size. The arm holes fit just right.
This was a serious crop top on me which I wasn't expecting. I wore to work with a high waisted skirt and still had to add a tank underneath so it was modest enough for work
Really cute but a little too short for me!

I didn't want to send this blouse back. It was comfortable and went well with jeans, skirts, and shorts. On my long torso the length came to just below my natural waist, but it wasn't too short-- just felt slightly cropped. Another great thing was that most button-downs pull at the chest for me, even though I'm not busty, but this one was perfect and didn't pull at all. I also loved the ties at the back-- I got so many compliments on that feature!

links_reviews_title: Super cute with a lil crop
links_reviews_text: Cropped just the right amount that high waisted pants covered everything I wanted covered. the back tie was unexpected and made it super cute!
Love the bow detail on the back. Got a couple of compliments while wearing! Great quality and comfortable wear. Flattering. Paired great with with dark jeans and wedges.

As a petite person I didn't need to wear extremely high waisted jeans or pants with this. It worked great with my normal pants. In size 8 it worked well with a 34D bust. Great top love the flare of the tie in the back 100% would rent again.

This shirt was super cute but only came like halfway down my torso (I'm only 5'3" so don't exactly have the longest torso either). I love a good crop top but this shirt didn't flair out at all at the bottom, it was pretty fitted all the way down, so it didn't scream "crop top" - more "this gal's shirt doesn't fit her." I didn't end up wearing it.
I found the fit to be boxy. I have big boobs, and it just kind of hung in front. Not flattering on me at all.
Great fitting on trend top. Can wear to work with higher waisted pants, but it slightly cropped.

links_reviews_title: Perfect everyday shirt for work and vacation
links_reviews_text: This shirt is adorable and looked great with high waisted jeans

links_reviews_title: Great color but runs large on shoulders and chest!
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and style but this shirt was pretty big on me, aside from it being a boxy cut. You could see my bra on the sides but looked cute with a black bralette. If you size down, be aware that the length is on the short side so if have a long torso, it might be too short. I'd give it a try again in a size smaller.
Loved this shirt. Wore it with high waisted shorts and didn't notice it being too short in the front. Was great for hot weather and fashion forward. Totally recommend

links_reviews_title: Shirt is BEAUTIFUL. but it is REALLY SHORT.
links_reviews_text: Such a beautiful shirt. Color really pops. But it was so short, I could never wear it. My stomach was showing. Didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Mixed fabrics make this one luxe.
links_reviews_text: It was tiny on the hanger but fit true to size. I love this jacket. Comfortable and sexy. Great WFH piece.

links_reviews_title: Warm and cute. Perfect ski sweater despite frigid temps
links_reviews_text: I wore this with two base layers underneath and still had plenty of room to move. It was comfy and warm.

links_reviews_title: Tight fit, kept me warm skiing. It has thinner breathable material at elbows and neck area
links_reviews_text: The thinner material improves flexibility while skiing with a lot of layers on.
This was really warm and comfortable. It runs a bit small because it's a fitted ski sweater.
Loved this ski sweater! It was warm, snug fitting and great to wear on the slopes under my ski jacket, even in single digit temps. Slimfitting and flattering for apres ski too!
I had no idea that rent the runway also rented snow gear! I rented this for a week in the snow and it worked perfectly. I wore it with jeans as well as on the slopes. I highly recommend it!
Great piece for active wear. I'd say it fits a tad small the large was fine if not a big tight at the hips. Solid heavier material warm without any bulk.
My favorite top so far! Thick sweater, super comfortable and fits perfect. Don't question this one, loved it!
Gorgeous details, very high end fabric was not see through, 3 compliments and felt like I stood out at a crowded trade show. Take note of the UK sizing
Loved this dress. The sleeve details are amazing and I received compliments all night. The chest and arms ran a bit small, so if you have a large chest you might want to size up.
Dress was cute--there's pockets! but definitely size up. I'm normally a size US 6. 5'9" 150lbs. Even in the size 10, the shoulder area was a little tight and uncomfortable.

This is such a pretty dress. However the fit is a bit off in the sleeves and chest area. Please note it does run a tad bit small. And also easily wrinkles. However it is a beautifully made dress that is crisp and white perfect for summer.

Wore this to work and had several people compliment me on it, but also comment that it looked "bridal" - so probably better suited for a shower or bachelorette than business casual work attire! It's a lightweight, lined dress (not sheer at all), and there isn't any stretch to it, so a pear shape may want to size up. I didn't have a problem with the extra fabric at the sleeves - it was easily tucked into the cuff when I needed my hands.

links_reviews_title: didnt wear it cause it fit weird
links_reviews_text: not good for petites
Wore this on NYE and felt like a million bucks. Tight in the shoulders/chest so do size up. Very comfortable to wear, great fabric (not see through at all). Will rent again!
Work at a conference. Beautiful fabric. Looks amazing on Tight in bust. I'm at 34D. Usually 2/4. Wore 8 well.
too tight in butt and super big in waist
Thought this would be longer. It was tighter in the hips, very short and loose in the waist. Was not good for work, which is what I had planned to wear it for
I loved this dress! I wore it to work and got non-stop compliments! Definitely will be renting again.
Sleeves were too long and the fit was tight around the chest and very big around hips. Perfect for a boxy tall shape or small chest.
I was worried about sizing up TWO sizes but was SOOO glad I did. If I was younger and wearing it out I could see going truer to size but for work (and with pockets) the sizing up was great.

This is my first RTR rental that was a total bust. The dress is beautiful and the material is very nice, but the fit is totally off. I had to size up because my usual size was unavailable so I thought this would be big and I'd have to belt it. I was wrong! It's big in the arms and chest and tight in the hips. The pockets are big and hit you right at the hips as well, which makes for an even more unflattering look. Do not rent unless you are truly built like a stick and have absolutely no hips or butt.
The dress was beautiful but the fit was terrible! It was baggy in the stomach and tight on the hips...and I am hipless! Sent it back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Easy sweater and really flattering! Versatile.

links_reviews_text: Not colors I would typically wear, but was a nice change. Wasn't crazy about the sweater as a whole though. The shoulders stood up a bit, but I like the varying lengths and the block colors. Was soft and lightweight. Not a huge fan overall though.
I think this was too big on me. The sleeves were super long and the shoulders were baggy. I liked the color blocking but it was almost too subtle in the front. Wore once, sent back.

Don't raise your arms or your belly will be exposed. Sleeves are really long and I have long arms. Maybe it's supposed to be that long, even on the model they're long. Otherwise the color combination is nice.
Liked the unique modern style, colors, and quality. Slightly cropped. Shoulders run big. Warm.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color placement and super comfortable!

links_reviews_text: Little pointy through the shoulders, but neat block colors and flattering flare at waist.
Very flattering. A little cropped for me but worked with high waisted jeans. I think hanger deformed the shoulders a bit. Sleeve length was perfect on me
fit great.
a little large but very cute

links_reviews_title: the cut makes you look narrow and tiny! love this sweater so much and will rent it again. love it!!!
links_reviews_text: fits great if you have a bust. great sillouette
Super cute and unique cut to the sweater. Loved

links_reviews_title: Shoulders did not fit at all
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were too long and the shoulders only fit when I pulled the sleeves way down
I really like the color blocking on the sweater but the material was very thick. Also, the fit was odd....the way the seams come together, it make the top look funny in the back.
I read some complaints about the fit being too long here and there but I took the chance. It fit beautifully. Loved the look. A new take on preppy.
Fits true to size. Back different than front which is a bit odd.
Oddly long arms, but short in the back. Had a nice feel to the knit but overall a bit strange and I wouldn't wear it again.

I sized up based on some other reviews, which was a big mistake. This sweater runs true to size and you do not need to size up. As a result the sleeves were way too long and the sweater was all around too big/bulky. Interesting details and color block made it better than an average sweater.

links_reviews_title: I really liked the style. Very fun and the variety of subtle colors was a nice change.
links_reviews_text: The shoulders were way too wide for me and the arms were *really* long.
I wore this one chilly weekend day. It's cute and casual. You need to wear high waisted pants with it-the front is a bit cropped

Good quality sweater but I would size down because the shoulders are big and the sleeves were too long on me I had to fold them twice. The sleeves are wool and a tad itchy but didn't really bother me. Good for a cool spring day!

This has to be the coolest thing I ever rented. The color combos are so cool. It has different pieces of gray, navy and Kelly green that work so well together. I would buy it if it was a small the medium is a little big but i made it work because i love it so much. Wore it three days in row so far because i saw different people each day!!!!

Fun, flirty, casual, comfy and lotsa compliments .... a perfect rental! With tights and a cami, I could make it work for the office. It is a little short, and low cut. But the layered look complemented the wrap dress nicely,

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color but doesn't hide anything!
links_reviews_text: I was bummed that this dress highlighted my momma belly! Also had to put a cami under it. Decided to send it back and open up another spot rather than wear it to work.

links_reviews_title: Great fit and love the wrap style!
links_reviews_text: Loved the quality, can't go wrong with DVF! Love the wrap style. I'm short but the length was fine. Work nice heels to lengthen my legs. I did have to wear tank under it because I wore it for work. Will rent again
I love this color! Wore a tank under - it definitely wouldn't have worked for me without it.
Typical DVF Wrap dress, lots of fashion tape needed. High end quality and recommend for a work meeting

I received a ton of compliments every time I wore this. Super classy and slightly retro. The fabric is thick and hides imperfections. My only complaint is that the front needed to be pinned to keep from my bra showing
Love it!

links_reviews_title: A bit more fitted than expected
links_reviews_text: The color is fantastic!! It's very boobylicious as you can see in the photo. It's a stretchy ribbed knit material. I didn't expect it to be so tight in the bottom half. It didn't feel tight, but I thought the ribbing pulled and emphasized my less than flat tummy. It's not my favorite rental, but I did get compliments on it all day.
When sitting down in this dress, I worried a little about my breasts popping out (and I have a small chest), but overall LOVED this look. Comfy, flattering and fun.

Love this classic DVF wrap and the gorgeous emerald green color. Super flattering, comfortable and appropriate for the office. Size S fit perfectly, I'm petite frame, 5'4"/115lb. Considering purchasing so I can keep it!
Fit perfectly and great material.

Absolutely LOVED this dress. Was so flattering, perfect for a 75 degree late summer day. Long enough for my tall frame, not too busty, and perfectly cinched at the waist. The color was incredible, very high quality thick fabric that covers any lines or bumps. Would buy this full priced.

Nice thick fabric, worn here with wedges but also wore with white sneakers for a sportier look. At 5'7" it felt a little short on me, like a little of a kids dress. Would have loved another 2-3 inches on the hem, but got a number of compliments and the color truly stands out.

I keep renting wrap dresses even though I find them to be extremely awkward. With that being said I still really liked this dress. The color was beautiful. It's like a cute casualish sweater dress. I did receive many compliments on it at work. I was going to pin it but did not want to be adjusting all day so just wore a tank top underneath.
Cute dress for work. Only gripe is my bra kept showing.
This dress was a good fit but I felt the material showed every lump and bump... as such I didn't end up wearing it

Proper length for work, bright color, and comfortable. Removed 1 star because like a lot of wrap dresses, I have to be sure I'm not revealing anything when I slouch or sit. Also, if you have a belly or bloated it will show
Very fun and flattering. I wore this 3x. Needed a camisole so it wouldn't show too much cleavage. But it made it much more classy

Beautiful, vibrant color, and long enough for my 5'9" frame. A classic silhouette but people notice you due to the brightness. Thick-ish fabric, enough to cover lumps but not uncomfortably hot at all. In order to tie it at a flattering fit, the back part bunched up a bit. I will rent again, and probably will get the same size (XL) because I fear it may be too short if I go smaller.

Material is thicker than I expected and it didn't travel well (got extremely wrinkled). It is low cut, I wore a camisole underneath. The color is vibrant - loved it! I received tons of compliments, I would definitely recommend this dress for work, date night or bridal shower.
The fit and the fabric make this an easy travel dress for work.
The Best Wrap Dress Ever. Lots of Cleavage!!! Wear a tank or really nice bra
It was super comfortable but shows off the cleavage A LOT!! I had to use tape to hold the dress in a comfortable place.

links_reviews_title: Compliments about the fabulous green color & fit
links_reviews_text: I did wear a white top to cover the front V
I loved everything about this dress. Perfect length for work, great adjustable fit, and gorgeous color. I loved the fabric details and how flowy the dress was when I walked.
Fit is forgiving and flattering. The collar detail makes the dress a bit more unique. So comfortable and stretchy, received many compliments.

I struggle with wrap dresses as they always fall too low in the bust for me as I am petite. With the bright color of the dress, I could not find a complimentary color tank to put under it. The material shows every curve and lump. If you love wrap dresses, this is for you. I guess wraps aren't my look.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but DVF is not for every body
links_reviews_text: I've been dying to try an iconic DVF wrap dress because who doesn't live the ease and elegance? But you know who looks great in DVF wrap dresses? Women that are built like DVF - big chest, narrower hips, long waist. Not an apple like me. I have no chest to fill out the front so the large seemed too big--I definitely needed a cammi. Maybe a M would have worked better but would it have covered my Buddha belly? The cut didn't work so well for me. The fabric is gorgeous--a heavier weight. The color is beautiful. So sorry I didn't do it justice.

This dress fit perfectly. The material was thick but stretchy, so fairly forgiving. I don't have much in the chest area, so had to pin it closed on top. I received compliments galore on the color, and turned a few heads. It's such a brilliant color that I even had an old friend call me from his office to tell me "nice green dress" - he said the lady in the green dress walking downtown on the street caught his attention from his 2nd floor office, and then he realized it was me.
Fits snug and true to size for DVF. A bit low cut.

Love DVF wrap dresses! This one doesn't disappoint... Flattering fit-flare style, nice thick material. Very well made. I wore a cami underneath so I didn't show too much cleavage. Looked great - received tons of compliments on the style and color. Would definitely rent again.

This dress looked so cute and flirty in the photos, but unfortunately it makes me look like a frumpy middle aged woman. The only thing that could make the dress worse is if you were to wear a tank top underneath which most women would do as it is unnecessarily open no matter how tight you wrap it around. I personally enjoy a fair amount of cleavage, but this dress makes it look awful. The dress hugs in all the wrong places and does not compliment my figure at all which is a major fail as this style of dress usually suits me. I can't think of anyone it would look good on. Also the way the wrap dress is designed it leaves an open hole on the side of your stomach where the "wrap" goes through.
Love the color and the fabric, but the neckline doesn't provide enough coverage for work and the belt loop can expose skin or undergarments when the dress shifts. Wanted to love it but didnt.

links_reviews_title: Go to outfit for important presentations
links_reviews_text: #bizcas #powercolor
Cross body didn't work well for me. Thanks.

The color is gorgeous. This dress is short but not so much so that I felt uncomfortable running around doing chores. It hit about mid-thigh on my 5'5", long-torsoed frame. The fit is classic DVF - perfect on hour glass figures but probably will look good on any body time.

links_reviews_title: A little big and thick in the hips
links_reviews_text: Too much room in the hips for me, I'm a more straight-figured person.
Perfect dress for travel - didn't wrinkle on two flights and was easy to wear all day. I wore a cami under it as it's quite low in the front. Will rent again for work!
Color is beautiful. I wore a tank underneath as it didn't fit the best in the chest but still looked awesome

links_reviews_title: really comfortable and the color POPS!
links_reviews_text: I had to pin the bust, but I have a large chest so I always have to pin wrap dresses …
I loved carrying this. I did not use my full size wallet.
Very roomy for a clutch and the design stands out!
Used on several occasions during the holidays

This purse was amazing. It was an oversized clutch which means you could fit a lot in there and still have fun. The clasp is very secure and you also have a zipper portion inside to put credit cards and such. If it wasn't 358 dollars I would have bought it.
This piece can be long or short. It perfectly pairs with silver and other pieces. I should have bought it!
Loved this and had fun w it. My office is frigid so it was fun to wear to work.
I love sweatshirts from RTR and this is no exception. It's so comfortable and stylish. I love how it's fitted but still casual looking. I wore my leather jacket over it which really made it work.
Great for wearing out and about. Sized up to a medium and still a little too cropped for my preference. Otherwise comfy and don't think twice about it until someone comments on the fun saying :)

This sweatshirt was so comfortable. Wore every chance I could get. Looked so cute as my “wish I was on PTO” outfit to work and then over workout clothes to a class. Perfect length for my petite frame too. Wanted to buy so badly.

links_reviews_title: Cute graphic, didn't love the fit
links_reviews_text: The sweatshirt was OK a little stiff feeling and boxy. Easy everyday choice --wore to work on a holiday when I could dress more casual.

I wore this after quitting my job and before starting my next one. It's a little odd in that it's a sweatshirt that makes you think of summer. It had a fun saying on the front that got people commenting about how they wish they were on vacation.
Tight fit. I usually wear S & M and the M wasn't tight, but quite fitted on me. If you're looking for a loose-fitting sweater, then size up.

links_reviews_title: Casual and perfect for chilly mornings/evenings!
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweatshirt for its beauty vibe and pastel colors. It has a nice weight to it, but still soft and pliable. I think it was a bit more cropped and shorter in the sleeves than ideal, but not enough that I wasn't wearing it regularly. I wore this with jeans, torn jean shorts, and my running shorts. It looks great with the distressed jeans look and white bottoms, so definitely versatile in pairing it with your basics.

Great weekend wear, runs small so if you're looking to be casual and comfy, I would recommend going a size up. Super cute styled with white jeans as shown - lots of compliments. Not super snuggly on the inside as it's been dry cleaned.
cute for vacation, it's a little short waisted, but still cute enough to wear!
fairly cropped and fitted, cute fit, fun saying; a fun casual vacation sweatshirt
Thought about buying this, but I don't need more sweatshirts. It was so cozy I fell asleep in it one night!
So comfortable for lounging or wearing to the gym - fits TTS - would rent again for sure
I wore this with high rise yoga pants and it was so comfy. It's just a sweatshirt but perfect for my so cal life driving my kids around or running errands!

This sweatshirt is what it is. I personally prefer shirts to be a little longer- this barley hit my hip bones so it made my torso look even shorter than it is. I liked it though and wore it a few times. The material is pretty thick/stiff which I think comes from it being a high quality shirt, however it just looks boxy- which can be great for lounging around. It just doesn't do my body type any favors (big boobs, small waist, short torso).

I was loathe to return this and even considered buying it, but decided I'd rather just rent it again in the future since summer is coming to an end. It's nothing special except that it's the PERFECT sweatshirt. Comfy, stylist but not over the top with the design, not too thick, but not too thin, perfect length (not quite cropped but perfect with high-rise jeans/shorts. I also loved that it was cut a bit narrower so it was flattering too. I got lots of compliments. I could've probably gone with the medium but it wasn't available.
Easy weekend sweatshirt. Might be short on long-torsos.
Cute sweatshirt. If you don't care for a cropped look, size up since it runs short
I wore this with light pink slacks and heels to work. Really cute and can dress up or down.
Super cute!
just a fun sweatshirt for the weekend

links_reviews_title: Really high waisted, not great for larger bottoms
links_reviews_text: I normally wear anywhere from 25-27 because my waist and height is quite small but I've got a bigger bottom, thighs, and calves. These jeans were not very flattering as they were very saggy in the crotch so I kept having to pull them up. And when I pulled them up the pockets on the back would go up so high it made my butt look huge (not a good thing). Would probably be better for a less curvy girl. very forgiving/stretchy waist - prob why it's too big for me.
Rented a 28R. I'm 5'4" & length is perfect. Soft, stretchy, slimming denim. Love love the look, feel, and fit of these jeans! Difficult to part with.

These fit perfectly. I wore them three times. Twice out and once just for running around on a Saturday. They finally started to stretch a little with the third wear but not badly. They were a little uncomfortable while sitting for long periods as they aren't "stretchy" material.

These jeans fit perfectly. They were skinny with a rise of 10" which was not too high but not medium. The length of 27" went great with my booties and vans. They didn't get too saggy after multiple wears. I would buy these.

These were so tight all over. I could barely button them. Bending down was a problem as they were tight around the knees as well. I normally wear a 26 and sometimes a 27 for comfort. I rented these in a 26. I wore them around the house for a few hours, but then they went back. The sweater in the picture ia also RTR.

links_reviews_title: Maybe they run small, or maybe I'm just running big this winter ....
links_reviews_text: I super love the color!! Not stonewashed but also not blue. These are definitely the 'painted on' jeans Luke Bryan always sings about. Wearing 29R in the picture and I will definitely rent one or 2 sizes larger next time. I normally wear an 8, occasionally a 10. Great condition. Wearing with RTR top - Duke Stripe Pullover by Splendid - https://rtr.app.link/GIcUtogN52
I'm about 125 pounds right now and this fit great but a tiny bit snug in the stomach. Comfortable for an hour but then I had to unbutton
These are good jeans that maintain their shape without stretching too much. The jeans were snug in the ankles especially when you go to take them off.
The ankle is a little tight but the fit was great everywhere else.
These run extremely small compared to Paige, Hudson, and other name brand jeans. Ankles are extremely tight. Did not wear as they were just too tight.
Lower legs a bit tight

I don't understand the sizing of these jeans. I ordered a 29, having just recently measured myself and I could barely put them on. It's a shame too because the legs looked great and I really love the wash on the these. I would say order at least double your size if you're going to order!
Ran super small. Much lighter color in person than in the picture
I'm normally a 29 but would have easily needed to go 2 sizes bigger. Could barely get it to my hips.

links_reviews_title: Fell in love but size too small for me
links_reviews_text: I am normally a 28 but that wasn't available so I ordered the 27. If they stretched it might have worked but these have almost no stretch. They felt like a dream though! They hugged really nicely and flattered my curves. They're the sturdiest jeans I've ever put on and felt really nice. I have small calves and ankles and these are the only jeans that have ever fit that area properly. I think a 28 would be perfect so I'll have to wait around for them to become available!
I couldn't decide from the mixed reviews if. I should rent my usual size or size up. I rented my usual size and could barely get my foot in. Sending right back
These jeans fit great but were unusually tight around the ankle (odd spot). I love that they do not stretch out and become baggy as you wear them.

links_reviews_title: Great color, did not stretch out, so comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Love the boot cut length, I'm 5'9 and often find that boot cut or ankle pants are too short. I love where the jeans hit the hip because it makes wearing cropped sweaters possible without showing too much stomach. Super flattering jeans, love the detail on them and the fraying at the bottom! Felt like a million bucks in these jeans and would buy if only they didn't also cost $$$.
Soft, stretchy denim. Doesn't stretch out with wear. Flattering fit, comfortable higher-but-not-too-high waistline.
These have been the best fitting jeans I've rented. Love them!

Very tight but enough stretch that they still look good and are comfortable. Love the color and little details. I'm keeping these jeans longer than anything else because I can wear them with so many things. Would buy if they weren't so expensive!

Loved the look of the jean and the waistband, super unique. There's very little stretch in the fabric and getting them over my calves was a little bit of a herculean effort. I have a nice curve on my calves that puts me in the category of sometimes needing extra stretch with boots and pants. Once on (and the fit was perfect for the waist), I tried to pull an "evil stepsister wearing cinderella's glass slipper" and pretend like it wasn't hard to move around in them, but sadly they were just too tight below the knee and had to go back.
they fit me like a glove. PERFECT. The length on me was just like the model.
This sweater was perfect for Midwest spring weather! It's a tad sheer in spots but I wore high waisted pleather leggings and a bra Leyte under and it was perfect! So comfortable and cozy!!
The knitting has a lot of "holes" so to speak, so you need a cami underneath. This is a fun sweater, but it's super cropped.

Received so many compliments on this sweater! It is quite short but not a problem on my 5'2" frame. The material was thick and cozy. Definitely need to wear a cami or tee underneath as there are some small holes knitted in by design.
Love the neck and soft yarn, but overall this sweater wasn't for me. It was way too short, and the sleeves are very wide.
This sweater fit great, it was a little too short o wear with leggings, but I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Comfy and warm but too short
links_reviews_text: This sweater is very warm and comfy. As many others have said, it's dove grey, not cream colored. The sleeves are gigantic so I rolled them but it was hard to get them to stay rolled. I loved the collar. But the sweater itself is too short and the sides are even shorter. It would be more flattering if it was a few inches longer.

I love this sweater! So cozy and perfect for fall weather. It isn't too heavy but keeps you warm, especially if you have a layer on under. The sleeves and neckline were my favorite. I wore it with white pants and boots for a birthday brunch with my fam. Also wore it with leggings after a yoga class and it was still a cute casual look. Definitely recommend!

I wish I could post multiple photos of this sweater bc I wore it so many times. I decided to rent this sweater for my trip to Iceland and Ireland and I wore it as much as I could! Every time someone would compliment me, they would ask where I got it lol! Amazing sweater!! The bell sleeves and the fringe on the bottom make this piece so much fun!!! I wish I would have bought this item but I know I'll be renting it again in the future so I might just end up buying it in the end, who knows!
Super cute and casual sweater! Wore for our engagement pictures. Would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Nice comfy sweater, with tassels for fun!
links_reviews_text: This is just an all around comfy choice - easy sweater to wear - nice and roomy with slightly belled sleeves.
Only complaint is that from the photo this appears to be white. It's absolutely grey but I still loved its stylish design and got a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much i had to buy it
links_reviews_text: I actually rented this sweater for a photo shoot and due to a large snow storm my package didnt arrive in time but i insisted on having it for pictures that i eneded up finding it online and buying it. It is absolutely adorable .. i bought a small though and im already pretty short and when i put my hands up my stomach shows so keep that in mind.. runs short

This sweater is more grey silver color than the cream pictured Very warm not boxy at all not frumpy fitted perfectly Sleeves were a little short on me but my arms are long - Sweater itself was a little cropped on me as well so i wore a camisole underneath to prevent cold drafts Not itchy which was a win win Love the fringes on the edge adds so much style

Perfect sweater for ski resort. I folded back sleves to eat dinner. Its a bit higher cut on sides (wore a camy under). Also some bigger holes down front /back so beware if it will be breezy. Loved the campy cute tassles!
Wore this out to dinner with friends. So comfortable and so stylish with the bell sleeves. Would rent again!

Soft and cute sweater fits very boxy and a little cropped on the sides. It's more of a light gray than a cream color. Not itchy. Sleeves are hard to eat dinner with, I made big cuffs with them to keep them out of the salsa and guacamole. Haha

This shawl-sweater is so cute for day or a casual evening in a ski resort town. I wore it around Jackson Hole, WY for a girl trip, and wore it with dark brown pleather pants. It's comfortable - but FYI - very warm. I didn't even wear a jacket that night (in 20 degree weather) b/c it was so warm.

This sweater was perfect for my thanksgiving party I attended. The fringe and bell sleeves add character to what could've been another boring, plain sweater. The sleeves are long but if you fold them up it fits/looks better.
I wasn't sure what to think after seeing photos. I was hoping it wouldn't be lumpy and shapeless. It looks amazing! Not bulky. Cute but still a little sexy. Can be dressed up or down.
Beautiful color (oatmeal) and softer than I️ expected. It's very warm so I️ didn't even need a jacket. Very flattering and the fringe was super cute.

I loved this sweater! It's great for a chilly night or fall weekend adventure. The overall style is a little over sized so sizing down may not be a bad idea. I typically wear a medium so that's what I rented (and still loved) but I would have been a little happier with a small. The sides do cut higher than the front so I paired mine with high waisted jeans.
The fit was true to size. It was very comfy on and was so soft to the touch. I love the sleeves and the tassels. It was a great sweater with jeans and ankle boots. Perfect intro to fall weather.
High quality and super cozy :)
This sweater is the perfect addition to any fall wardrobe. I absolutely loved the big sleeves and flowy fringe. This sweater is slightly cropped at the sides.
Wore with jeans and booties. Super cozy! Great design--loved the balance between the wide arms and the cut.

links_reviews_title: Wore it multiple times and got multiple compliments
links_reviews_text: Really unique sweater. Very comfortable. I did wear a tank underneath as the stitching is a little wider.

links_reviews_title: It was cute, wore to work
links_reviews_text: It ran short, I'm about 6'0 and it didn't hit in the right place!
I loved the chunky turtle neck. I would pair with a mid rise jean so you have tummy coverage.
Great everyday sweater. Super warm. Got so many compliments!
Small was a little cropped and showed my stomach even with high waisted jeans. Really cute but not the most flattering on me.
Overall it's cute but I felt the color was a little off. Cream in the RTR app, but more taupe-gray in person. It's a cute piece but in my opinion has seen some wear so it looks a little washed out...
This sweater is huge and also has bell sleeves which makes it worse. Size down!
I really liked the sweater but the sleeves were really baggy/loose and the body was a little shorter than I was hoping (I have a longer torso). But overall it fit well.
I didn't realize that the holes in the sweater were so large! You'd have to wear something underneath and i just think that's bulky and uncomfortable. Also, the material is kind of cheap looking.
