I wore this to the UN. It was elegant and looks like a designer dress but more importantly, it FEELS like a designer dress. The photos don't due justice to the material. The material! It's beautiful

links_reviews_title: Not the usual I expect from Proenza
links_reviews_text: The dress is a ribbed tank dress but too long. The cropped thing on top is too short. I thought this dress was not flattering on my body type and the short crop made it feel very awkward and just waiting for a peekaboo disaster to happen. I returned without wearing to work.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but wasn't flattering on me
links_reviews_text: I liked the idea of this dress but the fabric was stiffer than I anticipated, which resulted in some lumpiness. It also cut me off weirdly at the hips. I think this would fit a straight and narrow person better than someone with a bust and hips.

Great quality knit. Felt very luxe. Didn't notice the dude hidden zipper at first. The two hidden zippers are nice to help put on the double layers easier. Only drawback is it could have draped looser in the chest. Maybe I'll try sizing up, because the top layer rode up when I raised my arms and I was adjusting it constantly.
I really wanted to wear this dress. It's beautiful and clearly very high quality. Unfortunately it was just too long on me.

This dress is a tank dress with a cropped sweater overlay. I took a close up picture of the sweater fabric. Very nice. The dress has a side zip and is very fitted but is not too tight. The cropped sweater zips in the back and is attached to the tank dress at the top of the straps. With the heavy fabric, this Dress is a bit of a challenge to get on, but once on lays nicely and does not need additional adjustments. Just make sure to put it on before doing your hair and makeup. If you do not like to emphasize your midsection this may not be the dress for you, but it was fine to wear to work once. Arrived new with tags which is always a bonus.

links_reviews_title: So nice, I rented this twice!
links_reviews_text: I wore this exquisite dress on my first day at a new job and for a big meeting. The fabric hugs you hips, be warned. The shell on top is loose which makes it a less mermaid-body-con. I can't rave enough about this dress!
I rented this for work but it was way too form fitting. I would've been very uncomfortable at work and we're not overly formal.
Kind of hard to get into alone. Very well made but it's a sweater dress with a zipper so the waist line gets thrown off a little. It's gorgeous though.

links_reviews_title: it was difficult to put on, however once on it looked great
links_reviews_text: tight, heavy, manageable

I think that the popover on this dress needs to be bigger...as it is, it doesn't flatter the figure because it is too close to the body. There is a gap, but not big enough to clearly distinguish from the bottom part of the dress. The skirt of the dress is nicely cut though.

links_reviews_title: Cute idea, not the best fit
links_reviews_text: I liked the idea of the dress but it was complicated to get on/ off and the top hit right at my lower belly "pooch" which was unflattering. Overall, cute idea but didn't fit me well

links_reviews_title: CEO worthy style with a flattering fit
links_reviews_text: I received many compliments on this dress. The slight mermaid cut is very flattering for a petite person. The material is heavy and very high quality.

Well made dress, very nice fabric. This one is super hard to get in and out of. There is a zipper up the side on the under dress and one up the back on the over shirt. Took me forever to dress myself!
This dress was a good fit for 28-week pregnancy. Fabric had comfortable give while maintaining structure
I really wanted to love this dress. It fits great and material is very high quality, but it is just frumpy
Good fit.

This dress was a little odd fitting for me. It is actually a tank sweater dress connected to a cropped sweater. I had trouble with where the two pieces connected (at the shoulder) - it may have just been how it fit me, but I ended up not wearing it. The fabric is nice and heavy/thick, so great for fall, but I think it may be better on a taller person (I am 5'5").

links_reviews_title: Different take on your typical LBD, thick material and so flattering. I LOVED THIS!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress. I wore both for New Years Eve Party and work and it transitioned perfectly. A little tight around the bust and arms, but flexible. You can't tell in photo, but the material is very thick and feels like you are well supported. It adds shape with the tight under dress and looser popover. Different than anything else I've seen on here. Definitely renting again!

Not much more to add here but second what other reviewers have said about the high quality and construction but unfortunate tummy-enhancing fit of this dress. Beautiful dress, but did not feel confident so did not wear.
Super comfortable and feels stylish and work-appropriate. Personally, I'd have preferred it to be just below the knee, and this dress is a tad longer than that on me, but it's a great dress.
Great shape, construction, and fit. Looked so good with black suede booties. Looked great even though I am only 5 ft tall...

links_reviews_title: Very fitted. Day-to-night with the right accessories!
links_reviews_text: This is a midi body con dress. Very flattering! Love the textures of the ribbing on bottom and fine knit for the top.

I'm usually a 2/4 and the SR was a bit tight, but because of the stretch in the fabric it was manageable. Needed Spanx to even out the mid-section/backside lumps & bumps. Loved the cropped top overlay, although having it attached to the underlying dress made it difficult to get on and off. Perfect for a cold evening and easy to accessorize. (I wore with the Oscar de la Renta red Dreamcatcher earrings.)

links_reviews_title: If you have a super flat tummy and hips or spanx this is for you
links_reviews_text: Wanted to love it as it's beautifully made. However, I just didn't feel comfortable it it. The top is almost a separate piece that hits below the bust so it accentuates the mid section. Didn't have Spanx with me and didn't want to suck in for the entire event!

links_reviews_title: Chic - i wish I could keep it
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Great weight for winter, and luxurious feel. Only 4 stars because the fit up top is slightly weird. The shirt is boxy and the dress is tight and fitted. But I wore this a bunch of times to fancy dinners and parties and it was always a hit.
Size was fine I didn’t like the sleeves.

I'm 5'2" with a short torso and found the dress was not very flattering due to the cape overlay. The underlying tank dress is a beautiful thick knit material and very fitted, but with the cape overtop, it hung below my natural waist leaving me looking wider than I had hoped. Because of that, I did not wear it.
This dress was totally not what I expected based on photos. Very heavy fabric, runs small, not flattering. Got it with tags still on but returned unworn.
Heavier than expected but nice quality. Would totally rent again.

This item was super great and was exactly what i was looking for -- I actually wanted to keep these earrings, but they were too heavy to wear long term and the backs were a little lose. I ended up using my own but I would definitely rent again.
These were cute but not for me...they were heavy and gave me 80 vibes in their jewelry. Also looked weird with my 2nd and 3rd piercings

I desperately needed a subtle hoop for work and these were perfect. Lightweight, easy to wear and not too overstated, they are a perfect addition to spruce up any outfit. Can't wait to wear in the summer back to a tee and denim!

links_reviews_title: Really beautiful, but they were way too heavy.
links_reviews_text: They were so heavy that they kept pulling out of my ear (like unattaching the back). I couldn't wear them.

links_reviews_title: The vacation was canceled, I didn't wear.
links_reviews_text: The vacation was canceled, I didn't wear.
These are a great thick gold hoop, but they're solid rather than hollow so they get heavy after a few hours.

I've been looking for a pair of earrings like this for a while and I'm very happy I rented these, but they are pretty heavy. I will wear them for 3 or 4 hours but found I had to take them off to give my lobes a break while wearing them in the office. Going forward I will probably just wear them for events instead of everyday use.
Great earring, kind of heavy. I was able to put bling dots on to help with the weight and those helped a lot.
These earrings are totally on trend but are also WAY bigger than expected (super super thick). Wore them once but wasn't excited to wear them again.
Cute but pretty heavy
Hoop diameter is 1.25 inches - was expecting something smaller
Very comfortable and easy to wear. Wore to work. I will take it on vacation.
Was cozy, comfortable, and perfect for autumn weather. Thought about buying. Easy to make it dressy, casual, style in different ways. Highly recommend.
I love anything from Fuzzi and this cardigan was another fun statement. Runs big, but it's meant to be oversized. Soft, not itchy at all
Fits a little large, probably could have sized down to a medium. I wore this 3x in a week in all different settings. The only thing that could Make it better would be pockets! Beautiful.
Very well made...great quality. Definitely an oversized fit. The pattern was cool but I didn't love it. Wore once and returned.

The quality on this sweater is gorgeous. The knit is incredibly silky soft, and drapes perfectly. You can tell craftsmanship went into this material. Order a size down. It runs very large. It's also a bit heavy. As a result, the sweater pulled from my shoulders.

I liked this sweater for casual Friday, and running errands and visiting the zoo on a sunny but cool fall Saturday. The sweater has fuzzier and some shiny knits in the pattern, which sets off the detail. Fit is right for the style.
All stretched out. Wonderful customer service. I called so they would not put this back in inventory and they opened a new slot immediately for me. Thank you Rent the Runway!

links_reviews_title: It's adorable with spanx and a T-shirt
links_reviews_text: It's a size 10 and wore an XL that was big but cozy. Too big to belt.
Love this. Was mistaken for a local at the ski resort, it was so perfect. Will rent again.
Comfy warm sweater.

links_reviews_title: I loved this sweater! Very comfortable and tons of compliments each time I wore it!
links_reviews_text: It is not form fitting but the pattern and details are eye-catching and the length makes you look taller.

links_reviews_title: These designer clothes seem to run larger than the clothes I buy!
links_reviews_text: Big in the shoulders and long in the sleeve.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfy but size down
links_reviews_text: I should have got a medium. The large was falling off of me but I love the pattern and texture. Really enjoyed this
I wore this a bunch! With jeans, a grey midi dress, to work and even glancing. Heavy knit and cozy.
Over sized fit. Fabulous material!
too big for me.
The quality of this cardigan is amazing. I loved it so much I've been wearing it everyday

links_reviews_title: Beautiful sweater, but does run large.
links_reviews_text: Received a ton of compliments on this sweater. It does run a bit large and the sleeves are a little weird but overall it is a beautiful sweater great for fall for work or play.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love this more, but...
links_reviews_text: Based on reviews, I sized down. However the fit wasn't ideal. The sweater clung to areas of my body that weren't particularly flattering, but was huge at the shoulders (and I have broad shoulders!), so I'm not sure that staying TTS and ordering a medium would help much. Such a shame because I love the print of the sweater. Like other reviewers have said, I wish it had pockets!

links_reviews_title: Perfect way to make an outfit more fun
links_reviews_text: Cozy and cute. Runs large but would rent again

links_reviews_title: I just wore it to work
links_reviews_text: It's a beautiful cardigan, I got lots of compliments on it. It was a little big and not as warm as I was hoping.
I really liked the style of this sweater but it was too large. May rent again in a smaller size.
I could live in this. Cozy, comfy, and flattering. If it had pockets, I would buy it.
I loved this sweater and people complimented me all the time. It's very high quality and held its shape well.

links_reviews_title: Nice addition to a black outfit
links_reviews_text: The fit was a bit big. I could have definitely worn a medium or small. If you are short like me size down so you do not drown in it. Nice classic oversized cardigan. Wore to work and on the weekend and dressed it down with legging jeans and boots.
Warm but not too thick. Runs quite large so I belted it. Wore with leggings and boots. Great Western pattern.

links_reviews_title: Great light layer but runs large.
links_reviews_text: I loved the patterns on this sweater and the fact that it was a good layering piece on cool days. The down side was the fit, I normally wear a size 8/10 and can do medium to large on certain tops so the XL was huuuuge on me. I'm thinking if you normally wear large go for medium in this style.
Wore to work one day and thought it was really cute, I thought it ran a little big and the sleeves seemed kind of baggy so I returned after one wear
Pretty boxy
Fits well but runs a bit large. I may rent again but a size smaller. The pattern is very pretty.

I originally rented the medium but since it ran big, I rented the size small for another shipment. So happy I did, the small fit my 5'1' frame very well. I hope fuzzi makes more long cardigans like this in more colors!

links_reviews_title: Fun to wear. I wore it to work on casual day.
links_reviews_text: A limitless on the large side. I would get the med next time, but it is oversized so it didn't matter too much.
This sweater is beautiful, well made, but does run a bit large. This does make it cozy though :)

This was a nice long cardigan. Fits true to size, is pretty loose and flowy. I really liked the pattern on it and the fabric is surprisingly silky and has kind of a sheen to it which made it feel like I could have dressed it up a bit more, but I mostly wore it for casual stuff and on my flights home for the holidays. It's pretty light-weight so wasn't ideal for the Minnesota winter, probably would work with another lightweight turtleneck or something under it. It was super comfy on the plane with just a t-shirt, I just wish it had pockets. It did seem to sort of slip off my shoulders a bit, but maybe could be fixed by wearing something with a bit more texture under it.
Very nice, hangs well. Runs a bit big. Colors very nice.

links_reviews_title: Nice cardigan for work or casual wear
links_reviews_text: This was a nicely patterned sweater to wear to work a couple of times with leggings and boots.
Gorgeous pattern and fabric. It was a little long on me but still looked great.
Very nice, but I think it runs big.

links_reviews_title: Worked great and made a casual outfit feel more put together
links_reviews_text: I will definitely wear this one more than once!
I rented a size 28R, normally wear size 28. They are loose in the legs but for someone with larger thighs and a smaller waist they work great! I love these jeans.

These high-waisted jeans were a little slice of heaven! They held me in at all the right places and the extended cuffs were on point. I could roll them up, leave them down, pair them with tennies or booties or...

links_reviews_title: Maybe my favorite RTR jeans so far!
links_reviews_text: I really love these! High rise, perfect amount of stretch, interesting detail at the bottom hem. I loved the length - I'm 5'2" so they would definitely be cropped on someone taller.
These jeans fit perfectly and were very cute with the cut. I wore them a few times to work and casually.
If you're 5'5 and under these won't be cropped. Very cute though!
Great fit worked well with my boots !

These are a nice departure from skinny jeans with straight legs and an interesting reverse denim detailing around the calves. They fit true to size but were just slightly tight in the waist for me. Would probably rent again in a few months.
I did not want to give these jeans up! I wore them multiple times and absolutely fell in love with them. Great detail and the bottom that made them so much more special than "normal" jeans.
Wore to work on a Friday and will definitely wear again this weekend was surprised with how much I liked them! True to size for sure
I was so excited to try my first pair of high waisted jeans now that they are back in fashion. I was able mix them in with several pieces from RTR and my personal wardrobe!

AGs are my standard go-to jeans. I Have never rented jeans on RTR, so this was a first. It was successful, because I have many pairs of AGs in my closet I couldn't imagine the 27s not fitting. And they fit perfectly. I don't think I personally would purchase these since they are such a trendy look, but they were totally fun to wear more than once on my RTR unlimited.
These ran a lot smaller than I was expecting. I might have to go up 2 sizes
I wore these several times on vacation they didn't stretch out. They were very comfy. I'd consider buying them.
They fit great and looked great.

I'm between a 24-25 and got the 25. I was seriously concerned with how tight the waist was until I read the reviews. They also majorly loosen up throughout the day. The 25 was fine, but to be more comfortable (traveling etc) I would definitely go up 1-2 sizes. I would rent again but try the 26! They're very well made; sizing is just tricky. I'm very straight and narrow and have had a baby so my waist probably expanded just enough to have this issue.
I have other size 26 jeans in my closet that fit, but I couldn't get these over my hips. May run small or just have less stretch than others.
Love these! Git great and adorable with the light color on the bottom. Keeping them for a while!
Very cute and love the cuff detail. These were my regular size, but they were a little too small for my hourglass figure. Going to size up and try again.
Love the style, too tight at the waist for me. Going to try one size up.
Great jeans
Fit well, comfortable
The detail on the bottom of these jeans is great. Unfortunately, the top is not at all flattering. They are small in the waist with no give.

links_reviews_title: Omg I love these pants. They are high wasted but not uncomfortable at all!
links_reviews_text: Great fit. I even looked like I had a butt!

links_reviews_title: Not true to size. Get two size up at least.
links_reviews_text: Couldn't get them over my butt or hips.
Solid high rise jeans that hold you in and fit well through the thighs and waist

links_reviews_title: I had a casual lunch at a brewery whole hanging out with family and my dog.
links_reviews_text: The jeans were comfy, trendy, and easy to style. I felt great in these jeans!
Fun casual look, good fit
Cute but too small

This was my first pair of AG jeans to try, and I really liked them. Nothing super fantastic, but they were good quality and didn't stretch after multiple wears. I didn't purchase because we are going into Fall and these are cropped, but I did really like them!
Very fitted skinny jeans
Rent these jeans!!! They are so flattering and comfortable. I would have worn them every day if I could - I had to keep. Love!
Very high waisted and runs extremely small. I normally wear a 26 and got this in a 27 as I wanted it loose and comments mentioned it ran small. The 27 was super tight.
Not quite short enough on me
Love the high waist and unique style.
I really liked these but was not able to wear them as they ran small.
Love the fit of AG high waist. Curve hugging and flattering on curvy behinds. I sized up for calf circumference and comfort and I'm glad I did.
Tight fitting

links_reviews_title: hung off me like a big bag
links_reviews_text: way too big.
They fit perfectly. I want to live in them.

I should have ordered my regular size but sized up because reviewers said there is no stretch. These jeans are super comfortable and have a great rise. I wore them a lot, then saw that Nordstrom Rack had them for $79, so I decided not to keep/purchase them at the RTR price.

links_reviews_title: Way too big and heavy for me to wear comfortably.
links_reviews_text: Very heavy and big.
Love these earrings. Weighty but delicate and go great with short hair
Quite heavy but very high quality.
I like them they look good, but they are heavy. They get caught on winter clothing and tangled.
Extremely heavy. Couldn't leave these in for more than 20 min
Absolutely loved this. It was so cozy and I loved the slouchy style. Worked great as a fall staple in my 2nd and 3rd trimesters. Would definitely rent again as a non-pregnant person!
Really cute but way too big in the sleeves and the shoulders were really stretched by the hanger.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, I wore it to work and on the weekend. The sleeves are long but comfortable fit.
links_reviews_text: Great everyday sweater.
This ran large, but was intentional with the style. Super soft and easy to throw on over anything.
Super comfortable and very cozy
I loved this cardigan, I wore it twice in a week. It was so comfortable and matched with black and white. If it wasn't so expensive, I would have bought it!

Super cute dress that screams "It's summer!". Can't wear a bra and it is quite short, but if you can handle that, this is the PERFECT fun, flirty dress for a warm day. Great colors, got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Too Bulky, Arm pits are in your waist
links_reviews_text: Not flattering at all. Its far to bulky and doesn't fit quite right. The sleeve arm pits are sagging down to you waist line. I hated it and never wore it.

This sweater fit perfectly on me, the sleeves were just the right length and everything. I was a little concerned they would be long, but luckily no problems! I would definitely rent this again, it was really cute!!
It's a cheerful color with subtle speckles of other spring color threads woven throughout. It is a bit oversized in the arms, with a dolman style sleeve. Great for a comfy, causal, chilly spring day.
No itch , nice weight sweater.

Rented this for work and loved it! Very cozy and I didn't get too warm in it, even with temperatures in the mid 50s here. I knocked a star off because the XL I wore was big all over, but especially in the sleeves. Even though I normally wear an XL, I think a large would've fit better. Still a great rental all the same! Maybe I'll try it in a size large next time

links_reviews_title: Plenty nice enough sweater. Lovely color.
links_reviews_text: Soft yarn. I have long arms, and the sleeves were a little short. It looked a bit hanger worn. The sleeves were generously cut in the underarm area. Not quite roomy enough for a dolman sleeve, but a bit big for regular sleeves. Glad I got to use my birthday Pro perk on this.
Very warm. The sleeves are extra large at the armpit which isn't the most flattering. I wouldn't wear it again, although the color was very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear ... neck was too large.
links_reviews_text: Pros: Soft material Cons: Neck was just too wide, it looks like it was stretched versus designed that way. Therefore, did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Great spring color, but too bulky to be flattering.
links_reviews_text: I chose this sweater for its bright Pepto Bismol color, and it did not disappoint on that score. A nice early March pop for my wardrobe. But it was too bulky for me, and the sleeves were too long. So not very flattering, I'm afraid.
Maybe it would look better in an oversized fit?

Very comfortable sweater in a beautiful pink with some colorful knit threads. Great for everyday and office. Love the neckline, its very flattering! It does cuff a bit at the end of the sweater. I don't always want to rent J.Crew on RTR amongst other designers, but this was a great find and great sweater!

links_reviews_title: Just ok sweater for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: I've worn this a few times and will send it back as soon as my next item comes. The color is more of a pepto bismol pink than I had anticipated but with heathered bits of red, blue and yellow. The knit is pretty soft but oddly itchy given the fiber composition. I would not rent again but it was all right for a couple of wears.

links_reviews_title: Solid basic black T that can be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: Did not find it to be as snug in the shoulders as other renters described, but did feel movement to be slightly restricted.

I am absolutely NOT one of those people with sensory issues but the back tag on this shirt made it unwearable for me. Wore it around the house for 30mins and just couldn't handle it. I've never had this issue before. Had no issues with the arms being tight.
The fit in the arms was a little snug but the shirt looked great.

links_reviews_title: Eh, this shirt is fine, nothing special.
links_reviews_text: I'd say it runs true to size or maybe a little bit big. The material feels kind of cheap. I could see the outline of my bra underneath, so ended up wearing a cami as well.
Nothing mind blowing But comfortable and flattering. Did not want to return.
This blouse fit a little off in the shoulder and under the arms. The shoulder fit was wider and the under arm was slimmer.
Tight in arms. Didn't wear because all my pants are black and blue.
Loved the tight and flattering fit of the knit along with the flow of the bottom.

I don't actually love the pattern of this dress, but I thought it was cheery and fun and it looks good on. It's a thick knit fabric that retains its shape very well. It fit perfectly and is very comfortable. I got lots of compliments on this rental and enjoyed wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Good for November weather in Texas
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to work on a warm day in November in Texas. I liked it a lot- I did not love it. I did get a few compliments. It is a bit short, but when it arrived, the bottom half inch of the dress was folded backwards which made it even shorter. I had to iron it out flat (the sleeves were the same way). Overall, it's a fun dress, I think I would have preferred to wear it on a day like Cinco de Mayo because of how colorful it is. But it worked well with booties and the fabric is thick.
Good fit and fabric!

Loved this dress. It worked very well in Miami heat while also being forgiving fabric for my body type. I have a shorter torso so the dress felt a tiny bit long for me but overall it was great for work.
An easy and cute dress that requires no work to look good - happy renting!
Nice happy pattern helped to brighten the first cold autumn days. Wore with a black bolero to keep warm. Felt great

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, Casual and Bright
links_reviews_text: Worth a rental for any season. Too short for work, too baggy for a date night or "wow" moment, but perfect for a bright, daytime look.

Thank goodness it was a cool day, because tights were essential so this dress was not obscene on me. It was very, very short on this tall girl. I almost did not wear it, but thought it was ok with some navy tights on. The dress seemed pretty tight to me. The arms were a little tight and it was hard to get on (it's just a pull on). It was clingy, so it leaves nothing to the imagination in the tummy area. The dress pattern was fun though. Lots of different colors and different raised textures.

I received compliments, but didn't think it was very flattering. I liked the pattern and detail of the fabric, but it wasn't as soft as other knit clothing. It was also too short for work so I wore stockings.

links_reviews_title: Bright stripes to finish up summer
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a rehearsal dinner and got so many compliments. Everyone loved it. I had to wear spanx but if I was 5lbs lighter it would have been perfect fit. I absolutely loved the colors and felt so pretty.
Great colors. Might be too short for an average sized person. Would rent again.

This was unfortunately a little snug on my tall curvy frame, but heck was it cuuuuute!!! I think if I wasn't so tall it would have still been a winner with some shapewear, but it was just too short to be worn "as-is". I ended up tossing a pair of black biker style shorts underneath and wore it as a sporty-vibe.
Shoshanna did it again! Great fabric, print, and shape. Such a fun rental!

This dress was much brighter than pictured, and it has a very flattering fit! I only got to wear this once but would love to rent it again for work...or play! I think depending on the shoes and accessories, it would be great for both.
Heavy knit that did stretch slightly upon wearing. Excellent cut. Color are vibrant.

Loved this more than I was expecting- I thought the color might be too bold but it was perfect for work and the weekend. The material is think and is not skin-tight which I found to be very flattering. Compliments on this dress each time I wore it. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit that stands out at work. Super photogenic
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. So flattering and comfortable. Very photogenic! I have narrow shoulders and this fit perfectly
So cute and so comfortable. Wish I owned it.
Love this dress!!!! So cute and comfortable. A little short but it's okay.

I was hesitant about this dress but loved it. I got many compliments as it's pretty standout but still very classy. The colors are very vibrant, material is thick and is flattering. I've never seen a dress quite like it! Highly recommend. It's not as fit and flare as it looks, more A-line.
Loved wearing it. It is very flattering and visually interesting. Got lots of compliments.

I thought this would be a great dress to take me from work to dinner in the summer. I'm so happy with it! Apologies for the awkward photo, but I wanted to show the fit. I love the way this looks on me! I think it flatters my pear-shaped figure really well, and I love the length on my 5'2" frame. The fabric is really beautiful. It's a thick, lovely knit, but the material is breathable and comfortable (and not sheer, but I did wear nude undergarments to be safe). I wore this to work with a cardigan and then right out to dinner. I got so many compliments on this dress! So pleased with the quality and fit, and the beautiful colors and texture of the knit make this such a great summer piece that perfectly balances fun with class.
This was slightly more casual/summery in person than I thought it would be from the pictures, but it was still appropriate for my office. Material has some stretch but it wasn't tight or binding.
nice colors, stretchy, forgiving
This dress looked and felt great on me! It was a little hard to squeeze over the head but once it was on it was fantastic!
Fits great! Very flattering and professional

links_reviews_title: nice and bright, got lots of compliments would considering buying if it was cheaper
links_reviews_text: great dress
Got compliments all day with this dress. Nice thick and soft material that had great structure.
Stripes can be hard but this dress was so flattering!

Fit perfectly. Not clingy. Room in midsection if going to dinner! I'm usually a 4-6 on bottom with muscular legs and booty but 2 on top due to narrower shoulders/collarbone. The medium was perfect. The hem on the bottom and the sleeves was rolled up once from wear and dry cleaning but due to the pattern is did not affect the look.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Perfect colors, fit, and style!
links_reviews_text: Just a perfect dress for transitioning from day to night—it can go anywhere!

links_reviews_title: OMG I want to keep it forever!
links_reviews_text: Wow, what a gorgeous dress! I want to keep it in my wardrobe. To be honest, I might not return it so I can have it as my own...oh wait, i'll return it so you all can try it as well :) Seriously a gorgeous dress. Thick material, so likely a bit warmer than you are expecting for a short dress. I am 5'11" and it was a bit short for me, but still worked perfect for work. Size wise, I alternate between 10 and 12, and the Large size fit like a glove. I could have used a tiny bit more wiggle room, but it felt nice. Also like many have said, the dress is bright and bold! The picture doesn't do it justice, so i ordered a forest green blazer to tone it down while I was walking around the office.

links_reviews_title: Received lots of compliments at work on this dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. I was concerned with heels that it would be too short for work but overall enjoyed the dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work and then an evening event and received over 20 compliments throughout the day.
links_reviews_text: It was comfortable and I felt great great in the dress.
I loved this dress, and it was very well made, but I'm a solid 14, and it was too tight and short to wear in public...maybe in 30 pounds. ;)
This was a cute dress but just too short for my comfort zone.
This dress is beautiful but sadly it was too tight in areas I'd rather keep covered.
So flattering!
Im 510" -it was short for me
This coat was great for our chilly trip to Paris. The inner fleece is extremely soft, and I could comfortably wear a sweater and layers underneath. So many compliments on the colorful hood!

links_reviews_title: Happy, fun, warm coat for winter
links_reviews_text: My husband liked this coat so much that he bought it for me. It's super warm, great in the rain ( the pink fur is removable) and fun. I often get compliments when I wear it. 100% happy with this one.
I have big arms but there was plenty of room in it. The hood is really big. The jacket is water proof. Not my fav but cute for a rainy day.

Rented this knowing I would be outside at points during an NFL game- the fabric was great for staying dry and the hood provided lots of coverage. The inside has pink fleece/fur but isn't super warm so make sure you layer. Pockets also hold a lot!! Oh and the hot pink fur hood ensured my friends could always spot me!!!

links_reviews_title: Such a Cute Pink Furry Coat
links_reviews_text: Received new with tags so being the first to wear it I noticed the pink fur inside the coat shed onto my jeans. The inside is lined with pink fur. But after a day or so didn't shed onto any other items. I rented this for Alaska in October (20-30 degrees) and continued to wear it at home because it got a little cold in Texas. Such a cute coat I wish I could have kept it. The bright is definitely bright but understated.
Warmer than expected, pop of pink stands out, received lots of compliments ! May want to size up if layering significantly underneath. Wish I could buy!

links_reviews_title: Super cute but not the right fit for me
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this open (the pop of magenta is so fun!) but when zipped up it felt very constricting. Maybe I just needed the 10 or maybe it's not the right shape for me. I think someone who isn't as pear-shaped might love it!

I was very excited about this coat, but it was a but of a let down. The coat was delivered without the pink fur on the hood, and it was a bit too thin for a New England winter. The pockets are quite large and the location of them did not flatter my shape. I wore it a few times, but this is not something I would rent again.
Was missing fur on hood and that was the best part of the coat!
coat felt kinda crinkly. arriving without the fur hood took away all its style

Runs a little small. I am usually 2-4 and the 4 still seemed a little tight. The pink fur seemed a little matted/worn. The body of the jacket is lined but the sleeves aren't so not very warm, but waterproof.
Really cute

links_reviews_title: I loved the pop of color on the hood. Definitely got plenty of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Overall the jacket was great and I considered buying this one. But the fit around the hips ran small on me. I ended up buying a similar jacket from another website.

links_reviews_title: Sooo warm, well made, and cozy fit.
links_reviews_text: Nice roomy fit. Was long enough in the sleeves and length for me at 5'10. I so badly wanted to keep it. Maybe after the holidays!

I rented a size up because I wanted this to be oversized. Even in a size up, it barely fit me. Also, the fake fur on the hood looks SO cheap. It reminded me of something made for kids. I didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments on the jacket.
links_reviews_text: You can probably get a size down as it is roomy. I was able to wear my blazer under the jacket with room to spare. There are strings that allow you to cinch in the sides. I way buy the jacket.
I rented this for a turning blue ceremony and it fit like a glove with no stretch. This is fine when standing but when you sit the big buttons stay but the tiny clear ones come unbuttoned easily.
My boyfriend kindly explained that this dress is made for men - no hips and broad shoulders - definitely size up. Other than that I love it, will try it in a 2 (which I very rarely wear on RTR) .

links_reviews_title: Cute dress! Not for curvy girls!
links_reviews_text: I am covering up where I couldn't button at the bottom of the dress. There is no stretch so I would suggest ordering a size up if you have a big butt like me!
I needed to order one size up because the snap buttons inside kept opening up. My waist line got too big this winter. I loved the dress but wish I didn't have to worry about it opening.

So cute, great quality! They've sewn little clear buttons in-between the white buttons so the dress closes up well. Really loved the drop waist on this dress and I typically don't go for that style. Wore a size 6 and fit like a glove, even with 34DD, buttons still closed around chest with no problem.
Ruching in all the right places slims somehow while letting you feel comfortable that you don't need to suck it in all day.

links_reviews_title: Cute but a bit annoying to wear
links_reviews_text: I have a similar Veronica Beard dress so was excited to rent this one. While cute, the lower buttons popped several times throughout the day with normal movements so I had to safety pin to avoid any major wardrobe malfunctions. Also the fit and flair bottom blows up easily in the breeze so walking outside meant I was constantly holding down the skirt.
Fits well and very flattering around the stomach area

I previously tried this dress on in a store. I bought it in a couple sizes and I was in between. I did return because I couldn't justify the price for an ok fit. I rented in the size 4. It felt big. I THINK I could've worn a 2. But not positive. I wore with a belt and it was fine. Sorry for the pic. I was trying to pick my next bag.
Could wear due to size being too small

links_reviews_title: Adorable dress but runs super small as I normally wear a 2 in this brand but could not even button

links_reviews_text: I wore the dress out for a casual dinner. It fight great around the hip but it was big in the chest.
too bad cause i loved the cut
Loose on top, tighter in the hips

links_reviews_title: Not good for wide hips or ladies with a butt
links_reviews_text: Cute but did not end up wearing. I have wide hips and a bit of a butt so the front button kept popping open.

links_reviews_title: Too small, snaps were in funny places and not sure if would have stayed closed even if it did fit.
links_reviews_text: Really cute style

links_reviews_title: snug in the booty and hips
links_reviews_text: curvy girls beware. standard 0 here but this dress has no stretch and i couldn't button the the lowers buttons around my hip and booty area

links_reviews_title: It runs extremely small. I never wore it.
links_reviews_text: Pros: Cute Cons: it ran too small. I couldn't get it over my butt
It's a pretty dress, and great quality. I couldn't wait to wear it, but it was super tight in the hip thigh area.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it b/c it was too tight.
links_reviews_text: I should have sized up. It was too tight on me, but very cute.

links_reviews_title: Wayyyy too small in the hip area
links_reviews_text: Buttons go all the way down and I wasn't able to get the last 3 buttons to close. It would've been incredibly tight even if I could
tight is the waist even though I usually wear a 12 in this brand, the material does not give.

links_reviews_title: Too tight in lower back and hip area, I am reordering in 2 sizes bigger than I normally wear.
links_reviews_text: Buttons are weird, going to try 2 sizes bigger, but very cute even if I could not wear it, because you could not sit down in it....
Love the invisible snap buttons but crazy tight at the thighs which made it difficult to walk so the dress would ride/bunch up. Maybe a size 6 would solve this but 4 fit. Loved the stripes

I am 5'2 139 pounds. I will admit 40 pounds is probably hips and butt.. I have an athletic build but I could not button lower buttons. I normally wear a size 6 to 8. I ordered the 10 based on other reviews, unfortunately I could not wear it.
runs tight in the hips, definitely size up

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Not for hourglass/pear figures
links_reviews_text: To echo other reviewer's comments: if you trend towards the curvy side, rethink this dress. It's SO CUTE in person, but since there is no stretch to the material it is hard to get a comfortable fit around the hips. I could not wear it due to the gapping at the widest point of my hips (I could get all the buttons closed, but they still gapped!). If I had sized up to an 8, it would have likely been to big in the torso.

links_reviews_title: Was not able to wear the dress unfortunately.
links_reviews_text: I typically am a 2 but sized up based on reviews. The dress fit perfectly in all areas with the exception of the front button at the fullest part of my hips. Unfortunately I couldn't even get it buttoned and had to send it back. Beautiful dress if you have a very small back side.
fit like a glove. for a more slim-hipped figure but full bust works well. can be dressed up or down. would be willing to rent again.

links_reviews_title: Cute in theory, strange fit made it unwearable.
links_reviews_text: The fit was fine on top, then it got progressively more fitted through the hips. It then was unclosible on the last button, which caused dramatic gaping, leaving the dress unwearable. Not for anyone with a butt. I don't even have particularly wide hips!

I am a slim athletic build and even though I sized up, this cute dress was still too small and a no-go for my business trip. Size up from your normal size and then go 2 sizes up for backup and you might be OK. Shame because otherwise it's really unique and well-made.
tad big but overall great for work! Got lots of compliments.
I'm an 8 and rented a 10. Still a bit snug.
I wore this to a wives’ luncheon on a business trip with my husband and it was great. The striped button down style made it business appropriate and the ruching was flattering and provided interest
To tight around the midsection for me, but I LOVE this dress, going to rent in a size up. Hint to self, stop drinking chardonnay at night!

links_reviews_title: too tight across hips. I am a true 6 and couldn't snap at bottom.
links_reviews_text: too tight across hips. I am a true 6 and couldn't snap at bottom.

links_reviews_title: If you have hips - skip this one
links_reviews_text: I know every other review says this but I somehow thought I could be the exception. No chance. If you have any sort of hips, this is not your dress. The dress runs true to size everywhere EXCEPT in the hips and the fabric has no stretch. If you are straight-hipped, this dress is adorable. I would have worn it to work with a blazer or to brunch or errands with flats. Too bad, was looking forward to wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Great if you have narrow hips
links_reviews_text: Very cute dress! However, it does run very narrow in the hips, so not a great fit if you're curvy

Cute design, but not very forgiving. Lined on the bottom half. Tiny snaps in between buttons should help keep things from puckering, but boy howdy, it sure fits tight through the hips. A bit of a challenge to sit in this dress. One snap keeps popping open. I have a long torso and struggled with the top laying right, too. Size up!
Permit for any formal event

links_reviews_title: Dress is really attractive, but the hem of this dress isn't sewn and falls, which is making me crazy
links_reviews_text: The dress is really attractive. I love the asymmetrical hem of the dress. The zipper is a little risque for my work (attorney for a state agency) but the dress isn't short on me (I'm 5'1''), so I figured it was okay. The dress fits a little tighter than usual in the rib cage area, but not uncomfortably. My only real issue with the dress? The hem! It's completely undone. I didn't notice until I got to work, so I'm going to have to live with it all day, which is pretty annoying. It completely changes the angles of the dress and kind of ruins the look. I'm not sure if it's meant to be sewed or ironed to hold its hem, but it's not working now! Too bad, because it's an attractive dress otherwise. Wouldn't rent again just due to the hem issue.
I ended up going with another dress from my shipment but this dress was great too.
Tried my regular size, didn't fit. Sized up, still couldn't get it, so I decided to move on. If you're bigger chested/have a big rib cage, be prepared to size up at least once if not twice.
This is an adorable patent leather Marc Jacobs bag. It is super cute! I love it with the straps off. Plenty of room, 2 zip up compartments. Super cute!
Gorgeous, high quality jacket. But it just didn't look like "me". Felt a bit biker chick-ish. 10 years ago I would have loved it!

This jacket quickly became a staple in my fall wardrobe. I kept it for several weeks and wore it daily. I received a lot of compliments on it. I found it easy to wear with everything because if it's longer length. It is a little loose in the midsection and I would probably size down if I were to order it again.

Super awesome leather jacket. Amazing quality and a lot of edge to it. Dress it with a pair of jeans or over a cute dress. My only reason for knocking a star off is that the lapels are a little weird. Didn't look quite right buttoned or unbuttoned. Would def consider purchasing this one if it was just a bit more marked down.

links_reviews_title: A little big, but lovely jacket
links_reviews_text: Wanted to post a review with a pic, since so many people commented on how large this jacket is. I am very petite and the xs was a little roomy, but workable. The quilting design on the shoulders made me look a little broad shouldered, but overall I liked it and got lots of compliments. Advantage to the roominess is there is room to wear it with a heavier sweater. I loved the length, as I think jackets that hit right at the waist cut me in half and make me look shorter.
Beautiful soft high quality jacket. Runs large

links_reviews_title: Great fit. I have broad shoulders and had no problems. Waist drop in was very flattering as well!
links_reviews_text: I will definitely rent this again. The pattern matched my Tory Burch clutch which was ultra clutch. Wore this over multiple dresses and it was a perfect mix of edgy and dressy. The fit and movement of the jacket was great too. Broken in but still looks and feels brand new.

I've been wearing this jacket nonstop. It's easy to wear during the day or at night. The leather quality is top notch and I wish this could be a permanent fixture to my closet. This is also the second time I've rented this jacket.

This jacket is everything. Not too heavy, in warmth or weight. I felt so chic wearing it and it went with everything. I wore it on a trip to Boston where it was much cooler. Now that I'm back in the South I'll have to wait a few months for cooler temps to rent again!
I wanted to keep this. Wore a lot. Kind of tight when zipped up but perfect length.
Love the fit and style. I would typically order a small- but read reviews and decided to size down- so glad I did! Will be keeping a while!

This jacket. Omg. It feels so buttery soft and it fits me perfectly. Hit me right at the hips and is so modern. It's unlike anything I've ever worn. I can't buy it but I may keep it as a rental for a while....
Love this jacket. Incredibly soft leather, fantastic quality. Nice length too
Great jacket, a bit big

Super soft leather, great zippers, and lightweight! What more can you ask for? This jacket is great, it fit me a tiny bit on the large side, but overall I enjoyed it immensely. I'm 5' 9", 176 lbs, size 12 in dresses.

In an apparent deviation from the norm I actually prefer the jacket unzipped. The XL fit great on my anywhere from 12 to 16 body and I love that it's hip length. My only regret is that I can't afford to actually buy it, but thanks to Unlimited I'll be holding on to it for awhile....

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this lovely jacket
links_reviews_text: I want to marry this jacket! So very soft. Snug in all the right places!
Slightly wide jacket, but soft leather, pleasant to wear.

links_reviews_title: The truly hip length was amazing!
links_reviews_text: I always have a hard time with cropped leather jackets because of my slightly long torso and larger chest. I feel like they accentuate my problem areas. This jacket was perfect! I could easily zip, and wouldn't recommend wearing it open as it was definitely "oversized." But, once zipped, it fit like a dream and was perfect for the mild fall days around the city. I also, admittedly, wore it on a misty day and it was awesomely robust!

links_reviews_title: Nice length for me. Room for layering.
links_reviews_text: I am tall, and this jacket worked. It is not extremely form fitting which makes it a good piece for winter.

links_reviews_title: Maybe it's me, not the jacket?
links_reviews_text: This jacket is gorgeous! It arrived brand new with tags, and looked (on the hanger) exactly as pictured. I love the details: the quilting at the shoulders, minimal metal, clean lines. I have a high waist but long torso, with a fairy large chest. I'm not the biggest fan of the cropped, "big chest in a tiny coat-look," so I was glad to see that this jacket truly was long enough. The fit though. Maybe it's me? I love the oversized look, but this jacket isn't structured enough to look good (on me) as an oversized piece. It kinda just looks like I'm wearing my boyfriend's jacket (and not in a cute, intentional way). It was hard to capture the issue in a picture; in this one, I'm holding all the extra, empty jacket to one side. Hopefully I just need a smaller size!

links_reviews_title: Too bulky on my frame but lovely jacket for someone else
links_reviews_text: I loved the quilted panel placement and I wish it looked as good on me as it did on the hanger. I think it was the extra length - it just made me look frumpy. The leather was silky soft. As far as fit, the chest is on the small side if you zip it up but otherwise it is fitted but comfortable. I would call it the tankini of leather jackets.
I rented this to bring on a work trip to California. It was great quality, chic when worn dressed up and a great weight/length. Would definitely rent again.
I wore this jacket out for a date night, over a dress to a wedding, and to work. Perfect jacket for all occasions.
I first rented the large but the medium fit better.
Fits true to size. Is not quite my style, but looked great when paired with a floral Kate Spade dress. Considering buying.

One of my favorite rentals! The leather is soft and beautiful and it fit me perfectly wearing a light sweater underneath. It rides a bit longer than many leather jackets so the silhouette was sleeker and more thinning on my frame than being cut off at the waist.
I think this jacket is the perfect length and the quilted details are great. The pockets are a touch high but that didn't change my opinion. Will definitely rent again!

I rented this for three months and did NOT want to return it! The leather was super soft, and the fit was very flattering. I was worried that it would look too long, but it hit just under my waist. I got compliments on it every single day, and I would have kept if I could have afforded it.
Beautiful jacket but the XS was still too big for me to wear to work.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful soft soft leather, the jacket is so comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This Jacket is well made, comfortable to wear, looks great and is so soft to touch. Might have to keep it.
Super high quality feeling and the fit was good. Didn't love the shape on myself but would still recommend giving it a try
I loved this jacket. It was great to wear for every day.
For me, personally, I didn't like the fit. It felt like butter and was a beautiful jacket-just didn't fit me well.

I rented this back in September and kept it for months. Really lovely leather and nice fit. If I rent again I would probably size down as this was a bit large, but still beautiful. Could easily zip up and layer underneath.

Probably the best rental I have gotten from RTR. Like other reviews said, the leather is soft, buttery, substantial. The quilting is well stitched, great accent without being obnoxious or adding bulk. I have worn it everywhere and have received compliments from family, friends and people I don't even know. I cannot recommend this enough.
I literally only returned this bec I use RTR for weddings, and then pause my membership till the next event. Would have kept it otherwise for the season.

links_reviews_title: This is the perfect stylish fall jacket for all occasions!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jacket for the fall! It was perfect for casual days and cooler evenings. It kept me toasty on the cooler nights and allowed for all of my outfits to pop during the day. This might be the first jacket I've ever been tempted to buy! I also loved the deep zipper pockets which allowed me to feel like the pocket were secure enough to hold my belongings! PS the sweater in the photo is also rented, it is the Sorry Not Sorry Sweater by Sanctuary.
This was just not a good fit for me. I already have broad shoulders and this made me look even more square and boxy.
Loved it. Wore it with everything, felt sexy and sophisticated. Honestly, wish I had bought it. That is one for the closet for sure!
If you're looking for a jacket you can wear over a chunky sweater, this is it. If you are looking for a slimmer fit, this is not it. Wore once and returned.
Loved the taupe color of this bag. I used the long strap on my way in and out of work and I thought it was a great size and look
The gold clasp design felt a little dated in person.

links_reviews_title: pretty bag, the color just didn't really go with most of my wardrobe. I would've loved it in black.
links_reviews_text: nice bag, not large or small. Medium size. Just something threw me off about the color.
Was a cute shirt, didn't do a lot for figure but didn't hurt. Was a bit plainer then I thought it would be.
I really liked this one and wore it a few times over the holiday. Length of sweater and sleeves was perfect. The sporty stripes made it interesting.
Loved this sweater! Perfect for cold, but not too cold temps. Lots of compliments. Can dress up or down!
Easy to wear sweater, no complaints.
This was trendy and fine for everyday. It was fitted and v neck was flattering. I wore it to dinner with friends. It's not a WOW piece, but it's unusual and a good rental.
A nice sweater for everyday
Was a tad low cut, but I did receive compliments.

links_reviews_title: with dry cleaning, running smaller, but fun casual sweater
The fit, the quality of the knit and the color blocking stlye.
links_reviews_text: Loved, loved it! I looked fantastic on my size and was very comfortable. I wore it with black jeans and dressed down with jeans.
This is a very cute sweater. It's great for work or the weekend.

links_reviews_title: Cute everyday look! Playful sleeve pattern
links_reviews_text: I really ended up liking this sweater and wore it several times. Flattering v-neck. Nice middle-weight knit. I really liked the orange-red sleeves with the black stripes. Definitely different than most of the sweaters in my closet. It was also so easy to wear and casual vs. my usual Rent the Runway selections--which tend to be more dressy and fussy! Considered buying!
The colors were great. The sweater was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Too big. Like the top though. Might rent in a smaller size.
links_reviews_text: Fir recommendation was XL and this was too big. I'm short and have short arms. The arms were really long and the V is really low in the neck. Great looking top just the wrong size.
Great fit for big busts and smaller frame. Runs large. I am usually a small/medium (because of my large bust) and I wore an xs.
It's cute. Nothing To write home about.... is a sweater.
Cute top to wear in the sun!
Super adorable top that paired well with everything high waisted. Make sure to size up!
Def size up. Super cute and works well with high waisted bottoms

Wore this to a distillery tour and music festival and it was cute and comfortable. I did not wear a bra with this - the fabric is thick enough to not be revealing. Good length with high-waisted bottoms, hit me maybe a couple of inches above the belly button (I have a pretty long torso).

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable, cute, flattering & such an easy go-to. 12/10 would rent again.
links_reviews_text: I love this top so much. It's perfect for summer & going out, is just the right amount of cropped, and you can make the straps as tight or loose as you want. Bonus points, I never felt the need to wear a bra with this bad boy which really improved my general mood. The only reason I'm returning instead of buying is because all my most recent IG pics are in this top and I should give it a rest. Hope it stays on RTR forever though!

This was very easy to wear. I paired it with high waisted green pants and I either tucked in the shirt or wore it above. I have a short torso and this hit above the belly button. The only complaints I have is that the straps constantly fell off my shoulders despite how tight I tied it. I might have narrow shoulders though. But otherwise very cute and would wear again if the straps stayed on.
Great fit and loved the tie up straps. Perfect with a high waisted jean skirt or shorts.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and just great for summer!
links_reviews_text: Cons I wish it was a little longer not to show the stomach so much.
Cute and wearable
fit well, definitely cropped but works with high waisted skirt/jeans. great for outdoor party or casual summer day !

Only bad thing I have to say about this top is that the straps that tie on your shoulder do not well due to the fabric being too slippery to hold a knot well. It's not a big deal because this top will stay up with or without the straps in place but does take some minor adjusting throughout the day.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfy for daytime
links_reviews_text: I loved this shirt it was super great to day drink in. I do wish it was slightly longer but besides that it was great
So cute and flattering. Cropped to just above belly button so works well with high cut jeans. Would definitely rent again or buy!

links_reviews_title: Fit like it was supposed to just not my style.
links_reviews_text: Fit. Just not my thing.
Fit TTS. Got lots of compliments. Felt a little restricting at first since the fabric is so thick, but I got used to it quickly. Would rent again!
Shorter fit, heavier tweed fabric. Great button detail down the back. Pairs well with black dress pants and jeans, flats or heels. Love this top!

Fits TTS. Slightly cropped but I almost always wear high waisted pants to work so it wasn't a problem. It's not immediately apparent in the photos but the tweed material has green, red and blue threads which makes it easy to wear with any color pants. Got so many compliments from coworkers!

The quality of the top is pretty nice and was in good condition. The cut is boxy and it helps to have a short torso. It suits my office dress code and is out of my comfort zone. I received many compliments. You can wear this in warmer seasons if your office is freezing, like mine is! #businessformal #businessclothing #workwardrobe

links_reviews_title: Cute with skirt or dress pants
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and material of this shirt. It was a little cropped so it looked good with high waisted skirt and jeans. It was a nice transition piece between cold and warm weather. The pattern seems to have lots of colors that you can't see in the image but it would be nice with red or navy even!
Fits like a true small. Cropped but good for work with a nude cami underneath, as there is a slight gap in back with how it buttons. Would also be appropriate for going out at night.

PRO: - Classy and timeless fit - Lots of compliments - Beautiful detailing (buttons and seams) CONS: A little restrictive across the bust, and the material had no give. Shorter than expected. Decided to wear with a high waist skirt.
I love the fabric, but it fits a little tight in the arms, shoulders, and chest. The sleeves are shorter than the model image.
A little boxy/baggy, but not in a bad way. The length is a bit short. There are cute buttons down the back. High quality and looked polished but fun!
I loved this top!

links_reviews_title: This was ok. It was a little short, as I have a long torso. Didn't end up wearing to work.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is nice quality and there are buttons along the back, which makes it fun and cute. I would consider wearing with a blazer or something else. I didn't end up wearing to work because if I lifted my arms even just a little my stomach showed.

links_reviews_title: Perfect shirt for work with black pants
links_reviews_text: This was a nice change of pace for me from all of the dresses I've been renting. Fit was true to size and comfortable. Good quality, all around great shirt option.

The fit is boxy and cropped. May be snug in the shoulders if you're broad like me, especially since the woven fabric doesn't really have much give. Love the buttons down the back and raw fringing detail. It is cropped so I'd recommend wearing with something high waisted. Appropriate for work and going out. High quality and very warm!
Could be dressed up or down easily. Pretty comfortable and warm, a tad itchy! Impossible to button up without someone else's help though.

Wore this to work on a cooler day. Slightly itchy but didn't bother me too much. Thought it was a nice top for fall or even winter. Large fit well, even with a big chest. To get it on, since I don't have someone to help me with the back buttons, I did not undo the middle two buttons and slipped on over my head, otherwise I wouldn't have been able to button all. I would rent again.
Cute, but a little too structured and boxy making it feel tight around the shoulders

links_reviews_title: Loved it but will size up in the future!
links_reviews_text: I loved this shirt. It was boxy but fun and perfect for work. I did find it ran small in the sleeves particularly so I will size up in the future.

links_reviews_title: Not a great fit for average busted petite
links_reviews_text: Great top, loved the construction and material. Unfortunately it just didn't lay right on me and seemed to balloon out in weird pockets at the back. My friend who is 5'5" with a bigger bust rented it and it looked incredible on her, so definitely worth trying if you're looking for a solid work top.

links_reviews_title: Not good for long torso types
links_reviews_text: This was a very short shirt. Even with high waisted jeans I felt uncomfortable wearing this. I got a M but even if I got the L I think it would have been just as awkward. If you are all legs this is for you. If you have a long torso don't waste your time.
This is a really cute work top, and I loved the button details. The other reviewers are correct though - this top is pretty short, so it needs to be worn with something high-waisted.
Style and pattern were cute. Was a bit snug through chest and shoulders. Solid choice for work, but nothing amazing.
Loved this shirt. Would rent again. It's a little short, so wear with a high waisted bottom or something underneath.

links_reviews_title: Love this top. Definitely fits a work vibe, with a bit of a sassy kick.
links_reviews_text: Even on a 5'3 frame like mine, this was definitely on the cropped side. Was a little snug on the arms, would have gone a size up for maximum comfort but it still fits. No give.
And itchy. No lining. Strange to wear

links_reviews_title: Super cute top, but too hot for the Texas summer.
links_reviews_text: I chose this for work, but it's just too hot to wear in Texas in the summer. I would rent it again in fall. It's a bit short, so wear it with a higher waisted skirt or pair of pants; otherwise it fits well and is flattering.

links_reviews_title: A bit hard to deal with
links_reviews_text: Maybe it's just but I had to get help to button/unbutton the middle back button. Makes it not practical to travel on biz with.
Ran too small and too cropped

links_reviews_title: Great for a night out or work.
links_reviews_text: You might need help buttoning the back but otherwise super comfortable and runs true to size.

This top caught my eye for its fun fringed edges and the sort-of cropped length as I have higher waisted items I wanted to wear it with. I truly loved it however the one drawback for me personally was the arms. I have my grandmothers arms (thanks Gram) no matter what size I am, so anything restrictive in the arms material-wise is always a gamble. I could still wear the top and bed my arms, but I was aware of the restrictiveness the whole time. Overall - super cute find!
hard to button solo, a little scratchy
perfect for work and texture makes it a great jacket equivalent.

links_reviews_title: Interesting for work but not too flashy
links_reviews_text: I have an understated style so this was perfect for work. Interesting but not "hey look at my shirt!" Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great for work or more formal occasion.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful tweed material. Nice fringe accents. Considered buying but too pricey.

links_reviews_title: Rent it buy it but make sure to WEAR IT
links_reviews_text: Amazing top! So flattering and fun, easily transition from work to date night
Professional looking
Cute top, can dress up or down. Runs a little large in the mid section, looks a little boxy

links_reviews_title: Arms are cut more narrowly than you think!
links_reviews_text: The boxy cut would be very flattering with a tighter, crisper bottom. The Large fit well in the bust and overall, but the arms were too tight to allow for much movement. The buttons on the back are a very cute detail, but difficult to manage solo.

links_reviews_title: Great tailored cut - tweed is primarily black w/ white and burgundy threaded through.
links_reviews_text: I had to wear a cami because it was short on me (though I do have a long torso). Would have been really cute with high waisted pants.

Arms were much tighter than I hoped. My arms are fuller but were unusually tight especially for what seemed to be a boxy shape. Buttons down center were a surprise too. Zoom in if you don't see them. Wasn't crazy about that look.

links_reviews_title: Great top, tight in the arms
links_reviews_text: Overall shirt was great, but wish I had sizes up to the large, cut very tight under the arm pits. Not too uncomfortable to wear but was definitely ready to get out of it by the end of the work day. Torso is a hair short so recommend wearing with higher waisted pants/skirts

I loved this jacket. It's so fun and has built in style with the hoodie dickey. I wore this casually for errands and really liked it. My only complaint is that the back flared out over my butt in a weird way. Overall, would rent again for the right occasions and in transitional weather.
Amazing blazer with the hooded sweatshirt option. Great for a simple way to add layers.
I like this. It's navy and the "sweatshirt" is actually like a dickie that zips in. So not really a full sweatshirt, but it's cute nonetheless. Nice fit.

Don't. Want. To. Send. This. Back. I keep finding new ways to wear it--skirt, jeans, patterned slacks. Love, love, love this! It is just so fun. Compliments galore. People think I came up with this brilliant paring. I am not creative enough to have thought of it on my own, so thank you RTR! Another great example of how you have stretched my fashion sense in a fun and inspiring way. If you rent this, get ready for all of the 'wows'!

links_reviews_title: One of my all time favorites!
links_reviews_text: Ugh this jacket is so chic, wish I could foot the price tag. Absolutely loved it!

I have been coveting one of these jackets for months, so I'm super psyched to get to try one. I got this in a 4 (in jackets I run 4-6) and it's a great fit. Love the dickey look. Even with the "discount" for unlimited renters this is still cheaper to purchase retail, so this will stay a rental item for me- but I might buy a brand-new one.
This is a good piece for layering. I wore it with two shirts underneath and a leather jacket on top. Great way to dress down a professional piece. Would rent again.
Dress it up or down. Very well made. love to wear with jeans to dress them up a bit. Not a bad thing to say about this blazer
The sleeves are a bit long. The sweatshirt inset zippers in so you can't wear it separately. But it is well made and fun.

The shoulder seams are perfect but the lining inside the shoulders and arms is tight and the shoulders stick up oddly. The arms are too tight for anything other but a sleeveless top beneath. (I do have large arms.) Also, the torso runs narrow and is a very shrunken look. I could barely get the jacket to close. My daughter said it looked like the early 2000s and I can see how it is a dated look with the hoodie under it. It looks like Ellen DeGeneres from way back when. All in all, I did not like this jacket. The fabric wrinkles easily, too, across the front. A big miss!

links_reviews_title: Snug in the shoulders, but great for fall
links_reviews_text: Slightly too tight on the shoulders to make it comfortable for summer, but I would size up and wear it in the fall. I loved the look of the zipped in hoodie, adding a layer without adding bulk.

links_reviews_title: True to size and super cute. Will def rent this one again!
links_reviews_text: I'd been eyeing this in stores for a while. I love Veronica Beard and this blazer does not disappoint. Really fun to wear and more versatile than you think. Would love to own this one someday.

I love this concept and designer. Thankfully the dickie was included because it made it interesting. Otherwise the jacket would be boring. Sleeves were almost too short (I'm 5'6") but we're fine. Slight stretch made the 6 a perfect fit
Great, versatile jacket. Fits very true to size. Highly recommend and will rent again!

This is one my favorite pieces of clothing! The only reason I sent it back it is because much warmer weather has arrived! Too expensive to buy but I cannot wait to rent again in the fall! Best jacket ever! Perfect tailored fit and zip on hoodie makes this jacket soooo cool!

links_reviews_title: Love this jacket! Comfortable and flattering
links_reviews_text: Wonderful jacket.
Beautifully tailored and so functional

Absolutely loved this fun jacket. Well made and fit perfectly. I wore with jeans, black boots, and a light weight white turtleneck on a cold spring day. Got a ton of compliments. I wish I could buy it but at least with RTR I can rent!
True to size
Wish I sized down from my usual 8 to a 6.
Cute the sweatshirt is actually only the hood and front so it's not double layered but cute
The hood is detachable but I only wore it with the hood. Quality jacket. I HATED that the pockets weren't opened though. That was frustrating. But it looked good!

Well fitted and tailored. Love the dickey aspect that adds dimension. Dickey easily zips out for another polished look. Have worn with heels, flats, sneakers skinny jeans and cigarette pants. A versatile jacket to add to your wardrobe. Considering buying.
These colors are everything!! Perfect crop top. Love the material. You will not regret this rental. So great for spring/summer.

links_reviews_title: RTR Ambassador follow my looks on IG @margaritaloiscortez
links_reviews_text: Trendy and flattering

links_reviews_title: Such a cute pop of color!
links_reviews_text: Loved this - so fun and the weight of the top is very nice also
Paired it w shiny high waisted tights. Felt comfortable for a girls wine night. Multiple compliments!
Perfect for a party. Was a little shorter than expected but looked better with high rise jeans (not pictured). Have to be careful when raising arms up

links_reviews_title: Fun and casual top for any occasion
links_reviews_text: Loved this top! It was so fun. It’s very cropped so I paired it with super high waisted jeans and felt amazing and very stylish. The material is super thick so even though it’s short sleeved I wore it in the early winter without a problem. Fit was TTS.
Fit perfectly. Super comfortable. Loved it!!

links_reviews_title: It felt super hot when I wore this
links_reviews_text: Really boxy fit bit with high rise jeans it's. A real sexy look. If you size up the top will be long enough that you don't need to show stomach

links_reviews_title: This was a REALLY hard one to return!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved everything about this top. I was worried that the oversized fit wouldn't be proportioned very well on my frame, but it was perfect and I got tons of compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a family birthday party and got tons of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: I felt really great wearing this top. It was comfortable, cute, and while my grandmother was concerned I would catch a cold, she seemed to even like it. I haven't returned it yet, so planning to wear it for a trip I'm taking soon.
Loved top but is more adventurous than conservative. If I lift my arms you get major underboobage. I wore with pasties and also sheer body suit. Pair with a flirty bralette and you'll feel sexy.
I love this crop top! Fit is oversized and the material is super thick.
Enjoyed this whole on vacation in Maui. The material is way thicker than expected. Especially for a crop top. Which makes it hold it's shape more and be less flowy.

I wore this to a work event. Paired with high waisted jeans and leopard print booties, I received tons of compliments. It's a great piece, just make sure you have a cute bralette underneath if you plan on raising your arms at all!

If you have great abs, wearing this top is a major flex. I wore this with jeans to a NYC nightclub and it was non-stop compliments. The top is roomy and comfortable. If you are dancing and raise your arms, your bra can show, so not for the modest. Overall a great rental, have fun with it!

Boxy fit and the material is much thicker and heavier than I anticipated. The bold colors certainly make for an eye catching top. I absolutely loved this crop top and would rent again. I paired it with high waisted jeans, heels and statement earrings. You could dress it down by wearing high waisted jean shorts, sandals and hair in a bun. Hmmm keeping that in mind for the summer! Follow @thelustfulvegan to see more of my RTR faves :)
I loved this crop top. Loved it. It's what you would expect. Fits wells. Material is nice.
This top was such a great piece! It was a fun a spin on a cropped tee. It is actually made out of a thick, heavy, stretchy material. I received so many compliments while wearing this!
n/a
I really liked this shirt, very comfortable but wish it was just a tad longer.

I loved the integrity of this crop top. It was almost sculptural because it maintained it's shape -- not at all flimsy, like some others. It did require I keep my arms at my sides, though. Whenever I reached above my head (to tighten my ponytail, for instance), it went up high enough that the bottom of my bra was visible. Cute, though.

I wore it with high waisted jeans for just a night out with friends and got so many compliments! I ended up buying it because it's so fun to wear and I love crop tops. It's definitely a short one, so I would only do with high waisted stuff.
I loved this top! I wore it with super skinny high waisted pants & got so many compliments
I got loads of compliments. Looks great with high rise denim. Super high quality and expensive looking.
Super cute but felt too oversized. I should've went with the small as it's very wide. Also they way it's cut you can't lift your arms unless you want your boobs to show. FYI.

links_reviews_title: Too Short, didn't end up wearing
links_reviews_text: Fit well just too short

links_reviews_title: OBSESSED! I wanted to keep it but am trying to keep switching it up. Will rent again.
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about it.
Loved!! runs short and large. Great thick Material. Very fun!

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing out, but i love it!
links_reviews_text: Flatting fit, a little more cropped than I would like, even for a short person. Material/quality is amazing. A little too hot for 72+ F degree weather

links_reviews_title: Great material in true Léger style!
links_reviews_text: It is super cropped so bigger bust women may have to refrain from lifting arms but it is so comfortable and adorable!

links_reviews_title: I received numerous compliments on this top- It was a great rent!
links_reviews_text: Love the colors- versatile Great Fit- not tight fitting

This crop top was a heavier material but not too warm to wear on a nice spring day. I paired it with some acid wash cropped jeans and tan flats. I did wear a sports bra-type bralette underneath because I was going to a bbq with some work people so didn't want to be flashing a regular bra every time I lifted my arms. Got lots of compliments and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved it, and him even more!
links_reviews_text: A true crop top, lifting arms will show up to bra but I was very comfortable in this heavy weight top that received many compliments. Wore it to host a dinner at our home and then again to a birthday event for a friend ...my boyfriend picked it out and loved it even more than me!
Excellent top that makes elevates any outfit

links_reviews_title: Great fabric. Very short crop. Warm.
links_reviews_text: Loved this top, it was super cropped, more than I expected but still cute. The heavy fabric was quite warm, however. I didn't need a jacket.

links_reviews_title: Very unique piece that can easily be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: I layered this piece in different ways both for warmth and because I am not a fan of the totally bare stomach. It worked well both to put a longer form fitting piece under it and to layer a Spring jacket on top of it. I have worn it twice and have been repeatedly stopped and asked where I got it.
I wore it for a night out in Vegas. It fit perfectly with black high waisted tights. The shirt is heavy but it really cute to wear!
