Beautiful reversible duster with a thick, quality fabric. Perfect to wear outside on a fall day or inside in the winter when it is chilly out. Lots of compliments!
It's reversible from tan to gray so goes with everything
Wore this all throughout my trip to Paris and am sad to let it go. It is so versatile, warm, but not too bulky. Love it so much.

links_reviews_title: Just a big piece of fabric
links_reviews_text: Just a big piece of fabric - not flattering... but comfy! Maybe good for a long flight
I love that this sweater is reversible! It's like 2 sweaters in one. It's heavy enough to wear as a fall jacket, and as a statement layering piece. It's high quality, warm, and cute!
falls really nicely and you can wear it with anything
Really warm. Perfect layering piece for fall.
This is not a coat for someone with any curves. It's ok. Nothing great. But love that it is reversible.

links_reviews_title: I've worn this almost every day since I rented it. I love the gray side.
links_reviews_text: So comfy, soft, perfect weight for cool weather

More casual than I was looking for, but very high quality and extremely serviceable for freezing office space. I wanted more of a sweater-blazer, and this tended to look like a bathrobe (esp. the grey side).
Cute but shapeless. Good for fall or winter, but not for wear May - September. I also didn't love the color.

links_reviews_title: This is nice and tick and warm and reversible!!
links_reviews_text: So comfy and easy to throw over everything!

This is a truly beautiful jacket/sweater. The length is great, the fit is flattering, and overall it's comfortable and warm. Wore it with all black and on the grey side with cranberry pumps to work and felt comfortable but professional all day. Then wore it with navy and white on the camel colored side with flats and felt even more comfortable yet stylish. Wish I owned because it's so versatile and comfortable while remaining well tailored and sheek.
This was a really nice jacket cardigan. It looked very nice. I like that it has slits on the side so it is easy to walk around with. Medium fit well- 5'5 150 lbs with 36 D. It did not pile or fuzz.
Got a ton of compliments! I wore this for an overcast spring day (55 degrees & rain looming) and it was the perfect layer.
I am usually a small and this ran a little big. I still wore it because it still looked great but could've probably gotten an extra small. It's warm, heavy, REVERSIBLE and great quality! Recommend!

links_reviews_title: Nice weight for cool and cold days.
links_reviews_text: Beige side was nice. Gray was pretty but seams made the shoulders seem sloped.

links_reviews_title: This jacket does not stop...great for travel
links_reviews_text: The fact that this is reversible really adds to the function of this jacket. It is well made and has wonderful pockets! I took it to a business trip and did not grow tired of it. The cream side has a bit of a blush to it that makes it nice for early spring and it pairs well with white and cream. It is a heaver sweater material so no so great for warmer temps.
Fits tight in the sleeves and stiff.
This cardigan was so versatile. War multiple times to work and just for daywear. It's a heavy wool, but not itchy and very high quality. The warmest layer ever for cold days!

I wore this coat multiple times..usually on the cream colored side, but also the gray. It was so warm and comfortable, and actually quite elegant with slim pants and heels (I also wore it with jeans). All in all, it was a great item.
A little large in the shoulders, but overall a great staple piece for colder climates. Would recommend sizing down. I typically wear S/XS and the XS fit well.
I liked the concept of this cardigan but it was very thick and bulky and I didn’t even wear it. Wasn’t a fan!
The fit, design and color are excellent! I felt like a million bucks with this duster on. I paired it with jeans, a print top and boots. I'll definitely rent this one again!
I wish I had purchased this. Beautiful thick material

links_reviews_title: Loved this - wore many, may times.
links_reviews_text: Would have sized down.

I wanted to keep this forever but couldn't justify the price. I wore this sweater probably 3 times in the week I had it. I got so many compliments on it! The color was a rich dark green, the bell sleeves were so cute! Based on other people's reviews and pictures I sized down in this!

Such a cozy and festive sweater! Loved the detail on the back and the bell sleeves- runs a little big but tucked in jeans or over a skirt it's perfect! Very comfortable and not itchy at all. So happy I rented it for the holidays!

I wore this a few times, once with a matching skirt and for a date with leather leggings. It was warm and soft in a beautiful color. The sleeves are a little puffy which is a cute feature but tough to wear with a coat.

Easy to wear. Thick. I didn't find the material itchy, but the seam around the collar itches a bit. Not bad. Beautiful color. I saw other reviews said sleeves too short. I think they are designed to be pushed up on forearms. Loved it.
Loved this sweater. Was comfy, easy to throw on and a beautiful winter forest green color. The sleeves have a bit of a poof style which adds a bit of flare and uniqueness to the sweater.

I rented this to wear during the holidays. It was the perfect sweater to just throw on and feel chic. Loved the cut out back detail! Runs very small. I'm usually a 4 and Renee a 1 and length and overall fit was great!

This sweater was cute but not really comfortable. It felt super itchy at first but I got over it. Also, sleeves like these suck if you have to put a coat over it!!! I felt like I had little sausage arms!!

links_reviews_title: Very oversized look but super warm and cute!
links_reviews_text: Warm, great chunky knit. HUGE sleeves, but a really fun look.

links_reviews_title: Second time renting - one of my favs!
links_reviews_text: This sweater is one of my favorite rentals! I actually rented it over a year ago when I was super pregnant in a larger size and loved it both times. The body is oversized but I love that the sleeves still hit right at your wrists. Super cute keyhole opening in the back and slight puff to the shoulder make it both comfy and interesting! Also very warm!
I absolutely LOVED this sweater! Super comfy, great color, a little oversized but worked perfectly for fall with a cape (not pictured)

I've wanted to rent this for ages but the sleeves are way too baloony in person. It's good for fall if you're not wearing a jacket but the sleeves fit funny under a coat. Size down as it runs really large.
I'm assuming this is supposed to be oversized but it was even larger than how it looks on the model in the picture. I didn't find it particularly flattering, but the color is really nice

Loved this sweater. Comfy, and casual, but not the least bit sloppy. Very thick, heavy wool that kept me warm. Only issue was the sleeves are kind of difficult to fit comfortably in a winter coat. Will rent again
Sweater is a beautiful deep forest green. Fabric is slightly itchy but I wore a long sleeved shirt underneath and was completely fine. It's very thick material and kept me warm in 30 degree weather.
Received pilled and hem was stretched out. Otherwise it would've been really nice

links_reviews_title: Great color, but that's about it.
links_reviews_text: Wide-balloony arms and itchy fabric.

links_reviews_title: Little bit itchy but nice fabric
links_reviews_text: The color of this sweater was gorgeous, but it was a tidge itchy and the balloon sleeves overwhelmed my small frame.

The sleeves on this really make it impossible to wear with a coat, so I didn't end up wearing this too often as spring in New England is still quite cold. It looks great, a little itchy, but a very unique style overall. I wore it mostly when I'd be indoors and it's a nice casual sweater.

links_reviews_title: Great chunky oversized sweater. Loved the color! Very comfortable and still fashionable.
links_reviews_text: Oversized sweater, fit well
was perfect for my casual irish pub lunch with friends

links_reviews_title: Cute and casual for every day.
links_reviews_text: A little itchy.
It was shorter than I thought it would be and was a little bit itchy. Didn't end up wearing it.
The color is gorgeous but I just found this way too thick and unflattering - the sleeves are huge! Unless you're very thin and small chested I don't see this being flattering.
Runs large

links_reviews_title: Cute but not great if you're looking for maternity options
links_reviews_text: This was recommended as a third trimester maternity sweater; it's much to small for that! Either order up or pass on this as a maternity option
The sleeves are very bubbly- but it's meant to be oversized. Beautiful material and color Very thick

links_reviews_title: Pretty sweater, got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: fit well, true to size. Sleeves are too bulky to wear under a jacket though.
The sleeves are very large as others have reviewed, almost too billowy. And I was hoping the length would be longer, but it's almost too short to pair with leggings without exposing too much.

Pretty green sweater but awkward length/fit in the arms. I'm tall and have long arms but the length of the arms on this sweater are behind awkward and make it really difficult to layer or wear a coat. Might work for someone shorter/with shorter arms.
Love this dark green color. The knit fabric is not as itchy as it looks. Super cute detail with the open back. Many compliments from coworkers.

links_reviews_title: Oversized, but kind of short! And itchy...
links_reviews_text: Based on the model photo I was hoping I could wear this for just everyday stuff with leggings on RTR Update. The size 2 (I am usually a size S/M) didn't quite cover my butt, and I wasn't comfortable wearing it to work unless it did. But I probably would have for weekend activities during the day, it is oversized, but it is expected with this sweater. So after I tried it on immediately after receiving it, I thought I would swap it, but then the next morning I tried on again with jeans and I just loved the beautiful color and thought it would work. The keyhole in the back is adorable, and I love the sleeves! But after about 10 minutes I just couldn't take the itching. And I don't think I have sensitive skin. A long sleeved shirt with a low back could MAYBE work, but the sleeves on this sweater were really short. I am 5'4" with short arms, and when I bent my arm the sleeves almost became 3/4 length. So anyone with longer arms may find the sleeves really short even when their arms are relaxed! And finding something you could wear underneath might be hard. I wish I would have snapped a photo to help out!

Such a different shape, especially in the arms. I loved it! Wore it to holiday trivia and got a ton of compliments. I have a long torso so I paired this with high waisted jeans since it is on the shorter side.
I wore this as a casual sweater, and also dressed it up for work. Its comfortable, and is true to size. I would rent again.

This sweater was comfy and thick and warm. It has this cute keyhole in the back with a brown button. I mostly wore it with no bra and no one could tell. I was running out to the mailbox with this sweater on and some girl chased me down the street to ask me where I got it!
Great sweater! I love the keyhole detail in the back. It did feel a bit large especially the second time I wore it, so I wish there were a smaller size. But I liked it regardless!
Beautiful color, cute detail keyhole in the back, just an easy wear.
It was a nice fall sweater which was pretty warm but the sleeves were just ginormous. I couldn't put a coat or jacket on because the sleeves would bunch up underneath!
Good quality and beautiful green color. Ended up wearing just once, the fit was not for me. The sleeves in size 1 might not be long enough for tall people, beware.
I didn't love the bell shape of this one. Wasn't long enough to be slouchy... just sorta big.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear it, It was too small
links_reviews_text: I wanted to like this one and might if it was the right size but all that was available was the 1 so hopefully if I can get the bigger size next time it will be perfect. The color is just beautiful!
This top was very comfortable and the detail on the wrists gave it a cute little accent. Only problem was the front gaped open so had to pin it to avoid any exposure. Good for work or a night out!
This is best worn with a pencil black skirt or slim black pants and high heels.
I had to pin this to wear it & was worried abt it all night :(
I wasn't sold on the fit and style but every time I wore I received 800 compliments. I will say that it was very comfy and I felt like I was wearing pajamas
I really wanted to like this shirt but it was just to bulky in the chest area. I would have to wear undertook for sure.

links_reviews_title: Cute black top, shows chest a little too much.
links_reviews_text: The bottom of the sleeves are more gold than the picture shows.
The cinched waist was too tight which made the rest of the top sit weird
I liked this top just alright - I think the lapel cut is fun and unique, but the sides looked a little baggy. I also didn't like the wrist detail in person- the sparkles looked kind of cheap to me
This shirt rocks! I loved it. I should by it
This top is flattering to all body types, however, highly recommend for Pear Shapes as it hugs at waist and creates a great silhouette.

Great for a night out. Just be careful because it's super low cut. I wore with a strapless black lace bra, and that worked really well. The shirt does come open in front a bit so you will want something underneath that looks cute if it shows (and it will at some point!)
It was a little big and slightly too low cut for work but the sleeve cuffs were cute and metallic.
Nice fit. Works for tall women
It's a nice shirt and is comfortable while still defining a shape for you. You'll have to add a safety pin to keep the shirt front closed. It'll gape open without you realizing it.
Too small
A little short in the torso
This black shirt was a comfortable option for a dinner with my boyfriend. The detailing on the sleeve added a nice pop.
Nothing super special about this top. Good for a night out. Low cut in front, had to pin together

links_reviews_title: Needs a cami for work but cool oversized look
links_reviews_text: Fits baggy but I think on purpose

links_reviews_title: Not many compliments, but it was fine
links_reviews_text: Lowcut certainly, could not wear to work, but could wear if you're being risque at a party, wore with jeans and cute heels...
This top is cute, it does open fully at the neck. It's good for a night out if you don't mind something more sexy, but I pinned it to wear to work. Comfortable material, and I sized down to a XS.

I really liked this top! As other reviewers mentioned, it is pretty busty, but you could probably wear a cami underneath it. I have a smaller bust so I wore it without a bra and taped to make sure it didn't open up.
This shirt was just a bit too big on top for me so I sent it back

Dinner in Montreal the shirt was pretty-nice material, great detail in the sleeves, but I was constantly checking to make sure that I wasn't over exposed. Would benefit from a hook in the chest to hold the shirt together.

links_reviews_title: The cuffs were nice! Gold and sparkly.
links_reviews_text: It was big on me and made it too revealing so I didn't wear it. Overall a pretty top and nice material.

links_reviews_title: It was very droopy in the front so be prepared for boobage.
links_reviews_text: It was a nice length and nice fabric if you have boobs they will show. Need some tape. The sleeves are super cute and gold so even with a jacket over top it looks good.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely lovee everything about this dress
links_reviews_text: Really unique dress. Elevated work outfit. Can't wait to rent this again already!

The structure is like a shirtdress with a wrap dress around it. Worn, it looks like a button down shirt top with a wrap dress. The leg shows a little bit where the wrap gathers and forms a soft frill (for lack of a better description). Fabric is slightly shiny. These details overall give a formal and modest look. I felt like a person in a priest robe. Coworkers asked if I was going somewhere special after work.
As all the other reviews mentioned, great dress. The fabric drapes great, the fit is nice. The flaps are weird but work (once you figure them out)

I'm still not sure if I tied the wrap around this dress correctly. But it was cute and seemed like two dresses in one. When the wind blew it had the whole swirly effect. Would be a great dress for dancing.

Great dress that doesn't wrinkle easily. I wore it to a conservative work meeting and it was well suited for the occasion. Received several complements from colleagues. I should've maybe sized up as the dress beneath the "wrap" was a bit tight when sitting... but I wore it anyway. It is cute enough to wear out to dinner/ drinks following the work day.
This dress was easy to wear and true to size. I wore it in the winter w boots and tights. It's not super exciting but a little more interesting than a plain black shirt dress.

links_reviews_title: I was confused by this dress.
links_reviews_text: I'll start out by saying that I ended up really liking this dress. However, it didn't start out that way. The fabric feels cheap, and the fit was just off. I couldn't figure out if it was just my body type or the way the dress was made. I wore it by tying the two "flaps" in the front, shifted to the left side. Halfway through the work day, I started to think that I was wearing it wrong...but after checking how the model wears it, I think I did it right... There is a slit at either side of the dress at the rib cage, which I only discovered after having it on--they're covered up by the front flaps, but I still don't know what they were intended for. Anyway, with all that said, I felt comfortable throughout the day and (after getting used to it) thought it looked rather flattering.
Weird piece, but fun to wear once! Channeled Wednesday Adaams vibe

links_reviews_title: Didn't work on my petite pear figure
links_reviews_text: I wanted to make this work so badly because it's a gorgeous style. The top was too loose/long on me and I couldn't button the buttons on the lower half. Billowy sleeves made me look like I was drowning in this dress, too. The wrap front of the skirt aaaalmost covered me up but I was nervous about wearing this dress to work, which is what I rented it for. Looked great if I folded the top under the part that wraps and rolled up the sleeves and wore with heels but all of that and the open bottom would have been too much work.

links_reviews_title: Felt like I was in my old waitress uniform
links_reviews_text: Wanted to love this. After trying on 3 times I couldn't get over that it felt like an apron over a button up dress. In All black (my go to for the record) it felt straight up like a uniform. I couldn't get over it and ended up not wearing it. I do have to say the skirt cut fell amazingly which is why I kept trying.
Stylish modern and minimalist with a nice design twist. Very comfortable.
Loved this dress so much I didn't want to return it! I thought the material might be too dressy but it was was not. Easy to wear and felt very sophisticated.
Fits great and feels great too. The apron skirt thing was nicely tailored. Got lots of compliments. Quite warm.
Beautiful lines, looked great with a pointy heel.

links_reviews_title: Looked like a waitress in a bad way
links_reviews_text: The fabric is nice, but I just looked like a waitress. And maybe a little Amish.

links_reviews_title: STUNNER - WEARING TO WORK THEN OUT TO A PARTY TONIGHT!
links_reviews_text: This dress is very underwhelming in the photo but when I put it on, it was transformed. It was pretty wrinkled when I received it and ironing it was a pain, but it was worth it! The tie in interesting...not confusing, just different. It's kind of a wrap style but you tie both towards the front left. I will definitely rent again...LOVE VINCE!

Simple,soft, and stylish chic. You can wear it so many ways with a lace top underneath, sweater on top, jacket over, etc. Runs large so if you're debating between sizes, get a size smaller. Super comfortable. Would rent again in a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Very professional looking and high quality fabric/tailoring.
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely runs large, and is a bit long. Be prepared to embrace a more boho fit..I cinched it a bit more with a leather waist belt which looked nice and broke of the black fabric.
Loved this dress. It ended up looking more formal than I expected but it was still great. I am usually a 4 or 6. I got a 4 but I wish I got a 2 because I had to tie it as tight as I could.

links_reviews_title: My boyfriend said I looked STUNNING in this dress
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress.
Its an easy dress. Very comfortable and overall flattering.

I had a women in tech event for work, and this dress was perfect for it. Comfortable and easy, yet still fashionable! I did have to roll up the sleeves just a little, but otherwise it fit well. I wore heels for some added length since the skirt is longer. Overall, enjoyed wearing!

links_reviews_title: A perfect work staple! Perfect for the warm weather and cold office combo. Paired w/ black booties!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit, true to size. Modest length, very work appropriate without being boring.

I have a small waist, average bust, large hips and thighs. The shirtdress part of this dress extends about mid-thigh, and I couldn't get the lowest buttons done up because the dress is narrow BUT that is okay because of the overskirt wrap. It is tricky to tie. Here's what I did: Take the left side of skirt and put the string through the hole on the right, threading it into the back of the dress underneath. Repeated on the opposite side (right thread through left hole). Then, I lifted up the dress in the back and tied the ties together underneath the dress. This kept the whole thing more closed. I also did the j crew-tuck on the sleeves since it's summer in LA and I wanted to have this with the sleeves rolled up. I am very tempted to buy this one and will keep it at least one more month. I wear it to work with heels but can see it would also be cute on the weekend with sneakers. It's elegant, classy, and just a little bit different/edgy. Fabric is very high quality.

links_reviews_title: Fit was great, but I couldn't figure out how the sash worked, didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, but I couldn't figure out how the sash worked, didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work and got a compliment from at least 5 people, its very stylish
links_reviews_text: fit was a little bigger than i like but the slit made it feel more sexy/feminine. very comfortable dress. would rent again and possibly buy it .

links_reviews_title: Business on top, formal on bottom
links_reviews_text: The bottom half looks pretty dressy but the button up top brings the dress back to being perfect for work. I felt amazing in this dress and will rent it again and again. The sleeves are extremely long and it was a bit annoying to keep having to push my sleeves back, but it was worth it.
LOVED and so flattering
It takes a minute to figure out the best way to wear it, but it is subtly unique and fits well.
Loved this dress! Works both for casual, work and after hours. Comfortable material that stays nice all day - perfect for spring.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love but seemed very pilgrim/server style
links_reviews_text: Fabric is gorgeous, I think it would look better on someone who is tall
Chic

links_reviews_title: I absolutely LOVED this dress and received multiple compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress was absolutely fabulous. Very comfortable for a Monday in the office. The fabric was a bit heavy on the wrap but the fit and fabric were terrific. My only complaint isn't with the dress rather the condition of the garment. It was missing the bottom button on the shirt "dress" underneath the wrap. I noticed in a meeting when it was revealing a good deal of my thigh. I had to carefully sit and maneuver the extra fabric all day.

The sizing was fine but the tie is kind of awkward and this didn't do anything for me. I thought it would be a great basic work dress but it was maybe too basic for me and I didn't end up wearing it at all.
Silky, classy and cute

links_reviews_title: Not keen on the wrapped skirt.
links_reviews_text: I liked the style but I found the wrap make me look like I was wearing an apron. Didn't wear it.

If you have a little wider hips like me... the first layer of this dress could be a little tight. Thankfully it has the outside piece to cover up the buttons that were pulling a bit. Still a great dress and got many compliments

links_reviews_title: I received a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: Sleeves are a bit long, and overall was a bit baggy. Will rent again but in a smaller size for a more dressed up look.
This is a great shirt dress. I wish I had sized down to a 0. Wore it to work, would rent again.

This dress was good not great, classic style and true to size fit. The faux wrap was a bit of an odd cape thing but did give the draping something a little special once styled. Probably would not rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for winter days in the office
links_reviews_text: The coziest dress! Felt and looked formal enough for a corporate setting, and didn't want to take it off when I met up with my friends after work. Keeps your warm on commutes and in the office (no office sweater needed that day)
Loved the color and fit. Bought this within an hour of wearing it and have worn it multiple times since.
I got this for work and every day. It was not as fitted as as I had expected for an extra small. Easy to wear, but not an attention grabber.

The colors are a bit difficult to style but if you can figure it out it's so cute! The fit was a bit baggy and moving around resulted in weird lumps in the fabric. Overall though, super cute sweater dress!
I threw this on with sneakers to run errands and then ended up meeting friends for dinner and drinks and it was perfect for both occasions! Loved this dress.

The fit was overall great. It's comfortable but classy.. I'm short but with a fitted boot it was cute. Wore it to work drinks and a date. Material was thick enough that it felt flattering and wasn't too tight or loose. Lots of compliments!
To me this dress was both too boring and too tight (stretch, contour dress) for work without a layering piece.
Nice dress to wear. Comfy and warm for winter.
This dress ran large. It was like wearing a blanket all day. Cute with boots. Plenty of stretch. Just a comfortable everyday dress.

Orhers have said this runs large. Depends on how you like your fit. I would normally go small but this was very comfortable and while loose, had structure and with a jean jacket was cute on an outside tour day. I am 5'7" and normally a size 4-6 - if I wanted it very fitted for sure a small - it wasn't in stock. Easy to wear with boots, booties, sneakers even. Quite thick and warm, if your office or home is warm you might be unhappy. If you run cold and like a warmer choice it's like great and it is very very soft. This is one for "not sure what I'll want to wear this week" - it fits into a lot of situations.

I ordered the XS and it felt a little big around the middle but overall ok. The material is nice and squishy, thick enough so you don't have panty lines but not so thick it feels like you're wearing a puffer jacket as a sleeping bag. I thought the tan color would be a little lighter but it was ok for me. Overall it was an easy, cute outfit for a chilly day. I live where it's usually warm and I struggle with the layers so I appreciated the ease of a sweater dress. I'd rent it again for a vacation somewhere with cool weather. It would be a good casual, touring around town dress.
Runs large, size down. This dress was unfortunately loose/large and didn't hug my curves.
Loved this dress. Worked great with a bump. Got tones of compliments on it. Easy to dress up or down, super comfy and flattering. 10/10!
n/a

links_reviews_title: Great dress for everyday, wintertime tasks
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove and is super comfortable and WARM! I got quite a few compliments while wearing it and even considered buying it to keep.
I really wanted to love this but it was too itchy for me to wear. I loved the style and the colors. The fit was a bit big but I don't mind that for a sweater dress. Wish i could have worn!

links_reviews_title: Could not have loved this more
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments, so cute and so chic - May decide to buy it if I end up renting it again!
I wanted this to fit but it was huge in the waist. I don't think I could've sized down or it wouldn't been tight on my butt. Maybe it just wasn't right for my body type!
Loved this Free People sweater dress - an easy outfit to throw on and go with mules or sneakers. Would be perfect for travel. Fit well.

links_reviews_title: Great feel/weight, but it definitely ran a little large.
links_reviews_text: The dress feels amazing, the perfect thickness for late fall/winter weather, but ran just a bit too large in the midsection. I'm not sure that an xs would have worked though as the shoulders would likely have been too small.
As flattering as it gets for a long sleeve turtleneck full length sweater dress!

Very comfortable and a perfect length. I'm tall so I might actually warn girls on the shorter side that the length may be longer then you expect. The fabric is stretchy and the dress is not itchy--which is saying a lot for a turtle neck! A must rent!

links_reviews_title: Was nice for a fall day
links_reviews_text: It fitted right and allowed me to move around without having to pull it up

I rented this for a blossoming but still early baby bump and found the fit to be rather odd in the midsection. It was loose where the natural waist is and made the overall garment rather unflattering. After trying this garment on, I returned it without wearing it.
Loved the fit of this sweater dress, it would have fit me perfect is it was a tiny bit shorter or came in a XS short. Alas, I had to make die and looked fine in some heels.
Color washed me out but the fit was great.

This dress is made with very thick material, so it keeps you quite warm, especially with the turtle neck. Not as form fitting as in the picture. It fits loose around the waist and looses it elasticity fairly quickly throughout the day.
Doesn't exactly fit well cause the cloth is to thick

links_reviews_title: Ordered this dress for a meeting with work.
links_reviews_text: Nice sweater dress. I normally wear a size 6-8. I ordered a size Medium because I didn't want it to hug my curves for work & I thought it fit like a Large. Nonetheless I still wore it & received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: It was just ok and not spectacular as one my choices.
links_reviews_text: It was too long overall- in the sleeves and length of the dress but I wore it twice and it was comfortable to wear.
Loved the design, and the knit was perfectly squishy and comfortable - but runs large so I didn't end up wearing. I currently wear a 10 in dresses and the large was shapeless and baggy on me.
the stomach is super loose, but has a really nice shape!

links_reviews_title: The dress is warm and cute 5'3 115 lbs wore a small
links_reviews_text: Good fit, long
I'm usually a 4-6 and off the guide ordered a M. I was swimming in it and had to send it back. Such a bummer because it really is a rad sweater dress. Definitely size down.
fits true to size. i ordered a sm and should have gotten an xs as it was a bit large around my hips.
This dress is so cute for vacation! It has a lot of material, but is still breezy enough to wear in a tropical climate. Very flattering and would rent again.
Loved this piece for my Mexico vacation. I wish I could have bought it! Very flattering, and flowy and comfy when I eat all of the things at the all inclusive resort. :)
Overall really liked it. The fabric is heavy so for a warm climate it can be hot.
I wore this to my friend holiday gatherings BBQ. It felt flowy and extremely comfortable. The fabric was thick and since it was black it felt more "winter" than the colorful ones I'd usually wear.

I rented this for day wear in Mexico. I tried it on and my husband said it looked like a mumu. I think it's a neat dress but not necessarily flattering. It runs large even the extra small was larger than normal. It's well-made with lots of layers and very interesting to look at. If my husband didn't dislike it so much I would have kept & worn it. It does run somewhat short. If I did wear it, I would have to wear flats or flip-flops to accommodate the shorter length.
This dress is super comfy and I got SO many compliments throughout the day. I wore it casual but it could be dressed up. Super flowy and perfect for summer.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a party but wore causally instead.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a little odd. The top runs a bit small, but the dress is huge on the bottom. Almost like a cotton ball gown. I wore it casually. It's definitely not a formal dress as it's a ton of material that's all cotton. If you are under 5'2" you will be swimming in it.
Super pretty beachy maxi. The low back on this is gorgeous

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, tight in the bust
links_reviews_text: This is a cute dress! That said, I sized up from my usual Small to a Medium while 5 months pregnant to wear on vacation. At a little over 20 weeks, it fit my body well everywhere, with the exception of the bust. I couldn't even zip it to the top (zipper is at the side of the bust seem, which didn't help). Really bummed I wasn't able to wear this, and for the size, I would have expected a little more room. Would definitely rent this a few months post-pregnancy, though!
Absolutely loved this dress. Worked well for my body type (athletic with wider shoulders and a smaller bust). Perfect length for my 5'6" height
Great for wearing around, loose on bottom and snug but comfortable up top. Quite a lot of fabric and fairly heavy but cotton with string stitching

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful dress! So fun and flouncy!
links_reviews_text: This dress has a comfortable fit. The straps can be adjusted if needed.
Absolutely loved this dress. Wore it to a rehearsal dinner at 23 weeks pregnant. The belly fit perfectly and the chest was just slightly too large at one size up from my regular size.
The fit is great, has adjustable straps, worn for a party and around town. Could be dressed up or down. Very comfy!
Great dress but was way to long for me

links_reviews_title: Very cute, runs long in length
links_reviews_text: For a taller person. Runs large, should have sized down but made it work. Very cute dress, while rent again
This dress is sooo long! I am 5'8" and wore two inch platforms and this still was touching the ground.

Loved this maxi dress - perfect for summer given the linen cotton fabric, very breathable. The top half fit perfectly and the low back is a nice touch. The dress is definitely somewhat voluminous - not sleek, but cute for a summer date or drinks/dinner with girlfriends (plenty of room in the tummy area too!) I also took it on vacation with me. I'm 5'6 with long legs and the length was fine in flat sandals, but might need a small heel if you're shorter.
Great midi/maxi dress. Adjustable straps. It fit snugly around my chest which is not big so larger ladies, beware! Felt like a flamenco dancer.
This is lovely but a bit long. I'm only five foot three but even with tall wedges this was still dragging. Though lovely.

This dress is meant to be flowy and it is, but I didn't feel like it overwhelmed me and usually dresses without a fitted silhouette do. The length was perfect for me and I was able to wear flats and it did not touch or drag the ground. I loved this because it was easy and fun for warm summer nights with friends!

links_reviews_title: I wanted to like it but it just didn't do it for me as a maternity dress
links_reviews_text: Th fabric of this dress is great. Perfect for vacation or a casual summer evening party. Unfortunately the cut is a little off as a maternity dress. The top was fitted which was good but the flare under the waist made my belly look twice as large. If I wasn't pregnant it would have been great. But as a maternity dress it didn't quite work.

links_reviews_title: Such a cute design and I liked the simple pop of color.
links_reviews_text: Not maternity but works for a preggo belly! Comfy and well made.

I really wanted this to work for upcoming vacation but it's just too large. The photos hide how voluminous this dress really is - it makes me look a lot wider than I am and not in that beachy flowy way, more like a prom dress. It was also dragging on the floor in sandals 5'4".

Runs a little big. However, if you have a larger sized chest, order you're normal size. The dress is very long. I'm 5'7" and would need heels or wedges to keep it from dragging on the floor. All in all, it is a very cute dress and perfect for vacation.

links_reviews_title: Tight for me but cute jeans. made for someone a little taller and thinner. No stretch at all.

links_reviews_text: They came with the tags still on! I love these pants they are so comfy and I'm the girl who hates wearing any sort of pant so this means a lot coming from me

links_reviews_title: Perfect Jeans For My Height and Shape
links_reviews_text: These are shapely, but not loose. Flattering and comfortable. These are perfect for my petite frame.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and stretchy. Fit snugly everywhere.
links_reviews_text: I wore these pants for two days straight and they fit snug and comfortable the whole time.

I loved the fit of these jeans and was so temped to keep them. I wore the 24R and I feel like they ran true to size as I typically wear a 24 or 25 in jeans. The fit well in the waist and throughout the legs. They hit me at about my ankle and weren't too cropped or too long. I wore them multiple times throughout the month and would definitely rent again!

Amazing jeans! Comfy and flattering a great high waist. I thought of them as modern "Brenda Walsh" jeans. I'm usually a 27 so the 28 were a tiny bit large and they do get looser w wear. Wish the 27 would become available bc then I would buy!
Amazing high rise jeans with stretch (but not too much). Love these so much, they are super flattering and the perfect skinny jean
Not even close to fitting in my size.
Not a wash or fit that wows - didn't wear. Fits mostly true to size, slightly smaller in thighs + waist.
One size too small. Feels like 12 not 14.

links_reviews_title: Love the high rise, great fit all the way to the ankle
Comfyness lol if that’s even a word
links_reviews_text: Good feet not very flattering on my rear but comfy for everyday
A true high waist jean that stayed put. I may have been able to size up, but with this size didn't need a belt and felt like everything was "snug". Would rent again.
Wish I owned these! Comfortable enough to wear all day and versatile enough to wear to work or on the weekends.

links_reviews_title: Love these! Large on the waist though...
links_reviews_text: My measurements are: hips 41, true waist 29. I loved these jeans and how they looked on the booty! Needed a belt around the waist though- probably an inch or two too loose.

links_reviews_title: best jeans I have ever put on
links_reviews_text: amazing fit! My butt looked great! (which is rare for me)
These jeans are so flattering--they make me look like I have an hourglass figure but I'm completely straight up and down. I kept them for an additional time period because I loved them so much.
These are perfect. Great length for me, and very comfy material. They are quite high waisted, so that's something to keep in mind. I loved them so much I bought them.

I have wanted to try a pair if Agoldes for a while now. I am definitely buying these! Stretchy enough to be comfortable with a high waist, perfect length, sturdy jean (not a jeggings feel) and flattering. Love.

links_reviews_title: It is cute, but runs small
links_reviews_text: The jeans are very cute and love the details of the buttons, but it runs small and with no give.

links_reviews_title: Cute style, way too high on my torso
links_reviews_text: Love the style but they fit loose on me and came up to way past my rib cage. Definitely made for someone taller than 5'2". The quality is great though, would have loved to make these work. For reference, I got a 25R and am typically a 25.
A little too tight. Didn't wear

Didn't end up wearing these. They were lighter in color than expected and not all that flattering. Granted, I'm 4 months postpartum so any pants are tricky these days. If you are slim and not working on losing a Mom bod they'll probably look great!
Ok
would sleep in these
Great rise and for tucking in shirts - but the seams were rough against my legs
Will rent again so comfortable
very comfortable
These jeans fit perfectly. I would recommend getting your true size. They are perfect if you are looking for high-waisted jeans. I plan to buy them.

links_reviews_title: Love perfect high waist doesn't look like mom jeans
links_reviews_text: The pockets are placed so it doesn't look like mom jeans

links_reviews_title: The best jeans I have ever worn
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with these jeans! They make your body look insanely good, hit exactly the right length in the ankles, and work to either dress up or be casual. The buttons on the front look great and are really easy to get on and off. They do stretch out if you wear them for a long period but not anything like gappy in the knees or too lose, just enough that if you wanted to wear them with tennis shoes they would look a little more casual than if they were tight.

I rented these as I typically tend to wear lower-rise, dark wash skinny jeans only. I loved being able to try a new style, and these fit the bill! There is a good amount of stretch, so I didn't feel "trapped" by the high waist. Also, I love that there were several buttons in the front. The wash was the right level of lightness that I could wear with many colors. They did stretch out after two wears, but bounced back after a quick wash/dry.
Liking these jeans - nice wash, good stretch, and a hits at the belly button. Might have to buy a pair

links_reviews_title: The fit is really cute, runs a little big. Stretchy.
links_reviews_text: Choose one size down

links_reviews_title: High waisted with stretch. No gaping.
links_reviews_text: I'm a little curvier than usual right now and the 27s were a little large, but great staple piece.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite pairs I have worn!
links_reviews_text: They fit comfortably, high waisted, and very flattering, especially on the back side!
So comfy and flattering.
So awesome and so many compliments, just more jogging material then expected so that was the only thing I would change
Such a good fit! So comfy, kept shape all day and boyfriend said it's one of his fav rentals, so there's that.
I lost a few pounds so I went with a smaller size because that was all that was available. The overalls are very fitted throughout the hips and the legs. Love the color! Love the look!

I LIVED in these one weekend, so much so that I actually bought them. I'm usually a 29 or 30 in jeans so I ordered the 30 to be safe. I didn't want them skin tight. I received a ridiculous amount of compliments on these. The fact that they're a nice olive green instead of jean let me dress them up with cute booties and wear them to work.
These are fun to wear on a daily. Dressed them up and wore them to work.

links_reviews_title: I put that this runs small because who wants their overalls sticking to their body! Lol
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a size 26-27. The first time I ordered these I got them in a 31 I believe. They were a good fit but I think I like this size better, just because they aren't as slouchy. These are a good fit & im purchasing them. Hehehe after 3 rentals! Finally. They're just structured very good. Easy airplane outfit. Comfortable enough to wear around the house. My favorite set of overalls.
I wish the pants were a little longer but I have very long legs
These overalls fit really well on a petite frame. Material is stretchy and hit right at my ankle.
Seriously considering buying these. They are so comfortable and fit like a glove. They have a nice stretch so you don't feel constricted, and the quality is just really nice.
The fit was spot on and this piece was very comfortable. I really enjoyed wearing this jumpsuit:)
Everything and more
Super cute, fun and comfy! Great for fall.

I don't normally wear overalls but these were super cute on and actually flattering. They were really stretchy too which made all day wear very comfortable. I received several compliments from strangers and people asking where I purchased them.
Loved the fit of these overalls, especially the back being lower than others I've tried on.
Fits perfect stretchy material zippers on the side in case you have round hips a good length for short girls
A little snug, I'm a little bigger on bottom than top, so if you've got skinny legs, this would be cuter on you. Didn't wear, only okay.

When I ordered these, I felt pretty confident these would be one of those orders I immediately send back. However, I was so surprised how much I actually loved these!!! I did size up, based on reviews - but they were perfect! I'm 5'3" and the length worked out for me! They weren't too tight through the waist and hips, but did lay a little funny in the front. I think that's just because they're overalls. I wore them 3x before returning them - worth taking a chance on! :)
I love love love these overalls! They are so cute and comfy. The olive color is beautiful. They really spice up a regular everyday outfit!

links_reviews_title: Making me love the whole overall movement!
links_reviews_text: Loved these. They fit just like any blankNYC regular jean would. Super tight in the ankle and leg which made it flattering. Really fun color and style. Both sides button and zip up to close, a little inconvenient for going to the bathroom!
Fun and trendy - super comfortable. Softer/stretchier than normal denim. Only downside is I wish the front pockets were real.

links_reviews_title: It was cute, a little tighter than I wanted but I did have fun wearing it and received compliments.
links_reviews_text: a little tight around the belly, but cute over all.
Loved these so much I almost bought them. Really nice slim leg, and adjustable straps which are great for petites. Great for every day.
Love the color! The fit was a bit tricky, it's tight through the stomach and a bit prone to camel toe. Not uncomfortable to wear, but a little difficult to move in at times.
These overalls fit like a glove. Could be dressed up with the right jacket or go for a super casual as well!

These are a very form fitting pair of overalls and I wish I would have sized up because I like mine to fit a little looser. I have a long torso and was fine with the length but that are pretty low rise. Cute color and style!

Perfect slim fit overalls! Blank denim never does me wrong - fit is always true to size, definitely snug with some stretch. I'm 5'9" so these were pretty cropped on me. Best part of the fit is how high they came on the waist - nothing worse than low-riding overalls with unintentional skin showing! I paired with a tight black tee, one of my own basics.

I was expecting probably ankle length for me, but these were Capri length and felt dorky. Since they're so tight, when I sat down and got up, they were even shorter and I had to pull down the pant legs by ending over every time. I'm sure they'd be good on someone average height; but just not right for me.
Don't think about renting this - RENT IT. Stretchy fabric that fits like a glove in the cutest fall color!! Wore this 5+ already.

This is the first pair of overalls I've thrown on since elementary school. I absolutely loved the skinny fit and wore them all around town for a weekend. They are definitely tight in the hips but I wore my regular 28. I have a fairly straight figure so they were a hit for me but not sure a very curvy woman could make this cut work.
Love the fit, a great way to change up the weekend look

I really liked the style, cut, and color, and could have made it work by rolling up the bottom hem a bit, but unfortunately my large calves were too big for the skinny leg design. The fabric did have some give, but not enough for my body. It's definitely made for a skinny body type, not muscular petite.
Fit well, and was stretchy so it had some nice give. Really loved it and got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: easy to wear and on trend
links_reviews_text: I wasn't sure if I was cool enough or young enough for these, but I rented them anyway. I'm so glad I did. They were super comfortable and easy to wear. I received so many compliments on them. They fit great. There's some stretch to the fabric. I'd definitely rent these again for a causal gathering.

I love that these overalls fit skinny on the legs. They're perfect if you are into the overall trend but not ready to commit to buying a pair. My sisters ended up buying the same pair because they loved them so much!
Wish it had real pockets
Fit great, super comfy and cute. Has a good stretch to it without feeling like "jegging" material. Would rent again

It fit great everywhere except my hips. I am usually a size 4 but this ran small in the hip area. I carry the most weight there so it might just be me but most 27 or 4's fit me. Super cute but not really my style unless it was in black!
Loved the tightness around waist and legs, adjustable straps. If you're prone to camel tpes, you will get a massive one!

links_reviews_title: Wanted to try overalls as an adult
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to do the overalls trend without commuting so I did, these were super cute and so comfortable! Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: The sky blue suit is above and beyond the limit
links_reviews_text: Love this combo. Comfy and structured. The cozy feel of a lounge outfit and the tailored look of a structured suit. What more could a long day in the office ask for? Loved this suit. Only downside was the material was bunching a bit.
Wore this for a work trip and a funeral in the same week. The pieces together were incredible. So comfortable and a beautiful color
Rented pants to match. Perfect length of sleeves and well constructed. Pretty blue color.

I'm fairly certain RTR got five new subscribers from me wearing this suit (rent with the pants)! I got so many compliments and it fit perfectly on me. Stretchy, comfy fabric. Gorgeous color and perfect to wear all day. Wanted to keep it! Note, I have very large shoulders and I can't rent just any blazer, so this was perfect for me.
Has a little stretch so it's forgiving. Fantastic color. Not for hot weather.
Great blazer that's comfortable to wear all day long. Thicker material but great color and has some stretch in it that makes it comfortable to wear!

Loved this! First off, Theory just generally makes well made quality items. Fabric was lined but still light weight enough for summer. Theory normally runs small, so I'm a 6/8 and would always do an 8 but RTR only had the 6 available. It fit but was a little snug in the shoulders and probably would have looked ill fitting if I had buttoned it. Wore with the matching pants, and a white shirt, brown belt & tan wedges.
This jacket was not a very flattering . I did not care for the fabric and it didn't seem to be very good quality.
I wore this blazer with the matching pants. Very comfortable and fit perfectly like it was tailored.

I really wanted to like this because the color is great for work -- not too bright -- and the weight is perfect for cool to cold days. The boxy design though was a little too oversized for my petite frame. I wore this to work and styled it the best I could, but didn't feel great in it. I can see this working for those who aren't petite as it's truly a lovely jacket.
Lovely powder blue color, paired with RTR Ralph Lauren dress. Classic fit with great sized pockets. Gives a nice upgrade to any outfit.

links_reviews_title: Wore them with flats and a blouse for a work presentation. Dressy enough for special, comfortable en
links_reviews_text: I have short legs and these pant still fit like a dream.
My boss, who hates me, complimented me on this blazer.
True to size with a slight stretch. Very comfortable and a beautiful blue! Perfect for work or evening!

I rented this with the matching pants and got so many compliments I decided to buy it. The jacket runs small, hence the "shrunken" name. I went up a size to rent, but am buying it in my regular size. The color and texture are unique and flattering.

I loved this jacket and pant combo from Theory. The fabric is so comfortable, but it did have a bit of pilling on it. Nothing too noticeable. I love RTR Unlimited because provides so many fun alternatives to boring office wear.
Great jacket, fit n fabric...must try!
I love this jacket! Very professional and tailored fit. Color is a beautiful muted blue. Material is thick and has a nice stretch to it. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Didn't get a chance to wear it out but the cut it's really nice
links_reviews_text: Fits nicely. Unfortunately California is like 2000 degrees now I can't wear it anywhere. Probably a good fall or winter piece. Fully lined.

links_reviews_title: Great attention-getter at work networking event!
links_reviews_text: This color is really nice! Unusual enough so people notice you but not bright. The fabric was heavier than I expected but it gave the jacket nice weight and "hang." It was a great jacket for looking professional with a bit a flair thanks to the color. Wearing it boosted my confidence at an important networking event.
This was heavier than I thought; more suitable for the colder seasons. Also, just a little bit tight over the shoulders/chest. Looks nice. Will considering ordering in the fall, in a size up

The front is shorter than the back and it really sits like it does on the model. I just dont think this is a good silhouette for my body type, and the sleeves were long/wide so I couldn't push them up and have them stay there.
I liked this sweater and I wore it to work but it didn't feel like anything special. Weird fit, wouldn't rent again.
fit was great!

links_reviews_title: I liked this sweater for its color, its cut and its comfort. Belle sleeves were fun too.
links_reviews_text: I wore it twice in three days. It was fun to pair with the right shirt under it. It is pilling a little bit and got a bit hot in a restaurant so you have to make sure you wont be indoors in a warm room when you wear it.

I didn't think this was wonderfully flattering- it's cropped and floats away from the body in a way that didn't flatter me. However. It is so so comfortable that I did not care at all. Wore it. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Runs very small - would not rent
links_reviews_text: Photo shows it oversized and it's the complete opposite. Couldn't even get out my shoulders. Bad pick.
I loved this sweater! It is one of my favorite rentals. Great for work or play. The cut is very flattering and the large sleeves are a fun detail. I will definitely rent it again in the future.
The sweater is definitely large as I sized down to an XS and it was still long in the sleeves for me. This sweater is super cute and soft. Great color too!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful style, but not for me.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and a nice mid weight sweater. Sleeves are to long and the top is to short for me.
This is just a dorky sweater. Fits fine. I think it's the color and the width of the ribbing...

links_reviews_title: Great color and fabric. Fit just okay
links_reviews_text: Loved this cobalt color with light jeans and black booties. The luxe thick fabric hung well. Cut was mediocre and a bit shapeless.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color and looks and feels expensive.
links_reviews_text: Very baggy sleeves but a soft, comfortable feel. Worked well with dress pants on a winter day and jeans for casual.
Far too large.
This is significantly more cropped than shown in the photo. Shapeless and not in a flattering way.
I really love this sweater. The color is beautiful and the fit sits nicely.

This sweater is gorgeous. It's soft and cozy without being too heavy. The color is a bit more muted than it looked online - more cerulean and less royal, which I love. I am always between a S and XS and could probably be wearing the XS in this sweater, but the silhouette is drapey so it still looks good. Love it!

links_reviews_title: Didn’t wear this. A little too low and just a little too cropped.
links_reviews_text: Could be a great weekend piece for someone who doesn’t mind a little cleavage.

A little bit on the short side for me, but i wore high waisted jeans and a belt bag and it worked. Great heavy material. V neck is not too low so its work appropriate. Bell sleeves were a cute detail.

I absolutely loved this! I needed something to lift my spirits during the covid quarantine, and this did the trick! Comfortable to wear around the house all day without feeling like I was sacrificing mobility. Would love to rent again when I can where it out and about.

links_reviews_title: a little fancier than i thought but i loved it!
links_reviews_text: this was such a cute skirt i got so many compliments and i literally only wore it out once because corona! i loved the style. it was a bit more form hugging than i thought it would be and the material was a little nicer than i thought so this is probably better worn for an event than everyday but you also good wear it really casually depending on your style. either way i loved it so much that i bought it!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable midi skirt with great print and bright color
links_reviews_text: I'm between size 4 and 6 right now and the Medium was very comfortable. It fit my rear and hips perfectly but there was some puckering around the waist so it looked bad if I had tucked my shirt completely in. Love the length. Very easy to wear. I didn't notice anything that made me think it was low quality or over worn like some reviewers mentioned.

Wore this skirt with a crop top in Cabo and it had such a fun vacation vibe with the neon green. The waist is nice and stretchy so you don't feel squeezed in, could probably size down and be ok but I went with my regular size.
I loved this skirt! Ended up wearing it 3-4 times. I wore it out twice in the Hamptons and got tons of compliments. It's thin material but not see through. Would rent again
Loved the fit, elastic wait band and silk skirt with an old school fit plus new school print = RTR WIN
Wasn't sure I would love this as it pretty bright but it was perfect! Definitely would rent again. Pretty true to size but size up if between sizes.

links_reviews_title: The perfect skirt for the end of summer!
links_reviews_text: I was so excited when I rented this skirt but wasn't sure if I was going to be able to pull off the length or fit. To my surprise, it fit great! And it was perfect for a night out with friends :)

This was a fun pop of color, flattering, comfortable. However, it was kind of wrinkly and looked cheap. Also, you need to wear a slip or nude colored spanx underneath... I wore nude underwear and it was a bit see-through under bright lights.
Such a great fit.... I would like to buy it in multiple colors :)

This might be the most comfortable skirt I've ever worn. Silky like material with an elastic waist so it fits true to size. The green color is beautiful and bright. Very light, so prefect for vacation. I wanted to buy!

This skirt was AMAZING. The quality was amazing and it just fell perfectly. It's not lined, but it's not see through at all. It was perfect for a hot summer day! The color was bright in a good way. Both the small and medium fit but I went with the medium because we were having a big dinner and needed some room!

links_reviews_title: Surprised by how much I liked this!
links_reviews_text: Pulling this out of the package, I didn't think I'd like it -- but it grew on me! The waist is a stretch elastic band and the fabric has some stretch to it, too. It definitely did hug my hips and the elastic waistband isn't sown on all the way around, so that made the fit a bit awkward - but it's nothing you can't deal with. On my 5'4" frame, it was longer than a midi skirt but I could wear easily with sandals to work. I'm normally an 8 & rented the large. Medium def would not have worked.

I am still wishing I bought this skirt! It was so flattering, comfortable and versatile. I wore both during the day and for my birthday dinner. It was cute with a white body suit and fun jewelry or with a band t-shirt. It can go with heels, little white sneakers, sandals - anything really. Loved it and will probably rent again.

Love this skirt, received endless compliments. I'm an 8/10 and the medium fit perfectly. Thin material, but not at all clingy. Styled this with a black three-quarter blouse (stayed tucked in with the elastic waistband surprisingly well) for office casual on Friday and then a black tank with espadrille wedges for a weekend look. Cool enough for humid SC summers, but the fit wasn't too bootylicious for the office. Tons of comments on the fun pattern/color: "feels like animal print but better." Versatile piece that easily goes from day to night.
I sized up because I'm pregnant, but I feel that the waist in the large would be very snug on a true large. Cute skirt, great length.

LOVED! Wore it to work and then out at night. Super flattering for an hourglass shape - fit tight in my waist but fell nicely on my hips. I'm usually between a M-L but this fit well in L to give room to move.
Love this skirt and got tons of compliments. Very on trend. It is very thin - no lining - so can't really tuck in a shirt. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it but it fit well and I will rent again

links_reviews_text: Loved this skirt!
Ok skirt, stretchy waist, comfy, cute for summer

Way too long for me to wear normally. I had to roll it at least 4 inches to get the style I wanted. Other than that it was a cute, light weight skirt! Nice for summer, but not good for crop tops if you're short.
Fun color, good fit
This skirt is very cute and fits true to size but it is super see-through. It needs to be worn with a slip. Not sure I'll be able to wear it because I don't have a slip this long.
Loved dressing this up and down, and wore to work as well as on the weekend. Love the fit!
Loved this romper ! Looked so cute on, listened to the other reviews and went with the medium over the small and it fit perfectly. Only downside is you can't really wear a bra.
I rented this for a vacation and it was both super cute and stylish, and super comfy and cool for walking around in South America. So many compliments!

I'm usually a side 0/XS/25, and the S was a perfect. I don't think I could have sized down. It's a great print for summer/vacay, but starts wrinkling pretty much right when you put it on/start moving around. The light colour makes this less noticeable, but just not the best fabric.

links_reviews_title: Perfect romper for the amalfi coast!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit of this romper! It was super cute for a trip to positano. I was very tempted to buy it. I loved that it tied in the back so I could adjust it perfectly. My top is tinier than my hips so the adjustability helps.

links_reviews_title: For the love of lemons in Positano, Italy!

links_reviews_text: I loved this romper! Such a fun look that received a bunch of compliments. To my busty friends out there, be prepared for a little bit of side boob.
Cute, cute, cute!!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, cute, and fun! Ideal for hot summer days
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a small but wore a medium for this romper, which meant that the straps were too loose. However, I loved this romper and wish I could've kept it for longer! It's an adorable print, and I love the cutout back. For the summer months, this is an easy and really cute outfit.

The fit of the romper was exceptional it can be worn in a more form fitting and conservative style or in a looser sexier look . I spent a week in touring breweries and wineries in this ensemble And felt it suited every occasion whether Casual or formal

links_reviews_title: Super light and perfect for vacation
links_reviews_text: Loved this trendy romper, it was the perfect weight for a hot Mexican evening. The fabric does wrinkle easily but after being work it falls out. I would re rent.

links_reviews_title: Was really fun to wear on vacation. Had to wear cutlets but it was totally comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Medium was a little big. I could've gotten a small.
This light and very flattering piece is perfect for day or night! My boyfriend loved it just as much as I did, and he's so picky! So cute, totally recommend.
Loved this, so hard to find a romper for tall people! I'm small chested, so had to tie it really tight in the back, but it was comfortable and fun! Got lots of compliments!

Lightweight fabric and open back were perfect for dancing all afternoon during Miami Music Week under the sun. Very cute and the shorts weren't too short to be comfortable in. I have a long torso so I barely ever wear rompers because they can be too short. If you are tall/long just order up a size
Wore this for the day in Palm Springs, and it was perfect! The fabric is really light and the straps are adjustable since they tie

Received tons of compliments during my vacation. It was perfect for sailing the blue seas in such a fun, flirty romper. The back criss cross detail was the best part. Not too difficult to take off for the bathroom, but rompers are a pain in general.
This romper fit perfectly as the straps are adjustable and tied to fit you! It was super cute and so fun to wear!
This outfit was fun but a little awkward to wear because of the chest area and not being able to wear a bra with it. It also wrinkled over the day.
So freakin cute got so many compliments but runs small so be careful
For PERFECTLY and pro tip: take care of the strings in the bathroom or they'll end up in the toilet. Wish it had pockets...
Absolutely perfect- true to size and perfect for Mexican riviera

A beautiful romper. A small would have fit well too except I needed more room in the torso since I'm 5'11". Beautiful fabric. Lots of compliments. Loved it so much! I felt great in it. Very comfortable.
Cute romper... wore to ACL with some white tennis... tight on chest but is adjustable in the back with the ties...somewhat awkward fit but made it work.

links_reviews_title: Need Nubra to prevent side boob
links_reviews_text: When I first tried on this romper for my husband there is no way I was going to be able to leave the house LOL! However, I wore a sticky bra and helps illuminate the side boob issue. Also it's very important that you crisscross the straps in the back that will bring in the top bib area to cover any side boob.. I'm 34B, so bigger chest girls this may not be the right Choice for you unless you seriously size up because there's not much coverage. Otherwise it's absolutely adorable and I wore it with a Jean jacket and without and felt confident.
Very side-booby (avoid my mistake of wearing around in-laws!); and no back. Runs quite small, but love love love this romper for a day on the beach!

links_reviews_title: Great for warm weather, wrinkles easily
links_reviews_text: Very lightweight, cute print and great for warm weather. Only complaint was that it wrinkles easily (can be seen in photo) so pack some wrinkle release if you're concerned about that

I loved this romper. The back is beautiful. The ruffled straps were a little hard to adjust as the ruffle kept flipping the wrong way. Could have been fixed with an iron but I was on vacation and it wasn't that serious. The straps are adjustable with the cross design in the back. Very gauzy and thinner so nude underwear is a must. Definitely want to rent for vacation again in the future.

Such a cute romper from For Love and Lemons! Wore this for a day party in Miami for a weekend vacation. Such a cute summery romper, but it is pretty thin material. Fully lined, but definitely wear nude underwear. Great rental, super flattering and would definitely rent again. The back has subtle ruffles that make the design totally unique! Looooooved it!

I was able to tie this tight enough so that it held my boobs in place and i didn't have to worry about a bra or stickies or anything. It did get very wrinkled in my suitcase but I just steamed it out. It was so comfortable and cute

I rented this for a weekend trip to New Orleans and I loved it! It was so flattering and was comfortable enough for walking around all day. I am on the shorter side and have a hard time finding rompers that look good on me, but this one fit like a glove. By the end of the day it did start to get wrinkly, but it wasn't bad enough to bother me at all. Sending it back at the end of the weekend made me so sad -- I would definitely rent this again!

I loved wearing this. It fit perfectly and was light enough to keep me cool on a warmer day. The back and most of the sides are totally open so I didn't wear a bra with this - which was fine for me. I would definitely rent this again!
This For Love And Lemons romper is so easy and cute - perfect for a day on the go during vacation. I got so many compliments on the look!

links_reviews_title: Such a fun and flattering romper!
links_reviews_text: The lemon pattern is so fun and the back tie detail is so pretty on! I wore this all day and was really comfortable in it.

Pros: cute pattern and cute in the back Cons: runs very small and has a short torso, gave me a camel toe. The neckline is weird, straight across and unflattering on a larger chest. Although the torso is short, the shorts are weirdly long. Sadly I'll be returning with the tags and without wearing it. For the slim, small chested, and short torsoed ladies.
x

This outfit ran so small I don't even know where to begin. I can't even post photos online because it was absolutely horrid. I have a very small chest and my boobs were about to pop out inside. Not to mention how short the jumpsuit was and how small it ran. I'm 127lbs and Either wear an Xs or S.. and I could've probably worn a medium or large that's how small it ran. Probably best for petite frames
I wore this out to brunch with my girl friends. Got so many compliments!! So cute. Only flaw is the straps fall down a bit.

links_reviews_title: This romper was perfect for brunch on a warm summer afternoon!
links_reviews_text: It's very backless, which doesn't come across in the product photos. Also the back can be hard to tie so I wrapped it around and tied a bow in the front to give a little extra shape around my waist.
This romper is made for a smaller, younger version of me. Way too sexy (revealing) to wear outside of the house. BUT, my husband LOVED it! Lol
Ran small for me, very short and snug on the butt.
These glasses were so tiny on my face
The fabric is lovely and soft. The top is definitely cropped when tied and fitted at the bust and and at the bottom. It ran a little small but was still comfortable.

I enjoy this style with the knotted front but this is my favorite top like this I've worn. The tailoring naturally nips in at the waist a bit and the back is still a little longer even with the front tie.

I was so excited to try this top, but it was way shorter than anticipated. I'm normally a XS-S in tops because I have a small chest and rib cage, so I expected a S to fit like regular button down with the tied-off detail. But it fit like a crop top, which I wasn't expecting. The shoulders were a bit tight on me, too. I recommend sizing up if you want a loose, tied-off-button-down look or if you have a large chest. If I ever get this again I will size up.
This shirt would have gotten 5 stars, if the back was not longer than the front. Luckily it was easy to tuck under, and wear with high waisted pants.
Great shirt! Very flattering. I have a big bust and usually can't wear button ups but this was great.

The fit is flattering but sooo comfy, fabric is like a soft cotton -- so it looks fancy but feels amazing. I wore a medium, probably could've worn small as well, but it would've been a little more "cropped" -- it's only cropped in the middle where it ties up. Fun and classy at the same time. Would rent again for sure. For reference I am 5'7" 145, typically wear a small / 4.

I needed a M but I got the L because it was the only size available. Definitely runs true to size (M would've fit even cuter), but nevertheless this shirt is awesome! So soft and silky, and I love the front tie. Will wear again before returning.

links_reviews_title: Pretty top, great for a night out
links_reviews_text: It was pretty big on me and not sure it it was the design but it was lopsided, it also definitely needs a top under it. Love the pattern.

I was planning on wearing this to a casual work event. But the front is so cropped. It ended inches above my belly button. I have a longer torso (I'm 5'9") so maybe that was the problem. Sent it right back.
Was really excited but the fit was so awkward I had to return without wearing
Loved the print, material and all the details. Wore it 3 times before returning.
In the photo it looked like s slouchy shirt that you tie up but it wasn't. The tie was built in an well above the belly button while the rest of the shirt was way longer.

links_reviews_title: Potential to be cute, but runs a bit small.
links_reviews_text: Didn't end up wearing this due to the size, but it still looked cute on the hanger! I'd be excited to order one size up and wear that out and about.

links_reviews_title: Sassy top great for weekends and date night!
links_reviews_text: It was short as it's a crop top but so flattering and cute
The top could be cute but I hate when tops already come with the tie. I'm 5'10" with a smaller bust and I couldn't even button this top plus it was such an odd length it looked so dumb.
this shirt fit true to size, but i didn't realize it was a belly shirt until I put it on. I didn't wear it.
Top was a little big for me up top. Could have fit in a medium. I have lost weight recently thus my bra size is now a 34B! Still cute though and very soft and comfortable for summer office wear.
So cute but runs SO small or at least for anyone with larger breasts :( I couldn't button it, unfortunately.
Oddly asymmetrical, awkward fitting.

links_reviews_title: Shorter than it looks in picture
links_reviews_text: I rented this shirt to wear for everyday, but it was shorter than the picture shows and even with my highest waisted jeans, the shirt didn't reach.
Such a flattering top. True to size. Looks great with high waisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: Cute print but shorter than I expected
links_reviews_text: The shirt was a lot shorter than I expected (and I'm short!) and I had to wear a black tank top under it so that my belly wasn't exposed. Other than that, the print, material, and overall look was good.

links_reviews_title: Great fabric and fit EXCEPT for the tie - I'm 5'5 and the tie came above my navel
links_reviews_text: The tie was too high and there was not any extra fabric to play with to cover up your stomach. I wore with higher wasted pants and you could still see my stomach. I really wanted this to fit - I wore once with a black undershirt. Definitely not flattering if your stomach isn't super flat.
fit well and you can tell this a well made blouse
Couldn't even wear it it fit so awkwardly

I have a very short torso and still this came up very high. I love the pattern and how it's relaxed and casual but it's a little awkward when only your belly button show because the rise is specifically in the middle, rather than the entire length. You definitely need to pair this with something very high waisted
I'm not typically into animal print. Lots of comps, fun + easy

links_reviews_title: It was cute but not super exciting
links_reviews_text: The tie part comes up pretty high so make sure you wear it with very high waisted jeans (11" or more even) if you don't want to show your stomach. Love the print and relaxed fit, though. Wore it on the weekend with sneakers and it was cute but not super exciting.
I will be ordering the L next time. It was not the loose, comfy fit I was hoping for.

I rented this for a trip to LA and Miami, figuring it was on trend and perfect for warmer weather. Not only did I not love the fabric, I also didn't care for the fit or the tie waist. I think a smaller size may have been better. This was just frumpy.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear- love the print
links_reviews_text: this was VERY short in the front- not ok for work!

I have a short torso, so cropped shirts like this usually aren't flattering on me. This one is a rare exception. The ruching at the waist is actually super-figure-flattering. I normally never buy something from RTR outright. But reader, I bought it.
The sizing is off on this top. It's nice, but I couldn't even put the medium on. I think there are better leopard pieces available.

Was really short - and definitely would have showed tummy. Also - it isn't a true tie situation, like it does tie, but it is sewn to be super bunchy around i. Cute fabric though - which it was longer.
Runs small and too cropped in front for work. Otherwise adorable - love the sleeves and overall look. Sad they didn't have a large available.

links_reviews_title: I want to buy this shirt.
links_reviews_text: It's so well-made, silky, barely wrinkles and looks so good on. Lots of compliments, including several from my bf.

links_reviews_title: Loved this top with high waisted jeans and a leather jacket
links_reviews_text: Runs slightly small, and shows a bit of tummy
This is a lovely print and a very slimming design. Even my husband was like "whoa". This looks niiice;)
So flattering and ultra femme. Wrap was great on bottom with plenty of coverage. I had to pin the top closed--plenty of fabric just needed a snap or something...

links_reviews_title: Need a cami, warning: is a WRAP dress
links_reviews_text: such a cute pattern and color for the holiday time without being too obvious holiday. Just beware it is a thin wrap dress so you will need to wear full layers underneath. I wore a cami and black leggings- very handy for the winter. The neckline is low and unpredictable as a wrap dress so you definitely need to wear something underneath. Wish there was more built-in chest coverage so some type of v neck were possible and it would look more fashionable. But overall, would recommend!! XS for sure.
Very easy to wear and very pretty! Love the simplicity with small ruffle detail. I am tall and I thought it was a good length!
Fits well and is breezy while these hot temps remain! It does show a good bit of cleavage (I safety pinned mine) but could be left unpinned for a night out or date night!!
