Loved this dress! Fabric is lightweight, breezy, doesn't wrinkle so travels well. My typical concern with wrap maxis: they're too long and/or too big in chest. This was perfect. I'm typically a small, but glad I got an XS which is still very forgiving.

links_reviews_title: This dress was great! Flowy and fun for a summer wedding (Bonus: no bra, no problem.)
links_reviews_text: The chest opening was a lot wider for me than in the model photo because A) I have a wider waist so the ties were not cinched and B) I have a much bigger bust than the model. This makes the cut a lot sexier in person because more chest shows the bigger the circumference of the wrap. The fabric is cut for a full bust and the ruffles give some extra coverage, so at no point did I feel like I was really "hanging out". Great choice for a full-bodied woman.
Perfect, fun work dress, received so many compliments, easy to wear, comfortable and no cami necessary since the ruffles cover enough. Will definitely rent again and maybe buy

I loved with dress, nice and flowy, felt cute and professional. Downsides were it took me FOREVER to find the hole for the string to go through, i needed to enlist assistance. I also needed to Bobby pin the top because with even an undershirt it personally just felt too low cut. Other than that, received many compliments and am looking forward to investigating more wrap dresses
This dress is so comfortable and I got so many compliments while wearing it. Definitely recommend!
Not the most flattering, but it's comfy and packs well. Will probably rent again for warm weather trips!
One of my favorite and most useful rentals. Perfect work dress. Enough coverage on top and great length.

links_reviews_title: Too casual for a day wedding but could be fine at work
links_reviews_text: Bust was a little low for work though
I really loved this dress. Fits a little big, but you can easily adjust/pin it. I wore this to a party, but you could also wear to work.

links_reviews_title: stayed together - got so many compliments in one wear!
links_reviews_text: perfect length, good thickness, stayed closed in the boobs, which is always questionable in a wrap dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Super flattering for my shape, good quality material, and in my favorite color... I had to buy it. Thanks RTR!

The dress worked really well even at my 6 ft height. I would recommend using a safety pin or tape for the chest area. I wore a tank top under because it was raining. I received a lot of compliments at my office holiday party.

I rented this for work/everyday, I got a lot of compliments. Wore with boots and leather jacket. Material isn't the nicest in the world, but it looked great and fit perfectly so I didn't care. Will rent again
So cute and tts

links_reviews_title: I wore it for an everyday dress to work. It was cute, I received a number of compliments.
links_reviews_text: This is super long. I got an XL because I was worried about the arms and chest area, and that was a pretty solid choice. The length ended up being a full maxi length. The only other complaint is that there are no hooks or buttons to keep it from accidentally flying open.
Comfortable and easy. Wore to a baby shower & received several compliments. Was a little low cut for me, but otherwise wonderful.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my daughters bridal shower and I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved the flirty look, just had to add a safety pin in the chest area for modesty.
Perfect dress for the end of summer. Love the mid length and was able to keep the neckline in a comfortable spot for the office. Easy rental!

This dress was just sort of eh. The material is very casual and basic, the top of the dress fits like a conservative blouse in the bottom of the dress is huge and long. Maybe if I was taller it would look different on me but as it is I did not wear it out of the house

I really liked the way this dress wrapped far enough around to feel secure and it was very flattering at the waist. The ruffles draped really nicely. The sleeves are kind of large. I guess that gives it a more modern feel, but it made me feel a little hulky on top, while the rest of it is very feminine.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress to mix up the everyday!
Maybe if i was bustier this would be the right size but felt large and lots of frabric

links_reviews_text: Beautiful fit. Drapes well.

links_reviews_title: Wore this three times in a week! Perfect for work, play, or date night
links_reviews_text: Could have sized down but it looked great because you can tie it do your waist size. Dress up with heels and down with tennis shoes. Looked great both ways. Only reason why I returned was to get it dry cleaned and I'll rent again!

links_reviews_title: Love love the way this looked on! So flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Prefect length for my 5'4"

Beautiful, easy to wear dress. A bit low but easy to pin and the ruffles hide it. Not the most luxurious fabric but nothing wrong with it (just not some of the nice stuff you can snag on RTR!). Good for work, a shower, easy date night etc

True to size fit; love that it is a true wrap with customizable fit. Length as expected, no issues with wind exposing me as the length was mid shin on my 5'6" frame. Only issue was the neckline- I forgot a safety pin, and constantly had to adjust the smooth fabric to feel unexposed. Beautiful color and style!!!

links_reviews_title: So many comments on the overall style!
links_reviews_text: Loved it so much. Fit like a dream and was super comfortable. A little long which was what I wanted but if you are shorter, may be too long.

links_reviews_title: So pretty! I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I used a bit of fashion tape to make sure this true wrap dress didn't gape.

I wore this to a work lunch and got so many compliments. It reminds me of something Kate Middleton would wear. It flows beautifully when you walk but I will say for some, including myself, I had to watch the neckline because it being a wrap dress moved a bit and I didn't personally want it to be shifting too much to show my bra. Just be careful and aware but a simple safety pin would do the trick if you're really worried. Otherwise, a very classic flattering dress perfect for work then dinner and drinks after. I will probably rent again!
Comfortable

I rented this for work. It was too big on me (I should have worn a large), but as it was a wrap dress, it's easy to adjust it to fit pretty close to what you need. I'm really tall, 5'9" and this dress was extremely long on me, almost to my ankles. So if you are really short it might be too long. But I love the dress and it is really flattering. The color is gorgeous.

Rented with my unlimited for synagogue. Love the on trend ruffle and maxi with a modest edge. I have a lot of issues with wrap dresses because I am petite and not curvy. But this one really worked. Neckline was very low - always a problem because I am short, but I safety pinned and the ruffles made it impossible to tell. Got tons of compliments. Great rental.

Easy to wear. Sometimes wrap dresses are tricky, but both skirt and top stayed put in this dress. Drapes beautifully. Just a little long for me (I'm 5'4")--hit at almost my ankles. One of my favorite rentals ever--will rent again.

I wanted a fun skirt with a great length for out and about on spring break. Something breathable and easy to throw on! This was so much more than all that! Easy to dress up or wear casually. If it wasn't so much, I totally would have bought it! More @itsminefornow
Paired this with the Proenza skirt shown in the photo for a work event.
What a beautiful skirt! I ordered mine a size up since the smaller one was unavailable but I was able to adjust the tie. Love the colors and fabric, so beautiful and unique.

This skirt goes with everything and the high quality fabric has some weight, so even though it is a wrap style, it's not blowing open like some wrap skirts. Perfect zany but polished pattern. I thought this fit a little big and I even went down a size - the waist is not stretchy but I still had some room.

I loved this skirt so much. I wore it 4 times. I usually return something after wearing it once but I wore it to a date, a party and two nice dinners on vacation. With different tops/jackets and shoes, it can work for a lot of different occasions. It has a nice weight to it and worked in cooler and warmer weather. Very flattering.

Love the prints and unique cut of this skirt, received tons of compliments at work. Definitely a new favorite! Runs slightly large but if you wanted to wear it lower on your waist then fits fine. There is a tie so you can adjust as well. Will definitely rent again.
The mixed print and exceptional fabric make this piece both special and very wearable. I feel like it runs a little large-probably could have sized down to a zero (and I'm definitely not usually).
I would rent this again but in a size 0 (the 2 was big). A unique skirt that I wouldn't have purchased myself... love it!
A little tight around the waist when sitting but overall comfortable for work or any other life event

I picnicked in it, I twirled in it, I suffered through bad stand-up in it. It would have been perfect if not for the terror that I would spill something on it and owe like $650 to the fashion gods. The string on the side came undone fairly frequently, but it's got a zipper so nbd. I sized down (usually a 2) and the fit was perfect. Returned before I could fall in love and/or dribble soup on it. Would have kept forever. RIP.
So pretty and high quality
Might run a little bit. I usually wear a 4 or 6 and the 4 fit perfectly. Wore this to work and out and about. Great pattern, cool asymmetric hemline. Would recommend

Loved this skirt I wore it a couple times for a couple different occasions. I wore it for a family affair as for work either one I wore it I received a ton of compliments and felt very comfortable all day. Would recommend renting!
Good quality, has a weird little ruffle all the way around that I didn't like. Otherwise cute and versatile.

Wore this numerous times in very different ways. It was not the most figure flattering, but adding a slim jacket helped w proportions. The fabric is a poly-crepe. Underwhelming hand, but still enjoyed the rental.

links_reviews_title: Chic skirt with a modern floral print!
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this skirt! Great print and shape that's perfect for late winter / early spring.
I love the fun multi patterned skirt, it was so flattering and memorable. A showstopper in all the right ways. Absolutely renting again, great spring piece!

I rented this for daily wear. I loved the bright pattern and paired it with a black turtleneck and OTK boots. The skirt sits at your hips (it's not high waisted) and fell to below my knees. It was a little longer than I was expecting. The waist is nicely tailored and really flattering. Fabric is a light synthetic material that doesn't get static cling.
Received lots of compliments. Pretty pattern. Very comfortable.

This skirt was perfect to bring in some color into my winter work wear. The material had a nice drape, but you do need to be cautious of the side slit - especially, getting in and out of cars and big wind gusts. The skirt waist band was slightly large and did not sit even on my waist. Overall, a great skirt for any season!

links_reviews_title: Uber versatile floral for those of us who just aren't that into floral
links_reviews_text: Love, love, loved this skirt. The fit was fabulous (true to size, hit me mid-calf and I'm 5'8). Wore for date with tank / leather jacket and then for work with a black sweater. Super versatile. The ruffles and detailing are stunning.
Great fit, weight and interesting colors

I absolutely loved this skirt. The bright colors in printed the skirt are so fabulous to spice up any basic black top. Totally can dress the skirt up or down and it is totally wearable for any season.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this unique, well made skirt – rented for Art Basel
links_reviews_text: This skirt was so fun to wear & very well made. The fabric feels expensive and though I'm short, the length was perfect for me. The unique hem, bright colors made it easy to style, and it matched perfectly with my orange polka dot air force ones :) . I also wore it to work with a cropped black hoodie. I was very tempted to buy this skirt & will look to rent it again!

Love! Love! Love this outfit. I wore it just like the picture. I saw it in an ad where they pair the top and the skirt together. The skirt fits TTS. There are no stretch in the fabric. I got so much compliments all night long. Fabric is thick enough for cold weather. I wore mine with some black leather booties. I was still able to rotate the pieces to wear with different tops or bottoms. Def will rent this piece again in the future.

I loved wearing this skirt. The bright colors, ruffles, and asymmetric design was great. It fit really well. I wore a size 2 and I'm usually between a size 2 and 4. I would definitely rent this again.

Fits true to size. Absolutely beautiful and vibrant colors. Got a lot of compliments from men and women. Wore with a black sweater and boots but could be easily paired with a "louder" color or stripes!
This skirt is so fun to wear (I posted a photo that sort of shows how the skirt moves). The colors aren't as extreme in real life, and the design is so eye-catching. And no static!

links_reviews_title: Loved this but it's long on me!
links_reviews_text: I loved this skirt, it was a little long on me but I'm 5"2 and have lost a few pounds lately. I'll wear it again w heels and reupload a pic

links_reviews_title: Being able to rent brands that would normally be out of my price range is the best!
links_reviews_text: I rented this a size too big because I was shopping at the store and just had to have it! It has a tie at the waist, so it's adjustable if you accidentally go up a size. I love the pattern clashing on this skirt and wore it with some Doc Martins and a leather jacket to make it more casual for everyday. I would rent this again and again and again!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous pattern, weight, length and so versatile!
links_reviews_text: This skirt is GORGEOUS. With a chunky sweater, tights, and boots, it can be worn for work or for play. The details - a tie on the left waist and ruching midway down the right leg - add sophistication and just a tiny bit of "trend." It sits a little below the waist on me, so I'd say it runs a tad large although not so much so. I'm also 6'0" and it is below the knee, so it'd be long on shorter gals.
I wish I could afford to purchase this skirt because it is gorgeous. Got so many compliments. Absolutely love it, but would maybe size down next time it was slightly large. So pretty though!!!!

It was a bit big, however I ended up having to size up due to not having a 6 available. Not sure if the poor fit contributed, however I was not a fan of this. It was quite ugly in my opinion, however I've seen it look super cute in other pictures on other people, so who knows, however I could not pull it off at all.

This can be be dressed up or dressed down and worn year round. I wore it to a Dec baby shower in N.C. with a black turtleneck and black tights and received countless complements. Later, while in FL over Christmas, I wore it with sneakers and a jean jacket. The hem is very flattering. The only potential con is that there is an opening under the front flap. It's kind-of like a wrap dress and could open up in the wind; however, the pros make it all worthwhile! The pattern is prettier in person
The best of the best

links_reviews_title: Item is a stunner and the fabric makes it perfect for RTR - shows no wear.
links_reviews_text: I have received compliments every time I've worn this - and I think that number is 5 while I've had it in house. Looks perfect with a t-shirt & denim jacket or dressed up with a blouse. Long enough for a tall lady and the split can still be modest (if you watch yourself when you sit). Luxe in every way.

Such a beautiful skirt, received so many compliments while wearing. The mix of pattern and color make it unique and super easy to style up or down—my favorite way was with a ribbed tee, leather jacket, and ankle boots. Sized up to accommodate my baby bump and found it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not right for me
links_reviews_text: I thought this would be fun to wear for some client meetings coming up. But the wrap has a slit that comes far too high (mid-thigh when seated) and it's just not the right situation for showing leg. It'd be cute for something different. Fun and quirky.
I typically take a 10 but the skirt was falling off me... so go down a size or two.
Great drape, fun details, size 6 was perfect (I'm usually either 6 or 8).

I had seen this one a couple times but didn't think it was anything special. I finally committed and it's a winner! Super flattering but at the same time so comfortable. Felt great all day at the office and even out afterwards for dinner. Rent this dress.

links_reviews_title: This is a look you gotta own.
links_reviews_text: Honestly there's nothing bad about this piece at ALL--it's stunningly well made, super comfy and not too warm. It's a bold choice, but a lot of fun. Is intentionally oversized but still runs a touch large
Very fun shift dress. Thick and comfortable. Absolutely loved!

links_reviews_title: Can't go wrong with this designer.
links_reviews_text: Extremely comfortable!! Loved the shape and color blocking. Good with over the knee boots. Superior knit quality in this classic and casual dress.

My husband loved this on me. It is a great choice with tights and flats. I got a lot of compliments at work. I think it helps to be not so busty. My photo doesn't do it justice. Someday I'll learn how to take selfies.
I received so many compliments on this dress. It's warm without feeling heavy. The pattern is vibrant and really lovely. I would rent again.
Comfortable with pockets, great for winter with tights and boots. Loved the bold colors and has a cute shape. These colors are not the best on me, but I still love the look of it.
Very warm and comfortable. Received a lot of compliments on the dress. Paired it with black tights and boots. The M and L fit me about the same

links_reviews_title: A tunic for tall girls...not a dress
links_reviews_text: This was a cute tunic to wear over leggings. I wish it didn't have pockets, as it made it look a little hippie (which I already am and the color pattern does naturally). The quality of the fabric is extremely high-end.
Great, comfortable, modern dress. The material is very nice and thick. Got many compliments.

Loose and roomy but keeps its structure. Fabric is really luxe and feels nice!! Would be great with tights and tall boots in winter. Pockets always a plus! I'm 5'4" and liked the length on me! Short but not scandalous

This dress is quite a look. I got several compliments, but mainly from my colleagues who have an edgy vibe. The oversize fit - it ran a little large on me, but is also meant to be oversized - is super flattering, while the colors are fun. I rented it in the middle of summer and that was a mistake. The fabric is SUPER heavy, and it's really more of a fall or winter dress. It would be great over tights and with boots for the winter. Also, it is COMFORTABLE. It's like wearing a blanket. That fact alone made me want to wear it over and over. Honestly, I didn't think I'd like this as much as I did, and if it weren't so expensive, I'd have considered adding it to my permanent collection.

links_reviews_title: Fun but short for a tall girl
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed with leggings! Different shape and strong print. And pockets!

I think I should've sized up honestly, I got a small and it probably would've fit better as a medium but I was afraid of it being too boxy. Instead, my hips filled it out quite a bit and there's no way I could've worn it without leggings underneath. I'm 5'5" and it shows everything when I sat down. I love the colorblocking though and it's a thicker fabric, perfect for those almost spring days when you wanna wear a dress but it's still a little chilly.
So comfy and cool! Definitely runs a bit large (because it's not form fitting), so size down. I wish I didn't have to send it back :'(

This dress is chill. Very comfortable, not huge but not super fitted. Kind of awkward in terms of warmth - it’s fairly heavy for any kind of warm weather, but short sleeved. Would be good for a winter party, otherwise sort of temps in the 50s/60s. Wore it one time over tights with ankle boots, which felt a little trying-too-hard, and another day over skinny blue jeans which I preferred.
Pockets, so comfortable (no shapewear required!), yet stylish with minimal effort. And did I mention the pockets? Mondrian style earrings were the only accessory needed.

links_reviews_title: Warm and comfortable with an interesting shape
links_reviews_text: The thick knit was nice in the winter months, worn over tights. There are pockets too, which is a huge plus. Don't expect this to show off your curves, especially with the boxy cut of the body and sleeves, but I did love the more geometric shape of the garment that was mirrored in the print. The neckline is some kind of low mock neck, which was an interesting sporty addition.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Know your body type :)
links_reviews_text: Some of the reviews were mixed, so I wasn't sure what to expect. Well I LOVE it and would purchase. Quality construction, pockets hit me in a good spot, and it's comfortable. Not form fitting but feel "girly"wearing it. Compliments all day long. I wore the large because the medium wasn't available, and it still worked just fine.
Tons of compliments! I wore it with leggings and I was impressed I made an outfit lol. Super cute

This is not my usual style... boxy and color blocking. The stripe hits at the widest part of a curvy lady, which was off-putting, but I went for it anyway. There are pockets, but it adds to the hip bulk. I wore faux leather leggings to make this a tunic cuz it's too short for work. Not perfect, but definitely worth a rental. This is what RTR unlimited is for!
The shape, pattern, and color screams power and confidence. Paired it with some thigh high boots and leggings for work. Runs true to size. HAS POCKETS!
Very warm winter weight textile - maybe too short for someone my age but hoping over leggings it remains appropriate. Wore with turtleneck under... medium was comfortable fit for me, usually size 8.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to work and Friday drinks, got a ton of compliments
links_reviews_text: Love the length and fabric, and loved that it had pockets, but they hit me right at the hips and therefore stuck out a little sometimes. If not for that, I would seriously consider buying this.
Cozy, thick material. Unexpectedly flattering silhouette despite its boxy cut. Pockets are a plus. Rented for date night.

links_reviews_title: Short, thick sweater dress with pockets!
links_reviews_text: It is very short, so wear with opaque tights at the minimum. Very comfortable with plenty of room and the pockets are great!
Rented for work. Wore to family holiday party instead. Received favorable complements. Paired with leggings and booties.
This is a super cute and fun dress. The fabric is heavy but very comfortable. It's supposed to fit loose but I sized down and glad I did!
Very nice quality. Great for a modern look. Baggy but fairly short.

links_reviews_title: Wore this with leggings an booties for a ladies afternoon in NYC.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, perfect for a casual day.
Very comfortable and I loved the thick fabric, pockets, and length on me, 5'2". I got so many comments and this is a dress I probably wouldn't have tried on if I saw it in a shop.
Lots of compliments, but people thought it was a shirt. Bottom got loose towards the end of the day.

links_reviews_title: Better worn as a dress than a maternity tunic
links_reviews_text: At28 weeks pregnant I thought this would good to wear with leggings. I just wasn't keen on the short sleeves or how my bump made the pockets stick out a little. I think this would be really cute on a less pregnant person.
Considering buying this piece. Have worn it 3x and lots of compliments. Doesn't pull across hips/tummy, even with the pockets! Perfect fall piece.

links_reviews_title: I love Fall Sweater dresses and this one did not disappoint!
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear, tons of compliments
Loved this dress, got lots of compliments. A little short, but still work appropriate. Definitely needs to be worn with tights.

I really enjoyed wearing this and got so many compliments at work today. It's really comfortable and perfect for fall. The pockets are a plus. I styled it with tights and combat boots. I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Like the fabric and comfort, don't love the side pockets.
links_reviews_text: This is a very comfortable wear. If you have curvy hips you may not like the way the pockets hit and lay.

Perfect dress for work especially during the season transitions. I wore it with black tights cause the office tends to run cold. No cons that I can think of. It is a great quality thick and soft sweater material, beautiful color block pattern and it has pockets, what more could you ask for?!?
Wore to work with black tights and booties. So comfy, cute and professional looking. The only thing to note, is that the sleeves are very large and do not fit in a coat well. It looks all bunchy.
I loved the beautiful colors in this sweater. Wore it with jeans and boots and got compliments! I'd rent this again.

I rented this sweater for a trip to the Alps and it was very soft and cozy, not itchy like so many thick sweaters tend to be. It was a slightly strange shape, with sleeves that ran a little shot on my broad shoulders and waist that gets oddly wide around the hips, but overall it was cute and cozy and perfect for our day in the mountains.

links_reviews_title: Super warm with a fun pop of pink!
links_reviews_text: I waited MONTHS until this sweater became available to rent on Unlimited, and it didn't disappoint! Medium was the only size available so I snapped it right up, but I would have liked a Large for a slightly more oversized fit and longer sleeves (they were too short for my liking). It kept me super warm and I loved wearing it!
This was just a comfy easy winter sweater to throw on. I highly recommend wearing it.

Rented this for a trip to Aspen. It was PERFECT and so adorable! I got the L and I will say it was not nearly as long as shown in the picture. Still looked great with some leather leggings and was easy to dress up. The wool neck gets a little toasty so just be aware. I wore with a thin cami underneath to layer up.
Soft and cozy with a good drape. Ordered one size up for a more oversized look. Might order in regular size next time for a different effect! #cozy #apresski

links_reviews_title: The sweater was so comfortable and cozy and had the perfect fall color scheme!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a small but extra small was only available… It still fit only the sleeves were a tad bit short.

Interesting and fun mix of colors, mostly soft but a little itchy around my sensitive neck. It has a subtle A-line shape that is really nice for not pulling at my midsection. Lots of compliments. I plan to wear it all weekend. Highly recommend.

I loved the colors and the feel so much, but it was a bit small. I would suggest sizing up. I have broad shoulders and felt as though it was a bit short in the arms, when I wanted more of a cozy, baggy-ish sweater like it looked on the photo vs. fitted. But would rent it again in a Large next time.
Extremely soft and warm without being too hot. Wore this to a football game. It's a bit bell shaped at the bottom so I did a half tuck and it was perfect.

Have literally worn this sweater for 3 days in a row, I LOVE it. It fits perfectly, ever so slightly oversized but not big! Sleeves are the perfect length and it hits just below the hips. So so cozy and I'm obsessed with the color combo. Great for wearing now without a jacket or it's not too big that you can't wear a coat over it. If I don't buy this I will definitely be renting again.
This might be good for an outdoor event but it's too hot for the office. It's also really boxy. I probably could have been six months pregnant and you would't have noticed in this sweater.
Love this sweater, the colors are gorgeous. I love the fit. It's flattering, and super warm. Taking this to London and want to buy.

links_reviews_title: Loved the stand up collar and color. Very warm. Wish it was longer.
links_reviews_text: The large wasn't available so I tried the M. Too short.

The colors are really beautiful but the shape of this sweater is just weird. I'm a size 6 and rented the Medium. The sleeves were flared and short on me, almost 3/4 length. The body of the sweater was A-line shaped and ended at the waist, not at the hips as it appears on the model. It looked really odd and a bit stiff. Sent it back without wearing.
Love this piece - want to wear it all the time. The colors are great, the material is extremely soft and the collar doesn't run too high. I've worn it several times!
This is super comfortable, warm and looks cute! I got a size Xs and it fit fine, but I wish I got a size small for a little bit of a longer and loosed fit.

Very cozy, gorgeous color pops off the black. Super warm. Seems to be high quality. Not quite as oversized as I expected based on the photo on model, but not too small. Sleeves were a bit short but I often have that problem.
Liked the material but it was a bit too big/baggy to be flattering. A little too long.
Warm & cozy sweater. Bright colors were a nice contrast to the gloomy winter weather. Sleeves a little stretched out but otherwise great sweater.
Soft, comfortable and cute colors! Looks great with sweatpants and hugs on a cold winters day or dressed up with jeans a and thigh high boots. Super soft!!! Highly recommend!
Perfect everyday sweater. I wore this non stop and received so many compliments! A great staple

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater although it was a little worn.
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater although it was a little worn and pilly. I can only imagine how great it was when brand new. Although thick and warm it was generally lightweight and soft. The neck was a little high and itchy. It is slightly a-line.
Very cozy, fits oversized
Loved the oversized nature and soft fabric!
Perfect fit
Great colors
It's VERY warm, so it's great for cold weather. Very thick sweater.
It is a beautiful seater with pops of color. Great for a fall event to wear with jeans not really for work unless it is casual Friday.

The sweater was definitely cozy and warm. I usually wear size smalls, and since that size was unavailable, I went with a medium and it fit just fine. It felt soft to the touch, but it was a little itchy around my neck. I wore a cami underneath it, and boy did it shed and leave fuzzies all over it. Overall it was a cute wear for my casual workplace.

Fun sweater. Received lots of compliments! Note that the fit is boxy and I thought a bit short. I enjoyed wearing it, but it's one of those sweaters that picks up everything. Even though I enjoyed wearing it, Was glad it was a rental.
This was so soft and cozy. Wore a M, I wear a size 6 dress. Fit well with room (this is nicely roomy). So soft! Perfect for a casual fall weekend. Hate to send it back.

links_reviews_title: The leather details made me feel more stylish than I do on a typical work day.
links_reviews_text: The jacket was a bit too snug when closed. I wore it open and got lots of compliments. I would go up a size, especially if large breasted. Overall, I was extremely happy with the look.

Overall fit was way too big. I should have gone down 1 or 2 sizes. I got compliments but would have felt better if I'd sized down. Others complained about the leather straps but I wrapped them around 2x and that worked great. Beautiful details. I would rent again in smaller size
Wore to work and ballet - nonstop compliments. Unique jacket, makes waist look small. Showed signs of wear - probably rented a lot.

links_reviews_title: Change of pace for the office.
links_reviews_text: I am almost always a size 10 and could have gone down a size with this jacket. With the size that I had (UK16), it looked a little frumpy on me. I recommend skinny jeans with it to better offset the extra fabric on this jacket. I wore it to the office and felt polished and could have worn it out for dinner too. Next time I will try the smaller size.

Unique and fun jacket that's easy to dress up or down. Slightly short waisted and quite fitted in the waist. But plenty roomy in the bust and hip. Got lots of compliments. I dressed it down with jeans but could easily go dressy enough for a wedding or a party.

Great statement piece, but the clasp in the middle really needs to be fixed- literally hanging on my a thread. The fit was flattering but i wasn't sure how to tie the leather straps around my wrist and they ended up being a little annoying sitting at my desk. I wouldn't necessarily rent this again but it was a fun jacket to spice up a work outfit

I love love love this jacket! The cut is flattering and the style is different enough to really stand out! I agree with the comments about the leather wrist ties being slightly annoying, but they stayed tied for me most of the day. I marked this as TTS but it may run slightly big on some.

links_reviews_title: I felt so comfortable and confident in this gorgeous jacket!
links_reviews_text: The fabric and color are so rich and even the lining is luscious! A practical piece that brought a lot of comfortable flair!

Despite the fact that I couldn't button it, it made my outfit less boring. The party was anything red. The shade of red and the texture made it warm and fun. It was a size 6 already, so definitely size up to hook the clasp. It turned out ok just leaving it open.

The blazer was great, got a lot of compliments but the bows were a disaster. You had to ask someone else to tie them every hour or so since they were so large and made of leather, not easy to tie solo.
I loved the quality of this piece. I thought the leather accents was awesome and could even be dressed up.
I loved this sweater but it was not flattering. It looked like maternity-wear. The leather accents were cool but kept coming undone around the arms.
Easy to wear. Ties were so long, but just remember to tie them into bows before you put it on. I usually wear a 6 or 4 but R the R recommended a size 10, and it fit perfectly.

This is a gorgeous piece but I didn't love it on my short curvy body. The fabric is thick and the leather detail is rich - high quality overall. Shoulder pads do nothing for me so I didn't like that feature. The leather bows on the wrists are a little awkward, however from a distance it looks quite lovely.

I love this jacket! It's completely different from something I'd normally wear, but I had my eye on it and decided to go for it! I got compliments allll day and it was perfect for the spring weather. Highly recommend! Will rent again.
This jacket is perfection. It is extremely flattering and comfortable and very high quality. I got so many compliments and will definitely be renting again.
Very flattering - really comfortable. Would rent again and again.
Received some compliments. Not super bulky so liked the fit for a work day
I wore this to work and liked it more than I thought. The leather straps are unique but not inappropriate. It ran a bit large on me but still looked classy/trendy. I recommend!

links_reviews_title: The cut of the jacket is very unique.
links_reviews_text: The length for a pear girl was perfect and covered my butt. I needed to go through the reviews to see what to do with the wrist sashes. See photo. I will probably wear this again before sending back.
Love the leather piping- very nicely made. The arms are super weird though. Very loose

I wore this to a couple of holiday parties and it was a hit. Classy holiday-wear without being over the top. I thought the leather bows on the wrists were a bit much, so I wrapped them around a couple times rather than tied as bows.

This was a "pushing myself" rental to try something out of my comfort zone. I want to purchase this! It feels wonderful, fits awesomely, I love the color, and I felt like a million bucks. Downside is no pockets. But I loved it anyway!

links_reviews_title: Very unusual jacket for a country-swing concert!
links_reviews_text: Jacket for great. Lighter weight than anticipated but quite comfy. Only negative are the ties in the sleeves. They were too thick to the properly.
I wore this to two holiday parties. Beautifully tailored and pretty cranberry color. Really wanted to keep this one!
Different, looks great with leather pants or leggings. Wore to a party, work meeting and keeping for Christmas Eve.

links_reviews_title: Cute but the ties on the sleeve don't stay in place
links_reviews_text: The waist is tight, I had to keep the jacket open

links_reviews_title: Statement! Compliments on fit, color & leather ties.
links_reviews_text: Recommendations to size-up were wise! I felt very comfortable.
Texture of the fabric amazing, photos do not do it justice. Nice detailing , with leather trim and lining. Great addition to the closet, even for a short while!

Love this blazer/jacket! The material is thick, and it is a very unique look. I'd say this fits TTS and hooked fine for me. The arms were loose so if I sized up the arms would be even looser. The only thing I didn't like was the straps in the arms...I had to wrap them around and tuck the pieces in, because they kept getting in the way. Even doing that, they kept coming undone throughout the night which was annoying. I did get a lot of compliments though! Wore this with a black cami underneath and high waisted jeans.

This was very cute and I got lots of compliments. It looked great with a black turtleneck and black leggings and short black boots. Makes your waist look small. I ddi get a few jokes about the leather ties. I wouldn't wear this to a party where there was a buffet because the leather ties would get in the food. But I worked on my computer all day and I was fine.

links_reviews_title: The ties were difficult to work with
links_reviews_text: Nice jacket and beautiful lining but the leather ties at the sleeves were very fussy and kept coming undone. I was ready to take it off. This did not work well for me.
You need someone to help tie your sleeves otherwise lovely!

Due to the UK sizing, my first ordered jacket was too small (my fault for not ordering the correct size) and my second order was too large, so I never wore it. It was a beautiful quality piece though.

links_reviews_title: Very classy. Loved the fit, especially how it clipped at the waist.
links_reviews_text: It's unique and classy.

links_reviews_title: Too large. I wear a 12 and they sent a 16
I got way more compliments on this than I expected!
links_reviews_text: It was a little big on the shoulders, but all in all was great

This was just too big for my frame and I didn't end up wearing it. I loved the photo but the actual jacket is not nearly as vibrant. It's looking a tad worn, too. Guess it was well worn and loved by many others. Disappointed because it has been on my heart list from the moment I saw it and this was the first time it was actually available! So wanted it to be stunning.

links_reviews_title: interesting piece, good fit, not great condition
links_reviews_text: the sleeves have this leather bow detail, but neither was tied properly when i got it and i can't seem to figure out how to recreate it. also the jacket has a weird smell. (also my hangers were smashed up and unusable, this time) i'm returning without wearing this one.
Sleeves were a bit loose/a little too much material
Cute. A little big. Need nude underwear / bra, as it is see through.
This romper is so comfortable. I walked around sightseeing all day in very hot weather and was still comfortable. It is casual but flattering and cute.

Wore this to our local hometown parade. My mom and my grandma both asked where I got it from they loved it. So why the 4 stars? Well when I put it on to wear it the privacy flap was so worn out I had to wear a tank top underneath because it would not lay flat. The cut was loose yet tight up on top. It was easy to get on but a little tight getting it off. I was worried about having to heart it off when I needed to use the restroom. It took a little work but I got the hang of it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a hot summer day
links_reviews_text: I like the length of the shorts. Great for weekends or days off in the summer. I wore it over a camisole bc it was too low in the front and it was perfect

This romper is one my all time favorites. It's super soft and i found the proportions of top/shorts to be great! The shorts weren't too short and the top was loose. I did have to wear a tank top under it to keep the chest from being too low. Sizing down may have helped that but I preferred the comfort/proportion of my regular size! It's also super lightweight so perfect for summer!
This a a great romper to just wear on the weekend. It's very light and airy. I would make sure to wear nude underwear cause it can be a bit see thru if you do not wear the right undergarments
Loved the roomie fit, but super flattering. Got tons of complements. Super light weight and airy perfect for warm weather. I have hips and a long torso, but this fit perfectly the way I wanted it to.
It is so flattering, the material is incredibly light and the length of the shorts is perfect. Everything about this romper is the epitome of a perfect romper. I'm keeping!
Super cute and comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable BUT buttons were difficult for bathroom stops
links_reviews_text: The buttons on the front leave a bit of a gap between the two sides, so my bra was visible without an undershirt. I have larger arms and this fit them comfortably. Didn't wear a full 2 hours because the buttons all had to be undone to use the ladies room and that was just too time consuming.

links_reviews_title: light and casual, but needs to be ironed around the buttons better.
links_reviews_text: I didn't need to wear anything underneath, but the fabric around the buttons was not laying flat and had to be ironed to make sure nothing showed. Otherwise I loved this jumper.

Wonderful lightweight material that I'm sure would be perfect for a summer day and so cute in the photos I saw. But, I couldn't even get the top onto my shoulders because it's cut so short... I actually double checked the tag because I thought I was sent a petite/short by mistake. I think this is a must for petite ladies, but unfortunately a definite no for anyone tall.
This is not for taller gals. I sized up, usually a large and the XXL was still very tight in the chest and kept riding up because this romper was short in the torso.

links_reviews_title: Comfy but cute! Fit was great.

links_reviews_text: This was perfect for being lazy on vacation. I could have definitely sized down. It was very roomy. The front was a bit revealing but I wore a bralette underneath and made it work.

comfortable, casual romper. between sizes and went bigger for a more comfortable style. great for a warm weather bbq. buttons had a layer of fabric so you couldn't see skin through them. was fine with light colored underwear, but you might have been able to see black through it.
Cute and comfy romper. I wore it on the airplane for a vacation flight. It was big on top and bottom
love the material. very comfortable and flattering. can be dressed up or down. the only thing is you have to unbutton all the tiny buttons to use the bathroom...

links_reviews_title: This romper not for tall girls
links_reviews_text: I have been on the search for a romper that will fit my torso all summer. I am 5'10" and find it hard to find one to fit my height. This one disappointed with all the others and was not long enough in the torso. Bummer because otherwise it was really cute.

Loved this romper! I rented it for a beer garden event before a wedding. I got a bunch of compliments. I an normally a 6, and medium fit great, however stretched out a little as I wore it, so would likely go for a small next time.

Super comfortable, great for anyone with a longer torso. No riding in either direction. One downside is it can be a bit revealing when bending over if you have smaller bust. Also heavy things in your pockets (I.e. phone) not a good look for this outfit
Romper fit a bit snug. Chest area was really low, my cleavage was showing a lil too much! Linen wrinkles a lot! But otherwise a cute romper.
See through in the back

links_reviews_title: I didn’t wear this for a specific event
links_reviews_text: Great fit and very versatile
Runs tight in hips.
So comfy and effortless, perfect for everyday wear or a date night. Wish I could have bought it.

links_reviews_title: Cute but hard to get in & out of
links_reviews_text: This fit well and I liked that the shorts were slightly longer than usual, but with my broad shoulders this required too much work to get in and out of. Didn't wear.

Make sure you check you backside on this one - didn't realize until I was out of the house unfortunately that the bottoms were pretty see-through. Otherwise it's a great coverup ! Very comfortable to wear and has pockets.
Wore this to work since I have a casual office, and the shorts are long enough. It was cute and comfy but nothing special. I wouldn't rent again

links_reviews_title: Was great for hanging out at the lake. I wore this over my bathing suit all weekend.
links_reviews_text: It's super low-cut.

links_reviews_title: Fun romper, but a little stiff
links_reviews_text: Very cute romper and fit well. It was a little low cut, but you could pull it easily. Stiff fabric though..
Not an unforgettable item by any stretch, but a cute, comfortable, functional romper that could easily be a wardrobe staple. A little low-cut on me but otherwise fit was perfect.
Could have been cute but just a little too short in the torso length.

links_reviews_title: Too small, but let my mom wear it!
links_reviews_text: Ran small so I didn't get to wear it, but I let my mom borrow it and it fit her perfectly! So cute!

Loved how lightweight this romper was. The drawstring helps cinch the waist. The length is great, not feeling too short like all the other rompers are. My only complaint is that the buttons need at least one more for me, because it was very low cut. I had to use a safety pin so that my bra wouldn't show. Fashion tape wasn't strong enough for the material.
Comfy but nothing outstanding. Thicker linen so liked that it was not thin or see-through.
The fit was a little large and the shorts were very long. I am 5'4 so I would recommend for someone taller or older that wants the long fit.

This romper fit me and I'm pretty tall. It's super comfortable and looks cute with some summer slides, a hat, and a crossbody. It is linen so it got bigger as the day went on because we were sweating, but it was really comfortable and cute! Would definitely recommend for a summer outfit!
Tags were still on this romper. It was so cute and I loved wearing it especially now that the weather is hot. Great quality and really fun to wear. Unique

Looks like this is a popular dress because it was slightly worn. There was a really small tear near the arm area, but was not too big and I still wore it. I sized up from my regular size due to the other reviews I read and I am glad I did. I have wide hips and a smaller size would have made this dress snug in the hip area
Wrinkles very easily - had sit down lines all day. Very tight in the armpits. Good length. A-line Design.

I wore this over the a hot summer weekend. I wanted something simple, short and chill and this was perfect. It runs true to size with no stretch. It fit me very relaxed and I was bloated that day. My measurements 5'0 , 124lb, 34b 127 waist 38 hip. For the fans- This was at a Marvelous Mrs. Maisel exhibit in the city ! Love!
Cotton fabric is good for hot weather. Fitting and flattering but no lining.
Great, East dress that earned lots of nice feedback. Wore it to work and on site at an art installation for an interview. Great piece altogether!
I really loved this dress! It was perfect for work but could throw on sandals and wear it for a casual day as well. Very flattering! Highly recommend.
Typical Tory Burch(TB) shirt dress. Great rental that can be worn to work or casually. I usually wear a 0-2 in TB, and this was a 4 and fit perfectly.

I love the fun, summery print. My only two critiques are that you definitely need to have an iron and starch on hand - wrinkles very easy. My steamer didn't cut it. The other is the slight flare towards the bottom of the dress isn't super flattering for bigger bottoms like mine. Happy I rented it but definitely wouldn't buy it. I paired with pale pink statement earrings. Bonus: it has pockets!
Bottom was a little snug in hips For my pear shape particularly with sitting. Nice pockets. Cotton so it Wrinkles easily. Had to iron upon arrival.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but little wiggle room in sizing
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, wore several times (had for a month with Update). 100% cotton so wrinkles some and no stretch. Waist and hips are fitted. Worked well on me but might be tough if you aren't typical proportions.

links_reviews_title: Fitted waist with no stretch. But I liked the dress.
links_reviews_text: Fabric has kind of a cruise director meets medical scrubs vibe but dress was designed nicely and fit well. The white was a bit sheer so I wore a slip underneath.
Wore this with a skinny black belt and black heels to work and it was perfect for summer! Very light and comfortable dress. Would rent again and runs true to size

This dress is adorable and fits perfectly. It has two side pockets and one pocket on the left chest. The fabric is a little stiff. It's also thin with no lining but not see through. The space between the buttons are close enough so there are no noticeable gaps in the chest area. Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved it and would rent again. Runs true to size and appropriate for work in the summer
links_reviews_text: Love Tory Burch and she has multiple patterns of this same dress. It arrived a little bit wrinkled but looked okay. Paired with real accessories and got lots of compliments.

Gorgeous dress! The colors and florals are exquisite in person. The buttons felt very secure. It was a little tighter than I expected, but I wore Spanx underwear and it worked out just fine. Fabric does need a good steam/iron before wearing.
A perfect fit for my frame and height. Rented for vacation will rent for summer.
Love this dress. Couldn't wear it though... real Snug on my hips.... not made for an hourglass.
Perfect for beach date

I'm wearing this dress as I type and wish I loved it more. It is a very beautiful pattern, more professional than a typical shirt dress, and the fabric is nice and breezy for the still-too-hot to be fall weather in my city. However, the fabric overall was strange. It felt like a stiff cotton that was thin at the same time. Due to the stiffness, it just kind of hangs on the body in an odd way and doesn't have much movement. Nude colored undergarments are a must. Due to the fabric, this dress WRINKLES very easily. It was a tad rumpled upon arrival from RTR (easily steamed out), but by the time I got to work, I was a wrinkled mess again. The fit was also slightly "off" for me. It felt tight in the waist (there is NO give to this fabric) but was very loose around the chest and hips. It would maybe work well on a different body type.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for hot summer days in texas
links_reviews_text: This dress was the cutest rental for work.
Great we dress and looks better on than in the hanger! Even has pockets!

links_reviews_title: Cute but wrinkles as you wear
links_reviews_text: This dress was really cute in the morning, but by the end of the day I felt frumpy and couldn't wait to change. Loved the pockets though!
Very flattering piece. Worked well for a baby shower and then again for work. I loved the pockets and high neckline.

The fit was a little on the small side - I sized up and it was still a little tight. There's no give in the fabric and it's cut nice and trim so it looks fabulous but the waist might be tight on some people. Loved the a-line skirt and nod to military style. The print was adorable and the colors were great! The base of the dress is white, so if you have darker skin it MAY be a bit see through, but maybe not. I got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: A perfect summer work party dress
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly, very true to size and flattering!
Cute casual dress. Material is really lite - wrinkles really easily. Overall fine but nothing special.

Cute summer dress. Very light for super hot days. Sized up due to other reviews and glad I did, the 2 would have pulled at the waist. Well made but the opening in the bottom was problematic in a work setting when sitting- could use one more button.

This is a cute dress for casual summer evenings or daytime events. The fabric is a light, breathable cotton which is great for summer but as other reviewers have stated it doesn't stretch. As a result, the waist is a true-waist fit, so if you're bigger in the middle I'd size up. The print is a little Golden Girls, which I personally liked, but I can see how someone would think it resembles broadcloth/rattan furniture upholstery... Having said that, I loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: Great dress - little snug at the wasitband
links_reviews_text: If you're between sizes, opt for the larger size because the waistband is a little unforgiving. Overall, I loved this dress and got tons of compliments at work - just was a little tight after lunch.
I loved this dress! It was a fun every day dress. It buttons down the front. It could have done with one more button to keep it from being quite so short when I sat down.

links_reviews_title: Fit great no stretch at all
links_reviews_text: A Little see through so wear black undies or a slip lol

links_reviews_title: My favorite item. Will rent again!!!!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering - tight at waist, fitted nice on top for bigger bust. And always love a dress with pockets!

links_reviews_title: No event. Wanted it for work, but it didn't fit. This required field makes no sense.
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small. I'm generally a 2 off the rack, boy shaped (so I don't have a small waist) and this was a little tight in the middle, so this didn't fit me, and unfortunately I didn't get to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable summer work dress
links_reviews_text: Cute and comfortable dress - fitted enough to be flattering and not so tight that I couldn't sit down. It was a perfect summer work dress: dressy enough for a business casual office, but casual enough for low-key afterwork plans or for a weekend brunch. The buttons stay closed, but with the light colors I would recommend wearing a full slip or at least a cami underneath.

links_reviews_title: Bold print for a fun work outfit
links_reviews_text: This dress was a great work rental. Lightweight and comfortable with a beautiful print. A little casual but for hot summer days I think it is ok. I paired it with a navy cardigan to make it more suited for the office.

links_reviews_title: Size up if hourglass figure & runs short.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs small in the waist and hips and bending over is out of the question.

I rented this for a work conference in Napa and it was perfect! The pattern is bold without being obnoxious and the cut of the dress is conservative while still being fun. I did find it to be slightly tight on my hips but that's a typical problem for me when I wear dresses with similar cuts to this since I am an hourglass, definitely not too tight to wear and it did stretch out just enough. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a casual summer day
links_reviews_text: Got too many compliments to count!

links_reviews_title: Fun standout dress for work, summer events and church
links_reviews_text: Comfy fit, more A-line than it looks - in a good way, wrinkles a bit so not great for travel

You will probably want to wear a slip with this. I did not feel comfortable wearing something so sheer out in public. I didn't have a slip and also it's summer so I'm not wearing more layers than necessary. Promptly sent this back! Such a shame because it is a pretty print and summer-friendly light fabric.
Great oversized but structured shirt. A little cropped but if you wear high waisted jeans then it won't show your stomach!

Love the long, large shelves, love the short front - makes it really easy for tucking in. The back is a little bit long and billowy but that's the style. Really high quality shirt that is super flattering.

A cute casual but classy shirt! I loved the large sleeves and oversized fit! The shoulders are still tailored so don't go too big but you can get away with sizing down if you want. I kept my reg size and it was cute tucked in some high waisted skinnies.

LOVED this top, but it does fit kind of like a crop top, so be ready. I paired this with high-waisted, leather joggers so the crop look was a perfect match. Honestly, Jill you did me solid with this one. Thanks, girl.

I should have ordered a size down because the shirt has a boxy cut. With the cut I felt in needs to be worn with fitted pants, shorts or a skirt. I wore it work with my red pants and I received many compliments on the outfit.

This is one of my favorite shirts to rent (definitely planning to rent again). It's a very chic and new take on a button up shirt. It's an oversized, boxy fit. I feel like the oversized sleeves make the fit amazing and add something special to a simple top. It's kind of cropped, but can be tucked in if needed. It has small slits on the side seams so it was a great shirt to do the half in, half out tuck and went perfectly with my high waisted jeans. Can't wait to wear this again soon! Highly recommend.
The color and structure are great - runs large (expected given the boxy shape), so might want to size down a size to avoid it completely swallowing you up.
A nice, crisp look for everyday summer wear. I paired this with white shorts and flats.

This is a great every day oxford type shirt with a twist. Per most of the other reviews, make sure you wear high waisted bottoms unless you want your mid-drift to show (especially if you raise your arms at all for any reason). I really enjoyed this shirt.
Loved this. I went up a size concerned about the bust area but I really didn't need to. Oversized button up with loose sleeve is perfect for summer

links_reviews_title: The cut is beautiful. It's classic but the wide sleeves add great visual interest.
links_reviews_text: Light and super comfortable.
Loved this shirt, super light and fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Fun twist on the classic button-down
links_reviews_text: This shirt was perfectly oversized for a cool menswear chic look. You could style this endlessly with skirts, denim, etc. Nice quality too.

links_reviews_title: Amazing! Perfect fit with a fresh style for moms on the go!!! Looove it!
links_reviews_text: #momsonthego #beutiful #everyday #perfectfit
Incredibly comfortable, fun design, is a little bit of a crop but can still wear to work with high waisted pants. Got lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Cute, felt like a fancy pajama top
links_reviews_text: This size was too big for me but I tucked it into jeans and it was ok.

Loved this shirt. Perfect casual look with a little something different. Wore it multiple times for happy hours, brunch, and just running errands. Cute tucked in the front with high waisted jeans or untucked for the cropped look. Will totally consider renting again.
Nice color, flattering with a fitted pant
Super cute sweatshirt material. Puffy to tapered sleeves add a sweet/edgy style. Wear w jeans or dress up with leather. Love it. Considering buying.
The sleeves take this shirt into an unexpectedly fun shirt. The upper arm balloons at the shoulder, which I loved.

links_reviews_title: Most worn of all my rentals so far
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. The puffy sleeve details made it unique. It's a thicker terry cloth material which made it warm and cozy. Considered buying since it's the perfect casual Friday sweatshirt, without looking like a sweatshirt.

links_reviews_title: Wore it around the house and to run errands
links_reviews_text: Comfortable but not particularly flattering if you have a larger chest and shoulders because of where the seams fall.
This was great for a casual weekend. It's really just an elevated sweatshirt, but that can be great too!
Didn't realize this was terry cloth, but liked the style a lot. Very comfortable without looking sloppy. Wore it several times.

I was enticed by the multi-directional stripes and the sleeves are fab BUT the horizontal stripes (which I comfortable wear all the time) in this silhouette made it look like, in my husband's words, that I had balloons in my shirt.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this item.
links_reviews_text: Very cute top! However, this fit very small in the arms, I would not recommend for anyone with muscular arms.

links_reviews_title: Pattern around the shoulder made me look hunched
links_reviews_text: Something about the lines/pattern around the shoulder area made me look like I was hunching over so I didn't wear. Shirt had some pilling and looked a little beat up.

links_reviews_title: Cute but it arrived with a stain on the wrist
links_reviews_text: Looks like maybe red wine?

links_reviews_title: Great sweater but pills easily. A lovely update to a classic stripe
links_reviews_text: A little tight on the lower arms as an FYI
Fitted - a bit too much! Not a lot of give to the material so order up a size.
Not flattering
This is the perfect everyday work dress. The cut, color, style is classic. It is very flattering on my pear shape. Got so many compliments today. I highly recommend it.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress, flattering for anyone with pear shaped body type.
links_reviews_text: Wonderful color, fabric, and cut. Fit large on top, I'm pear shaped and much smaller up top.
This dress was great for work! It had pockets, was very flattering, and I just *loved* the color.
I loved how this dress felt. The material is nice and warm without keeping you too warm. It is also very forgiving. It's flowy and has pockets! Very nice dress.

Rented for church at Christmas time. Beautiful fit, comfortable and even has convenient pockets. The only draw back was that all of my bras were slightly exposed at the cleavage. If I wear it out I'll need a camisole underneath.

I wore this for an engagement party and got lots of great compliments. Loved the pockets, loved the swing of it, and that it wasn't too tight. It fit a little awkwardly in the shoulders, and I'm not sure if that's because of my broader shoulders or because there was more fabric. Either way, I was a fan! Great color too..
It fit wonderfully and hit in the right place, very flattering cut! Great color and it was perfect for our family photos!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful drape, slightly larger on top
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress, dark green and perfect structure. Created a beautiful silhouette. I'm a 38D on top and the top/chest area was slightly loose which is not common. I had to constantly pull the dress up at work so I wasn't showing cleavage. But I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Needed a dress for a wedding and saw this beautiful green dress!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'1 and 126 lbs. the size 4 was a little loose and I could have sized down. Since I'm short the dress looked a little longer on me. I wore a belt to cinch the waist a bit and felt like the dress was missing something. Got a lot of compliments!

This dress ended up being a little frumpier on me than I had expected, but that is definitely partly how I wore it. Add some cute jewelry/hair/heels and I'm sure it could look a little more modern. I wore it with flats to work, and I liked it. It's comfortable and flattering and modest. It felt a little Victorian, but in a fun retro kinda way. It fit true to size and is a nice fairly heavy material; definitely feels well made.

Picked this up in the NYC store for a trip to Edinburgh. I'm normally a size 14 and they only had a 10, but I'd had a couple of drinks so decided to try it on. Well, it FIT. Nicely! Very stretchy and flattering. Wore with spanx as the fabric is a tad thin.

Other than the fact that it ran just a smidge big, it was a great dress. Really very elegant. I am a solid 2 at Banana Republic, and therefore normally wear a 4 in designer brands, but I could have sized down for this one.
Beautiful color, hits below the knee, a little formal for work.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my winter concert at the school I teach at. It was a classic outfit with some flare
links_reviews_text: The top on the 6 was a bit big so I wore the 4. 5'7. 140lbs. Fabric was nice and forgiving. Very comfortable to move in but still formal enough for the show.

This style usually looks great on me and the dress is well made but looks very matronly. It is long on me and I'm 5'8". The color looks almost black. I simply don't like it and it is not something I would purchase in a store for any price so I opted just to return the dress without wearing it.
A comfortable and pretty dress. I usually wear a small on top but was swimming in this size 6.

I rented this as a backup dress and I'm glad my 1st choice worked out. This dress runs large. It was too big for me to wear and I ended up looking very wholesome instead of cute like the model does. Not the look I was going for, but this may work for you if you are looking for a nice church dress rather than a cute wedding dress.
Very rich green color and the fit is flattering
Really liked this dress. Very comfortable and flattering. Would rent again.

I absolutely loved this dress. I wore it for a rehearsal dinner and then for a date night. It fit so perfectly, the sleeves were the perfect length, everything about it was wonderful. I would seriously consider buying this dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress worked well for my company holiday party!
links_reviews_text: The dress was kind of plain by itself so I wore some cute accessories but it's great for a formal winter event. I would describe the dress as more of a skater style dress so the bottom is a little large which I liked but some people may not, but other than that the fit was great.

I rented this dress 1 size up from my normal size (4/6) to account for being 6 months pregnant. This dress is very comfortable, hits at a great length for a wedding or work and has pockets which is always nice. I would definitely rent this dress again!
Conservative yet flattering dress, perfect for a holiday party. I added a gold belt for a bit of bling since the dress is kind of plain. Loved the thick fabric, helped keep me warm in the cold!

This dress fit perfectly and was so flattering. I wish I had taken a picture. I have a large bust and rib cage and often have difficulty with tightness through the chest or on wrap items that don't offer enough coverage. I received so many compliments on this dress throughout the day I wore it and the color was gorgeous and appropriate to holiday parts, etc. The fabric drapes beautifully but it's medium weight and I had two meetings the day I wore it that took place in offices where the heat was really turned up and I was sweating as if in a sauna, so this would not be a good summer dress.

links_reviews_title: Such a sweet dress! Wore to church, work party, and got compliments both times!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, very flattering

links_reviews_title: Loved, loved, loved this dress! So comfortable and elegant. Wish I could’ve kept it!!
links_reviews_text: True to size, nice length and perfect for a winter wedding.

links_reviews_title: Awesome, high quality dress- great as maternity
links_reviews_text: I wore this as a maternity dress. I am normally a size 4 but wore this in a size 8 since I am very pregnant. It looked terrific and fit so so well. I wore it multiple times before returning.

links_reviews_title: Color and cut are so flattering
links_reviews_text: People couldn't stop complimenting me! This is a tiny bit big but works for my full figured body type

links_reviews_title: This is just a fantastic, classic dress
links_reviews_text: There is absolutely nothing wrong with the dress, it's lovely. Got tons of compliments. Considered buying it. Great dark green color for fall and winter.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful & comfy for dancing all night long!
links_reviews_text: Super comfy and nice length for a fall wedding on a cold day.
Looked like an 80s dress. Terrible cut. Not flattering.

I'm six weeks post-partum, and not anywhere near my original size two, but I took a chance on a size zero, as there was nothing else available. It was *perfect*. The dress is so flattering and travels well without wrinkling. Beautiful. First thing I have felt great in since giving birth!
Runs large like most Donna Morgan dresses. Beautiful color and POCKETS

links_reviews_title: Was too large for my smaller frame
A beautiful day for a friend’s wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was very flattering on and the best was that it had pockets!

links_reviews_title: The puffiness on the sleeve takes this from being retro to dowdy
links_reviews_text: The fabric is heavy and luxe, and you feel like it is a true garment. The sleeves are a real tragedy, though, as they take are what takes the dress from being retro to something like what you would see in a community where every woman is wearing the same dress.
Loved the length too.

Had to host an event in front of 300 people on a stage (where we were seated on stools) and this dress was great. I paired it with high suede boots to balance out the length (it's long, about mid-calf). Great for coverage when you're at eyelevel, but also comfortable. Lovely green color.
Flattering at waist and bust
The ruffle neck and puff sleeve are sweet details. The seater is light and fitted. A little small.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater for work or dinner with friends
links_reviews_text: I do usually prefer a more fitted sweater shirt but I think this one was very cute. The material felt soft and comfortable enough for me. I loved the color and was able to wear it to both work and out to dinner with a friend

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater! Soft, warm, great dusty rose / light pink color.
links_reviews_text: Great Sweater. If it was not so expensive I would purchase. Color is a dusty rose and can go with anything (black, Blue, Gray, brown, White). Fit is a bit on the small size. I wear a S/M and definitely needed the M. Shoulders are super cute style. Neck is unique take on turtle neck. The condition of the rental was fair. I would purchase if it were in better condition (especially for the price) and if were cheaper.

links_reviews_title: It'll do for a chilly day.
links_reviews_text: A little loose throughout the day, will stretch out a bit... wish I could've washed it. But cute.

This sweater is pretty and feminine. It's fairly fitted without being super tight. Not too long either. The detail in the shoulders and collar adds a nice feminine touch. It's also very comfortable. I wore it with only a bra, no tank top underneath, and it felt very soft.

Pretty turtle neck sweater, very feminine and girly. Soft, not itchy at all to me. Runs a little short if you are longer in the torso like me. I would have preferred a small, but only xs was available. Noticed this top on the final episode of Dirty John-worn by one of the daughters:)
I’m a small but only medium was available. It was big in the shoulders, but I could get away w it.
The mock collar was not sturdy enough to stay up as pictured so it rolled down and looked odd. It is ribbed as well, with not much structure.
Lightweight sweater that can be worn on its own or with vest over top.
Too big in the shoulders and too long
Cute and lady lake-- a bit old school looking-- but still lovely and feminine.
Loved the cute feminine details on this. The material is very thin which was perfect for the early summer days.
Great fit, light warm material and very cute.
Nice flattering fit with a slightly puffed sleeve. Very pretty spring color. Would definitely rent again.

Just got this to have something different in the wardrobe, nothing too special or boring for a regular workday. Sized up to make sure it wouldn't be too tight across the chest, which worked well for me. The collar did start to flop toward the end of the day, which was slightly disappointing. Thankfully there are many more sweaters to choose from, so I probably won't come back to this piece.
I loved this sweater! It was sweet, trendy, and very feminine. Lightweight.

links_reviews_title: Enjoyed wearing this light weight sweater
links_reviews_text: Pretty pale pink sweater
If you have a long torso, don't bother...this top is very short. I'm 5'9" and the blouse didn't even reach the top of my pants. Returned without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Material felt good on the skin.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect!
The top was a little loose on the sides.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, flattering, fitted, unique look, romantic, a little short at the hips
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, flattering, fitted, unique look, romantic, a little short at the hips
I liked this sweater a lot. Very lightweight, good quality material. It looked great with faux leather leggings. Comfortable to wear.
Great color, cute puff sleeve details. looks great with pants and jeans... nothing super special but did the job
Only wore this sweater twice in the month that I had it but got compliments each time. The feel is super comfortable and I kind of wished I would have started wearing it earlier in the month!
Soft

links_reviews_title: I ended up wearing this to an 80's party and was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Of course, I would have worn it anyway! It's soft and on trend and adorable.

This is a cute mid-weight sweater with pretty details like puffed shoulder, banded sleeve and a ruffle neck. The wool is heathered- it's not a flat pink...which I liked. The sleeves were a wee bit floppy with slightly too much material - I might have done better with the small but I know that Rebecca can run small.

links_reviews_title: Adorable! Wish it were cheaper...I'd buy!
links_reviews_text: Really cute shirt. Can't see spending so much on a sweater turtleneck otherwise would have bought it. Wish I had it in lots of colors! Wore to work and keeping to wear this weekend more casually.

I rented this for work. I found the material to be very soft. The color was pretty. I liked the neck and sleeve detail. It is cut straight, so the bottom was more form fitting than I would normally prefer.
Cute but loses shape.
Cute top, loved the ruffle neck and the color. It was snug and good to tuck into skirt / pants.
Every other turtle neck makes me itchy. This one is amazing, so light and warm and super soft. Also very cute and fits so nicely.
I rented it to take pictures, and it looked great. It was super comfortable. I would totally buy it if it becomes available.

links_reviews_title: it looked so pretty on me
links_reviews_text: the fabric is scratchy I hate that the tag in the back of the neck scratches, too.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and a great fit, flattering
links_reviews_text: Nice sweater material, not scratchy or too hot. Breathable.

links_reviews_title: Very cute - Maybe a bit over the top demure
links_reviews_text: It's cute, pretty soft. It is a little puritanical looking with the turtleneck and puffy shoulders, but still cute.

links_reviews_title: it was a nice pop of color on a cold day
links_reviews_text: It's slightly scratchy but the color and cut are beautiful

Great for everyday, I paired it with chunky boot and dark denim looked very put together. Casual and lux look with the large knit, very easy effortless look. I would wear again, next time I would size up because although true to size I feel like the material was shrunk during dry cleaning before I received.
Very nice material and wonderfully made. It's the the perfect length for skirts or jeans. Great sweater for the winter!
Wore this to a blogger event, appropriately enough, and got lots of compliments. I even got stopped in my travels- it was a big hit

I saw another RTR girl in this sweater (different night) on my ski vacation. I wore Moto leggings and at 5'2 the sweater was not a crop w/ the high side slits. It's eye catching and fun, comfortable. I thought the sweater was very roomy but sized up to S b/c Valentino dresses always seem to run small on me. XS in this would have been fine. Taller girls worried about the side slit may still want to size up or wear a tank under..

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and not too warm
links_reviews_text: Great work sweater could be easily dressed up or down, the cut out on the sides made it very flattering and not clingy like some knit sweaters feel. Would highly recommend!
This sweater is so well made. I love the way it cuts in on the hips. The colors and knit are unique and I got a ton of compliments. Not sure about the saying but still super fun and cute.

Love this little sweater. Chunky look with a fun, trendy edge, but still totally wearable. The length was great on me with high-waist leggings -- slits came just to the waist band and gave the sweater a flattering curvy shape. Slightly longer in the back. I'm 5'2" though, so expect more cropped and a little skin if you're tall.
Obsessed with this non itchy sweater. I was about to donate these red leather pants but they look cute together. Loveeeee it.

I like my sweaters big/oversized and the large here fit the bill! This sweater is very soft and comfortable to wear and has amazing knit details. I wore it with the Derek Lam Asymmetrical Mixed Print skirt and received lots of compliments! Just an overall fun and different sweater!

Love this knit sweater. Paired it w ripped black jeans, black booties and red lipstick! It runs large but that's the style for it be oversized. This is made very well, felt warm, and the material is thick, isn't going to pull. The sweater makes a statement and can be casual or dressed up

links_reviews_title: Loved it Want to buy it
links_reviews_text: So cute Want to buy this one!
A little stiff and bulky for a busty petite person. I probably needed a size up (a small) but didn't sit well on my short frame unless I had very high waisted pants or skirt. Great color.
cUte but hot
Perfect fit, super comfy.
It was comfortable and heavy. I like the way it fit me with my large bust. I would definitely recommend.
I got this sweater for a every day look & was pleasantly surprised by quality, texture & fit. This sweater is light weight enough to be worn in the early months of spring or a warmer winter day.
Loved this cozy well made sweater. Design was fun and I received a ton of compliments. Hard to return
