Obsessed with this sweater for fall. The fit is perfect and the material is cozy. You could dress it up or down which makes it perfect for work and going out.
Loved this for the first few weeks of fall transition. The high neck is a fun detail and the fit was just what you want in a non-fitted sweater. Got several compliments!
So cozy. Received many compliments. Great piece.
Runs a little large, but generally true to size. Perfect for fall/winter.
A little short for me, thought it was longer. Like my sweaters to cover my bottom!
Loved this for the cool "spring" we had and am considering purchasing. Felt so cozy then when I popped it back on after dinner my friend exclaimed, "what a great sweater! Its like a hug!"
Goes with everything. Has pockets and nice closure to keep secure. Huge!
Great color/fabric/print. Fun full-skirt. Liked the cut but didn't love it...waist tie a tad high-waisted for my long torso...bulky overall.
Very roomy, but flattering with cinched waist. Super comfortable. LOVED the bright blue. Wore it 2x! Will rent again

Very comfortable and roomy (runs a bit large but you wouldn't want this dress to fit tightly). It's very lightweight but not cheap, making it perfect for warmer climates. Also it was so comfortable I ended up wearing it on the plane ride home! Got LOTS of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Runs big but I love it
links_reviews_text: Definitely on the baggier side but I loved the print and color and fit of this dress. Wore it twice
Super cute!!!! Runs large and is heavier than I pictured. Not Ideal for a hot day in NYC but very cute !!!

links_reviews_title: A dress that lights up the room!
links_reviews_text: loved this dress so much! The blue and white print were perfect for a summer party. I think I could have sized down since it is so swingy in the sweep... but got so many compliments in it! Would highly recommend!
Beautiful dress, great colors and it even has pockets. This thing is perfect!
This dress is perfect for summer!! It's very forgiving! The tie waist is great! Pairs well with sandals.

I tied the collar on this so it was more crew than boat. The color is so vibrant and attracted a lot of compliments. A little preppy, but chic with some strappy sandals and good earrings. Fun to twirl in and perfect for a lawn party.

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful dress! The color and pattern is wonderful. I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Runs large, but the drawstring waist helps.

I think the print was my most favorite element of this dress, but in the end it's not for me. The styling is a little too straightforward and felt somewhat boring. I think this dress would work beautifully for running errands or lounging; the cotton fabric is super comfortable and easy. Not so simple to dress this up, however, so felt somewhat limiting. Beautiful bright blues, though, nevertheless!

Fresh white and blues almost Greek floral feels like a wonderful length if you're my height falls right above shoe crest. Cinching waist and sleeve super flattering def one to maybe purchase! Loved it!

Never got so many compliments on a dress before. The color, fit and style were comfortable and flattering. I would recommend sizing down a size as it does run on the larger side. The subtle drawstring helps cinch in the waist.
This dress is gorgeous! Very chic daytime and vacation option. Fits me well and can be paired with Converse or more dressy sandals. The fabric is light and airy. Love love love!
Super feminine and the colors are gorgeous blues and crisp whites.
Loved this dress. The blues are just gorgeous and it's a great fit for work, dinner, BBQ, etc. the sleeve make it more versatile and the tie waist gives you shape. Defintely recommend!
I rented this to wear in Napa but snuck a wear in before I've even left. It's so pretty! A lot of fabric so maybe not great for very hot weather but SO pretty.
Runs large but drawstring waist is adjustable. Fabric is high quality cotton.

I love this dress. Gorgeous print and comfortable, easy fit. It is casual, better for vacation and everyday summer wear, not special occasions, but an absolutely perfect summer dress. It maybe fits a little large but the drawstring waist makes it adjustable. Would definitely rent again.
Pretty dress, but with the tie at the wait, the neck and one at each arm was a bit much. It's hard to tie the ones on the sleeves unless you live with someone who can tie them for you.

I am 5'7" and medium build, but this was completely overwhelming on my frame. It's really pretty, and I think a taller person would look amazing. But the length, the tiers, the print, the volume - in the end, the dress wore me.

I rented this delightful mumu for a housecoat trial run. The moment I tried it on I knew I needed to own it (and I will). I can't say enough. Light cotton, not stiff but crisp. Drawstring at waist give the option to have more shape if preferred. Ties at arms come u done a lot but I was only annoyed doing dishes and giving baths. Colors and print are total perfection.

links_reviews_title: Great quality fabric with adjustable tie that allows it to be about 3 sizes!
links_reviews_text: #beautiful

It's hard to photograph black. So I think this sweater is languishing here on RTR. But it's great for working from home, washing your hands (again), and trying not to strangle your children -- all at once! Facial mask optional. Rent it! TTS
Cute easy sweater. Was pretty breathable and so I'd say more on the lightweight side. True to size

links_reviews_title: Loved the fringe on the sleeves, made a regular black sweater more special
links_reviews_text: The only thing keeping this from 5 starts is the neck - I felt like I was suffocating taking it on and off. If was comfortable while wearing but very difficult to get on and off.
I would buy this if I could afford to but this sweater is soft and cute and so comfortable. I wore it all the time!

I thought this sweater was cute! The fringe makes it interesting, and I received a ton of compliments when I wore it to work. I prefer my sweaters to be a tad bit longer than this one, but I'd rent it again for sure.
In the picture the sweater looks a bit more cropped than it is, it is definitely a waist-length sweater- but very cute none-the-less.

I wore this to work over a black dress. (I rented the matching pants too, but I didn't like them.) overall true to size. I liked the style and thought the material is comfortable, but it also seemed to wrinkle and not really lie flat, so it looked a little cheap even though it's almost $700!

links_reviews_title: This suit jacket fit but was nothing special.
links_reviews_text: The fabric was nice but thin so the blazer didn't have much structure. I wouldn't be able to tell the difference between this blazer and many other cheaper ones that I own.
The sleeves were too long for a petite person, but they were oddly right when trying to roll them.

links_reviews_title: Like the shape but not crazy about the material.
links_reviews_text: Better for date night than office.
I would order a size up from what you normally wear in a jacket. It's very fitted through arms and shoulders.

I was hoping for a jacket that would make me feel like a million bucks. But this wasn't it. It arrived very wrinkled and leaned in that direction even after I steamed it. Wish the fit had been a little more structured. I likely should have ordered a Small. Good, but not outstanding.

links_reviews_title: This was just meh - I didn't wear it
links_reviews_text: Seemed a bit bagged out. Material was not that nice
Great fit

The jacket was super fitted to my torso which I loved but I ordered the wrong size so it was too tight in the arms. Should have gone with a medium or it would have been great. Not too broad of shoulders and felt feminine and powerful

I rented this for work, and wanted the sleeves to be comfortable. Ordering up to a Medium (I'm usually a Small) provided the extra space in the arms that I like. Typing at a desk all day can be difficult when your arms are restricted! Although I liked this jacket, I gave it 4 stars only because I didn't feel that the quality met its retail price. That being said, I would order this piece again. It's a classic!

links_reviews_title: Fit really well, made me feel well-dressed.
links_reviews_text: Great, but too expensive.

links_reviews_title: I consistently rent this blazer and love it.
links_reviews_text: This blazer is my go-to and rent it often to wear with any outfit. Consistent compliments and a great fit.
I felt like this was just an okay jacket--not very tailored looking. I wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: I ended up Not wearing this
links_reviews_text: This was a little tight on my shoulders and upper back. Good material though.

links_reviews_title: I wore this multiple times and would buy it if it weren't so expensive.
links_reviews_text: Dresses up any outfit
This soft jacket was a great way to dress up without feeling stiff or strangled by a boxy suit coat jacket. The only down side I found was that the fabric wasn't super breathable.

links_reviews_title: Nice, basic jacket. Was a little baggy on me.
links_reviews_text: Wore it once. Nice material!

links_reviews_title: Great backs black blazer for work or with jeans for a date
links_reviews_text: Fit great!

This blazer was well made, looked great and comfortable, but not anything special. I would absolutely recommend it if you don't have a black blazer and want one for work or any function, but if you have a lot of blazers and are looking for something a little special, this isn't it.

links_reviews_title: Nice jacket. I didn't wear it though.
links_reviews_text: It was a little long for me.
I wore this to a seminar and couldn't have loved it more. Fit well, looked great and paired well with dress pants and jeans.
This is a classic black blazer with a nice tailored fit. Lapels have a bit of sheen, but not too much for a casual look with jeans or paired for a suit.

links_reviews_title: Good blazer, but not worth the rental!
links_reviews_text: I had high hopes for this blazer, but it was a let down. Cute, but nothing special.
Fits long but great for work!
It fit very nice and it's definitely high quality materials. Not sure it's worth the price point but a very classic black blazer.
Great fit , wore it for corporate "photo day " my picture turned out fabulous.
Would have loved in an XS. Runs large

links_reviews_title: Reminiscent of character Dopey's oversized loooonnng sleeves; lol.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are 24" and my arm length is 21" so I had to tuck in and lost the unique aspect of the arm. Cut was perfect and flattered the waist
Love everything about this jacket!
Jacket didn't hang well and it was too long for me
Super professional and comfortable.

I rented this because I had to be in court and none of my skirt suits fit me at 22 weeks pregnant. This jacket looks great with dresses and is the right length to pair with a more formal dress to pull off a business formal look.

links_reviews_title: Sleeves too long to wear; great jacket otherwise
links_reviews_text: This was a perfect fit-- bust, waist, shoulders, length, everything -- except it was impossible to wear because of the length of the sleeves. The fabric is great -- lightweight, wrinkle-free, gorgeous -- but didn't lend itself to rolling, scrunching or rouching the sleeves. Too bad!

links_reviews_title: Neither forgiving, nor true to size.
links_reviews_text: I'm almost always a medium on top. As most of the reviews state, the arms in this blazer are very tight. I didn't even get to wear it. Sent this item back straight away.

I ordered a large based on other reviews and I'm glad I did. I'm 5'4" 34C and have broad shoulders and this fit perfectly. It wasn't fitted in the waist and was a tad big but with a tucked in blouse, high waisted jeans and some heels it was a fun going out outfit!

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear the blazer, I returned unworn.
links_reviews_text: The color was a bit odd to match with standard black pants and the jacket just wasn't as dressy as I thought it would be. It was nice, just not what I expected. I was not able to wear it for the event I ordered it for.
Great fit
For a size large, it felt like a medium. But overall, I loved the material and quality of the blazer. Fits beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Cute style but didn't like the shiny fabric for everyday.
links_reviews_text: Good fit, runs small like most reviewers have said. I am normally a small but went up a size and it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Skinny in arms, wider in torso
links_reviews_text: Arms are very slim for the size to the point where I was straining at the seams. I'm typically a 2 sometimes a 4 in blazers and have wide shoulders, so typically sleeves end up wide for me, so slim sleeves here was a surprise. Did not end up wearing this as a would have restricted my movement but the torso otherwise fit nicely as did the shoulders. I am 30E, 135, 5'3". Also sleeves were about 2 inches too long for petites.
Loved this. Got so many compliments!
Wore this comfy and fashionable romper for Father's Day
I wore this is Mexico on vacation. It looked great at night at dinner. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: It was a great fit- if it wasn't fall and cold outside I would have purchased.
links_reviews_text: it was comfortable, perfect for a day brunch
Worked well on my petite frame.
Loved this. Comfortable and easy to throw on and feel pulled together in a snap. Great for AZ fall
I felt a bit like a less shapely ghostbuster in this, but I got many compliments. The material isn't as light as I expected, it's more like a medium cotton and not so silky.
This was a good, true to side fit. The asymmetry with the wrap over in front was a little awkward, s f sort of wished it was just a more basic romper. The print is cute.
Rented for vacation in Hawaii, then wore it two additional times once back at home. Great summer brunch outfit!

A very cool romper, the material was a little thick so I would recommend wearing it on a cooler day. I thought it ran very big. I got a large, because I am very hourglass and need a little more give, but I was swimming in this. If a very relaxed fit is your thing, it could work, but I would size down next time.
Was so sad about the fit, but as a curvy girl, should have known such a straight dress wouldn't work out well.
The fit material was on point. This dress can be wore to formal and causal places.
I gambled with this dress with NO reviews. Size down if you do rent it. I wore a belt with it.
A little baggy but a cute dress with tights

links_reviews_title: Cute print but not super flattering
links_reviews_text: Love the print and the sleeves were great. Definitely a shift dress with lots of room. Size down.
Dress is super cute. Hugged my bottom more than I liked. Would order size up if you you have a shapely bottom

links_reviews_title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE. Super Cute, fun, comfortable, and flattering.
links_reviews_text: easy, breezy, fun with polish.

links_reviews_title: Loved it. I should have got the XL, as it was tight on my 10-12 body. With jacket it was okay
links_reviews_text: a little tight for me, but would love to buy the size up.
Pure perfection on this little dress. Best for rectangle-shaped figures. So cute with the polka dots. Can't say enough good about it! (Comfy, too!)

Very flattering fit. I wore this for Thanksgiving dinner out. It was incredibly soft and very elegant. I received several compliments on it from strangers. The sleeves are sheer giving it a slightly sexier look than the photo. Love it. Will rent again.
Comfy and flattering for work!
Since this dress is so unique and unforgettable it's perfect to rent to wear once. Wearing for work, adorable.
Navy blue polka dots bring charm to this dress. Wore this to work and it fit perfectly. There's enough room for movement. You could probably size down for a slim fit.

This is a straighter fit than expected - it was baggy for me between my bust and waist but tight around my hips. I could probably get away with shapewear, but it wasn't worth it. The fabric was thinner than expected so probably great for warmer climates, and the arms were slightly sheer which was a lovely detail. If your body shape isn't curvy, this would likely work for you.
This jacket was awesome. Loved the throw back plaid pattern. Wore it a bunch of times. Comfortable and warm without being hot. Lined, so that was nice. Compliments. Dressed it up and down.

links_reviews_title: Bright colors in NYC when you're in a sea of black
links_reviews_text: I rented this to try and spice up my outerwear, since I'm almost always wearing big black coats. It was definitely warm, but a bit oversized and longer than I would normally wear (for reference, I'm 5' 1'')
Very cute coat. Nicely made. Fit well. Great fun everyday coat.

links_reviews_title: Warm and looks nice, just pills easily
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a business trip, was great for chilly Seattle weather and even better for the cold spell when I touched down at home. Only issues were that the material pills very easily, like other reviews, and that it didn't quite close over my hips.

This coat can make an outfit, especially a casual one. There are only a few buttons but it's warm for 40s. There's not a lot of room underneath for big sweaters. Looks better unbuttoned bc of the boxy shape.
This print is definitely loud but in a good way. A really fun piece that was also functional in the cold
Runs fairly TTS, maybe a little on the large side so you can fit a sweater under the sleeves

links_reviews_title: Beautiful coat, but not the best quality.
links_reviews_text: I found this quote to do the job of keeping me warm, but I had a new, and after wearing it once the outside layer started pilling. It fit well, and was very cute, just keep that in mind.

I wore this to a Christmas market & loved the festive vibe it gave off. Not super warm or thick so be mindful of that when renting. If you plan on layering a thick sweater underneath, I'd recommend sizing up as there's not a ton of give.

Loved this coat in every way except the fit. As an extreme hourglass, I should've sized up for more coverage around the hips. It does NOT nip in at the waist, so it is boxy. However, the fabric is luxurious and the colors pop. I still loved it

links_reviews_title: Everyone commented on how much they liked this coat!
links_reviews_text: I am 30 weeks pregnant, and usually wear a 6, so I sized up to an 8 and it was perfect. The coat is very flattering and I loved wearing it. I had a work trip that took me to 30 degree weather and this has kept me very warm. I definitely recommend renting this!

I wore this to an outdoor event in the fall and got lots of compliments on the print. Only thing to note is the material pills easily. The coat was new when it arrived and after a couple of wears some of the thread was pulling so I returned it.
Super cute for winter and I kept it for 2 months! Really enjoyed this!

I like to be a bit different and this coat fits the bill. It is really paired with colors I have in my closet: black, white, beige,browns and red and blue jeans. I wore it with brown boots, mustard top, a black scarf and jeans. It looked nice. I do like the large pockets! The size 14 provided me enough room in the shoulders and arms (this girl has out-of-shape weightlifter arms and needs a bit of more space), but I had extra room in the waist as it isn't tailored slimmer in the waist. I can tell my husband isn't the biggest fan, so I will probably try something else soon.

links_reviews_title: Had a blast in this coat!
links_reviews_text: Great oversized coat. Fabric is soft, coat and pockets are lined and the print is great.
Got it for the holiday season felt nice and festive without being too much to wear every day
This is why I do unlimited something I would never buy but is one of my favorite unique pieces. So cute
Something about this coat, I just didn't love it. Mine was a bit shop worn and a bit tight. I sent this one right back. May just not be my style.

links_reviews_title: Runs small but a nice festive coat
links_reviews_text: Saw this coat in the store and tried it on. I wore it a few times but the buttons were annoying (you have to use the loops to button but the loops are very tight and it's hard to pull it around the buttons). It also doesn't button all the way down. It is quite warm though. It runs small especially if you have hips, so I'd say size up!

I found this coat to be average. Loved the length, but the buttons only come down to waist and the bottom of the coat was splitting open on me. This might be remedied with a larger size, but I found the coat to be nothing exciting.

There's a picture out there of Princess Kate in a car with this same print on. It looks good on both of us. I loved the pattern. But a size 14 was too small for this size 14 body. It was way too tight around the hips. I would order one size up next time.
Such a fun jacket! Wouldn't purchase because I think i would get sick of the pattern, but adorable for a weekend!!
The jacket was slightly smaller than expected and the buttonhole was ripped, so it ended up being unwearable.

I think it's safe to say I just love all NVLT coats. When I pulled this out of the bag my husband made a face and said "that's.. a lot", i.e. color, pattern and texture. 20 mins later after pairing it with a brown hutch dress he said he really liked it. It's an absolutely lovely coat. I got a 14 because it says its oversized, but I couldn't close it across my 38DDDs so keep that in mind, maybe don't size down? Still gave it 5 stars cause that's my bad, not the coat's. 10/10 would rent again (in a 16)
Fits well, hits midcalf on me. Beautiful coat.

links_reviews_title: First wearing was to a Raconteurs show - felt like a million bucks
links_reviews_text: The highlight of this coat is the bold plaid and the pop of color it can bring to any outfit.
Fits loosely. I loved the colors and pockets of this coat. Decent warmth to ~15 degrees, but I didn't try colder. Lots of compliments.
The coat fit well. The weaving is a little nubby and was easily snagged. Otherwise it was warm and cute!
Great pattern and fit. i wish it buttoned all the way down instead, it just has a couple loops to button at the top. It makes it not as warm but it was good in 40 - 50 degree weather.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty jacket that looked elegant on
links_reviews_text: Loved this coat! I wore it one time, dressed down with ripped jeans and a cream cashmere sweater and then a second time dressed up with black leather pants, a fitted black sweater and stiletto boots. Got tons of compliments with both looks. I did find the coat ran large. I'm usually a 2 but sometimes a 0 depending on the brand. This 2 was quite big on me, so I would definitely size down if you are even close to being between sizes.
Cute and kept me very warm. Also had plenty of very helpful little pockets. Great ski jacket.

Rented this for my ski bachelorette weekend in Colorado and it was everything I needed. I loved it. It was a bit big, and I felt like a grey marshmallow but I was incredibly warm and content with the jacket choice.
This coat was so warm and comfy in the cold Park city, Utah weather. Fit well and had lots of great picked as well as hand coverings.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a weekend ski trip (actually works for skiing, not just apres :) )
links_reviews_text: The large was a little "fluffy" and long on my frame, but worked great when wearing with layers. It's a really pretty grey/powder blue color that looks great in the snow! It was perfectly warm while skiing in zero degree weather. There are finger holes in the sleeves so you can use those if you want (but weren't in the way if you don't like them). The zippers are super clean and there's a perfect pocket on the left sleeve for an electronic lift pass. The lining on the neck is fleece and super soft.

links_reviews_title: skiing at the sun dance film festival
links_reviews_text: i have not worn it yet but did try it on it seems very warm and is very stylish however it is very long which normally would be fine except it may be too constrictive to ski in..... i will let you know
Wanted to love it, but it was just way too big, especially to ski in.

I had this in December during the holiday season. I wore it to work, to casual holiday parties and I wore it on Christmas day. It was comfortable and sparkly and added some sparkle to any holiday moment.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous statement sweater for date night
links_reviews_text: I love this sweater! So cute, shimmery and fun sleeves. It's a little bit itchy but bearable and worth it! I wore a small and it fit the body but was a little short in the arms.

links_reviews_title: I feel so high fashion in this
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and sexy but not over the top. I wore it to dinner with some friends to a nice restaurant. I got a ton of compliments. Very comfortable and fit perfectly!

Rented this cute top for work and a happy hour and love it! Felt a little retro with the puffy sleeves but it is adorable! Also very sparkly (more than it looks in the pictures) and reminded me of a Michael Stars shirt from my middle school days, but in a good way. Zipper in the back that's easy to use, super cute. Will rent again!
I like the way it fits and how the sleeves are sculpted. Only downside it it's slightly itchy. I also didn't expect it to be as sparkly as it is, but I'm not complaining.
Obsessed with this top. It was flattering and eye-catching.

links_reviews_title: Cute top but a little scratchy
links_reviews_text: Fit ran large but extra room allowed for undergarments to be worn. Top is very itchy due to sparkle material

Pros: The structure, deep blue color that's not overwhelmed by the sparkles, heavy enough material to feel warm during an NYC January. Cons: The shoulders/arms made me feel a little broad but a carefully chosen bottom piece offset this.

links_reviews_title: Fun shape and color, difficult zipper
links_reviews_text: Really cute for a date night but not a lot of styling options. Would be difficult to pull off on a curvy figure. Enjoyed the wear--it was comfy and well-lined.

links_reviews_title: Looks great, fabric a little scratchy.
links_reviews_text: Wore with jeans for date night and felt fab! The puffy sleeves and metallic look were perfect for dinner out. Fabric a little rough when I first put on - I got used to it.
Love the shape and cut - fabric is very sparkly and I didn't feel great wearing this for day.

links_reviews_title: Playful addition to an all black wardrobe!
links_reviews_text: My usual uniform is all black everything, so it was nice to add such a playful piece into the mix! Got lots of compliments! I wore the L, which was fine, but a M would have been better. Wore it front tucked into a pair of (surprise) black jeans with ankle booties! Would definitely love to rent again in a M to compare!
wayyy more sparkly than pictured
This shirt was fun to wear on a night out. I paired it with black jeans and boots. Nothing spectacular, but added a bit of energy to the outfit.
Fun, sparkly blouse. The sleeve structure and the overall glitter effect made me feel like Wonder Woman. I suggest sizing down.

links_reviews_title: Runs large. Very vivid blue sparkles. I felt old wearing it.

links_reviews_text: I have really long arms so this was a bit short in both arms & torso. But as it was sparkly, it worked well for a David Bowie inspired outfit.
Fit was fine, though the material felt a little hot and sweaty. I didn't wear it because the amount of sparkliness exceeded my usual.
X
Not quite my style because of glitter.

links_reviews_title: Look at me top, super chic
links_reviews_text: Sparkly, but fun!
Loved this top! It is wider in the shoulders but that's the look! Paired with a slim fit leg i felt like it was flattering!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear, but cute for night out in cold weather!
links_reviews_text: Shiny and cute! Wish they had in a different fabric for work appropriate.

links_reviews_title: Love the stretch, the color and sparkle!
links_reviews_text: I needed to order a small instead of a medium

links_reviews_title: Beautiful sweater, too many sparkles for daytime wear at work
links_reviews_text: Fit well just couldn't wear to work
This was a cute top but the M was just a bit big. The volume on the sleeves and it being big in the waist just didn't work for me! Great quaility I'll size down next time. Size 4-6 140lbs.

I should have paid better attention to the reviews. The picture doesn't show how glittery this is. I thought it had a wool felt appearance. Nope! It is made of polyester fibers woven with blue Christmas tree tinsel. Cheap look and feel.

links_reviews_title: It is much for sparkly than appears in photo but a good amount. Not overwhelming.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Zip in back easy to do

Loved this top! Sleeve detail is so fun and the top is black with blue and purple sparkle details. I thought it was really flattering and easy to either dress up or dress down for everyday. It's a comfortable top, not itchy. Sleeves run a little short but only when arms are up. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Dressed up with a little glitter
links_reviews_text: I couldn't tell by the photo that it was a glittery sweater, so I ended up not wearing it (because I was getting it for a casual day at the office), but it's a beautiful sweater and I love the cut. Will rent again when I plan to be a little more fancy.

links_reviews_title: Dash of sophisticated sparkle for a girl's night out.
links_reviews_text: This fit perfectly and was really comfortable. Wore it on a cold night in Manhattan and received a lot of compliments. It had the perfect amount of sparkle for someone who shies away from flashy fabrics and colors. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this top with some jeans for New Year's eve. Very Cute top.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great.
It was a tad tight for me around the wrist but but overall really lovely for a conservative event.

Would have been better in a medium, but the event was next day, and I just made it work. Looked great with the red satin pants from Galvan that I also rented. Super comfortable and the big sleeves were a definite 80's flashback. Lots of glitter. Plus the blue cobalt color is looked great with blue eyes. If you have blue eyes, this is a winner.
Loved this top but it had a LOT of sparkle & glitter - wore it to work but would be best for a Holiday party or night out for NYE
I loved this shirt! I wore it with black jeans and over the knee boots and it really dressed up my outfit. The sleeves are puffy but not too much that it looks ridiculous.

links_reviews_title: Leggings, but make it work appropriate
links_reviews_text: Elastic waistband + work appropriate = yes. Loved the buttons on the bottom of the pant legs as well. Super cute
Super comfortable and cute, a little baggy in the crotch

links_reviews_title: Row of metal buttons on the kick makes these special
links_reviews_text: Pro: easy on/off with slim fitting elastic waist. Very cute slight bell cut that gives a little movement at the ankle, highlighting the row of buttons. Sharp plaid print. Stylish Con: not much stretch, so may be hard to fit /tight if you are curvy in the upper thigh area. Fitted on the belly so it will show bumps-- wear a longer sweater to cover that if needed. I wore it to work multiple times with a black cardigan .
Fit well. Not incredibly exciting, but a good every day pants. Look nice with a solid black top.
definitely made a statement, got lots of compliments
The dress is flowy and could easily be belted.
Totally cute dress. Easy to wear all day long. Two thumbs up.
Not only do I love the print and details of this dress, but it is so forgiving. I could probably have worn the L and been fine. Solid rental!!

I liked this dress a lot but definitely note that the material is very lightweight. I had ordered it in the winter and got lucky with a 60 degree day! Very fun and floral- if I can wear an XS, it definitely runs a little large!
I really loved this dress, black high heels!
As the other reviews said it is quite large but that's the style I didn't add a belt but could have to give a little more shape.

Super comfy dress...it is a super loose shift dress...I rented the large and probably could have used the medium but it was fine. The elastic sleeves and neck make it a little more tailored versus just having a basic baggy shirt. The colors are great and really pop...I wore with tights and little booties...I got several compliments. Would be great for work.
This dress was perfect teacher dress. I changed shoes and added a poncho and went to dinner with my hubby that night. It was comfortable and loved the pattern.
Adorable if you belt it. Might run a little short on tall women but it is super flattering. Would rent again for sure!
Loved everything about this dress. I'm short so a lot of dresses are too long on me but this was the perfect length. Would definitely recommend. Got a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Wish I would of rented sooner!
links_reviews_text: I had hearted this dress like a year ago but always passed by it for something else. Boy am I regretting that decision!!! Great dress!! So many ways to wear it and you can dress it up or down. I will definitely be renting this one again!

I love this dress so much!! This dress is lightweight but warm for the fall. My husbands first reaction was that I looked like a tablecloth but he quickly changed his mind. I was worried it would be too short for work, but on my short frame the dress falls just at my knees. The only problem is one of the button loops is broken. I will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Fun floral for the warm fall :-)
links_reviews_text: This was a cute little number for the very warm fall we're having. If you're tall, it's a little short but it passed the fingertip test so I rocked it to work. Lots of compliments on this one.

links_reviews_title: Perfect piece for a nice lunch!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a wine luncheon I was invited to. The color popped against the black. And this dress was SO COMFY! And the way it's shaped, the wind didn't blow it up and show the whole city of Chicago my bum. Ha!

The pattern on this dress was even brighter and more beautiful in person! The fabric was stretchy at the wrists and neck, so it didn't feel too constricting. Got TONS of compliments both times I wore it!
Fun and flirty

This dress is beautiful. It does run large. I could have sized down or used a belt or clip to help the fit. It just hangs and billows. Many said it would look better as a blouse but I received several compliments as is. The sleeves end with an elastic band but that too is loose. It came just above my knees. Overall I would wear this again but in a large.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, would rent again in bigger size
links_reviews_text: This dress was super cute, tight around the boobs so I could only wear a ban-do. Also shorter than expected so had to wear leggings underneath instead of tights. Would just recommend choosing a bigger size!

links_reviews_title: Fun day to night bday rental
links_reviews_text: Rented both size small and XS, wore the XS because this dress is quite a-line and flowy in the body. Does fit on the short side so had to wear black tights vs panty hose to not worry about seeing any lines. Cute print, super comfy, looks great under a black blazer!
Has a generous fit and great for spring when you get a not so spring day!
This is s comfy, fun dress. I could have gone down a size, but wore it and got loads of compliments!
Wore this eight months pregnant for my sister in law's wedding!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors, gorgeous, stunning and comfy work dress.
links_reviews_text: It fits loosely and a little short but paired well with black tights and boots. Will rent again! I received so many compliments. The red pops.

Loved the colors and the feel of this dress. It had no shape so plan to wear a belt or maybe a vest or blazer to give yourself a silhouette. I wore it in February (ie definitely still chilly here in NYC) w/ sheer black hose and black low-heeled, over-the-knee boots for a fun Valentine's Day look for work and post-work cocktails. I could see wearing it w/ nude heels closer to Spring, too, thanks to the pops of color.
Loved this dress! I kept it for 2 months and wore it 6 times! It looks great with or without tights, and it was especially cute with my suede block heel booties.

This looked cute with black leggings but the fit was super wide. I would size down one size for sure when renting. The width almost made it feel like a maternity dress. I would have liked the sleeves to be a tad longer too.

This was my first RTR rental and it was a HIT. I've never received so many compliments on a work outfit; strangers stopped me on the train to tell me they loved the dress. Funny thing, I probably never would have tried this dress on in the store since I shy away from patterns. This dress is perfect. It runs big, normally my shoulders require a large but the medium fit great; I may even try small when I rent again.
The fabric on this dress Is beautiful! I wore it several times - sometimes belted and sometimes not belted - and i loved it both ways! The colors really pop in photos as well.
Gathers at neck & wrist, otherwise it is a tent. A cute & colorful tent. Which is fine, if that's what you are in the mood for

links_reviews_title: Fab retro print, lots of room
links_reviews_text: Rooms fit with nice details at neck and sleeves. Very eye catching.

Lots of reviews painted this dress as a tent, but I thought it was super cute. Yes, it's big and billowy but it's also short so it works. I paired it with tall boots and got tons of compliments. My only minor complaint: elastic at the wrists and neck got a little tight after all-day wear but not enough to make me regret the rent. I'll wear again!
This was a pretty dress to brighten up a winter wardrobe. However, the static was so intense I couldn't get rid of it all day

links_reviews_title: I looked like a pregnant woman back in the 1960s. I'm not pregnant.
links_reviews_text: This dress is ok. It's huge, though! I felt like I looked like a pregnant woman back in the 1960s. Maybe if you're petite and skinny this would work, but wasn't the greatest on me. It's also quite thin, for those of us who live in chilly climates.
Super comfortable and fun dress. Looks great with fitted suede over the knee boots.

This dress is amazing. The only thing that really determines the size is how tight the shoulders are. I usually wear a small and was able to wear an XS in this. The colors are really vibrant and I really like the little slit near the neckline at the top!

I bought it! The red/pink pop is a nice addition to the black and white motif that's common every late winter / early spring in the annals of fashion. Conservative without looking dowdy. Great under a black blazer jacket. Tights or no depending on weather.
It was loose and covered the right places!
This dress has no shape and didn't look good on my frame at all. I don't suggest for those with larger bust because it doesn't have a waist and made for a very frumpy look.

links_reviews_title: Wore for work. Pretty dress. Too much fabric.
links_reviews_text: Such a pretty dress but it's a lot of fabric for my frame. Shoulders are a little poofy, again because I'm short it made my shoulders appear broader than they are. Probably better for 5'6 and above.
They are very much compression pants. Size up.

links_reviews_title: feels great on! sucks you in!
links_reviews_text: love love

this fits like an xs and it's not forgiving fabric. it's thick, which is nice but not stretchy so i cannot wear it. i will say that the waist did not pinch even though it ran small so if you get the right size, that is great!

links_reviews_title: Really great quality - great for everyday or for exercise.
links_reviews_text: Didn't realize the striping on the side was sparkly from the pictures I saw online.
I wanted to buy! But at RTR so I curb my buying.

Love this shirt, perfect for work and can be dressed down with jeans. The arms wrinkle as you would expect with this material but the chest area does not wrinkle as easily as the arms. It arrived from RTR in ready to wear condition- no ironing required.
The fabric is really thick.

I really wanted to like this. It's boxy and masculine, but not in as chic a way as I would have liked. Could have been tailored a bit more narrowly. Didn't hate it, but wouldn't wear again. Also wrinkled easily, but not surprising for a shirt of this material (feels like a suit shirt).

links_reviews_title: Wore under a wool blazer. Comfortable, high quality fabric.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. Nice quality shirt.

links_reviews_title: Fit well. Wore it to work.
links_reviews_text: Needed ironing when I received it.

I felt like a bag of wrinkles all day. I took the time in the morning and steamed this shirt so I would look acceptable in under an hour I was already collecting wrinkles. The fit on this shirt was great, to wear with leggings is super cute and comfy.
Love the idea of this shirt, but was hard to pair with pants. A little too oversized to tuck in, and wearing untucked looks sloppy.

Really didn't know if this would work on my petite/curvy frame but it oddly did. I usually don't like collarless tops on me but the overall cut was nice. Fit me great, and was really comfortable. The material is a bit thick though so it ended up just being too hot for the temps we had during my rental, so I only ended up wearing it once. Will probably rent again in cooler months.
Perfect fit and quality. Wore it with a pair of black suit pants and some heels and it was a great work outfit.

links_reviews_title: Alternative to your basic button down
links_reviews_text: Fits loose but still had structure. The collar was a nice detail. Received compliments on how fancy I looked, styled with black leggings.
Absolutely love this shirt! Perfect for work and everyday. Received a ton of compliments.
Classic shirt that was comfortable and flattering, although ran a bit large and became wrinkled by end of day. Would rent again.

TTS, I wore the Large, because Medium was not available. I think that the Medium would have been a better fit. It is comfortable and professional looking. I wore with black pumps and black skinny slacks. The fit is very square/boxy, and the details on the front mimic a tuxedo type top. I am thinking of buying the medium.
This shirt has the cutest cuffs. They fold up and give it such a cute twist. It has pretty high slits on the side so it feels very feminine. Better quality than most Equipment items I've worn.
Great shirt and got lots of compliments on it however it does run big so I'd order a size down next time.

Love this - instantly dressed up my jeans and top for date night but would also be great for everyday. It was a little snug, if you're on the fence about size I would go up a size. Other than that super comfy and cute!

links_reviews_title: Cute jacket for a winter weekend!
links_reviews_text: Liked this jacket a lot - cute fur detail and the color was nice. I wore it with a thin shirt, but it would have been a challenge to wear with a thick sweater underneath. Decently warm, but better for a mild day
This jacket can be used for daily life or for a dressy occasion. Versatile and fun

links_reviews_title: Great for a cold weather outfit!
links_reviews_text: Loved it!
Loved this jacket- high quality and could be dressed both down & up

This is a really good looking cropped cut, plus the fun flair of the faux fur collar. It's lined but not very heavy - may not work as an winter outer layer in cold climates, but was perfect to wear outside and in the office in San Francisco.
Great jacket, great fit, tons of compliments and it was warm!

I was able to try this on in store so I was able to select the right size, but beware you should size up because it's a short torso. 8 worked well for me. The fur was beautiful & felt like new! Great for a fall east coast vacation!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much that I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Fits great and looks adorable. Very sliming.

links_reviews_title: Quality and comfort and dozens of compliments!!
links_reviews_text: Love Love Love this sooo much I have to buy it!!
i wore a 14 my normal dress size is 8-10 so I'd say it run small but I also like jackets bigger so I can move around easily.
Cute but too small
Great way to dress up an outfit and feel put together. Wore with jeans and it looked super cute
Cute jacket, lots of compliments
This would be good for only someone who has narrow shoulders. I am a true six and it was extremely tight.
I loved the tweed but the fur collar was a little TOO big for my style. Fun to wear as a rental. The garment I received was starting to show its age with some fuzzy tweed.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun piece - loved it!
links_reviews_text: It was very snug and I would order a size up if you have a larger chest. But I wore it with slacks, jeans and over a dress. It went with everything and I got tons of compliments.
This jacket is so lovely! I wore it for family photos.

I loved the jacket's tweed/faux fur combo, however it ran small. I'm usually either 4 or 6; I ordered 6 and it was almost too tight to zip up. Other than that, the jacket is cute and very fun to wear.
This is really the weight of a blazer not a jacket- very trendy & adorable faux fur Moro jacket- thought about buying- great style with jeans or for office - loads of compliments

links_reviews_title: This was a fun jacket, wore a few times.
links_reviews_text: fit well, heavy for indoor wear

links_reviews_title: Fun coat - easy to dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: I decide to size up with this coat and I'm so glad I did. It fits a little tight around the shoulders so I'm glad I got the 12. Such a fun, different look with the fur. It looks cute zipped or unzipped. Adorable dressed up with a skirt or more casual look with jeans

links_reviews_title: Perfect lighter jacket. Super versatile. I dressed it up and down. One of my favorite rentals.
versitile and cool, loved wearing this
links_reviews_text: thinking of buying

links_reviews_title: I loved the fur and plaid. It was super cute for a night out with a nice blouse, jeans and booties.
links_reviews_text: The jacket is great! It was a little tight on the arms and cropped.

Such an adorable jacket but unfortunately I couldn't wear it, it runs very small in the arms and the chest, and specially if you are muscular or broad. I would have needed a 10 (my usual size is a 6).
Really cute jacket that can be dressed up or down. I typically wear a 2 or 4 and the 4 fit perfectly.
True to size, gorgeous jacket. The compliments are endless. Fabric is very luxe and has some give.
It runs small but looks nice.

links_reviews_title: Want to feel cool? Rent this.
links_reviews_text: I had so much confidence, that I strutted when I wore this jacket. I wore it to work, out on the town, a doctor's appointment . . . .I loved it. Wore it once with a skirt, jeans, and black pants since the versatility is great with this piece. The fur made the tweed jacket feel modern and very hip.

I was surprised at how light this was. It's more of a sweater than a jacket. It's very unstructured and not thick. With the fur collar, it's only really appropriate to wear when it's cold out, but the jacket is too lightweight to keep you warm. I sent it back without wearing.
This jacket is beautifully shaped, flattering and on trend. Tweed anchors it in the classic and the faux fur collar is the perfect addition to keep it current. I will definitely re-rent.
Runs small. Beautifully made. A little too heavy to wear indoors Would rent again.
This jacket is fun! A perfect rental- would wear a few times but not buy.

Worn on a quick trip to Miami - was great for by the pool and exploring the city. Although being slightly low cut, it fits really well and the tie makes it very flexible and you can tighten. I would rent again! A lot!
This was an effortless romper and it was so comfy and adorable - I bought it!
I wore this dress my first time in Seaside heights New Jersey and made it casual with sneakers. We spent the day on the pier, and went on the Ferris wheel. Perfect for an easy-going day of fun.

Wore this on a winter trip in Miami and it got so many compliments! It's a beautiful romper - only complaint is it's so hard to get out of when going to the bathroom alone. Otherwise, such a fun piece especially if you're short. Looks good on athletic girls too! (I'm 5'3, 32C, with an athletic build)
So fun and cute. It's a little short but didn't show any ASSets. Got tons of compliments as well!

links_reviews_title: So cute for Vacay or summer!
links_reviews_text: Loved this look! It was a little big for my boobs but I was able to tie it tight so it stayed and fit! Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Made me feel larger in the belly
links_reviews_text: I really thought it would be tighter on my belly, but made it look larger. Love the color and style. Just not for me. Would look better on a different body type maybe.

Very cute and feminine romper. Was a little large though. Super low-cut so I had to keep on looking down to make sure my boob didn't pop out. Also a little loose in the midsection. Would've preferred an extra small. Great quality, was relatively happy with it.

This romper was super cute and very flattering since it looks like a wrap dress in the front, I ate an entire 3-course meal for my birthday and you totally could not tell. The only thing was the straps kept falling down which caused me to flash some unexpecting people, so if you're petite I'd suggest investing in some fashion tape!
Relaxed fit. Great transition piece for the seasons!

So comfy, flattering and STINKING CUTE! Wore around for a day in LA and it was perfect whether at brunch, walking the beach, or stopping for drinks. The fit was perfect! Since it's backless- a stick on bra or no bra is needed. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this! Wish I could buy it.
links_reviews_text: Typically I wear a Med but sized down to a small

Fits true to size. Was perfect for vacation. The material is great, didn't need to steam the fabric after being packed in my suitcase. Went braless with this since the back plunged quite a bit. Effortless, easy, and cute! Will rent again.

I'm 5'9 and usually have a problem with my butt cheeks hanging out of rompers. This one fit well with the exception of the straps being a little loose, I had to put in some effort to make sure they didn't fall down completely for a serious wardrobe malfunction. But, this could probably be fixed with a safety pin or two in the back to shorten them. It runs slightly big, mostly in the top half.
Such a cute skort style romper for a date night or girls night.
super comfy (biggest pro) and lightweight. only (con) was that i had to return it, and sometimes the straps didn't stay up as well, but it wasn't an issue since I could tie the wrap part!
Can be glammed up with heals or dresses down with cute white sneakers

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my friend's wedding shower at a winery.
links_reviews_text: Loved the low back. The tie on the side made it adjustable. It is on the shorter side. I would definitely rent again.

Loved this romper! Very cute and easy to throw on. Can be a little nerve racking because the sleeves are the only thing preventing a wardrobe malfunction since there is no back. I sized down since my normal size wasn't available, and I think my normal size would have been too big.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but wanted to love it more
links_reviews_text: Loved how this romper looked in pictures, which I why I decided to rent it. The front is super cute, but the one big flaw is like a lot of other reviewers said, the straps are very prone to falling down... with the fabric and the way it's made you have to be very careful of this happening to avoid a major wardrobe malfunction. The fluttery cap sleeves kept getting flipped up weird on mine too or getting caught under the elastic part of the strap, so that required a decent amount of adjusting throughout the day. Took some adjusting to tie the wrap piece in a way that still made the top look flattering on me, but once I got it, it looked good and I didn't have to touch that again while I was wearing it. The skirt/shorts are a good length, not too short. Because of the open back you can't wear a regular bra, I opted to wear a bralette, even though that could be seen on the back just because I didn't want to have to really worry if the strap fell down too much. Overall, super cute, lightweight/breathable, and easy to get around in. I'm glad I rented it and got to try it because it is so cute, but probably wouldn't rent again because of how attentive I had to be about the straps all day.
Fit well, comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable, lightweight, easy to adjust.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, true medium. My chest is smaller so gaped a little but easy to adjust with tie front. Very comfortable material, was awesome in hot weather!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an afternoon at the winery!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED THIS! So cute and comfortable. I sized up to XL because I was afraid it would pull across my DDD chest. I ended up having to put a pin in it to keep the girls in! Straps were a little long but I think If I got my normal size it would have been fine. Very true to size. Overall, quick, chic, easy. LOVE.
Super cute and comfy! Great for a hot day! The straps may slip off occasionally so i safety pinned the front closed just to be safe

They only had a medium available so I had to size up. It's super cute but fits very awkwardly/largely on my shoulders and chest. Needed fashion tape for it to stay on. There are some outfits that you can size up, this just isn't one of them.
So perfect! It was the perfect length, super comfy and true to size! I got an XS + it was perfect all around.
This romper is so comfy and beautiful. It's very flattering! Especially the back. I got a lot of compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a bachelorette party night out, it was a little big on me!
links_reviews_text: I loved the romper and would rent again by maybe in a S, instead of a M. I usually order a M and L as a backup but this one was a little baggy and the sleeves were falling down all night. Thank goodness I was around my girl cousins all night to help me keep everything in check up top!

links_reviews_title: Super cute but beware of wardrobe malfunctions
links_reviews_text: This fit very nicely except the cut of the back made the straps fall off often! Definitely make sure to use double sided tape when wearing

The faux wrap style and low back are super pretty. The color is a bit drab, but I paired it with bright accessories, and that worked well. The "great fit" size recommendations for me were both small and medium. I went with the medium, because that's what was available. It worked well, and I think the small may have been too short through the torso (I'm 5'9"), and the length is not adjustable.
Super comfortable & dresses you up
Great fit! A little bit big in the boob area but I am very flat chested.
Very flattering and comfortable - true to size

links_reviews_title: Perfect, easy romper to dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: This was a perfect fit for me and I was able to wear without a bra with no issues.
This is perfect for summer or vacation
I'm 5'4 118lbs 34D and the xs fit perfectly. I wore this around Savannah with jean jacket and vans and it was perfect.
Rented this romper for a weekend in San Diego. Wore it all day to walk around. Super comfortable material, and it does not wrinkle! Fits TTS.

Loved this romper! The back is open and sexy, it's a little short but very flattering, and polka dots and flutter sleeves are to die for! Obsessed! Also, my husband kept complimenting me on it all night too, so you KNOW it's good bc he never comments on what I wear lol. The sizing does run a wee bit big but I don't ever mind having to wear a small. For context, normally a M/4-6/27 jeans . This rental was 10/10, will rent again
the romper fit me perfectly! was super comfortable and stayed in place!
Super cute, just a little large in the chest and there's no way to adjust so the straps kept falling off and I couldn't wear it. I may try again in a S.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and nice shade of red

links_reviews_text: Fit great! Normally a 4/6 but RTR recommended an 8 and I'm glad I went with it. I have slightly wide shoulders and need large enough armpit holes and the 8 fit perfectly. Great quality.
A fun pop of color for two nights out. Very comfortable, cut works best with a strapless bra.
This color is great! Fits as expected, super cute, got lots of compliments.
I wore this to a conference and really liked the way it fell and it layered really well, too. It was really quick to show deodorant, though, so be careful. And requires a t-back bra.

I rented this shirt to wear to the office! The v-neck was perfectly modest, and wasn't too tight around my bust (34DD). The neckline meant I had to wear a strapless bra, but I didn't mind it. The bottom of the shirt was a tad bit tight around my hips, but I wore it tucked in so it didn't bother me at all. The fit was flattering and the color was great!
This is an easy classic rental! Loved the versatility!

links_reviews_title: Versatile shirt with a vibrant color!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to football game and found it to be quite comfortable. I think it's a versatile shirt that could be worn for work, or night out. The scarf is super long and attached, to stave off strangulation I tucked it into the color which worked fine. My rental was quite worn when I received it so I didn't feel bad wearing it to a football game, I imagine it was quite beautiful at one point in its existence.

links_reviews_title: Really cute, loved the red color
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Wear to work or out for a date.
The neck tie is a bit weird and pulls on the collar a bit distorting the line of top both when tied as on the model and just loose. I found best look was treating the tie like a scarf
I rented this top for work and it was the perfect piece for a warm summer day in the Bay Area. Cool sleeveless stylings but sophisticated enough for a day in the office.

Wore to work on a hot NYC summer day. The pits showed a little sweat by the time i got into the office and dried with a bit of a ring under the arm which i didnt Love and usually don't have this issue with chiffon-type shirts. It's lined and looks really smooth on, not clingy. Got lots of compliments on this outfit! Paired with Vince pants also from RTR

links_reviews_title: A true red blouse with a feminine twist
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this top. It was so versatile. I wore it with cropped pants, denim, shorts and under a suit jacket. The front tie can we worn tied or untied. I loved the true red color

links_reviews_title: Vibrant color with cute tie in the front.
links_reviews_text: I wore this under a blazer and it was a great pop of color with a nice tie in front. Also the fit was great.
Wasn’t thrilled- very loose fit and too short to tuck so looked like red bag draped as a shirt. Material is great quality though. Neck tie is very long. Just looked messy on.
It's a very straight cut , making it tight across the bust and waist
perfect

links_reviews_title: A little on the small/short side.
links_reviews_text: The arm holes are very small, and it is a little shorter in the torso so I am returning to size up.

links_reviews_title: Love this - great color, drape, and fabric!
links_reviews_text: Will definitely rent again. Excellent for work.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a Formula 1 race that I attended for work. It was a gorgeous and apropos top.
links_reviews_text: I'm large chested and it was a little tight for me in the chest area and shorter than I expected, but otherwise gorgeous and I would purchase if I could do so in a larger size.

The drape and color are wonderful. I am not particularly oversized up top for my size, and the top was somehow tight and uncomfortable around the arm holes. Also, if you have big hips, the bottom will not hang properly- it will stick at your hips.

links_reviews_title: I wore the shirt for an Ole Miss football game, I'm on the right in the picture!
links_reviews_text: I love how the shirt ties in the front, but I wanted to look a little edgier in this outfit so I ended up tying it in the back and I liked the look! That makes it very versatile. I post all my RTR pieces on my insta: @the_real_lin_shady :)
This is the second time I have rented this top. It is comfortable and stylish. Wore it to work with black skinny pant and black sweater jacket.

links_reviews_title: The red was an eye catcher, without a doubt.
links_reviews_text: The top fit for the most past but the fabric pinched under my arms.
Perfect fit

I loved the top for its length (hip area), the material and color as well as the tie. Sadly, I didn't wear it because with a size 34C chest, I think I was just a bit too big to have it lay right under the armpits and across the V. If I tied it, the chest area bunched halfway up the V.
This top was so pretty. Fit great and could be worn to a party or for work if you put a blazer or sweater with it.
This top was cute and good quality however if you have wide hips and a short torso....its a little snug
Absolutely love this gorgeous top and am going to purchase. Beautiful color, true to size, great quality. A perfect staple piece.

links_reviews_title: Also an item that arrived late.
links_reviews_text: It runs a little small in the arm pit area. But it's really flattering.
perfect
This was a great work top and I received a ton of compliments, mostly for the color. It's a vibrant, rich and true red. Took my boring black pants to the next level.
great color and fit

links_reviews_title: I have slightly bigger arms so it didn't fit comfortably in my armpits

links_reviews_text: Can dress up or dress down. Small in bust for girls with big boobs, make sure you have a razor back bra for best fit.
True to size fit loved color
Pretty top, but was tight in the hips. If you're pear shaped, you might consider sizing up.

links_reviews_title: The color is a perfect red!
links_reviews_text: Simple but flattering blouse.
Great fit and great color!
Wasn't a fan of the feel of the fabric- didn't hang great and ran small.
Great basic faux wrap dress. Fit great, liked that it hit me right below the knees, and the higher neckline is perfect for those of us with larger chests. Perfect for work.
I liked this. Needed spanks because it wasn't terribly forgiving but the cinch across the waist is nice. Long, below knee.

This dress is the perfect length, has a great shape, perfect for work or an occasion. I gave it 4 stars out of 5 because it isn't forgiving. Shapewear is a must with this dress to give you that slim shape. I have a pear shape and I feel it accentuates my hips and stomach more than I'd like. It does give the hourglass look if that's what you are looking for. I would recommend it for the quality, comfort, beautiful fabric and pattern.
Really like this dress. It is comfy and does not wrinkle! I am typically a size 6, and the small was great.
This dress was very easy to wear. I sometimes struggle with the DVF wrap dresses. Great pattern. No spanx. Solid option for work. I drove for six hours it was very comfortable.

Perfect for work - when you want to stand out a bit - has several coworkers tell me I had the Joan from madmen thing going. Loved that this hit right below the knee - covered all problem areas. This is a good DVF dress.
Felt very professional in this dress! The fabric is a little stretchy and comfortable. Small fit me perfectly. The skirt went slightly below my knees, I'm 5'3.

Better in film than in person. I was so thrilled this graphic little faux wrap #dvf. In person the front seam (that ran down the middle of the bodice) was miss paired like wonky wallpaper. Nevertheless, the dress is memorable for film and wears beautifully all day.

links_reviews_title: I love the fit and comfort of this dress so much. It was perfect for work and travel.
links_reviews_text: Lays really comfortably on your body. Beautiful fit in terms of length of skirt and sleeves. I even travelled with it which was fantastic. LOVE it.
DVF has finally made the perfect professional dress for we who don't love a gappy wrap! The feel of this fabric is so silky (oh, it's silk...!), I get caressed all day. Would love to own this!!

links_reviews_title: As worry-free a DVF dress as you can find. Stylish and conservative.
links_reviews_text: This was a nice dress but a little "plain". Fit was great - I sized up and went with a medium and it was comfortably roomy and not overly clingy. Material has some weight to it. I struggle with wrap dresses so this was a nice alternative. Solid 4-stars.

links_reviews_title: Stylish and feminine DVF wrap dress!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a luncheon date. Wore it with a black blazer and black patent leather high heels. Usually a size 12 but the Medium fit well, which was exciting! Felt elegant and sophisticated in the dress but did not have the silky feel that I was expecting. Got lots of compliments from the ladies and even a couple from the men. Would rent again.
This dress is so comfortable and looks great. Couldn't ask for more!

links_reviews_title: Classy, thy name is THIS DRESS
links_reviews_text: Hate to say it but this is soooooo much easier to wear than the iconic, awesome DVF wrap dress. Same thick, breathable, non-wrinkling silk knit, minus the constant fumbling with a plunging neckline. LOVE the 3/4 sleeves and they are not too tight. Add a bracelet and you are the Boss. Hits mid-knee on me. I am normally a 4-6 and the Small was perfect so I would say it runs a little big. Spanx a must. I wish this dress came in EVERY DVF fabric pattern/color!!!!
The dress was true to size. It was very flattering and comfortable to wear the whole day. I love the length of the dress (slightly below the knees) and the fact that I felt sexy and classy in it.

Very cute dress for warmer weather. Would not be good for winter as the material is pretty thin. Also does not offer much coverage so if you are trying to hide problem areas probably wouldn't work. Overall very happy!
I think I liked this style more than the wrap dress-- and I love DVF wrap dresses! All the comfort of her wrap dresses with no possibility of a wardrobe malfunction.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and surprisingly flattering for the length
links_reviews_text: I was unsure if this longer style would work for someone on the shorter/curvier side, but I was pleasantly surprised! The material is soft and the dress was very comfortable. I wore it to work and a dinner date after, but I didn't feel as sexy as I do in other DVF dresses. Didn't love the pattern either.
This dress fit like a glove. This is my first time wearing a DV wrap dress. Now I know why her dresses are iconic. I received a ton of compliments on this dress and I am eager to try another one.

Wore for a work conference - comfortable material with give (would have fit me if I was slightly bigger or slightly smaller). Able to wear a regular bra. I'm short (5'4) and it was a little longer then I thought it would be hitting right below my knee. Not unflattering by any means - but also not terribly flattering.

A lovely dress, lots of compliments... what kept it from perfection was the tendency of the bodice center seam to shift to the side (my work wife told me to get over it, loves it and insists that I rent it again!)
Nice work dress. Interesting pattern and nice soft fabric. The tie was at a bit of a weird angle but I made it work.
I liked the high neck line, the high waist tie was very flattering. The fabric is light and comfortable. Can be styled with lots of different bold jewelry.
Cute. Comfortable. Fit true to size with a tiny bit of stretch in case you're curvy. Plenty long and conservative enough for work without looking frumpy.

I loved this dress for work. I'm 5'6" and 159lbs. The large was perfect. I liked the unique structure of the dress for work. A fun choice. The shoulders are pulled a little bit from the hanger, but not too noticeable.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress, I received tons of compliments even hubby loved it!
links_reviews_text: Excellent fit and great style! Conservative and fashionable!
Love the dress style and the fabric but a bit too long for my 5"3 height.
This fabric is a thin and clingy knit, and also see through. I would strongly recommend wearing Spanx or something similar unless you have absolutely no figure flaws and nothing to hide.
I loved this dress so much I’m buying it!
comfy, stylish and functional for a variety of settings!
Didn't like how the center seem pulled to the side when you tied the wrap at any reasonable tightness. Covered it with a scarf to try to ignore it. Liked the weight of the fabric and the pattern.
This dress was cute and I wanted to love it, it just sat funny on my body.
A little tight.
Great fit on me. Easy to wear - no bunching or pulling. A good, comfortable work dress.
Wore for a conference. Great dress, fits really well.

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite DVF dress, but it was comfortable for a day of meetings and full coverage up top.
links_reviews_text: It just seemed a little plain and I don't think it's great if you have a large chest, I think it made them look bigger.
Wore this to a work meeting. I felt professional but still young. I would rent again.

This is a comfortable nice dress for work. It looks professional and isn't too tight or low cut for the office. Not the most exciting dress I've rented or worn, but it's nice to be able to change things up thanks to unlimited.
Loved this dress

This sweater has a unique design and the material feels really nice. I got a medium because of the crop, but small might have fit better. I felt like it wasn't very flattering, but I still enjoyed wearing it and received complements. A great casual, cold weather sweater.
Fit like a normal sweater, but a little cropped. Loved the color!

links_reviews_title: Love this, want to keep it
links_reviews_text: Such an easy cute cropped top to wear all fall. I want to keep it! It goes great with jeans and sneakers or flats. Very easy to throw on and look put together. Wore it to work, and on the weekends.
Nice, thick sweatshirt material that is cropped just the right amount fitting TTS! Funky pattern goes well with jeans and sneakers for everyday or casual Friday. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Got loads of compliments for this funky sweater
links_reviews_text: I quite liked this sweater, it was funky & fun & I got a lot of compliments from random people every time I wore it. It was nice & thick and warm too. It's not something I would have bought myself but it was fun to wear for a month. My only complaint is that this is a very short sweater. I have a long torso & short legs and so I could only wear this with super high waisted bottoms or with a long shirt underneath (which is what I did most of the time).

Fantastic thickness - wore on a freezing nyc day with no issue. The camel pattern is wonderful & artsy. Fit was baggy on the top & arms but clear that it's the design so not super unflattering. Considering keeping.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun print for a cold day!
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected. Very warm and thick! Received many compliments at work.

links_reviews_title: Easy and stylish update to jeans
links_reviews_text: Definitely a heavy fabric as other have mentioned, but I liked how that made it keep its unique shape. For compliments from my most stylish friends and co workers!

links_reviews_title: Great layering piece for a pop of print
links_reviews_text: This sweater has a structure of its own. It's not really a live-in sweater, but more of a sweater you wear when you want to be comfy but want to let your clothes do all the talking. The shape is pretty round, which can overwhelm a petite person. I rented a medium and layered it under a denim jacket for a sort-or oversized, loosely structured look

links_reviews_title: Definitely a cropped sweater but still cute!
links_reviews_text: Definitely fits like a cropped sweater like everyone says but i made it work!

Cropped enough, but not too much, just enough to not show skin with normal, high waisted pants. Funky design, but goes with most everything. Warm and cozy. Can't say enough good things, wanted to keep!
Compliments on the camel print. Somehow this sweater sealed my "best dressed" title at the school I work for.... yasssss

links_reviews_title: Darling high end sweater. Soft inside, not scratchy or too warm, just perfect.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit, feel and fit. Great length for high waisted jeans without showing skin.

links_reviews_title: Camels, cats and people in barraits?
links_reviews_text: Couldn't quite identify the various shapes in the abstract sweater, but it was cute none-the-less. The marerial is unlike anything i've felt before. It's an elastic-y feel, but mixed with sweater! I'm always freezing cold in my office, but actualy wasn't when I wore this, which is really nice! The length is great, especially with high-waisted jeans. The sleeves were a bit long, but fun sweater overall and I got a lot of compliments.

I ordered the small based on reviews that it runs large. I usually like a medium or a large in sweaters so they aren't tight across my chest. Fit cute. I really liked it and got compliments on the unusual pattern.
I really loved this sweater. The print is so wacky and wonderful. The fabric is heavy, but soft and comfortable. The fit was relaxed but still flattering.
I just love this sweater! I would buy it if I could afford it. I love the design and color. The fit is great and the heavy material is great for winter. Really soft, too!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fall day ! Walking, window shopping, and momofuku !
links_reviews_text: The sweater is beautiful and perfect for a fall day. I'm wearing high waisted jeans, which goes nicely with the cropped sweater.

Such a pretty sweater! I love the colors and the design in the print. I paired this swear with nude heals. The sweater isn't that long, so with your arms raised, your stomach may show. Perfect for fall.
This was a great cropped sweater that was crazy soft! Also, the design was just so different and interesting!

links_reviews_title: Amazing print, lux fabric, runs large
links_reviews_text: This runs large (rare for shrunken sweaters in my experience) so order down. I love the print and rich, heavy material so will try again - maybe even an XS and I usually wear a medium.

This sweater is well-made; great thick material, a flattering cut to show off your waist (or give the look of one if you are squarish like me), and long sleeves for us tall girls...I love it. I want to keep it.

I did not get a good pic of this rental, but it was super cute and on trend. As other reviewers pointed out, it is definitely cropped and short. Great for work from home. Soft, comfy, high quality. I might have kept if it had been longer.
Returned immediately. Too structured. Not comfortable.
This was a little hard to pull of as a 5'10" woman, but the pattern was so much fun.
Medium weight.

Great pattern to spice up the sweater boredom. Made an unexpected chilly day in summer a bit more fun. I sized up so it's not too cropped for work but a more cropped silhouette would have been cute with high waisted jeans on the weekend.

links_reviews_title: Structured fit made it look too big on me.
links_reviews_text: The quality of this item is great, however, I found the fabric to be very stiff. The stiffness created bulk and for this reason the item just wasn't for me and I did not wear it.

links_reviews_title: Versatile, warm and tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a medium, but the small fit great! Wore it several times and loved it! Great conversation starter because everyone loved the camel-looking figure in the middle
It was a bit baggy for my preference, but nice material

links_reviews_title: A little too "Bill Cosby" for me
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to like this sweater but every time I put it on I just couldn't get past the fact that it looked like a sweater straight from the 80's! It's very thick and well made but just wasn't for me.

links_reviews_title: Love this funny little piece! Very bold. Nice compliments.
links_reviews_text: It's a heavy-weight cotton, so prob not great for summer. Perfect for fall and winter. Not itchy.

links_reviews_title: Fun Print! Stiffer knit than expected.
links_reviews_text: This print is fun and funky. I tried to dress it up a bit with a skirt but think it really is better suited with casual pants. The knit is a lot more structured than I expected. I thought it would be more of a soft drape.
The fit is perfectly cropped. I paired with a cotton collared shirt and it was perfect for work with booties.

links_reviews_title: this was bulky and very unflattering. did not wear.
links_reviews_text: Very bulky and cropped - looks more like a sweatshirt than a sweater. I did not wear, very unflattering.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to mix up my sweater collection for winter in SF.
links_reviews_text: I got 3 compliments on this sweater the first day I wore it to work (which is saying something given that my office is only about 10 people). The sweater is relatively warm, fits nicely (I'm short and only wear high waisted pants so I looove tops that are slightly cropped), and looks high-end. I want to buy it but I'm trying to resist.

links_reviews_title: Great print, too cropped for me
links_reviews_text: I love the print, but I felt myself pulling the sweater down the whole time I was wearing it even though I paired with high waisted jeans . I'm short, but maybe my torso is relatively long. The sweater is warm and cozy though, so if you don't mind crop tops, it's a fun rental for cold weather
Overall, it was fine. Great print, but nothing crazy special. I rented a medium, but probably could've went with a small.
The pattern is super cute and fun - perfect for weekend brunch with friends. It's definitely cropped so ideal for high waist jeans.
Fits true to size, but is a cropped type sweater, so if you want something that is like a normal length sweater, this is probably not for you. Loved the weight and softness of the knit.
Gorgeous coat, throw it over anything and you look put together

links_reviews_title: Nancy Drew is on the Case!
links_reviews_text: The frosting on the cake to any Nancy Drew inspired look! The fabric has great texture. The jacket is lined with blue silky fabric, but it's not insulated. Would save this for 45°+ warmer if it's windy.
Wore this all weekend on a trip to Seattle. Perfect medium warmth and true to size. East to layer a sweater with

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this coat!!!! A must rent
links_reviews_text: Fits amazing and fabric is great quality- looks and feels expensive. I wore this so many times, for a formal occasion and just for every day wear with a sweatshirt and leggings. I will rent again!!
