Loved this coat so much, seriously thought of keeping it. Received so many compliments and it went with almost everything. If u want to fit a sweater inside, size up!

I loved this coat! This ran large in my opinion because I was able to wear a large sweater underneath the XS and it didn't look bulky - I would've expected this fit from a sz S. Played well with the Club Monaco quarter zip hoodie. Looked great dressed up or down.
Loved this coat! It can be dressed up or dressed down. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner.
This coat is gorgeous! It came to me brand new with the tags still on and I've worn it every day for two months. I get so many compliments on it.
Very warm and you great for layering

I absolutely love this coat. It is structured but not too firm, and you can't really see in the pictures but there is beautiful dark green and blue detailing in the pattern. I wear it almost everyday to work. LOVE!

This coat was very fun to wear for a few days. I felt like I should be strolling across the quad at Harvard in it. It runs true to size- I had a medium and it was a little big/slouchy, but good for layering a sweater underneath. It is warm, but it does leave a good bit of your chest exposed, so this is better for a crisp fall day than a cold winter one.
Great jacket.

Absolutely love this coat. It's so cute and elevates any outfit. It's got green, dark orange, and purple detailing that you can't really see from the photo online. Definitely recommend this one. I'm 5'4'' and it hits just below my knees.
This coat was great quality and had a very flattering fit!

links_reviews_title: Was oversized but that is what I expected
links_reviews_text: Warm and cozy!
This coat was awesome!! It's really good thick material that doesn't look shabby and the cut is very sharp. I absolutely loved it.

I really like this coat. It's not super high-quality, but if you take it for what it is, you'll be happy. The body is oversized, but it's balanced well by the slimmer and sliiiightly shorter sleeves. The oversized body is purposeful this way, rather than just looking like you are wearing a coat one size too large. Not very warm, but good for short walks and sunny 50 degree days.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a fall trip to Boston.
links_reviews_text: The coat came new with tags and is a surprisingly lovely pattern in person. I was going for an intellectual tweed look for a weekend in Cambridge, MA but I was pleasantly surprised with the colors in the coat. If it weren't so expensive this coat would have been mine forever, I absolutely loved it. Plenty warm with comfortable lining, and a good length!
Great colors but very boxy fit. Going down a size wouldn't help as the arms and shoulders fit well, just the body was very large and boxy. Looks ok opened, but when buttoned just looked huge!
Even though I accidentally got a size large (normally a medium) I absolutely loved this coat and wore it everywhere. Beautifully made and warm enough for the very chilly start we have had in the PNW.
I love the feel and look of this coat. It can be dressed up or down. The color pattern is nice.

I think I liked it. I felt good in it and did get some compliments but when i went back to look at this pic, I feel like I looked like a house- so I sent back when I thought I may even buy it. Oh well. Maybe I'll try again.

Rented this top hoping it would work with RTR Snider Hans pants. It does, a great pairing! This was a big departure style-wise for me which is why I love RTR. Superb fabric, beautifully made, bold yet understated. The body isn't boxy, which is a win in my book, as boxy tops rarely look good on me. Will definitely rent this top again!
It took some maneuvering to figure out the best way to get the neckline to sit well but then it was great! Pairs well with jeans or a skirt.

I wrote another review for the same piece, but wanted to share another photo for reference. If you have any reservations about this piece, just rent it!! I'm only 4'10" and made it work. I'm contemplating purchasing.

links_reviews_title: Cute, unique shirt but not super versatile
links_reviews_text: Liked how unique this shirt was (design and color), but realized once I got it that its difficult to create an outfit around so I could only wear it once. Its fairly short (or at least the size 34 was) so you need bottoms that are high-waisted and because its so flowy/loose I wanted something tight to tuck it into, which left me with only a few options. Overall very cute top, just not the easiest to pair with existing closet. Super comfortable too.
The color is very nice. It's a neutral taupe color. It was just too baggy and made me look shapeless. Wish it would have worked but didn't look right.
Love this shirt!! While it fit a little large, it still looked incredibly elegant, and made me feel like a million bucks.
Elegant draping, great color. Have worn several times. Also love the corresponding Iro dress. Considering buying.
I absolutely love this top. It fits great. It can be worn on any occasion. It hid my post partum belly and my bust. The material is good. No need to iron.
This a cute top to look dressed up and put together. It's a baggy top so it's not the most flattering but it fits the way it should.
Wore to work- very comfortable- tons of compliments from coworkers- would also work for going out with boots etc!

links_reviews_title: Excellent Work Top for Busy NYC Lady!
links_reviews_text: I highly recommend this top! It runs slightly loose so you may want to size down. I wore this top to work in NYC with black skinny jeans and a belt and went out with my girlfriends after work for some drinks. It's a really comfortable, sophisticated, and beautiful blouse and it should be in your closet!
Wore this to work a few times, the unusual neckline is an attention getter Pairs well with skirts and slacks. Received multiple compliments

I was underwhelmed with this top. I sized down per reviews, and it was a little small on the bottom where it hit my hips. It didn't drape as nicely as I had hoped, and I felt like Princess Leia. Because of the large cut almost bat wing sleeves , it was difficult to wear a coat over this--the sleeves would have bunched up inside the coat sleeves. Also, the color is a drab grey. Maybe if I paired it with some wide leg slacks or a pencil skirt it would look ok, but I didn't love it so I sent it back without wearing.
Interesting neck
It's a beautiful too but it was too big for me. The shoulders fell quite wide and overall was too baggy.

links_reviews_title: This shirt is so easy to wear. You put it on and instantly feel glamorous. Tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Although the fit is relaxed, it is so well constructed that someone asked me if the shirt had shoulder pads -it does not.
loved it
This shirt is so comfortable, hides any fluff you may want to camouflage, but looks so chic while doing so. Not a frumpy, oversized pajama look at all. Would definitely consider buying. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this with the Clara Velvet Skirt and it was a hit for a work fundraiser!
links_reviews_text: Fits great and looks lovely with anything that I paired it with. The small opening in the back adds a nice touch to soften all of the layering material around the chest and neck. Its a really pretty blouse!
Perfect fit

links_reviews_title: It's a truly BLAH shirt, does nothing for the figure.
links_reviews_text: True to size. The material is heavy and un-breathable. It's loose and does absolutely nothing for your figuring.
Loved the fabric, the way it draped. Color was wonderful, paired with black. The top was too large for my narrow shoulders, should have sized down.

links_reviews_title: liked more than I thought I would
links_reviews_text: This is a great neutral. Has an interesting cowl neckline and wide sleeves.
Chic and modest - perfect for work. It runs big.
I wanted to love this, but the shoulders were weirdly oversized and made me look frumpy. Might be better for someone with broader shoulders.
The draping, fit, and fabric of this top is so elegant. Beautiful way to add style to an otherwise neutral color. Bought this because I know I will wear it a lot for work.
I wore this to work and found it was great for comfort, while looking pulled together.

The fabric and the way the neck was supposed to casually gather felt really cheap to me. The quality of the stitching in the "V" on the front was not what I would expect from a higher end blouse. I rented to wear to work and I didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Did not like this at all
links_reviews_text: short and wide. SO UGLY on!

I was expecting a roomy fit but there was something too enveloping about this top. The shoulders were too large and it was cut a little too short for my longer torso. The fabric is a beautiful color and substantial. Just didn't work on my frame - didn't wear this one.
Loved the style, comfy, back buttons so cute!

links_reviews_title: Cute but a lot of fabric.
links_reviews_text: Lots of fabric, needs some colorful accessories and streamlined pieces to balance or you could end up looking like a Star Wars character

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous shirt - runs a little loose and sleeve needs hemmed.
links_reviews_text: Super cute shirt for a date! Neckline is really pretty and unique - but the sleeve on one side was completely unhemmed. I had to tuck it under and it kept coming undone all night - annoying. Fit was forgiving and loose - probably could have sized down.
I wore this for a date night and it elevated my attire without feeling too dressed up
Beautiful neckline
Beautiful neckline, but the cut was off. Kind of boxy and baggy through the shoulders. I really wanted this to wear as a neutral, but it just didn't look that great on me.

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite but an interesting look.
links_reviews_text: This fit rather odd and did not give my body any shape. The neckline is insteresting and the color and fabric nice. I wore it once and would probably not rent again. It was just ok.
I love this top! It's so elegant and sophisticated, perfect for work. I want to buy it. Might size down next time and see how that fits before purchasing. Love!

links_reviews_title: Loved This Shirt. Different and classy.
links_reviews_text: No cons. Wore this shirt to work and happy hour.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for France and Ireland in December
links_reviews_text: I loved this coat! It was super warm and kept me dry in the rain. The arms are a little tight so layering was a challenge.
This coat was very stylish and kept me warm during my vacation. Fit and material were great!
Great coat for very cold temperatures. Super comfy and chic. Big enough to wear winter gear under it!

Who knew a thick winter coat could be so stylish?! It was a lifesaver for this Cali girl's trip to New York. Incredibly warm yet form-fitting with great details. I liked the thumb holes so you know no air was coming in!
Warm, great grey color with nice detail. I usually wear a size 10 and wore a large.

links_reviews_title: Great for casual sightseeing on a chilly day
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, was warm on a chilly December day in Chicago. It was a little unflattering (boxy). I prefer a coat to come in at the waist a little, but overall it did the job.

links_reviews_title: Unique coat, perfect for late fall
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments on this coat! The design is awesome and the material is heavy enough for late fall/early winter. The pockets are great and could easily hold my phone and wallet. I wore this everywhere. Highly recommend this piece.
This coat was a great rental to travel somewhere colder. I love the length of it. It looks great and kept me warm.
Warm enough for Chicago winter, comfy energy for every day and got lots of compliments
This jacket is very cute - I didn't get to wear it as it wasn't quite warm enough for the weather, but the fit is great and is very comfortable.
I love all the details: thumb hole, mixed material: quilted and wool. Its very monochromatic.
Loved everything about this jacket. So warm for the cold Iowa winter, stylish, great pockets, hood while keeping your neck warm. Definitely would rent again and recommend.

links_reviews_title: Perfect coat for 30s/40s - pulls an outfit together.
links_reviews_text: Not too bulky, but warm. Detailing is beautiful. Looks expensive
Love this coat. Perfect length and weight for Spring/Fall. The light gray color is casual but style is unique and I love it.

links_reviews_title: Multi media coat great for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: RTR only had a larger size of this coat available so I wore that but it's definitely true to size, so it looked big in me. Loved the thumbholes and mixed materials on this coat. The wool collar chafed uncomfortably on my neck and chin when it was zipped all the way.
This jacket made Chicago in the fall bearable. It was warm, comfortable, and many pockets.

Stylish, comfortable and warm. Was able to wear during a snowstorm and kept warm and dry. It runs a little big but is perfect for having layers underneath. So sad I'm returning this, thinking of buying in the future!
Wore this in Chicago during their coldest winter since 1994! It felt like Bora Bora inside this coat!
Fit was perfect to layer clothes underneath. Very warm in 5 degree weather. Would love to own!
I wore this coat a bunch of times and love the fit, look, feel. It goes with anything, and I get compliments frequently!
I am 5'5, 120 lbs. An extra small fits perfectly. Love that it is an everyday coat with good style.

links_reviews_title: Everyone comments on this coat - I'm going to buy it
links_reviews_text: Fits well, and I can wear it to work. Has interesting details that make it so much more interesting than a puffy coat or a pea coat.
Warm and stylish, really liked it

links_reviews_title: Warm comfy coat that helped me survive the first cold winter days in NY
links_reviews_text: The fit is great -- I'm fairly tall, and the coat came down to almost mid-thigh. It's extremely warm with a huge hood that actually stays on and works as a hood should. If I was in the market for an expensive winter coat I would have bought this in a second. I will likely rent it again over the next few months when the weather gets even colder.

links_reviews_title: Loved this jacket. Super comfortable, warm and fashionable. Got many compliments
links_reviews_text: Loved the jacket- fit true to size. Got several compliments and wore to various occasions including work, football game on weekend, etc.

links_reviews_title: This is a standout. EVERYbody noticed it. It's warm, comfy and modern.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. Felt like an architect designed it.
Maybe I ordered to big of a size, but it was just too big overall
Good for a busy week running to/from work, school events and errands. Wore around the city for a week and it was great for autumn weather, now it's too cold for this coat.

links_reviews_title: Just a bit bulky on top
links_reviews_text: Overall fit really good and very wArm
Great fit and looks very similar to picture. Was very pleased with this rental

links_reviews_title: This cozy hooded jacket was adorable!
links_reviews_text: True to size!
fits snug and tailored - love it
I never wore this dress out of the house, it looked terrible on my hips. I guess I should have known given Victoria Beckham's body... on someone with no hips it might look good.
Fantastic, classic LBD. Fabric drapes beautifully. True to size everywhere except chest was snug on my DD's. Would have been too large everywhere else to go up a size.
Great top for work! I paired with high waisted black jeans. I'm only 5'3", and it's definitely a little low, so I would suggest layering.
Easy to match, arms were a bit tight in the biceps.
Fit nicely. A little snug in the bicep area.

Wore this with a black skirt, perfect for work. Upper arms did have a snug fit like other reviews said but not enough to not make me love wearing this to work. I did add a cami under because the buttons tend to pull at times in the chest.

This is an nice professional top, but there is no "wow" factor. The fabric is quite thin and bra cups are visible in strong light, so I'll need to wear a camisole underneath to work. There's also a few weird places where the fabric bulges along the seam at the top of the shoulder. Not enough to bother me too much though. I'm usually a Medium on top, but the size Small Joie blouse fit me just fine.
Nice little blouse--runs truer to size than typical Joie in my opinion as I think they tend to run large. Great little rental for a casual workday.

The neckline on this was deeper and wider on me than on the model. Between that and how sheer it is it definitely needed a camisole, and it showed more of the camisole than I really wanted for the look I was going for. The sleeves were also much fuller and I really didn't like that, but I wore this under a blazer. The fabric was lightweight enough that I could comfortably roll the sleees up a bit so they didn't show at my cuffs.

links_reviews_title: It is a really cute top
links_reviews_text: Generally flattering fit - however for broader shoulder ladies, may want to size up. I wish I would have done that!
Perfect top for work. Cute and comfy

The buttons are so far apart you can see skin through the gaps. Didn't realize that until I got to work and my colleague kindly pointed out that my boobs were basically out. Ended up securing the gap with a binder clip.
Great top. Looks good with jeans or dress it up. Lightweight fabric. Very thin for winter. Perfect for warm weather. Runs a little smaller.
I rented this for work and it was too low and revealing in the bust. I felt myself pulling it together all day.
Looked great with a pencil skirt
True to size
Lovely but thin fabric - I wore a black tank underneath and it was perfect. it did feel lux. I would have preferred a Medium, but the Large worked under a blazer just fine.

links_reviews_title: Pretty print, but very large and a bit shapeless
links_reviews_text: This just didn't work for me. Looked like a tent untucked, and when tucked into a skirt all the extra material bunched up. Would probably work well for someone taller and less narrow.
Great classy blouse for work
fits true to size
I think it needs one more button at the top, since I had to wear a cami underneath.
Pretty tight fit, the shirt didn't fit me
It's a nice blouse but thin, sort of cheap material. Nothing special.
Tight in busy and baggy through midsection. Long distances between buttons causing it to gape open in places.
I always wear an xs in Joie shirts and I couldn't even get my arms through the holes on this shirt.

links_reviews_title: Went great with my work wardrobe!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit- small fit just right
Fit was too large, material not as nice as expected. Overall an awkward garment.
Great fit and beautiful top. Unfortunately the top button can come unbuttoned so watch out and wear a tank under!

links_reviews_title: Great outfit with black cropped pants.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit.
Loved the print but sleeves were oddly tight at the top. Had to return it.
Gorgeous top, but a bit tight in the shoulders and the bust.
This blouse was too small across the shoulders and upper arms. I wish I could have worn it because the material hung nicely otherwise.
Great proportions v neck but not booby. Would hire again.

links_reviews_title: Had put together a cuuuute outfit w this top but...
links_reviews_text: This shirt is almost perfect. The sleeves fit, the body fits, it's just across the boobs there's a huge problem, namely, button placement. The buttons are located either below the gore of any regular plunge bra, or far above into the décolleté. As a result, it gaps something fierce right across the chest. It's a cute shirt, if you don't have a chest.
Fit perfectly. Looks great for work or just looking more polished. Will def rent again
This beautiful blouse is well-made, and fits true-to-size. It's a fabulous staple piece that will last a long time. Perfect for work, but you can dress it up or down for your needs. Love it !
I wore this under a blazer- easy piece to work into your wardrobe.
Fit was ok. Wished the top was slightly more structured.
Very thin material. Large chest, so unfortunately too tight in the chest area and huge gap in the button area. Otherwise fit was okay everywhere else.
Love the print! Wore it to work and received compliments. This material is polyester not silk like the description says. Regardless, would rent again.
I originally didn't know it had pockets. It's a fun detail on a dress that seems less youthful. But it's a beautiful color with great details. The only weirdness is the darting at the bust.
Gorgeous color, fairly long. Felt frumpy at first but grew to love it. Good if you're looking for a statement color and something comfortable and not wildly form-fitting. It's a LOT of fabric.

links_reviews_title: Super cute ! Great fit and looks very vintage!
links_reviews_text: Flattering cut and love the berry color.

I love conservative dresses with high necklines. Felt super cute wearing this dress to work with tights. Would rent again! Also addicted to this brand given the comfort and classy styles. Lightweight fabric but still felt high quality.
I rented this for a luncheon at work. It was comfortable and I was told it was flattering. Fit is true to size.
I loved the color, and the length. The cut however was strangely clingy around the hips. This meant that I looked very thick in the middle. Went back without wearing.
I normally don't wear dresses this long but this was great for work. I added a belt

When my brother saw me in this, he told me I look like I'm out of the 1800s. I told him fashion always comes back around. I personally liked it and thought it was unique and stylish with the buttons only on one side. I got compliments at work. It's heavier and longer than I expected, but comfortable and stands out. I would rent again for work, especially during winter.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful dress to kick-start fall fashion!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful, the fabric is stretchy, and it has POCKETS! Got tons of compliments all day. The only reason I took off a star is because the fabric collects debris and required constant lint rolling/brushing off throughout the day, which was a bit frustrating. I will absolutely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Wore to work, likes but not love. Fits a lot loose due to stretchy fabric.
links_reviews_text: Loved the shoulder and button details on this dress as well as color and pockets. It ended up being a little big and I should have sized down. I'm a normal 2/4 and could have worn a 0 in this. Not very thick or sturdy fabric so I recommend a sharper or spanx. Overall okay but would not rent again.
This dress is a little on the formal side for a regular work day due to below knee length, but it's pretty and flowing, so very forgiving.
Buttons on the should a nice detail.
The size recommended to me was much too big. Didn't wear. Too bad because the color was beautiful!

The color isn't the best for me but its so pretty I couldn't help but wear it. Very comfortable and stylish. The 10R is a touch big but I'm afraid with a size smaller I would have trouble zipping it up all by myself.
Fit well, I don't love collars, I felt
Great dress for conservative work environment. Paired nicely with black tights.
This dress was perfect for Christmas eve mass and work. It also has pockets! The weight of the fabric is great. I highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Not so flattering, no wow factor
links_reviews_text: Not as great in person, fit well but not flattering as in the photos

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and length. Works for dress or a dinner out
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful. It's a stunning color and runs true to size. The length is absolutely perfect as well! I rented it for work but wore it for Thanksgiving dinner and got tons of compliments.
Received so many compliments. Hit me perfect on all the richter spots, ended up buying it!
This dress is comfy and easy on the eyes! It hugs the curves without being too tight . It's feminine without being too girly and structured without being stuffy! I will definitely rent again!
Fit very well, attractive with nice detail of buttons on shoulder. Flattering.
Fit was great. Pockets are a lovely touch. It was also warm but cool enough for the changing Fall weather. Tons of compliments at work!

links_reviews_title: Cute shoulders; a classy work look
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress twice during my rental period for two work events. I received a lot of compliments from my colleagues. This dress is great for work events because it has pockets so you can keep your phone with you while running around, it's an appropriate length, and the puffy shoulders add a nice touch. The material is also thick so you don't need to worry about anything showing.

I. LOVE. THIS. DRESS. I normally wear a 2 or 4 but they only had a 0 in the store. Given that it's stretchy and has more of a wider cut around the hips I tried on the 0 and it worked! I got so many compliments on it and it looks exactly like the photo.
Absolutely love this dress. It seems like I got a compliment from everyone I passed at work! Considering keeping it because it's so flattering and such a great work staple.
Perfectly TTS, slightly tight around the neck at first but stretched enough to be comfortable within half an hour. Nice material, uncommon but pretty color. Great option for work.
I'm 5'6" and it was a little too long on me, so it looked kind of frumpy. I bet it would look great on someone taller!

links_reviews_title: Excellent for business events! Elegant, but work appropriate.
links_reviews_text: Great for hourglass bodies, the little buttons at the top add a nice elegant touch. Great length mid calf - for shorter folks need to wear heels.

links_reviews_title: Not the most flattering but has potential
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size. I really wanted to love it but I ended up looking like a frumpy version of Serena on Handmaids Tale. The dress is fairly shapeless and unflattering. I returned it without wearing it.
Have rented this one before - love it. Great for work - gorgeous wine coloring. Heavy fabric lays nicely and is very flattering.
Basic and beautiful. Goes with just about everything!

links_reviews_title: Best purse! Classic and goes with every outfit
links_reviews_text: This purse is a great size for daily use! The leather is super soft. It's classic but still trendy! I do not want to send it back.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful bag... too long for petite ladies
links_reviews_text: I wanted to rock the heck out of this bag. It reminded me of a Chanel chevron quilted bag and was so darn cute (especially with the gold chain and the top handle). I'm a petite lady standing at a proud 4'11.. the body strap on the bag was waaaay too long for my petite frame. It made the bag fall almost to my upper thigh which, if you ask me, was pretty comical. I didn't get a chance to wear this for the event I rented it for; however, it is a stunning bag with tons of space inside. Def beautiful
I don't usually use structured bags - but fell in love with this one. Perfect size for my wallet, phone & glasses - great everyday bag!
Love all Tory bags

Love the style, 3 inner compartments and the extra pocket in the back of bag for easy metrocard access. It holds a lot of stuff for a small bag - winter gloves, powerbank / charger, foldable wallet, keys and phone. Highly recommend this beautiful bag! Can dress up or down with it.

links_reviews_title: Super cute cross body, great for daytime to evening. A little small but lots of pockets!
links_reviews_text: Love the detail and leather/chain mix of this purse. Can be used as an evening bag or cross body, perfect for vacation!

I work at the casual office do paired this with black shorts but it could easily be dressed up. Super comfortable. I was worried about the bow because other reviews thought it was overwhelming. I think it's adorable! Will rent again.
I'm definitely not an XL but it seems that these shirts run small. I loved the shoulder detail and easy coloring.
I really liked this top. The fabric is comfortable and the print is cute. It was perfect for the office.

Fit is super large-- I should have gone down a size because the fabric is a stretchy gauzy material and moves with a lot of give. Loved the colors and the layered ruffle that hangs over the side of color down the backside. Super cute. Will rent again but in size down.
I felt like I was wearing a huge fabric brooch on my shoulder. Bright colors, received complements on this shirt

links_reviews_title: A night out with singers that I work with in this comfortable, classic look.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful print with flower like draped ruffle to give a unique flare. Lovely for any occasion depending on if it's combined with relaxed, business casual combination, or dressed up and elegant. Love it!

I am going to give the style, color and pattern an A+ - but the fabric a C. The fabric is a mesh net type fabric, it sort of sticks to itself, just not what I imagined the fabric would be like. Style and fun factor this too definitely has. Size wise I say it runs small. I am wearing the XL and it has a little room, I am a M/L at best. Definitely fun for vacation or a summer night out!

links_reviews_title: There was not event, it was a day time top for me!
links_reviews_text: This top is a hit! I loved it and received many compliments. I wore it 3 times!

The print is gorgeous and will pair well with lots of colors. Loved it with my orange pants! Lots of compliments. Double-layer mesh type fabric provides coverage. Love the ruffle. Runs a bit big but I like that it isn't tightly fitted, and it is a good length. The only down side for me, the high neck and fabric made it a little warm for me...but I'm 52 and entering that time of life where I'm running hot! I also wore it on our hottest day of the summer, so there's that as well. I will definitely rent it again when our temps cool, it will be perfect for fall and spring!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print, nice stretchy fabric, but not my vibe
links_reviews_text: For a Medium, it was pretty loose. I'm 7 months pregnant so I really didn't think it would be big !! It was too big pretty much everywhere. It's really nice fabric and a gorgeous print , but runs large and the ruffle on the neck is a bit extra. I think this would work a lot better on a petit person (not pregnant) and the ruffle might not feel as intense.

links_reviews_title: The side ruffle was subtle but different and gave the shirt an added layer of style.
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments at work- nice appropriate top for summer, not super form fitting which was nice. Put it on backwards initially as I'd never had this type of neckline.

This shirt was beautiful and fit great. The material is really stretchy so easy on and off and really comfortable and flattering. I appreciated that it was also long enough to tuck in and stayed tucked in. I happen to love the ruffle-like embellishment on the right side but might not be for everyone. Overall, incredibly comfortable shirt and thought it was beautiful and eye-catching.
It was bigger than I expected, so size down if you're unsure. Plenty of stretch and would look better if it was more fitted
I was obsessed with the florals on this top. I considered buying it but reminded myself that that would defeat the point of "renting clothing." Such a beautiful top.
Pretty floral with unique side ruffle adds something different to the everyday work wardrobe. Didn't love the synthetic material though.

I really wanted this top so got the Large b/c it was the only size available and still really like it regardless of is being big. However, it is not that big for being a Large so I'd go with a medium next time for a comfortable fit or small for a more skin-tight fit. There is a lot of stretch as it is a netting material. FYI the skirt of the same print is a different silk material but I still loved the look together.

I liked this top, but didn't love it. I wish it didn't have the ruffle detail on the front. The material is really cool—it's almost a gauze/mesh fabric but it's double-layered so it's not see-through. I wore it with black pants to work, but could be cute with black jeans and heels for a night out too.

links_reviews_title: Pretty floral top for black pants
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fuzzi top that runs unusually large for the brand. Great for work with black pants

links_reviews_title: Fun colors, kinda weird neckline/closure and big ruffle!
links_reviews_text: I got a few compliments at work on the bright, vibrant florals. It's the perfect fashion print for this part of "Spring." The neckline was a bit funky, and the shirt felt a bit heavy from the ruffles on one side, as if I were being weighed down. But I would wear it again! It looked great styled with high waisted white culottes for a vacation look, although I wore it with jeans and a blazer, and again with jeans and a sweater.

links_reviews_title: Great work top with dramatic flair
links_reviews_text: Rented this top for work. It's made of a mesh stretchy fabric, like WestonWear and Sweet Pea. It felt a tad bit stretched out--this type of fabric tends to need a good wash to shrink back after wear--but was still flattering. Cap sleeves were nice if you don't love your shoulders. Although the fabric is stretchy and drapes, it isn't too thin. It has a higher neckline with a tie in the back and a dramatic ruffle on one side/shoulder. Worked well for me, but might be challenging for someone super busty. I wore with skinny black pants and black booties + loved!

links_reviews_title: Perfectly fine, but not for me
links_reviews_text: I hadn't rented this brand before so I got the XL to make sure it fit. It was definitely large and then some, since it's so stretchy. Unfortunately this made it look matronly on me. Perhaps it would look better on someone a little older? The ruffle was unnecessary and the tie back wasn't dramatic enough to show off. Pretty flowers, but that's all.
Great top for work or regular life :) Had to wear a sweater with it since it is winter but still looked good. The flounce is pretty flouncy but does not look ridiculous. Standard fit.
Fit was a little off... but I made it work. The neckline puckered in the back when tied. Chest and armholes were a bit large, even for me and I'm a 32D. Overall, cute top.
Lots of compliments.
Fits loose, but not baggy. Again, very flattering

Loved wearing this under a blazer and letting the collar flair pour over. It was a really fun piece to liven up a winter work wardrobe. The fit was slim and a bit short, but I also have a longer torso. True to size and very comfortable.
I found it to be flattering to my shape
Paired well with pair of black pants for work
I wore for work and a girls night. It is a bit sheer so needed a cami underneath. Stretchy material made it comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous blouse to give an outfit a stylish upgrade
links_reviews_text: Love this blouse! Fun pattern, easy fit and doesn't wrinkle. Great for packing/travel. Wore with jeans, boots and a leather jacket.
Bizarre mesh fabric that was uncomfortable. Shape was completely boxy and too long on the torso.
fabric kind of itchy. wore on a hot day and it was not comfortable
Super professional, classy, comfortable and stylish. Wanted to buy, but it was still slightly pricey. You won't regret renting this!

I liked the pattern and general shape/fit of the shirt - sized as expected. The fabric felt a bit cheap - sort of like mesh spandex. Definitely not breathable. Probably would have given it a try, but the oversized floppy ruffle on the shoulder was a bit over the top. Not for me.

links_reviews_title: The fabric and fit of the shirt was amazing.
links_reviews_text: Went perfect with black pants!

Pretty shirt with striking pattern. The fullness of the side ruffle just made me look larger and fuller on one side resulting in appearing not attractive on me. I have a full bust so on some body types it may be just right.

I loved the shoulder detail on this shirt the moment I saw it. It's such a cute work top to spice up regular slacks or basic skirt. And it was nice surprise when it arrived to find its not a terrible chiffon or silk fabric because sometimes chiffon material easily gets smelly in the summer and silk is just too risky for sweat stains. This shirt is a different stretchy cotton material on top and a bottom layer of cotton so it's breathable and comfortable. I would order again.

links_reviews_title: Not what I expected, but flattering
links_reviews_text: When I pulled this out of the garment bag, I was surprised. The fabric is like a mesh knit. At first, I hated it. But, I put the top on, and it's super flattering. The mesh drapes nicely, and you actually can't even tell it's mesh because of the print. It's also got a little cap sleeve, which is nice if you have flabby arms like me.
Fit Tts. Its stretchy but very comfortable. Got tons of compliments! Would love to own.

links_reviews_title: I wore this shirt to work and was surprised at how much I liked it.
links_reviews_text: This shirt goes great with a black pencil skirt. I couldn't tell that there were ruffles on the left side of the shirt from the photos and thought I wasn't going to like it. After trying it on, I'm glad I rented this piece. The material was light and comfy.

links_reviews_title: Good in between from winter to spring
links_reviews_text: 20 weeks when I wore this. Thick material was perfect to wear in February. I appreciated the length and that it actually came past my knees. Material was stretchy, but held its shape very well. I've rented this multiple times throughout my pregnancy
It was cute, not really special. Needed spanx.
This is a nice thick sweater dress and perfect for a cool weather we have been having!
For as warm and comfortable as this sweater dress felt, it certainly looked very cute on! Loved it!
Super thick, comfy, cozy dress. I found it flattering. Many compliments at work!

links_reviews_title: VERY Warm, 3/4 sleeve length, stretchy, lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The first stranger to see me in this dress GASPED and proceeded to compliment me. Gots lots of compliments at work. The sleeves are slightly longer than 3/4ths length in my 5'5" frame. Hugs curves and has some slight extra room thru the waist. I wore shape-wear underneath but I don't think you need it because the fabric is thick, very soft, and stretchy. I wore this on a cold rainy day in December in Texas- High 47 / Low 37 and it was perfect for the weather or colder temps.

I'm always skeptical about sweater dresses, but this one does the job. The length and thickness is great and will keep you warm! Material is a little itchy, but not too bad. Hugs your behind a little, but not bodycon like other sweater dresses I've warn. Definitely casual.

links_reviews_title: I felt comfortable and confident in this dress.
links_reviews_text: The fabric of this dress is a thick, springy knit. Not too hot and still fairly modest even though is skims the curves.

I did really like this dress - comfy (not itchy) and flattering, not too tight or clingy. The only reason I didn't give 5 starts is because it's LONG. I'm 5' 4" and I got a little lost in it (it hit me more mid-shin than right below the knee).

I rented this without any expectations, and I really did love it! I wore it at 7 months pregnant and it was very comfortable and warm, while still being breathable. The pattern was more holiday in person, which made it fun for the week after Thanksgiving.
The arms were a little small and it was snug around the tummy, but very cute.
Made for someone much much taller than me. Length of the dress hit low calf, couldn't pull off even with the highest heels. Thick fabric. Returned immediately.

links_reviews_title: A little bodycon but very cute
links_reviews_text: Very cute sweater dress but pretty bodycon. Not bulky! I seized up based on the way it fit on the model and I'm glad I did. The print is very cute. Not itchy at all also!

Felt fantastic in this dress! It's way thicker than I expected but in a good way. It's a true cold weather dress that's form fitted and sexy which is so rare in a winter dress . Perfect for planned trip to NYC.

Super flattering pants! I wore these pants for Valentine's Day Date with my husband and 10 mos old son. These were a hit with the hubs!!! The perfect combination of classy-sexy-comfy, which is a check mate in my book!! They may be a bit long for some people, but for me it was the perfect length for a wide-leg pant. I would definitely rent again!

Love these pants. I wanted to wear something different than a dress or skirt to an engagement party where the attire was dressy casual. The pants are a bit long, but with 3 inch heels they hit just right. They are also high waisted which is flattering. I think the pants would also work well for work related events.

I love red pants and these didn't disappoint. I wore once to work and was comfy all day. They were quite long, I am tall and still had to wear a heel to keep the hem high enough off of the ground. The color is great and the fabric is very flattering. I would definitely recommend. Check out all of my rentals on my YouTube Channel. I also talk about RTR tips and tricks. Channel Name: Pointe Boutique

These were so much fun to wear to work. I sit all day at a desk so they were very comfortable and held up to wrinkles well. I'm 5'8" and I wore these with 1" loafer and the length was so perfect. I have long legs and a long torso, the waist on these came up above my belly button. I'd def rent these again in winter.

If these pants were a half inch longer, I would have bought them. They run a little large in the waist, and have stretch to them, so don't be afraid to size down if you're in between sizes. They are super comfortable and the wide leg is so on trend!
Love the very high waist, comfortable

links_reviews_title: Fun. Easy to dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: A little long to wear with flats or sneakers.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and the best fit for my tall frame
links_reviews_text: These pants fit like a dream. I would definitely consider buying them. I am 5'7.5" and these pants were great with a 3" heel for work. The red was so vibrant and the pants have enough stretch to make them super flattering, yet the seams make them very professional and polished-looking. I got compliments all day!
This was part of my first order from RTR and I absolutely loved it! It was the right amount of fit at the waist and cradled my hips. I plan on ordering it again for a work Christmas party!

No stretch in the high waist, very true to size. If in between sizes in the waist, go up. A great wide leg, does not wrinkle, really good if you have long legs (I have a 33inch inseam and these were perfect with flats). Wish I could keep.
I'm 5'6" and these were much too long. Otherwise, would have been nice.

links_reviews_title: LOVED THESE!! WILL RENT AGAIN, I am 5"8 loved these Classy with a bit of SASS
links_reviews_text: I am 5"8 and were still long with my heels perfect where the toes just peeped out... Wears nice and did not wrinkle horrible sitting :) loved

links_reviews_title: Got a ton of compliments, not a 'red' fan, but these are fabulous!
links_reviews_text: A little high waist - but very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: The best wide leg pants in the best color
links_reviews_text: I loved these. I was hesitant to rent because of differing reviews, but I’m 5’6”, 145lbs athletic build with a bit of a booty, typically wear a 28/6 in jeans and had zero issues with these pants. I wore a pretty standard heel, probably 3”. They fit like a dream and the bold color was so fun. Will absolutely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Had a special event that I needed red pants for; a color I rarely wear so RTR was perfect idea.
links_reviews_text: These were REALLY long for a 5/2" woman. Not even 3 inch heals could save me.
Loved these pants
They weren't a good fit for curves

I really wanted to like these pants, but I ended up not wearing them. Despite reading all the reviews, I found them to be way too short, even for flats. They ended up looking frumpy rather than fashionable.

The high waist of these pants is extremely flattering. The flare does not start until the widest part of your hips, so it still shows some (appropriate) booty definition. The stretch is great. The pants are very long-- I'm 5'7 and wear 4 in heels. The pants don't touch the ground with heels on, but they're close. Great for taller girls, but anyone much shorter than me might have a problem with the length. I wore these to work with a black sleeveless turtleneck similar to what the model is wearing. I had a black blazer to cover up walking around my fairly conservative office. Will probably rent these again. True to size & a fun statement piece for a girl whose closet is all neutrals.
Great color and flare…really pops with a neutral top color

links_reviews_title: Way too long. I wanted to wear but the length was just too long.
links_reviews_text: True to size, but super long for a 5'3 person when with stilettos. I did not wear because of this.
They fit true to size. They do have a higher waist.

links_reviews_title: fit in the waist but was 12 inches two long.
links_reviews_text: I ' m 5'2 and these pants were 12 inches too long. Could not wear

links_reviews_title: Way too long even with heels
links_reviews_text: Pretty too long
Amazing fit. A little long but got away with high shoes. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Nice fit, but way too long!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7 and the pants are just too long! Unless you're going to wear a super high heel, they will drag. I want to wear them and may use hem tape as a temporary fix. The rest of the fit and fabric are beautiful. Just wish they were shorter.

links_reviews_title: Great fabric and color but very long
links_reviews_text: Loved the red but didn't wear due to being snug around the waist. Even if that had worked, these were far too long for me.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful! But only if you're tall
links_reviews_text: Had to exchange without wearing, sadly. These pants are GORGEOUS and I loved them and felt great in them, but at 5'3", even in my tallest (5") heels, they were dragging the ground. Rather than risk destroying them, I exchanged them. Would only recommend these if you're 5'6" or above and plan to wear heels. Wish there was a petite offering in these! They're just so beautiful and fit great in every other way.
These pants are the reason I use RTR. They are awesome but they are something that I would only wear a few times. High waisted with little give.

links_reviews_title: so many compliments! felt great on
links_reviews_text: these FIT. they are a little snug; I didn't have any extra wiggle room. they felt great, though. i have long legs, so i wore them with boots and they looked good.

These pants are perfect for unlimited. Too much to buy them but so fun to wear . Tons of compliments. Paired with a tighter top each time. Was bummed when the bottom hem came out and I had to send back earlier than I hoped! Tight in the belly area. For tall girls!

links_reviews_title: Great bold pants! Not too long
links_reviews_text: I rented these hoping they would be long enough after reading review after review about how these are way too long. I am 5'7 and they were just barely long enough in flats. To be fair, I do have long legs and a shorter torso, but given all of the reviews to the contrary, I was hoping I could at least wear these with a heeled boot but nope - only flats. I also had no problems with the waist which others have complained about. They are great pants, great quality, some stretch, bold color. I am happy I rented, but am still on the search for pants that are actually long enough to wear with any form of heel!

links_reviews_title: Waist is super small. Legs are super long.
links_reviews_text: Waist is super small. Legs are super long. I didn't wear them.
A little short for me - 5'11. Fit wasn't right around hips

links_reviews_title: Great fit. Compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: I wore these for my work holiday party. Paired them with a subtly shimmery black long-sleeve bodysuit. I'm 5'9 and the length was perfect. I ended up wearing flats because I thought it looked better with the length. Super comfortable. I highly considered purchasing these!!

links_reviews_title: Totally Impractical for even a 5-inch Heel!!
links_reviews_text: These pants fit well in the waist but the length is more so for a 6-ft woman!! I am 5'6" and even my highest heels had these pants dragging across the floor. So much extra material. And a total waste of one of my 4 rentals. I am so bummed.

The style is so cool. I'm 5'7" and usually a size zero/small/extra small or even medium if I want a style to be baggy. I rented it in 2R because the 0R wasn't available and the style looked so cool. WAY too big. Couldn't even wear once.
These make you look like you're a toy soldier from the Rockettes show. Not a good look. Very long (and I'm 5'9")and you look like you're wearing stilts with the wide leg. Disappointed.
Too long even for a 5'7 with 3 inch heels

links_reviews_title: very flattering - felt like a boss!
links_reviews_text: The perfect rental - who wants to buy bright red pants? Red pants the type of thing that you can get away with wearing maybe once a month. These are lovely, well cut (if you like a pretty high waist and a very wide leg), but they do run large. I usually wear a six, but I think I could have easily worn the four. I wore the six anyway because a little big is fine for work.

links_reviews_title: they fit nicely in the waste
links_reviews_text: that's all really.
#relaxed. Comfy relaxed Jean fit.
These were nice. The fit wasn't too snug and they are comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Fit well in the waist but the legs were too baggy. Looked like mom jeans.
links_reviews_text: MoM jeans
Ended up sending these back without wearing. Fit was fine but didn't love where they cut on my leg. Looked awkward, not like a crop but a high water.

links_reviews_title: A little chunky, not particularly slimming
links_reviews_text: These were incredibly comfortable but I felt like the cut was not slipping and drew attention to my stomach-in act making it look a lot larger than it was.

links_reviews_title: Very cute and casual, had a nice deep-black.
links_reviews_text: The jeans run quite large, and the leg length is a little awkward. Not a high crop, but definitely clears the shoe line. A classic boyfriend fit

links_reviews_title: Super sporty shorts for a unique golf day outing!!
links_reviews_text: These shorts are super cute, flattering and just fun to wear!!! They can be styled so many different ways, I loved the boxer feel and gold stripe down the side!! Rented them for vacation, but I'll definitely be renting again for summer fun!!

Easy to wear and modest length. I'm not typically a fan of elastic waist bands because I think they make me look larger in the waist than in real life. Loved the pattern, pockets and how soft the material is too. Wasn't crazy over these though.

Fit was true to size. Hi-waisted and there is stretch to the waist making it very comfortable to wear. Wore out with friends, to work, and to the beach. Pattern is great in person. So many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Wore these for vacation and the were perfect for pool days.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, love the silky fabric that makes them somehow casual and fancy at the same time.

Super cute silk shorts. Has a drawstring & pockets. #winning True to size. Order by letter and not by number. I'm normally a sz 10-12 so I ordered an XL. But I'm normally a sz L and not XL. The XL was a bit large but I made it work for vacation. These shorts are also on trend with stripes on side. Must rent!
I ordered these for a trip to Mexico. They were a little too long and not flattering. Returned without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Great for throw on and go
links_reviews_text: Rented these shirts for game day and they are very comfortable and cool in this Alabama heat. They're perfect for every day wear. Will purchase!
Liked but did not love. These shorts were cute and comfortable, but I felt a little bit too much like a boxer.
It can be dressed up or down.
All the sizes were unavailable so I took a chance that it might run small and ordered the XL. Way too big, if anything they run on the big side. Will try to get in M. Elastic waist, great pattern.
Comfortable, loose fit. Hit me at my waist, very comfortable.
I didn't love the stripe down the side. It made the shorts look sporty when I was going for more casual chic. But still a cut pair of shorts and the colors really pop.

links_reviews_title: So cute! Looks like men's bathing suit shorts and I mean that in the best way!
links_reviews_text: Super cute and comfortable. It has side pockets and fake back pockets. I adore them!
Very cute colors and a great fit. Loved the retro vibes
Loved the colors and fit, took one star off because it was pretty worn out - lots of pilling
Great unique cardigan! The colors were really fun. The fit is boxy as other reviewers note but I still found it to be flattering. It is pretty warm so I would suggest renting it for colder weather.

links_reviews_title: Too bad about the hole it arrived with.
links_reviews_text: Love the sweater. Sleeves are bracelet length, not full length. Overall length on the short side, best over a longer tee/tank. Colors are great. Spring-weight warmth level. I might send back this damaged version for the next size up to see how a more oversized fit looks.
Great colors. Nice to change up my black slacks, black shirt go-tos.

links_reviews_title: Cute and bright sweater, somewhat odd cut.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were a bit short on this and the cut boxy, but overall it was fun to wear. Worked well casually thrown over a tank top with jeans. I wouldn't say it's particularly warm, and the fabric is a little scratchy. I would probably rent it again for everyday wear.
So many compliments, fit well, bright colors, overall awesome!
Great fit, not too short wore with white oversized button down, black cropped jeans, red patent Prada belt with silver buckle and black studded booties.

This cardigan has a boxy fit, but still has a nice look, true to size, and a great splash of color. The material is thick and warm, but very itchy. I wore a long sleeved shirt underneath which took care of the itch.
I had so much fun with this. Wore it to work with a skirt and on weekends with spanx leather leggings. Adds fun pop of color to any outfit. Runs big.
Love the colors on this and there are a million ways to wear it. Definitely has a boxier fit, so size down if you want less of that.

links_reviews_title: Fun sweater with a weird fit
links_reviews_text: This was as cute and colorful as the pictures depicted, but I found its short and baggy combo a bit hard to style into an outfit. Would've like it more if it was super oversized but definitely a statement piece!

I was on the fence about this piece for mobths, not sure if it was either super cool or super ugly. I finally bit the bullet and rented it, and I'm SO glad I did! It has a very vintage look to it, which makes the crazy color combo palatable. Unlike the photo of the model, I found this to have 3/4 length sleeves, so I guess it fits smaller than expected. All in all, a great rental when paired with an Anine Bing silk cami and Rag & Bone skinnies!

Loved the boxy, boyish cut and bold color on this. It's way brighter than my usual black, gray, navy and cream sweaters but it somehow didn't feel clownish. I wore it with super skinny olive jeans and sneakers one day and went full menswear another with these wide, slouchy navy pants. Felt really fun both ways!
This is the perfect casual work day look, makes a jeans day pop! Super comfy and noticeable and i love the colors. Vertical lines are the best!!
Loved the look and the fit, it was very warm though and was slightly too small. Should have got the larger size.

links_reviews_title: Great for everyday. warm without being heavy.
links_reviews_text: Kind of a boxy fit. The colors were lively and exactly what I was looking for to spice up a winter day.
Wore for work and it has a preppy vibe. Loved it and it fit true to size...will rent again!
I wore this to work a couple times. It's a comfy easy piece. Not particularly flattering but not unflattering. Kinda preppy nerdy vibe which I dug.
Fits true to size. Cute w jeans and boots for brunch

links_reviews_title: Loved the style, just not meant to be
links_reviews_text: Fun way to add some color to my fall wardrobe. Yet every time I went to wear it something held me back. I realized it was pilled/overworn, so I didn't feel great in it. I ended up returning it without wearing it. Might try again for a newer version.

Wore this on a cool spring day like a jacket of a T-shirt. It was very comfortable and worked well for what I needed. Lots of color so works over many T-shirt's. I wore it with navy one day and gray another. I was on vacation.
True to size, looks nice with jeans.

The fit is easy- a little boxy. I found the sweater a little short in the sleeves and length in general. Worked for me with high waisted pants and a navy shirt. Loved wearing it and got lots of compliments.
Used on the daily

I knew that when I rented this, it would be a stretch for styles I normally like. The colors are pretty, but the cut is definitely a little more "grandpa" than I normally like. It was hard to make it feminine enough for my taste. It was also not an ideal fabric. Would probably be great for other styles.
Great cardi. Fun and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Great color scheme. It matches everything.
links_reviews_text: Great lightweight cardigan.

links_reviews_title: The only way to wear a cardigan.
links_reviews_text: Opted to pair with a simple necklace and jeans. The neckline was low enough to feel ultra feminine but not too low to make a cami necessary. This is a must rent.

links_reviews_title: Loved the pattern, didn't love the fit
links_reviews_text: I loved, loved, loved the pattern of this cardigan. The colors are rich but not loud and it's an interesting take on what can be a boring piece. But the torso was very square and somewhat large and the sweater as a whole was kind of short (in the front in particular). I probably wouldn't rent it again but I liked it while I had it.

I've worn this a few times since it arrived. It worked for work with jeans (I work in a casual industry) and with a lowcut top under for a dinner out with friends. It's very cute but nothing particularly special.

links_reviews_title: Fun and cute and would definitely rent again!
links_reviews_text: Loved it. Has a fun collegiate feel. Feels well-made.
Great colors and easy to dress up or down for work or everyday.
It hits kind of high on your hip and the sweater is a bit itchy.
I guess i just assumed it was going to be slightly oversized or boyfriend fit, based on the model pics. It was short on my arms and just did meet the top of hi-rise jeans

links_reviews_title: Liked the colors but shape was meh
links_reviews_text: I knew going in that I might not find this sweater very exciting but I love The Great, so I ordered it anyway. Wore it a few times but wasn't super exciting to me. The colors are fun but the shape and fit just wasn't flattering.
I love the colors! The wool blend is very warm for how thin this cardigan is. It does have a baggy feel, but without it feeling like it's eating you! If you are a petite frame, I suggest a size 0
Great weight for office. Not too warm for indoors.

I thought this sweater was cute, and it is, but not really my style. I wore it to work a couple of times - it's wool so it's nice and warm. I recommend it if you like stripes - personally I'm more of a solids. It's a tad masculine, but okay with jeans.

It fit fine, it felt fine, it was fine. But it really didn't do anything for my figure. I felt like zipping it up was too stiff and leaving it open gave me no silhouette. Probably needs the right outfit to really shine.
This added a great dimension to my work wardrobe. It's too unique to wear frequently, so it's a great one to put in the Unlimited rotation. Loved it and would for sure rent again.

There's cropped and then there's ridiculous Yes I have a long torso but this was super cropped Maybe someone short waisted and shorter Arms were short too Other than that great jacket lol Pretty warm good for high 50s

links_reviews_title: Cute jacket. Runs a bit small.
links_reviews_text: Got this for casual fall Friday's. Super cute although runs a bit small. Works well with light shirt underneath.
Professional but with an edge. A great jacket. A bit tight throughout the shoulders/back but tight fit was more flattering as it is a bit of a boxy cut.

Fun take on the crop moto jacket. Warm and comfy, but a bit snug in the arms. I wore a thin black turtleneck underneath (with high waisted black work pants. Probably couldn't get anything thicker under it. Professional enough for a work event. Tweed has a tiny bit of sparkly silver thread in it; fabric is slightly prone to snagging.
This jacket was super cute on, loved the cut and the fabric. The sleeves were maybe just a little short, but not too noticeable.
I should have gone with the XS for this, but read other reviews that said it was tight. I may rent again in a different size because it's a really cute jacket.
Adorable blazer for work! Tweed pattern was fun and got tons of compliments on it for work. It did run a little big and I have fairly broad shoulders.

I love this sophisticated jacket by Cupcakes and Cashmere! It runs true to size so we suggest sizing up for your back up. This style is fitted at the waist but is very comfortable. Its great for any cup size and can be worn with a standard bra. Pair with black boots to complete this look.
It was perfect for a casual Saturday. Felt a little boxy but loved it unzipped!

links_reviews_title: Rented a number of pieces through the RTR update subscription for a November NYC trip!
links_reviews_text: Expensive looking, blk/wht Tweed type jacket was great for grabbing and throwing on to keep me warm in NYC on a Nov trip. Wore out for our Broadway and a nice dinner in SOHO. Pretty true to size. Does cut short on waist but that is the style. I'd own this if I could afford it ;)
It's extremely fitted and short fit. I'm 5'6.5" and it's was a mid-drift on me. It's also short in the arms.

This jacket was PERFECT for my birthday dinner! The cropped fit pairs well with high waist jeans and booties. I got numerous compliments, specifically "ooh that looks expensive!" This is a fab winter rental. I would rent again!

As other reviews mentioned, the jacket really is quite short. I paired it with a high waisted pencil skirt. I wore this to a work meeting and felt very confident. It is lined with a soft material and fit my medium width shoulders great.
I rented this for an everyday jacket. I ended it wearing it to work with black pants, with jeans, and even a night out. Good tweed material, and looked great kept open or even zipped up.

links_reviews_title: Dress it up, dress it down. So versatile!
links_reviews_text: Quality jacket that fits well and will go with jeans or pants. Possible even with a LBD.
This cute casual jacket was a little short but good for work or a night out. Will probably wear twice before returning! Very nice piece. Fits well
This is a thick jacket! Well structured. Kinda fuzzy. Fit well. Worked for a professional event and beers after. Sleeves snag on jewelry- so watch that!

I prefer my cropped jackets to be fitted to prevent it from making me look wider than I am. I'm a size 2/4 and chose an XS to get a more fitted look. It was a little tight in the shoulders and elbows, but fit well in the body. Note that I don't have a large chest. It's overall true to size so sizing down won't work for everyone.

links_reviews_title: Nice touch to my work wardrobe!
links_reviews_text: This piece was nice as a last minute add to my work wardrobe, I found it add some style to a breakfast event I was attending. I felt it ran a little small for it's size, but that may be because I usually wear less fitted jackets (this was also my first time wearing a cut in this style).
Way too small.
The arms fit fine, but the back was right where I couldn't raise my arms much. I feel like because I'm slightly broad it didn't work, but it's definitely a really nice jacket!
Didn't match with anything really so although it was cute I could only wear it once with a really simple outfit.
I love this blazer - it's not too boxy and goes great with black skinny pants for work or with jeans.

links_reviews_title: Great for work - needed something fun but professional.

links_reviews_text: I love this jacket. I saw what other people were writing about it being very cropped and I could definitely see that being an issue for people with longer torsos. Just keep that in mind if you're considering renting it! Otherwise, super versatile. I wore it to work with black pants and then I wore it out to dinner and drinks with black jeans and/or blue jeans and boots.
The fabric is heavier than I expected and looks out of place for the summer or warmer weather. May rent again in fall.

links_reviews_title: Runs small with no stretch - size up!
links_reviews_text: For, but was so tight in the arms I ended up returning without wearing
It was shorter and wider than i would have liked.
Such a fun piece to spice up an everyday look. Fit was great, perfect for slightly chill evenings!

links_reviews_title: Love this cropped blazer. Perfect to dress up a tshirt for work.
links_reviews_text: Not super structured, almost wears more like a sweater, but looks like a blazer.
The jacket looks like it should go to about waistline in the photo, but when I put it on it was like it came just below my boobs. Looked ridiculous. Didn't wear it
Cute jacket with a boxy fit. Mid weight perfect for transitioning weather. I liked it but I probably would not rent again. Didn't really do much for me.
I'm in need of spring jackets and this was perfect. Fit great over a light sweater and was so comfortable.
This wasn't a flattering jacket so I never wore it. It hits at a weird place on the mid- torso area and is very boxy fitting.
cute jacket but arms are really tight!

links_reviews_title: I enjoy trying new looks without purchasing.
links_reviews_text: I love this jacket, may be back to purchase.

links_reviews_title: Love the style, was too baggy in shoulders.
links_reviews_text: I loved the style of this jacket, but unfortunately, I sized up to a medium so that the sleeves and waist would be long enough, which they were, but the shoulder area ended up being really slouchy and baggy as a result. Tricky fit! But if you have a short torso and broader shoulders, it might work.

super boxy/wide in the waist, SHORT waisted (I am tall...), and the arms were kind of tight went bent. it just wasn't comfortable & i took it off every time i was sitting at my desk, i just found it uncomfortable.
Loved this top! Fit absolutely perfect and hot so many compliments. May have to purchase it.
Cute and flattering and very light. Good for multiple seasons.

Wore this for thanksgiving and it was a total hit, and very comfortable. I got the XL and am happy with it b/c I wanted something roomier for thanksgiving but if you wanted it tighter / more form fitting, you could potentially go down a size. Definitely would wear again!
I love this! Comfy and the sleeves aren't too long (which happens a lot for short people). They also have elastic so that you can push them up. Great blouse!

This is a sophisticated polka dot top that I rented for work. Pairs well with skirts and pants, tucked in or loose. I liked the ruffle on the sleeve, which made it a little more interesting. It was slightly snug around the neck for me.

links_reviews_title: Fun top for a night out!
links_reviews_text: Sleeves a tag long but didn't bother me one bit. Can wear tucked in, or hangs loose, both ways look great! I paired with black pants and boots and felt great!

links_reviews_title: Great, flattering fit. Sophisticated, yet fun.
links_reviews_text: Other blouses with rouching, billowy sleeves, and high necks are typically matronly and frumpy. This one has the right proportions so it still looks chic.

links_reviews_title: Adorable top, wore it on Thanksgiving!
links_reviews_text: I loved this top so much! I wore it to Thanksgiving dinner and it was a hit. The sleeves were not too long because the elastic kept them on my wrists, and it fit perfectly everywhere else too. Wish I could buy it!

This was fun but not amazing. Was a different shirt and fun with little frills that were not too much. I didnt look amazing as it just isnt a super flattering shirt but I felt fun in it at work all day. It is also very comfortable. Glad I tried this!

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt! Perfect for Halloween colors!
links_reviews_text: Cute shirt. Well made and just like the picture. I rented it for family pictures with a brown, beige, white black, theme. I just had a hard time pairing the shirt with everything else so I didn't wear it. But it was still cute!
Cute design but the sleeves were very long on me.

links_reviews_title: The puffy sleeves are so feminine and fun
links_reviews_text: Really loved the fit and look of this blouse. I wore it with high waisted trousers and the proportions worked really well together
Perfect top that can go from work to evening and pairs with pants or skirt. Received tons of compliments.
I didn't love these at first but after wearing them all day I loved them. Relaxed fit and very comfortable.
Fit great! Stretchy and comfy! Look cute!

The fit of these shorts was absolutely perfect everywhere except in length. I'm 5'8" and have a big butt- half of it was hanging out! Couldn't wear them which is unfortunate because the shorts fit great everywhere else.
I read the reviews and still thought I should try these shorts. They are insanely short.... and I'm already a pretty short person. Unwearable on my body.

links_reviews_title: Cute if you want to show your butt cheeks
links_reviews_text: ran very small. Looked more like underwear than jean shorts. I know that's the style, but not for over half a butt cheek.
comfortable and good summer shorts but fray was different then expected
These are literally booty shorts that ride up your bum and look like underwear. I didn't even feel ok to wear them at the beach...
These shorts were so comfortable for jean shorts! They are on the shorter side but the fabric has the perfect amount of stretch and softness!
nice quality.
Fit well and perfect for vacation
Perfect fit and soft. Can't wait to wear them this weekend!
love the fit, the cut, the feel

links_reviews_title: Wore on vacation. Very short, but was cute and sexy.
links_reviews_text: The shorts are very short. They were perfect for my Jamaica vacation.
Good material with stretch. Fit in the waist, but Butt cheeks hung out the back and the crotch was super short. Only tried on, never wore.

I really hate wearing shorts, but the super hot weather made me decide I needed to try a pair. and now I'm in love! They were super soft and comfy to wear. I sized up to a 28 and they worked great, but I definitely could have worn a 27. They are definitely on the shorter side if you are adverse to that.
These shorts were adorable and I want all the colors!

links_reviews_title: I wore these for everyday, lounging, weekends, etc.
links_reviews_text: I love these shorts. As soon as I tried them on I knew they would be tough to send back. Would totally buy if the price was lower. Super comfortable and felt my bum was covered enough.
These Shorts were AMAZING. They are very stretchy so they are very good for someone who is in between sizes. They are not to tight around the legs which is great!
Did not wear. They were cute just shorter than I am comfortable in.
Didn't end up wearing these because want to trade for something more wow. They're comfortable and nice, but just regular denim shorts.

I'm usually between a 26 and 27, so I ordered up just to be safe. I could have easily worn a 26, these are soooo stretchy. I don't know how I overlooked the short inseam but it must only by 2" and crept up when walking. Eeek! Thankfully I was on vacation where it's more permissible but I'd never wear these around my neighborhood. Just too short for conservative ol' me. Quality is top notch, though!
Ladies if you are not wanting to show your butt these shorts are not what you are looking for. They are extremely short.

Super flattering and body con. This dress was really fun to wear, and I could see it being dressed up or down as needed. The fabric is mid-weight and has a fairly good amount of stretch. The ruching makes it very flattering.
This dress was fitted but the thick material is forgiving, so it made me look quite slim. Good winter dress.

It nearly took an entire stick of butter to get this on, but it was worth it. I wore this to synagogue. While it's extremely body conscious the coverage makes it ok. Depending on your workplace it may or may not be appropriate. I felt super stylish and confident. When in doubt, size up. I'm normally a small and I had to suck it in to zip up a medium.

Way exceeded my expectations. Was worried this wouldn't fit, or wouldn't be work appropriate. It was perfect!! I'm an athletic build, big shoulders but big hips. The small was perfect. The ruching has a slimming effect and slims my hips too so it doesn't look inappropriate at all! Fantastic pick!!!
This fit but was a bit snug for me. Size up if you don't want every flaw showing.
Absolutely love this dress! Stretchy and comfy, and appropriate for work. It definitely took me by surprise.

links_reviews_title: Very form-fitting. Not appropriate for work.
links_reviews_text: I should have looked more closely at reviews. This might be good for a sexy date but not what I needed. It required help to get in and out of because it is so form-fitting.

Very cute and got tons of compliments at work. It's definitely form fitting and shows off the baby bump! I wore a small at 21 weeks, I'm usually a small and figured the material would stretch over my belly, which it did... but it was definitely not easy to zip (needed my husband to help!!) and felt slightly uncomfortable all day. It's a great work staple so I'll swap out for a medium and that should be perfect and still hug in all the right spots.
Runs small
This dress fits very well. Very flattering!

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for work and event after!
links_reviews_text: Love the fit and material. Very comfortable. The only annoying thing is it's very difficult to zip up on your own with the material folding.
Snug, flattering, comfortable

links_reviews_title: Great fit. Form fitting but not too tight. Flattering!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress and will definitely rent it again. Perfect for work or a California winter date night. I wore the dress for both and received tons of compliments. dressed it up for date night and kept it more conservative for work.
Fitted and shows off figure
No complaints here except that the arms are a little tight but not enough to be bothersome. The fit is sexy like most or NMs dresses in this style. Extremely flattering on an hour glass shape.
Loved this dress. I liked the rouching as it was very flattering, the fit and the structure. Perfect for a work presentation.

links_reviews_title: Runs small, ruching popped a hole
links_reviews_text: I grabbed this today at the SF store on my way to a memorial service. I'm a 4 but there was only a Medium on the rack. I thought it would be loose but it was snug. Also I'm 5'9" and as I reached to finish zipping up the back, I felt a pop at the bottom of the ruching under the zipper. I couldn't see where the ruching had popped, but during the service, a hole opened up at the bottom of the ruching. In a very awkward spot. Fortunately I was wearing black tights.
Cute, but fit snug.

I always tend to size up for Nicole Miller dresses and am glad I did with this one. It was extremely fitted but the ruching was a nice touch to add texture and offset the tightness of the dress. I did notice the bunching in the back around the zipper made it a bit uncomfortable when seated against the back of a chair (or in my car) but a simple adjustment was all it took to fix. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Good Luck Getting In or Out of It
links_reviews_text: Conservatively covers you while being very bodycon. Well made and modern. I liked that the ruching accentuated by bum and gave me a waist. The big issues though are the type of fabric and the sizing. The dress is designed to be shaping but man, it was next to impossible to get into and out of--and I am not a curvy woman. The zipper didn't glide easily, the fabric was stretchy but not enough, and there's a weird built-in bra type of thing that prevents the top from stretching too. Hard pass on this unless you are a contortionist.

This was cute, but the rouching added an odd touch - if bunched just the wrong way it gave a pot belly look, almost like a maternity dress. Maybe I just needed to size up, but at 5'3/116 lbs at the time, I thought a Small would be safe. - The arms, chest and length were perfect

links_reviews_title: It is super cute but super tight
links_reviews_text: Adorable dress but super tight and fitted. Not appropriate for work.

links_reviews_title: Bodycon work dress-something fun and different!
links_reviews_text: While it was very bodycon on me, I think fits TTS. Almost a sexy work dress!! Thick ponte knit is flattering, and liked the color blocked arms. Good length, almost to the knees. Something different for work!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a rodeo with cowboy boots and it didn't feel like a costume. It's warm and cozy
links_reviews_text: Great fit for petite body types
Plaid but chic, the fur collar and fringed bottom makes this so much better than regular plaid. Very light, not meant for warmth.

links_reviews_title: Loved it more than I thought I would
links_reviews_text: Rented on a whim for a not freezing weekend in February. Wore to brunch & out and about. Fun jacket! Boxy fit, could have possibly sized down.

Such a cute trendy jacket! Definitely on the boxy side but adorable with a pair of jeans or leggings. The top is a bit itchy so wear something higher that covers your neck. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Fun Friday jacket for work to play
links_reviews_text: I liked the boxy fit. Pattern was great, fringe is cute. A great rental for fall.

links_reviews_title: Super cute & stylish coat...love wearing it!
links_reviews_text: This cropped jacket is a great way to mix up my mostly black wardrobe (still black, I know, but the plaid is really cute)! Love the fringe at the bottom. Sleeves fit perfectly. Shoulders are just right. Length works with lots of tops. Just enough warmth without being too hot, even with it on inside. My only complaint is that when zipped up, it sticks out at the bottom due to the slightly boxy cut. I'm a 36DDD, so might not be an issue for smaller-chested women.
