And in that case, I might size down. I'm planning to keep this awhile...staving off warmer weather so I can get more out if it. May end up buying it :)
Nothing I'd rent again but wore it twice and it nicely and stylishly ties an outfit together. Boxiness of sleeve cuffs is kind of weird, rolled them up.

links_reviews_title: Loved this jacket so much! Comfy, warm, stylish. I may purchase it from Kate Spade!
links_reviews_text: Good cropped fit. Comfortable. Perfect with black jeans and booties. A go-to winter piece.
Sleeves are oversized, but it is in a fun way.
Absolutely loved this unique coat. Will rent again for sure!!
Fit well on the body, the sleeves are a little generous ( but not in a bad way, enough to layer a sweater under of you want). This piece was very stylish & easy to coordinate an outfit for work.

links_reviews_title: Last minute rental that became my favorite!
links_reviews_text: This was the 4th item I picked for my unlimited subscription but it surprisingly became my favorite! It definitely runs big, I ordered the XS and it was still fairly roomy, but that made it great for layering. I wore it to the movies, running errands, brunch, etc. It was also very warm and comfortable.
Very cute, a bit boxy but that its the look
Too boxy and stuff. Also, a tad dingy looking, didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: It was cute but it wasn't the wow factor I was looking for
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly, I liked it, it was warm enough for Chicago winter, but it just wasn't what I was looking for the week I was renting it for.

links_reviews_title: errands with black yoga pants and black nikes and i wore it to dinner with jeans and boots!
links_reviews_text: super cozy jacket! can be dressed up or down. very warm and not itchy, super happy with it
Cute in theory but too short and boxy for a long torso.
Super cute for fall! Kept me warm yet very stylish!
So comfortable, so cute. Kept me warm and I got so many compliments. Definitely a statement piece !

links_reviews_title: Cute coat but not for me
links_reviews_text: Loved this coat but found the collar to be itchy and the fit to be a bit boxy. Ended up not wearing.
Fits great and very versatile. A perfect spring or evening jacket. Will rent it again for sure!

I really loved this jacket in the photos. The flannel print and fringe around the bottom were cute. However, did not realize it was waist length crop (at least on me). I had planned to wear with skinny jeans but it didn't provide enough coverage for my muffin top and rear. Still enjoyed wearing it - just not the right style for me.
Love the fringe however the jacket was boxy and didn't flatter my figure much

links_reviews_title: So cute -on trend- luv buffalo check
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments on this cute jacket! Pros: not itchy, comfy, fit over sweater. Cons: warm only for weather over 40, pockets not practical.
Cute jacket for the cold weather. It is a bit heavier than it looks. I loved that though and it looked great with black pants or jeans and boot! I would rent it again!
I am tall and it was awkwardly short on me so I did not end up wearing it. Also the sleeves/wrists were very wide which added to the awkwardness.
Wore to work with black pants/dress. Wore out with heels for a friends birthday.
Very cute for casual wear, nice fit

links_reviews_title: I love love this coat. If is warm Without being bulky and it is cute !
links_reviews_text: Glamourous and cute
Warm, cute, great sleeve length, went with a lot of my outfits. I enjoyed wearing this one and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: This jacket was cool and comfortable! Low effort for a 10/10 look!
links_reviews_text: I wish I had gone a size down- It was a little large, but I knew that was a possibility when I ordered the size up!

links_reviews_title: Wore this out for my 30th birthday and couldn't have been happier - got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The jacket runs a touch big, mostly in the sleeve, but think that makes sense due to the trucker-style. A size down may have been perfect but honestly was happy to have it not cling to me. So comfy and the quality/material is great - not super thick (not a winter coat) but warmer than I thought on a cold Maine night. Had SO many people ask where I got it - def an instant favorite!
I rented to wear out m about in San Francisco. This jacket is so on trend. Super comfy and warm. Loved the fringe. I received a lot of compliments.
Really cute fringe detail and overall fit was great.
Love this! So cute; so comfy. Always draws compliments!
Excellent quality and super comfortable. The only thing weird is the pocket placement.
Very comfortable and warm.
The jacket was cute but I wish the shoulder fit was a little smaller

From the pictures, this seems like a super short-waisted coat. I sized up a size, and it fell exactly where I wanted it too. It was slightly cropped, but still kept me warm. It's really an adorable coat. Definitely a thinner fabric than it appears, so it's not for cold weather, just for a crisp fall day.

I wore this everywhere for a week or two and got constant compliments on it. By far the best rental I've gotten from RTR, and I considered buying it but decided it was really more trendy/seasonal than classic. I'd recommend for anything that isn't a formal occasion.

links_reviews_title: The colors are festive and perfect as a vacation dress.
links_reviews_text: Dress is very comfortable and a great length.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to ease into fall
links_reviews_text: I've been loving the maxi dresses as it gets a little cooler... this one is no exception! It's print was perfect for fall with the oranges browns and olives... the smocking at the top was comfortable and easy to wear! Would recommend getting your normal size!
I loved this dress and was going to buy it, but it was too heavy for hot weather. Maybe it would be better in the fall with a jacket. It's a definite rent.

Wore this dress several times during my month-long rental - it's a simple cotton dress. Not the most flattering, but keeps you cool when it's 100+ degrees, it's not lined. I think there is flexibility with sizes due to the stretchy top, and it fit my 5'1" height stopping at my ankles, making it easy to wear with flat sandals. I enjoyed it, but in no world would I think this dress is worth $300+. I rented a similarly shaped dress previously that I felt looked better and seemed of higher quality - THE GREAT scallop gingham clover dress.
Rented this for summer parties. Very flattering & comfortable boho dress. If you're newly pregnant - this would be a great dress to wear with tiny bump!

links_reviews_title: The Definition of an Easy Breezy Summer Dress
links_reviews_text: Took this on vacay and it was very easy to pack (didn't wrinkle!). Felt very comfortable taking a walking tour, but the straps kept falling off. Regardless, loved this pattern and would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!!! Perfect for summer wine trip
links_reviews_text: Summer perfection

Love the style and fit of this dress. The straps are the tiniest bit big - but only slightly. Length bits right at ankle and chest fits perfectly. Great to pair with flat sandals or wedges! Could dress this up or down.
Really cute dress. Wore to family barbecue and was really comfortable. Very lightweight material (not see through at all). Straps would get a little loose but overall great fit.
I wore this dress like 4-5 times even on the long flight to Hawaii with my 2 year old. Literally so comfy and amazing. Will rent again!!

I love this dress! I wore it without a bra and I've never felt more comfortable for a night out in Key West! If I traveled more often I would definitely buy this dress. I might still! It runs large, so size down if in between.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it
links_reviews_text: Very versatile, but most of all, just easy. Perfect spring, summer, and fall dress in Southern California

links_reviews_title: So in love I bought it via unlimited!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a Sunday brunch wedding event. This dress is so rich in color and fits perfectly in all the right places. Tighter in the bust but not too tight (I’m a 32B/C) and the bodice is loose but doesn’t look like a blanket. Love this dress so much I purchased it. I’m 5’3 and the dress hits a little above my ankles so if you’re short like me and looking for a midi on the model this is not it. But with cute platforms or wedges it doesn’t matter if it’s long.

links_reviews_title: This was great for a trip to Costa Rica.
links_reviews_text: I had read it ran big so a medium was perfect. It’s very long. Comfortable but kind of makes for a “blob” shape.

I loved this dress! It's cotton, lightweight, and had such a cute pattern. Very flattering and easy to wear without a bra. The only annoying part is the straps are a little long so can slip off at some times. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Love the idea, don't love the fit
links_reviews_text: This piece is so beautiful in color and pattern and I even love the cut of dresses like this, especially for a vacation. However, this one fit my body all wrong. The chest was perfect with the elasticated material, but the straps were too big, constantly falling off my shoulders. The tummy area was so billowy that the part I love most about my pear-shaped body, my waist, looked huge, especially from the front. And the fabric doesn't help with its stiffness. I would still recommend this dress, just maybe for someone with a less curvy body.

I was nervous that this dress would look like a bag on me, considering it's lake of structured shape. However it's trumpet-like flare at the bottom made it a relaxed and comfortably cute look. My only issue was that the straps run long - I used some fashion tape to keep them held in place but they could be a nuisance. Maybe someone with a bigger chest or broader shoulders would have a better fit?
It runs big, I'm normally a size 8 but read the reviews and went with the 6 and it was perfect. It's just a cute maxi dress that is great for summer.

With our current heat wave I’m LOVING this 100% cotton Joie maxi dress. I took a risk as the largest size is a L, but it ran big from reviews and IT FIT! 👍👏👏👏 I should have taken a side view - it’s really flattering and sliming due to not too much fabric (plus size designers take note - just because- or especially because- we are plus size we DO NOT need 10 yards of fabric in a skirt!! I am a 36D, 39” waist and 49” hips. It *just* fit but I was comfortable in it. There is no stretch to the fabric but it does stretch out a bit as you wear it. I wore without and with a bra - I prefer it with a bra, and it allowed me to use fashion tape to keep the straps up and I think it just looked better with support for the girls 😀

Very pretty pattern, but the material was a bit rough. I didn't have to wear a bra which was nice! The bottom is flowier so you can get away with sizing down if you're more pear shaped. It was a good rental!
Wore this dress multiple times. Size small (normally wear a small/2-4) fit comfortably even at 28-30 weeks pregnant. The cut and style are really pretty. Straps are slightly long but manageable.
So fun. Wore this to an outdoor concert during the summer. Was perfect for staying cool (as possible) on a sweaty evening.

links_reviews_title: Light and easy; perfect summer dress
links_reviews_text: I love the fabric of this dress, the pattern is really vibrant and pretty in real life. It is also extremely light weight, so perfect for hot summer days. I wore the SR and while it feels true to size, if I wasn't 25 weeks preg. I could have sized down. Very easy to wear, I love this one! Might keep it :)

I rented this as part of my update rental just to have a casual maxi to wear on the weekends. It's super comfortable and easy to wear. The straps were a little long on me but nothing that made it awkward to wear. The pattern is so beautiful and the fabric is super light. Loved it!
This dress was so easy to wear! Wore it with a Jean jacket and sandals. I'm normally a small and the xsr fit great so I'd size down

A smocked bodice and flounce hem enhance the free-spirited, boho vibes of this floral-print maxi dress by Joie. Typically my size runs between an XS and Small - I rented a Small but could have done with an XS. I would recommend sizing down - The dress runs more floor length than tea & the straps of the dress run a tad long. The bust area of the dress is incredibly stretchy which allowed me to feel comfortable without a bra. Overall, I loved this Joie piece and am definitely renting again!
Great for the summer and super comfortable

links_reviews_title: Adorable, casual dress for every day
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much, I bought it. The chest is tight, and I wear it without a bra, typically. I just love the design and pattern.
Straps are too long; other than that, perfect.
Too long on me

links_reviews_title: Comfortable Boho dress for relaxed event
links_reviews_text: This dress is comfortable and pretty. It's not appropriate for a formal event (it's cotton!), and can come off like a nightgown. It's so easy to wear--great for vacation, a casual rehearsal dinner or shower, and walking around town.
Should have rented a medium but wasn't available. Cute dress!

This dress was perfect for a girls night dinner. The print and colors are beautiful and it is made very well- material is not too thick or thin. My only complaint is that the straps were a little long on the XSR.

This dress was great for a hot weekend around town. It's light and comfy, the middle was plenty roomy for me in my second trimester (23 weeks) and the top is ruched/elastic so easy on the chest. Agree with the other reviews that the straps are too long -- it's less of a problem if you're wearing a strapless bra. Wore it with tennis sneakers and felt put together but comfy.

links_reviews_title: Light, airy fabric with a beautiful pattern and great fit
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, didn't need to wear a bra with it. I'm 5'10" and ordered a medium, length was as shown in stock photo (ankle). Great for everyday, vacation etc.
Love this dress! Was perfect on my travel day to Mexico. The length was perfect for me (I’m 5’4”)

links_reviews_title: Easy, breezy, perfect dress for party at the beach!
links_reviews_text: Easy to throw on and pair with fun colored earrings! Didn't need to wear a bra but could've if i wanted to.

Although I loved the pattern on the hem and. Straps this dress felt very cheap. The fabric was stiff like low grade bed sheets. The straps were too long. The colors were pretty but I guess I expected better quality. It fit well otherwise, I'm a size 6-8 and average narrow build.

links_reviews_title: It was lovely but was too small in the bust
links_reviews_text: nice lightweight

links_reviews_title: Comfy and casual but nice quality
links_reviews_text: Great for a day party or summer BBQ. It's casual without looking frumpy!
This ran a bit big, but I loved the fabric, quality, and colors! Really nice detail on the shoulders, excellent feel to the fabric.

links_reviews_title: I felt great in this top.
links_reviews_text: I love this top! The material is beautiful and it fit so well. I'd definitely rent it again!

Pros: beautiful colors and pattern; silky, breathable high-quality material, stylish detailing Cons: a bit large, but I wouldn't recommend sizing down because the shoulders fit just right. Takeaway: fun, comfortable top for a spring day at work
Loved this Kate Spade top. I wore it to my daughter's birthday party. It was a pink and floral theme. So perfect! Very comfortable! All the hearts and stars
Not my usual style, but got many compliments.
This didn't wow me like I thought it would. But it was pretty and feminine and comfortable. Nice and polished for work! Very pretty cut. Next time I will try with my hair up!
Sweet little top for the office. Very comfortable and cute!
I loved it and received many compliments. It it simple but the top detail is unique. The shoulders are a little itchy from the fabric but not too bad. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Just different enough on the standard work shirt!
links_reviews_text: Doesn't pull too much on larger chest. Beautiful colors to brighten the work day!
A fun top.. wish I would have ordered a xs but the small was fine. Beware there is tulle in the shoulders to help poof them out and it gets itchy through out the day.
NA

I did really like this top and the neckline was very fun, and different. It was just okay to me for a one time wear but something about it didn't WOW me. It did feel a bit worn and the fabric had some pulls. overall was cute and would recommend for a dinner out

Interesting play on a floral pattern. Detail around the sleeves/neck was just enough without being too much, given recent trends. I'd buy it except I don't really want puff sleeves in my long term wardrobe. Good rental.
I loved this shirt! It brought some Spring into this never ending Winter.
This blouse is so adorable and perfect year round. It is lightweight and happy! The shoulders have a tiny bit of puff which elevates the blouse.
Super cute and different. Fun to mix up the day to day wardrobe.
I'm warm skinned toned so it clashed. The cut is cute. I think this blouse will flattered cool/pink toned ladies.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, but makes shoulders look incredibly wide!
links_reviews_text: I already have broad shoulders from years of competitive swimming, but the combination of details in this top make me look a little like a linebacker. I think it would look best on someone who is slighter than I am.
loved the puffy sleeves and pattern!

links_reviews_title: I want to own this shirt!
links_reviews_text: Love this shirt so much - would love to own it! The shoulders are unique, the fit is super flattering, can easily dress up or down - you won't go wrong with this shirt! Super light so not too hot for the spring or summer.
If it wasn't so hot, I would've kept this for awhile. The quality, colors and cut were amazing. It felt like a really high-quality vintage piece and garnered lots of compliments.
It's a beautiful top with a great design and great detail. However, it is tight in the bust
Very flattering and easily chic
True to size.

I didn't expect much for this blouse. I just had to pick something else since I had two open spaces and most of my faves were taken. I wore it with a white pencil skirt today to work and it looks cute. Fabric is very pretty. Not a fan of the zipper enclosure in the back...a button would have been smarter. But overall, a nice blouse to wear with a pencil skirt to work.
In reading the other reviews I was glad I sized up. This top looked great paired with Slim black. pants
Flattering detail at the neckline.
Slight puff to shoulders and V shape in back. Very cute details. Lots of compliments

The fit was big but not too big so I think it is TTS but big for Kate Spade. I couldn't find the right pants or skirt to pull it off though. I didn't find the shoulder to be itchy but I didn't wear it all day. It was just too much puff in the shoulders and with the material and pattern, I felt it looked a bit old ladyish given the large fit.
Loved great fit
Not easy to pair , its remind me of Wild West style or Gone with a wind times - the southern bells. But it was interesting to try Fits right for my size
I rented this for work and it is an interesting shirt with a great Spring theme. It is very dressy though with a shiny silk fabric. It was a bit too dressy for my work environment
Perfect spring shirt! I will probably rent again. Fit pretty large. I'm a 8 or 10 and the medium still had an over sized look in me.

links_reviews_title: Love the fun flared shoulders, cute print and excellent fit
links_reviews_text: everything was perfect
Very boxy shoulders.
Nice a fit, very comfortable

The print of this blouse is beautiful and perfect for spring. The bright pink colors really pop. I didn't love this shirt, though. The criss-cross at the bust didn't lay right, and the puffy shoulders reminded me of a Star Trek outfit.
Great shoulder
Lots Of compliments

These shorts were very cute and also comfortable. I wore them on vacation to Hawaii, and a nice thing about them for vacation is that they are washable so you can get several wears out of them even if they get sweaty. I will rent for my next sunny vacay!

I hate shorts but I loved these. The fit was perfect in every way - not too tight or short but they still looked really cute and polished. The print is beautiful and I love that it has a bit of red and pink so you can wear either.

links_reviews_title: Yes I am still riding these Hawaiian vibes...
links_reviews_text: I came back from a rad vacation to Hawaii 2 weeks ago and I am still flying high on all the beachy relaxation and mai tai vibes. I figured I could stretch it even further by scheduling our date night at Trader Vic's and scheduling this tropical outfit to adorn my body. The whole thing is just too cute. The shorts in particular are awesome. Fit was perfect - not too tight not too short. Hit at a flattering pOint in my thigh. The fabric has a slight stretch but not much. I die for this pattern and color combo and got a million compliments. Styled with orange suede Charlotte Olympia sandals and a green envelope clutch.

I wore this with the matching top (cute but straps only adjust a small amount) and made a big statement at party. I also wore it with a white top to be more causal. I would go with the smaller size if you are in between, they ran a little larger than Trina's other shorts.

I wore the entire set, meaning shorts and top together, for a daytime birthday party then went out to dinner at night adding high heels to it. It was a huge success and I received nothing but compliments! Super High End material plus I got it new with tags, which is a huge plus!

These shorts fit true to size and were great for a day spent exploring Monaco! They came to me with tags on which is always a fun perk. The fabric is thick and very forgiving of lumps and bumps but not at all heavy. Great for warm weather and can also be dressed up a bit too.

Loved these shorts, they look super cute with a plain white shirt too so I got double use out of this outfit. I got the same size in top and bottom (4) and had to return the shorts and get the 2 so they do run a little bit, but I also have a larger chest than waist!
I wore this 2 days in a row with the matching top! It wasn't too short like I feared. There are small 1 inch side slits. True to size.
I liked the pattern on these shorts but the fit was off. They were too long and wide--they kind of flared out at the thigh and we're not flattering. I decided to exchange them for something else.
These shorts fit great and were super comfortable. I felt like I was on vacation wearing them.
Loved these more than expected! You can dress down for day, or I dressed up for night with a silk top and wedges. If between sizes, size down.
And pairs really well with the top to make a 2-piece mock-romper.

links_reviews_title: Loved the material, pattern, and fit.
links_reviews_text: Zipper wasn't pulling all the way up easily, despite the shorts being loose. Other than that, loved them.
Flattering fit, fun summer print. Comfortable and cute!
These were really adorable, but unfortunately were too small.
These shorts fit perfectly. Wore twice - once with the matching top and received a ton of compliments. Also wore with a solid colored top. Great material and fit.
The material is not giving at all ..specially in the waist.
Beautiful fit, but runs big. I'm Between a 14/16 and the 16 was huge on me. Will rent again in a 14

links_reviews_title: I'm obsessed with these shorts. Have already worn them to a picnic party and to work.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. The side zip means no awkward bumps. The length is short enough to feel cute and fun, but long enough to wear to a casual office during the summer. The pattern is adorable. Seriously considering keeping these.

I love colorful shorts that are slimming to my figure. These shorts were the right length for me and also somewhat high waisted, which allowed me to tuck in my top without making my tummy look too big! It was easy to match with a solid top in any of the colors found in the shorts.
Size up but comfortable, great fit, wore them multiple times.
Very cute short- comfortable material and right balance of polished but fun. Size 6 was wearable but rather large. I normally wear 4/6 but would have preferred to size down to a size 4.
The waist is tight on the belly
High waisted, flattering and vibrant. Will def rent again!

links_reviews_title: Ran really big :( couldn't even wear it
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love these since sets are so cute these days! But these shorts were wayyy too big on me and they were the smallest size available. It felt like it was actually two sizes too big, not even able to wear it without them falling off. I'm thin, but I'm tall so usually I always fill out the clothing, but I couldn't wear them out no matter how much I wanted to. Definitely size down.

links_reviews_title: Fun twist in a classic cardi
links_reviews_text: This isn't the sort of thing I would usually rent - it's a little too Golden Girls meets 90s for my taste - but In the early days of shelter-in-place I was looking for comfortable things that also looked pulled together for Zoom calls. This did the trick! I liked it more than I was expecting.

I sized down in this because I didn't want too much of an oversized fit, and I'm happy I did. Things are always tight in the shoulders for me, and even with sizing down, it fit fine. I liked this, but definitely felt like I was wearing something I took out of my grandma's closet.
Fits TTS- gold trim is sparkly as well as some of the tweed fabric. Goes with everything, can dress up or down

links_reviews_title: It's so cute and can we work with anything
links_reviews_text: Great for work and after work plans
Great statement piece. Paired with a black turtleneck and dark jeans, instant outfit. Not particularly cozy but fun to wear.
I LOVE this cardigan! Super unique and fun. I got compliments all day! I wore it over my shoulders, which was more flattering than wearing it the normal way. I definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: IM OBSESSED WITH THIS TWEED CARDIGAN
links_reviews_text: A great layering piece and the perfect piece for your transition into spring.

Completely fell in love with this cardigan, which in warmer weather could also double as a coat. The colors are beautiful and I love the contrasting trim. Could style this so many different ways. I paired it with a leopard Alexis dress and Lizzie Fortunato earrings also from RTR! I will be posting other ways to style these three pieces on my Instagram on February 11 and will save to my highlights, if you want to take a peak! @luxeandlouche

This was a great statement sweater, kind of reminiscent of old school Chanel. The style is big and bulky but without taking me over. It was great paired with an all black outfit to add some interest. If it wasn't so expensive and so memorable, I would have bought it!
Oversized cardigan coat. Fun, metallic tweed - received so many compliments. Loved it!

It was an interesting piece and would add some fantastic flair to an ordinary outfit, but the fit was weird and unflattering and I couldn't make it work. I don't mind boxy, but this is very stiff and boxy. Cool idea, but the reality was not a good look.
Has to be styled just so, otherwise it looks a bit kooky.

Pros: fun gold accents, funky fabric, good quality, heavier fabric than expected which made it warm, loose boyfriend fit Cons: Not much, maybe a little more preppy than the pics would make you think but still fun
Very comfortable and love the detailing. Lots of compliments!

This is a fun piece. I styled it similarly to the picture on the model, and I received a lot of compliments. It is nice for spring because it could be worn as a light jacket, and the colors are vibrant. You could also style this with black jeans/pants for a more polished look. My only issue is that the fabric is just begging to get pulls in it. My sweater was a decent shape when it arrived, only a few pulls; however, I could tell from wearing it once that this would not be a piece I would keep. It could easily get snagged on just about anything. I wore it once, but wouldn't feel comfortable wearing it again just out of fear of ruining it.
This is one of my absolute favorite rentals. It's so bold but amazing and really fun. Got a lot of lewks and compliments. Great with black or blue jeans.

links_reviews_title: so glam, but such a modern cut. This is the second time i've rented, and I loooove it
links_reviews_text: runs BIG- could have gone with a small but the medium was so cool i wore it to work and to dinner at a nice restaurant.

links_reviews_title: Colors in this jacket are wonderful.
links_reviews_text: Pros - beautiful colors, nice drape Cons - I rented this for work but felt that it was a bit too dressy for the office. However, the couple of times I wore it got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: an update to an old classic
links_reviews_text: i'm obsessed with this cardigan! i normally wear all black, and this has been a fun update to wear to work over a work dress and i can't wait to wear this weekend with black skinnies and a white tee. i try to vary my outfits throughout the week (hello! unlimited!) but i seriously contemplated wearing this for a second time. it is definitely gold and colorful, but reminds me of a classic cardigan (re: the trim, material, gold buttons) but with an incredible modern update (re: the gold and colored threads, length, etc). i don't want to let this one go!
I got this as a fun everyday sweater. It definitely stood out and the fit was a normal medium with a bit cropped sleeves. I wore it with black jeans, cami, and booties.
Cute, but oversized in some places, but not through the hips.

links_reviews_title: I never wore it. It was too gold. In the picture I thought it was beige.
links_reviews_text: See above
The fit is very flattering and the pop of color truly makes this top stand out. It can easily be dressed up or down.
My only complaint about this is that it wrinkles easily. I brought it on a trip to Chicago and it was wrinkled when I unpacked. I left it in the plastic and all. I did iron it and it looked good.
Super classy top, I was about 3 months(?) pregnant, so wore it with leggings! So cute!
And the sleeves are well constructed: fluttery but with an extra piece of fabric below the arm to avoid bra exposure
The blouse felt cheap and I didn't feel comfortable in it. Wouldn't rent again!!! I think it would have got better for someone with a longer torso than mine

Love love love this top! It was a perfect dressy top for work but would also be great for a date night. The bust was just a little bit tight but I made due. If you are more than a C cup, you might want to size up. Loved this enough to buy it.

links_reviews_title: The color is so vibrant and the material is very high quality.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. I'm normally a size 8. Considered purchasing and still might!
Can't go wrong with this classic piece. It's loose-fitting so I tucked it into slacks. Easy polished look.
Loved this elegant cute top that can be dressed down or up. Fit true to size, perfect length and overall great fit. Tons of compliments!
This top is super cute. You could dress it up or down. The bow on the neck is a nice touch

links_reviews_title: Wasn't as Eye-Catching as I Would Have Liked
links_reviews_text: I love a good red for work. I don't know if it was the shade of this red (very bright red) or what, but I didn't feel it "popped" the way most reds do. The shirt was just ok. Not extremely flattering, but would wear to work. Probably wouldn't wear it out for a night with friends or my husband as it didn't feel that exciting. I also felt it ran a little big, and would size down next time.

links_reviews_title: Loved this. Really cute. Great for work.
links_reviews_text: Thick, nice material, comfy.
great fit and color was great too
Nice tomato color. Hits right at the hip. Nice blouse.

This top is a beautiful bright red and great for work. Transitions well from the office to happy hour, and I got compliments on it all day. I'm typically a 6 or 8 and went with the size 44 in this. While the top fit and was wearable, it was a bit tight for my 34D chest and I probably could have sized up. Will definitely be renting again!
I don't have much up top as it is and it was a little tight on me. I'd suggest a size up

links_reviews_title: Absolutely love! Wish I took a pic
links_reviews_text: But will be renting this again. Beautiful color. Soft light material for summer. I paired with black pencil shirt
The color is a bright red. Beautiful blouse. Can be dressed up or down.
Loved this top, very flattering, wore it a few times! The 44 fit perfectly. I am 130 lbs, 34 DD.

links_reviews_title: The bold color and fun style for work
links_reviews_text: Standout color with a unique style that attracted plenty of compliments at work. Would rent again.
Beautiful color and neck tie, not too tight at all.

links_reviews_title: Loved it, but happy to not have to buy it!
links_reviews_text: Loved this top, gorgeous red and the button/ribbon detail is great. I wore this with pants, but it would look great tucked into a skirt. Flutter sleeves were nice in the warm weather, but did not bunch or look weird when I put on a cardigan. Good quality fabric and going to wear again before returning, nice to know that I didn't have to spend $500 to enjoy this top.
This is the nicest blouse I have rented from RTR. Absolutely love everything about it. I've worn it for work and going out. Highly recommend it.

I loved everything about this top and I would rent it again. The fabric is soft and expensive, the color is just right for my skin tone, and it can be dressed up or down. It is a little tight around the bust for my body type.
This is a beautiful shade of red. I loved the top but wish that it tucked into pants/ skirt a little more seamlessly

After reading the reviews, I ordered size 42 (equivalent to size 4) even though I normally wear a 0 or 2. I have a larger chest and was concerned about it being too tight. The size 42 was perfect for me.
SLIGHTLY snug on the top, but that probably won't be a universal critique.
Nice material, good fit...just a little small
Such a cute top but was super small!! Could not wear and was sad.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and cute for a date
links_reviews_text: It fit well, and I loved the petal sleeves. It's made from a satin-like material that wasn't too thin, so my bra was not visible underneath.
Fit was loose/flowy, ran a little big IMO. Thick nice fabric, neckline was a little saggy. Overall, cute top!
Love this shirt. Will keep for awhile! Perfect for work.
Great fabric

This is a beautiful top. Well made. The fabric is really nice and a bit thicker than I was expecting. Lovely shade of red. While it did fit me, it was just ever so tight in the bust (I am a 32DD). So if you are a bustier lady, be aware of the sizing. Can be worn out or tucked in.
Fits true to size, beautiful color, and the material feels very expensive. would rent again and consider purchasing
Got this for a holiday party and was very cute with black pants and heels. Ended up wearing it a few times to other holiday events. Could be dressed up or down.
Ordered for Christmas Eve but wore something else with long sleeves, because the weather was cool. Absolutely gorgeous and will probably rent again for another occasion.
Great fit especially for bigger chested girls.
not worn small on chest
This was such a beautiful top. The quality was noticeably high with gorgeous detail. I'd love to rent to rent this again.
A bit tight in the chest area and the strings kept unraveling so that was a bit annoying. Otherwise loved the color/ print

I enjoyed the details on this blouse - especially at the shoulders. The v was not too deep for work and the colors are nice. This is a good piece to wear during the summer to fall transition. While it's still hot in Vegas now, this material did not bother me in the heat. Would rent again. Fits TTS.

links_reviews_title: Delicious! A dessert in shirt form
links_reviews_text: Thick silk fabric is flowy but not billowy. The color is just perfection, a light terracotta color. Despite its loose cut, I wore a size 8 (nornally a 4-6 on top) and it fit just right. I have broad shoulders and kind of a wide back. Perfect with lighter summer jeans. Love!

Rented for work and also wore to a casual party. It's a really pretty but shapeless blouse. If you want a more fitted look, perhaps size down. Also, the v neck was a bit too low for the office so had to wear a cami.
I rented this for work and needed to film a marketing video. I love it with a cream suit! Super comfortable and plenty of room in the bust if you are bigger (i am not). I love it!
I thought this fit on the smaller side but pretty colors, conservative neckline, and nice material!

I wore this once for a casual dinner with jeans and boots. It is loose fitting and not too low cut, nice V neckline. The color is flattering on most people. Nice silk fabric with a bit of sheen, but not shiny. I also like 3/4 sleeves.
Great for work.
Very pretty print but tight in the chest area.

I wore this top several times - for date night with jeans and for work casual with black pants. Tailored at waist but not form fitting. The fabric lets it flow with my body shape. Ties on sleeves are at just the right length so they aren't annoying.

Did the trick for a casual Friday at work. Fabric was starting to show the non-silk fibers in the fabric blend turning slightly fuzzy, for lack of a better word. Beautiful color! I tried to use an image of the fabric up close but it wouldn't load.
This was an easy, lightweight top to wear to work and I loved the puffed shoulders to add a little something extra!
Nice print, flattering cut. Fashion forward puffy sleeves. Material is nice and light but wrinkles very easily. Good quality.

I have a large chest. This shirt has no side zipper, so I had to attempt to put it over my head. Nope, that wasn't happening. Sending back without wearing. Not sure if I'll try again with a larger size.
Silk is soft and comfortable. The cut of the sleeves is beautiful!
Nice quality and fit but wrinkles easily. If I crossed my arms, the front of the blouse would wrinkle.
Wore this twice to work
Size up at least one size, I could barely get this over my chest. Great color, will try in a 14 for a better fit.
Basic top, not exciting but it is an unusual color. Runs small. Material is shiny
Cute top, but fits externally tight in the hips and large in the shoulders.

Rented this to wear to work. Love the top. Wasn't sure about the color because I don't normally do pastel-type colors, but this is a bit brighter than a real pastel. The materials is somewhat silky, no give. I will definitely rent again.

I loved the color and print of this top. It was flowy and looks great untucked or tucked (as I had to do for work). The sleeves were slightly big on me, but I am pretty petite and expect that with most tops. I'd rent again!
Rented this to wear as a coverup for a day on the lake with friends. It was super light weight and the pattern was really fun. I would definitely rent it again!

What a fun top for vacation! The material is soft and lightweight. It wrinkles pretty easily, so if you're bringing it on vacation you might to pack a steamer. I'd definitely recommend sizing down. I typically wear a size 6 (5'8", 145lbs), so I got a M per the size chart. There was a lot of extra material, a S would have been more flattering. All in all, such a fun shirt!

Rented this for our Disney trip and it didn't disappoint. Love the cocktails on the blouse. Comfortable and breathable material. Plan to wear a cami underneath. Would rent again. Size medium fit perfectly.
Not a showstopper but some days you just want to breeze out
Nice and flowy top. Paired it with jeans. Love the cocktail details.

links_reviews_title: How could you not love it?
links_reviews_text: A breezy cocktail print on a blousy button-up shirt? Perfect vacation wear. My only two complaints were that it wrinkled really easily (but I was on vacation so I didn't worry about it) and the slits on the side go really high up - beyond the waistband of my jeans. Otherwise, this is a super cute top I considered buying. But why buy when you can rent?
Great top.

links_reviews_title: Cute but nothing out of ordinary
links_reviews_text: This ran true to size
Loose fit and fun. I got comments on it everywhere I went.
This top was fine but nothing exciting. I've rented a few other Rails tops that I liked better, the quality of this one seemed a bit lower than the others.
So cute and comfy--I wore 4 times in 10 days! Perfect for date night, cocktails on the deck, casual day at work. I would have bought if less expensive.

links_reviews_title: Don't move too much or it'll wrinkle!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable shirt with a super cute design. The biggest drawback is how easily it wrinkles. I spent a good 10 minutes steaming the shirt after getting out of the rental bag. Put on the shirt, looked cute. Sat down in the car, when I got out the shirt was severely wrinkled. Definitely a shirt to be worn in a comfort setting and not when you're trying to impress someone.
Wore this to the beach and to a breezy lunch. Cute little top with fun cocktail print!

links_reviews_title: great casual summer top for daytime
links_reviews_text: probably only needed medium

This was just too kitschy of a look for me. I didn't even try it on. Fabric is thinner and looked very sheer. I was also drawn to pick this by the silk fabric as listed in the description, but it didn't feel like any silk I have ever encountered. The fabric felt cotton-like and fluffy. Definitely needed an iron!

links_reviews_title: Got good feedback on these when I wore them onsite at a conference.
links_reviews_text: As others have said, stiff to start but softened up. Wore them with tall boots with no heel.

Rented this entire suit and was hesitant about the pants because they are a bit of a lower waist, but it still felt good overall. I am super petite so the cropped bottoms looked great with a tall boot. Great fit throughout and loved wearing it as a match set!

These pants are ah-dorable! The capri length and the checked pattern made them a modern version of the bland Dockers. Nice material with good stretch. The waist was a little large so I wore a belt, but I would have anyway, so no biggie.
This suit was spectacular. These pants are basically jeans. They are a bit hard when they arrive but settle in quickly. You will wear them multiple times. People love them!!
Fits like a glove but material is itchy

Okay I hated them when I first pulled them out. So scratchy to the touch. Put them on and wasn't pleased. Almost sent them right back, but ended up wearing them to work because why not. Idk what changed, but ended up being so sad to return them. They were rough to the touch, but comfortable when worn. They're quite stiff, and were slightly tight around the thighs but after a couple hours, they loosened up enough to be a perfect fit. Several compliments! Hit right below my belly button.
These pants are so great for work. They are professional, funky and comfortable! I have been receiving a ton of compliments. Would absolutely rent again.
Wore this to an interview and got lots of compliments! Pants do not stretch but fit true to size.
These somehow make your whole outfit look great. Perfect for everyday, versatile for work or fun. True to size

Since I'm a kind of curvy 5'3'', I have to be careful with a cropped flared pant. These actually ended up being super flattering - they hugged my hips nicely and fell a little above my ankle. They have a little stretch and I found they stretched a bit more thoughout the day, so were comfortable by the end of a long day. I wore with the matching blazer, and while the full suit is a bit loud, I loved the look - I got compliments from strangers throughout the day!

links_reviews_title: Stylish pattern and cut, not too out there
links_reviews_text: Slightly itchy. Stiffer fabric that lays nicely. If you are 5'4 the pants hit just above or at the ankle, not above like for the model.
Felt confident, great quality.

links_reviews_title: Different take on a work pant
links_reviews_text: Great work pants, liked the funky vibe. True fit. Not the most comfortable pants I've ever worn, but fine to wear.
Wore once to work, felt cute!
Slight stretch, high rise, and great crop flare. I just wish the blazer had been available, too. I'm a normal 8/10 and needed the 10 in these.
DOES FIT GOOD. RUN LARGE WAIST, BUTT OVERALL TOO BIG

links_reviews_title: great fall work outfit quick and easy and interchangeable
links_reviews_text: I wear 8R size these pants we good fit - need to keep in mind styling for shoe, I ended up with my black patent oxfords but also look good with a platform boot. Super cute especially with jacket
Tailor fit

links_reviews_title: cute pants just not for me
links_reviews_text: Cute pants the cut was not quite right for curvy women but they were still wearable.
the pant ran a bit small

links_reviews_title: Great, stiff work pants w flair
links_reviews_text: Liked that there is absolutely no chance of wrinkling. Subtle pattern is nice change from a solid.

I love everything by Derek Lam, and I'm consistently a 4 in their pants. However, the 8.5" rise isn't high enough for how small the waist is. The top of the pants hit the top of my hip bones, and the fabric is high-end, but stiff, so it was uncomfortably tight. The cut of the pants also flattened my backside a bit. So if you're curvy and have a long torso, size up. I will rent again in a 6!

They fit TTS but unfortunately I found the material they are made out of incredibly uncomfortable and knew I couldn't wear them all day. I normally love Derek lam but this item was not for me. I do have sensitive skin so maybe this was just me, but just a warning

Was a little worried that the drawstring would make them too casual but w heels and a blazer it def works! Very comfortable but I couldn't really wear without a jacket. The jogger style w loose fabrics around the hips doesn't work for me. Love them w a blazer though.

links_reviews_title: Fun way to dress up joggers
links_reviews_text: I loved that I was wearing joggers to work but they looked like nice work pants. I wore them with the zippers up on the leg to show my boots but I also liked them zipped to the bottom. Great fit too. I'm a medium/ large in bottoms and the large was a good fit I think
High waisted, comfortable, pretty flattering. Would buy if less costly.
I like these pants. They aren't super special but they are easy and comfortable to throw on for a semi casual work day. They are on the warmer side so wouldn't recommend much above 70 degrees.

links_reviews_title: My most favorite rental of all time
links_reviews_text: Loooooooved these pants. Well made, high quality, perfect fit for hippy ladies. Super comfortable but also put together. The high, wide waist band makes them really flattering. I kept these for weeks and wore them to everything. Basically cried sending them back but couldn't take the price tag to keep.
These may have been a little too casual for a business casual setting, but I made it work. They were also comfortable to travel in. They essentially feel like sweatpants made out of a nicer material.
These were great for work! Super comfy but still looked polished with a pair of stilettos. The waistband is really thick and sturdy and cinched my waist in nicely. Worked well dressed down too.
I went with the size suggested based off of numeral sizing, but i could have sizes down. Still, they were comfortable and good for several events so I wore them twice.
I absolutely loved these pants. They were so comfortable and so chic. If they had been cheaper I would have purchased them.
Love the material, great quality and fits really nice.

I received quite a few compliments on these pants. Their uniqueness is derived from the contrast between the seemingly luxurious synthetic fabric and informal silhouette characteristic of these joggers. They are very comfortable and surprisingly durable, resisting wrinkles excellently.
Wore for work and a baby shower over the weekend -- don't want to return!

I loved the fit of these and got so many compliments. The waistband makes them so comfortable that I didn't even feel like I was dressed for work. I would be buying these if it weren't for the price tag!

These are super comfortable and flattering. The fabric has a nice weight to it, which makes them professional enough to wear to work (despite the drawstring and elastic waistband). My only complaint is that they run small - even after sizing up to an XL, they were a little tight in the calves.

I normally wear a 10 and got the xl since it was the only size available. They fit ok but a little big, probably could have gone with the Large. But they have a cute slouchy look in the bigger size. They are so comfortable at the waist. I'm 5'2" and they're a perfect length with heels. Gotten lots of compliments!
These were super comfy, but not particularly flattering. I loved the zippers at the bottom, but the drawstring dressed the pants down quite a bit.
Comfy and versatile but otherwise a bit underwhelming.

Pro: super comfy, warm to wear on a cool fall day, hid my 1st trimester belly Cons: were a bit too casual for work (looked like pajama pants), too large-- I should've worn a medium instead of sizing up
so comfortable, yet very work chic. totally versatile.

I'm a huge fan of dressy joggers and Cinq A Sept and these did not disappoint. Super comfy and can be dressed up or down. I've worn them with sneakers and with booties and both work just as well. I'm a size 6 and the medium was loose. I could have gone with a small but the M worked just fine. They came to just below my ankle (I'm 5'4).

Great, high waist pants in a high quality material. The length worked well, even though I have short legs, although the waist was a little tight after wearing them all day. I would consider buying these if they weren't so expensive and if the waist was a little more comfortable.

I went way too big with these. A L would probably have been perfect. I am a pear shape so I feared these would be snug in the hips so I went with the larger. Luckily there is a draw string so it worked. So comfy and cute!

links_reviews_title: Frumpy runs large and short, falling above the ankle

links_reviews_text: I wanted to love these. Fit through leg was good but the top / waist had so much material it bunched up when I sat and just looked bulky. Couldn't wear them.

links_reviews_title: As soon as I put them one I loved them. So comfortable and thick. Awesome fit and material
links_reviews_text: Perfectly tailored and I have thick thighs so the medium fit me well. Love them!!!

links_reviews_title: Comfy, but a bit bulky on waist
links_reviews_text: Super comfy for work, but was a bit bulky onwaist. Made finding tops to match with difficult.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy - can pull off at work!
links_reviews_text: loved these. so comfortable. chic enough to make work appropriate. wish they would've been cheaper and i would have purchased
Fit well, insanely comfy, and super cute! One of the first items I'd consider purchasing

links_reviews_title: Cute fit but too short for me
links_reviews_text: Good basic piece
These were wonderful to dress up for work and dress down for after work. Great pockets and loved the drawstring waist
Loved the look of these pants but they were just a bit too loose to look put together. Next time I'd try a size down.
Be careful with side pockets though, my belongings kept falling out of them all day

Originally, this was not part of my original rental. The day I went to pick up my rentals, none of the outfits work except my accessories. I had some assistance with picking outfit #2. I saw the pants and immediately tried on. Feel in love with the comfort and fit.
Fit a little snuggly in the hips but overall so comfy

I took a few reviewer's advice and sized up and definitely should have stuck with my regular size (L). They're definitely versatile and I wore them for work and on the weekend. Great airplane pants. Will rent again in my correct size.
Perfect! And the zippers on ankles were so classy. This is the second time I've rented it and if it isn't so expensive to buy, I'd own them as th perfect pair of black pants to dress up or down!
Cute pants but a little too large for me, so definitely not a good luck with my short torso.
These are great! They dress up or down and are really cute, especially the ankle detail. I'd buy them but they're super expensive.
The fit was nice, but I felt it made my butt look huge.
Interesting pattern but found this very oversized, and the sleeves were huge. Should have sized down, but I believe the sleeves would still have been a bit comical on my frame.

I loved this top! The style and material made it perfect for the office. I was very comfortable with the looser fit from the front, but the arm holes were slightly problematic. I'm 5'8", I wear a size 10 pants, and a 36D bra and you can see from my pic how loose this is. Next time I'd order the 8 so my bra doesn't peek out.
Beautiful stylish top! I got tons of compliments all day. The only thing would be it runs big. Size 2 sizes down!!
Wore this to work, very comfortable. Fit is loose but flattering. Cute and sophisticated, very nice!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, easy top in an on trend color for spring
links_reviews_text: Fit is loose, so it doesn't do much for your figure. The arm holes were a bit large, maybe would have been better if I sized down
soft pink, great design, nice under blazer

links_reviews_title: Great shirt but not for me
links_reviews_text: I got this to wear to work but it was too big. I’m a 38D and the arm holes were gigantic and it could not be worn.

Loved this top for work and going out after. Was cool without being too much. It definitely ran large though but I enjoyed the loose fit. 100% could have gone down a size or maybe even two. it was roomy in the arm holes.

links_reviews_title: okay, probably would have done better with smaller size
links_reviews_text: loose fit

I really liked this top for work. The neckline was a fun detail and the high neck made it really easy to wear. It’s definitely boxy, so skinny bottoms are a must with this top. I typically wear a 4/S in tops and I sized down to a 2 and it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Loved this top - elegant fit made it great for work.
links_reviews_text: elegant top, great for work.

links_reviews_title: Perfect touch of pizzazz to an everyday piece.
links_reviews_text: Runs slightly large, in a good way. Photo is pretty accurate. The slit at the chest is the main attraction and it is placed so that a regular bra can be worn and unseen. Fabric was nice, color was muted - a great piece.
This was a beautiful blouse unfortunately it was just way too large for me to even wear.
A little complicated to arrange the tie

links_reviews_title: love the color and style. perfect for work and casual weekend dinner..
links_reviews_text: none
it was large
It runs very large, I didn't see the comments before I ordered!!
Runs very large so order down. Cute top but heavier and longer then expected
Just a perfect work top. Super flattering - easy to dress up and down. Hits just below waist, amazing material that always looks chic

Great material that feels great even if the room is hot or cold. The tie reference with the drape is interesting and doesn't get in the way like some ruffles or additions do. This is the second time I've rented this top. LOVE IT!
This had a strange boxy fit that was not flattering.

Love this top but it runs VERY large. I'm normally a 6 or 8 depending on brands. Ordered a 4 in this top based on other reviews, but I probably should have gotten a 2! The material is a nice, thick fabric with stretch, but the cut is extremely boxy. I do love the look of the top and can wear the size 4 but if I rent again, I would size down to a 2.
Fits big but it's so cute! Loved this top. Very classy
Super cute top! I normally wear a size 6 but saw this runs large, so I rented the 4 and it fit perfect. The fabric was thicker and a nice quality. Will rent again!
I liked the color and weight of the fabric. Good all around work shirt that pairs nicely with trousers. I'd be willing to rent again, but with a plan to size down.

links_reviews_title: Great pink color of the season, too large.
links_reviews_text: Large all around, esp. arm holes. need a size down from regular size.

links_reviews_title: I would not rent this top again.
links_reviews_text: The fabric looks and the boxy fit made it look a little sloppy. I rented this for work and didn't feel like it looked as tailored as I expected.

Odd fit. Runs large, or maybe is supposed to be boxy? Looked like a sack on me. And was worse when I tried to tuck it in... material is very thick. Beautiful concept- not well finished though. Needed to be more of a tailored fit.
Love the fit!
Fits true to size and neckline is beautiful. Great shirt

links_reviews_title: It was a simple, easy to wear piece for work.
links_reviews_text: I wore it tucked in with a skirt to give more shape, not something I would wear loose.
I have rented this before and always get lots of compliments. Perfect for business event. Good for large busted or large shouldered ladies. Very flattering.

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing this
links_reviews_text: The fit was fine but the cut at the neck was not for me.
Received lots of compliments on the color and cut of this shirt. It fit well

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately it was too big on my petite frame and I couldnt wear it
links_reviews_text: Runs very big.
This shirt is beautiful and the fabric is soft. I'm 5'3" and it's just not made for me.
I wore this under a blazer for a work meeting and loved it. I felt so confident and pretty at the same time. It is a boxier, not fitted look, but super flattering.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love it but runs WAY too big
links_reviews_text: I rented this shirt two separate times in two different sizes and neither fit. I'm 5'5 and 138lbs with a 34C, and I tried the sizes 4 and 6. Both were just too big to make it work. With the size 4, the arm holes were still huge (you could see my bra) and the shirt was just so baggy. I tried doing a half tuck and a full tuck, but there was just too much material-- and honestly, it really shouldn't be tucked in. If I'm looking for a spot to fill in my Update order in the next few months, I might try out the size 2, because I really want to love this shirt.

This runs really large. Normally I'm a 0 or a 2 in Tibi and the zero was large. I wore it but would have been cuter if it were smaller so I'd definitely size down. Also the fabric has a crinkled look. So it looks like it needs to be ironed when it doesn't.

Loved the draping quality and the slit across the shoulder. It made for a very unique style and the color was very pretty too. I got lots of compliments on it. It was a little long and boxy on me but at 5' 2" I run into that problem a lot with the tunic styles.
I love Tibi and this is a quality blouse, It is just not my style. The fit is very square and not flattering on me.

I loved absolutely everything about this sweater! It was the perfect fit and the perfect material- it was soft, yet held its shape, and was not stuffy like I find most sweaters. This is a $328 retail top for a reason. I may or may not be sending this one back!
Very cute and comfortable, I'm 143 and the m fit perfect. Very stylish, I received compliments. Great normal piece that's a bit dressier than a sweatshirt, but feels great.

links_reviews_title: Great classic look but SO comfortable
links_reviews_text: Would definitely rent again! Got a few wears before the weather got too warm. Easy throw on with a pair of jeans but great classic/elegant feel to it. Very well made.
The sweater looked great on, I guess quality clothes will do that. The arms were a little short for me, but other than that it was a good rental

The photo online looked like an ordinary sweatshirt but this is more of a sweater. I wore to work and a conference presentation. I felt that the neck was too open and I needed a shirt underneath. Overall enjoyed it.
I really loved how basic yet stylish this sweater was, not to mention warm and comfy. I wore it to both work and boozy brunch and got compliments across the board. Would definitely rent again!
I really like this top but I'm struggling to wear it in Arizona because it's a super warm sweater.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments and very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Really flattering fit. Loved the deep v that stayed in place. Really cute sweater for every day!

Loved the sleeves and the color combo. If you want something classy and comfortable for a party and don't want to do a dress, this is a great option! I could have probably used an XL but the L felt just fine!
Beautiful, high quality sweater! The shape was fun and different, and I received lots of compliments on this throughout the day. Very comfortable and chic.
fun sweater to wear in sweater season. Runs a little large. Sleeves are big
felt it was too low cut for everyday wear

links_reviews_title: I loved this sweater. I felt comfortable and confident so I wore it twice.
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater. I was thinking about buying it but then I noticed they have it in another color so I want to rent that when available. I received compliments walking down the hall at work. I loved it so much I wore it again on the weekend to a kids birthday party. Just really comfortable and nice.

links_reviews_title: Ok sweater. Liked the bell sleeves.
links_reviews_text: I would say this is an ok sweater. Kind of a sweatshirt material. Runs large. Wore it with a leopard pencil skirt and black heels. Looked cute together, but wasn’t in love with the sweater enough to keep longer.

links_reviews_title: Baggy yet slimming, good emphasis on boobs
links_reviews_text: flattering
Got this in a L but need a M. Super cute and comfy with a low v-neck that doesn't show cleavage! What kind of black magic is that?! I'd rent this again in a smaller size for sure.

links_reviews_title: Cute cut, looks good high waisted jeans
links_reviews_text: Good option everyday
I liked this sweater to add some color and feminine detail for everyday wear. It is not itchy but very soft and comfortable.
Loved the colors and the fit was amazing. Great for casual date night.

links_reviews_title: Fun. Comfy. Statement sweater. Not itchy. Loved it
links_reviews_text: Comfy and loved the colorblock
My husband described it as a "Renaissance top" because of the puffy sleeves. I loved wearing it to work and on a weekend trip. Would rent again!
Cute, warm, fun. Wore to work on a dress-down day with jeans and fun boots. Love the colors and wide v-neck. A bit more casual item made of soft sweatshirt knit material. Sleeves make it interesting.
Love! Love!
Flattering and the perfect weight. I wore this to a work retreat and I got so many comments. It's just different enough to be noticed in all the right ways. Great top!
This sweater is super cute but was a little large and I'm a true size 12. Loved the colors.
Not flattering. It made my shoulders and arms look large.
Wore it a lot. Great fit, goes really well with your favorite pair of jeans. Can dress it up or down.

links_reviews_title: Nice quality sweater and interesting design, just a too short in the torso for me.
links_reviews_text: I like the style of the sweater but unfortunately for me, it is a quite short in the torso.
Cute sweater. Neckline is wider and sleeves make it special. Easy to wear with jeans for daytime running around or lunch out in winter.

links_reviews_title: really stylish and comfortable. Great for every day - many compliments
links_reviews_text: great fabric! No negatives..

links_reviews_title: Great sweater, not for a petit person.
links_reviews_text: Sweater is just as picture. Super fun. The sweater swallowed me.
Great for a quick outfit to run around in, spend the day with family and friends. Even wore to work on casual day. Worked great! Warm even with the wider neck opening.
This is an awesome sweater. It is soft. The sleeves have a great bell shape that isn't overly dramatic. Good neckline. Just loved it
Cute

links_reviews_title: Ordered this sweater to wear to work.
links_reviews_text: Overall I loved the colors and design. The only downside was that I personally like a little looser of a sweater, the arms were extremely loose (as pictured in the photo), but the fabric around the midriff was very tight and the hemline was shorter than the photo shown. I will definitely rent again for the larger size.
Awesome sweater!
Rolls up pretty easy but very flattering and comfortable
Nice variation on a classic sweater with great volume in the sleeves. Comfortable yet chic.
The fit was nice and the fabric was nice.
This was super comfortable! I love the bigger sleeves! The V neck seemed a bit stretched out, I did have to wear a tank top as it was rather low cut.
I love this dress but because it's looser fitting at the bottom it feels very short on me (I'm tall) for work, especially when I sat
I rented this dress because of the unique arms and loved it even more because of the thick material. Perfect for the cold weather
Great fabric and flattering fit, but very short!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and fun sleeve details make this a 10!!
links_reviews_text: One of my favorites so far! Very thick fabric made it feel like it fit like a glove. Many compliments! Loved it so much!

The dress came "loved". Really over worn and I think it needs to be retired. I felt like I was wearing a used dress. The fabric had be worn down. I ended up covering most of the dress with a furry poncho.

links_reviews_title: Cute Sleeves but not my color
links_reviews_text: The color is a bit lighter than I thought, but it is still a nice work dress! The sleeves are really cute.

links_reviews_title: Work appropriate and nice sleeves for fall/winter.
links_reviews_text: I would rent this again for work in fall or winter. I had to wear tights because the dress was a little short on me. The material is also pretty heavy

links_reviews_title: Great Dress for work to cocktails
links_reviews_text: For my DD + girls, you gotta size up. - there is no give. This one was a little snug across the chest and in the waist but I loved the dress. It was classic and the arms gave it clear. I will be renting again when I get back to my fighting weight!

A little on the large side of TTS. Nice thick material - sleeves can get in the way as others have mentioned, but worth it for the unique touch. Wore both to work and a farewell party for a colleague afterward - would rent again.

This dress was made in a high-quality thick material. And it was perfect for a day full of work meetings. It fit like a glove, but it did NOT stretch at all. If you are between sizes, definitely size up.
It is fitted but very flattering on. I would rent again!
This dress fit well. It had a thick fabric which kept me warm at the office. I liked that the sleeves added detail but did not find them functional.
Not a perfect fit. Didn't love it. Fine for a normal day at the office.

links_reviews_title: Be safe and order a size up
links_reviews_text: At first the dress did not fit, but with my best set of spanks I was able to wear it and really liked it. I'm 5'9 and it was a little on the short side, sitting down was a little risky. But I still really liked it. A gorgeous dress (considered purchasing)
Size up. The dress is soft, comfortable, professional, and trendy. The material is thick and forgiving

links_reviews_title: Wore it 3 times in one week
links_reviews_text: Not sexy, but well made, flattering, classic with interesting sleeve detail, and versatile. Can be dressed up or down with accessories, tights, and shoes. Received several compliments and my mom wanted me to buy it. The structure is impressive and you can see why it's an expensive dress. Photo doesn't do it justice.

links_reviews_title: Really cute, but not for pears
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress in theory: it was professional, but the sleeve detail was really fun. Unfortunately, the fit was pretty off for me: tight across belly and hips, but too roomy up top and far too wide in the shoulders. Probably a good choice if you're not a pear.

I ordered a size up (normally a 6) just because I don't like to wear anything too tight at work. The material of this dress is very thick, making it a nice, structured, polished look. My only issue was with the back of the neck area rising up when I sat down, but was probably due to the fact that I ordered a size up and had some wiggle room in the dress. This dress is extremely flattering on, especially over a little shapewear.
The material is so thick and it looks professional yet sexy

Love this dress and got many compliments! The dress is well made, i would size up it to make sure it's flattering on your body. It is made with thicker material, i would not suggest getting this is the summer or you could roast yourself.

links_reviews_title: Great conservative piece with a slight edge
links_reviews_text: Thick suiting fabric so no stretch but didn't need it runs true to size. Loved the sleeve detail. It's short tho- mid thigh on me 5'6"
Fits as expected and the sleeves are really fun! But it is a little short. It was cold when I wore it and with tights it was fine.
Solid dress. Nice structure, not too short. Comfortable. A little small in the shoulders of you have broad shoulders. Overall good.

links_reviews_title: Thick high quality fabric, creases when sitting, cool sleeves, fitted in middle
links_reviews_text: Sleeves are cool and different. Fabric is excellent quality. Thick for winter. Creases in middle when you sit. Tight in middle - have to be pretty thin to wear the 0 - even on very petite frame it was tight in middle.

This is a gorgeous dress. The detailing on the sleeves is beautiful and really stands out. The fabric feels really substantial, I had been wondering if I would be cold in my office since you obviously can't put a jacket over the sleeves, but it was fine. Got compliments all day. The only thing I would mention is that if you're busty, might consider sizing up.
Received a ton of compliments on this dress. Would definitely rent again. I wore it with tights because I felt it was a little short for bare legs.

I wore this to work and to a work party after. The sleeves were cute, but I had to be very careful reaching for things on the buffet table! The material was nice and thick, but even though it's a newer style, it was starting to pill on the inside (outside was fine). Fit true to size, but obviously the sleeves were much longer on me than on the model!

This dress was pretty and I received a number of compliments. However, the material is very thick and stiff so it gets creased throughout the day. I also felt like it was a tad too short for a professional setting. Definitely plan to wear tights or shape wear.

links_reviews_title: My work is business formals and this dress fits the bill.
links_reviews_text: Good, heavy weight, well structured dress. Modest knee length and quarter sleeves.
So many compliments on this dress! I felt amazing.
thick high-quality fabric
Way too right. Needed 2 sizes up

links_reviews_title: Fabulous sleeves. Simple and sleep design
links_reviews_text: Great for cold weather days. Great fit-- a bit snug across my shoulders, but that's normal for me

I'm usually between size 2 and 4 for these types of dresses. The 4 fit nicely - 2 might have been a little too fitted. The 4 was slightly loose in the chest because i have a small chest but fit nicely in the waist and hips. Maybe very slightly short (I'm 5'3-5'4) but i wore with black tights and felt fine. Thick fabric which is nice - wear whatever underwear you want :) sleeves are unique, kind of funky but i got used to them

links_reviews_title: Ran small, not able to wear.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs small, fit very snug, felt it was too tight to actually wear out and be comfortable in, so I ended up not wearing it.
Fits true to size. Thick, non-stretch fabric so it's nice for the cooler/cold months. Great for the office!

This dress is a good quality fabric, it feels heavy and the garment is constructed well. However it's way too short to wear to the office and its tight on the hips and arms. I have long legs but even with flats on this dress is not office appropriate.
This did. It fit well. It was a tight, overly structured rectangle I felt stuffed into. Too bad, I was looking forward to this one.

links_reviews_title: The material looked nice and thick, but the fit was very off.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5' 4" and usually wear a 6 or 8 (I've got some hips and small chest). I sized up to the 8 and it was too large in the shoulders but too tight in the hips/butt. It was also shorter than I'm comfortable with at work. I have no idea how it fits the model that way - it hit me at mid to upper-thigh.
This is a beautiful dress, but runs small. I'm usually a 12 and ordered a 12 and it was too tight and wouldn't zip. Also it's a very heavy fabric, would be great for winter.

links_reviews_title: From work to a night out
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! The animal print is super fun and the blush color is subtle. I wore this out for dinner with friends with thigh high boots and a leather jacket and then to work with tights and dock martens. Super versatile and fun and flirty even for these cooler months!
Super light material but not see through! Perfect for a warmer winter day. Loved this look!
Good for large chest. May be too baggy on top if you don't have one. You need another person to help you because it buttons down the back

Sized up bc I was expecting the dress to be a little short on me - I'm usually between two sizes - would rent again and style with tights and boots for cool weather. BEWARE there are buttons up the top of the back, so plan on having morning help if you can't reach. I had some extra room, so I was able to get it buttoned alone. #roomforboobs
Comfy to wear, not clingy at all, not the most flattering but it's a fun, simple and easy outfit. I'm usually an 8 and the 6 was plenty roomy probably could've done a 4
I wanted to love this so, so much because the pattern is gorgeous! It's very long in the arms and baggy in the chest, but shorter and tighter in the bottom. Just a very bizarre fit.

I liked this dress for the most part, but it was kind of a weird fit. I couldn't tell if I didn't fill out the bust enough, if it was too big in the waist, not the right length for my torso...or just oddly constructed. The upper middle of the dress poufed out a little and made it look like I had an oddly placed "spare tire." Wearing a jacket with it seemed to minimize this, but as you can see in the picture, the awkward baggy pouf thing was still there. Great print and length, though.
Great fit! Other reviewers commented on the length, but it was long enough for me, although I did wear it with tights. I found it very comfortable & wore it for several occasions!
Cute fun dress but not my favorite. Pretty short and flowy lightweight skirt makes it feel even shorter. Sleeves and top very baggy/blousy.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I rented the 6 in this because I loved it and that was the only size available. I'm typically a 2-4 and the 6 was huge on me. I ended up purchasing it on my own and went with a 0 which fit perfectly. This is a very classic dress that I know I'll wear for years to come.

Thought the cut reminded me of a dress from the 80's (in a trendy way, not in a bad way!). definitely loose on top, I sized down to a 4 (I tend to be me more of a 6). I rented it for Thanksgiving but also found it conservative enough for work. Sorry for the blurry picture!

I loved this dress! It was perfect for work! I did find that it ran a little large (I sized down a size) I'm typically a 10 and the 8 fit perfectly and it was super flattering, highly recommend for work, or dinner or a casual party.

I wore this several times before Mailing back. I wore a denim coat once, and styled with with a sweater over top a few times. The fit is relatively boxy and skirt is short, and if you're looking for something form fitting this is not the dress. I loved the texture and pattern and will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Unflattering but cute pink leopard print
links_reviews_text: I can't believe this dresss costs $400 to purchase. It's like wearing a bag. Not flattering at all. I'm usually between a size 2 and 4 and I should've gotten the size 2. But I wouldn't rent this dress again. Did nothing for me.
The 2 might have worked but the fit is still a bit strange. Sending back

links_reviews_title: Darling dress. A bit looser at the waist
links_reviews_text: Not very fitted at the waist and I wish the arms were somewhat stretchy. I couldn't push them up my arm, as they were at a somewhat awkward length. Cute pattern through.
Wore to a cocktail party with a leather jacket over it. It was a little baggy and short. The material clinged to my tights. Overall cute.
Love the dress the fabric is amazing and colors beautiful! Everybody love it! Runs a bit large I will downsize if I even rent it again! Is not high do not worry for that! I think is a perfect!

links_reviews_title: I rented it to wear to a cocktail party but was too large so I wore it to work.
links_reviews_text: I would rent it again but it a smaller size.
Dresses like this make me so grateful for RTR. This was a nice dress. I felt ok wearing it, I could have gone a size down... but happy I get to drop it off for something else.

links_reviews_title: Light and trendy for the summer
links_reviews_text: Fit well. Absolutely enjoyed wearing this. Love everything about it so much I may rent again or buy it!
I wore this out with girlfriends after work with a leather jacket and I loved it! Very light and breathable.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, but I couldn't wear it because the fit was so off.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs very big all over. I do not have the measurements of a fit model, so I don't expect things to fit perfectly from RTR and I'll wear things that don't fit quite right, but that was not an option with the dress. It was loose throughout. It was especially big on top.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, others were right about the fit. Wear a belt!
links_reviews_text: Looks better with a belt because of the bagginess above the waist. Cute pattern and nice material. Can wear to work or out with a leather jacket or on the weekend with leggings. If you have long hair, be careful, as mine got caught in the top button on the back.
Fabric was beautiful but the dress was so big I didn't wear it. Definitely size down.
Slightly big size down next time
Dress is great for work, does run a little big.

links_reviews_title: horrible fit - very large and just hangs
links_reviews_text: I wouldn't recommend it
not flattering in the waist
