links_reviews_title: Too big in the waist - order a smaller size
links_reviews_text: This dress ran large so I wasn't able to wear it.
Every time I put on my crossbody purse, one of the buttons in the back came undone. Wasn't a big deal just had to be aware of it.
Fun fabric and easy to wear but not that flattering. I wore out to dinner with black tights and booties but could be worn to work as well.
This dress is flowy and comfortable but the buttons easily come undone in the back

links_reviews_title: Probably re rent, didn't wear, don't have an occasion
links_reviews_text: A little big
Cute for work or weekend. Fits true to size
Not flattering for petite frames

Very sweet sillouette. Body skimming, not too clingy but flattering. Pretty pattern. Slightly short if you're on the tall side - in 5'9" but still found it appropriate for work with flat boots and tights.

I loved this dress! The fabric is on trend and comfortable. I wore it with black tights and high black boots. I'm a 4/6 and wore the 4 and even that was too big in the waist (and my waist is what makes me more of a "6", as my hips and legs are skinny). Definitely size down, maybe even 2 sizes if you have a tiny waist as compared to the rest of your body. I would definitely rent this again!
Very clingy fabric in all the wrong places. Liked the idea more than the execution.
Dress was cute but runs really large. Ordered the 0 instead of my usual 4 and it was still pretty loose. I wore it with black tights for work function.
Love this dress so much! A little hard to get on and off but looks great on everyone. Has the peplum so covers belly if you have one! Size up if you're true to size.

This one surprised me in the best way. It looks super professional, but the fabric is almost like a sport fabric. Very stretchy and comfortable. Hides any tummy pouch, super flattering. Will definitely rent again.

The fit is absolutely perfect! I want to keep this so bad. I was in NY and it was chilly so I paired the dress with another RTR rental that I was super lucky to find on the store: the Nanette Lepore blue blazer pictured in the top right corner. So. Many. Compliments. On the dress! Will rent again!
This dress is a little tight but it was so flattering. I felt a million bucks

Stylish, put my girls to a vote and this was the winner. Flirty, I felt like my waist looked small and made me feel confident, which made me take a more laps around the venue talking to people. Quirky, because when you go the bathroom in this dress, it's bodycon without a zipper, so you have to fold it up to use the facilities, however trying to find the bottom of the dress to pull it down was a fun adventure. 🙃 loved the dress and the whole designer line is very chic.
I wore the dress twice, so comfortable and hid all my self conscious parts in the mid section

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit for the pear shaped body
links_reviews_text: Little hard to get into but beautiful fabric and flattering cut for my short pear shaped frame. I felt like a million bucks.
Love it. Very professional work dress but still stylish !
This dress is stunning! No zipper, slip into it, soft stretch fabric that hides all lumps and bumps haha. Beautiful shape that really would work on any body type! Must rent!
Very flattering, beautiful color and lovely fabric

I really liked this dress. It was professional and sexy at the same time. The peplum hides my tummy and the fabric accentuated my curves. I didn't like that there was no zipper. It was easy to pull over my head but I got deodorant on the dress which wasn't easy to clean off.

links_reviews_title: Shape wear you can wear on the outside!
links_reviews_text: This is a little awkward to put on. I had to wriggle in and out of it. It's also a bit tight in the armpits. I really loved this dress. I felt confident all day long. It kept all my parts in place and smoothed the bumps.

The dress was a beautiful color and fit. I didn't have to wear any foundational undergarments. The peplum hid my my major flaws. I turned a lot of heads in this dress. It worked well for a very important work engagement. I rent La Petit Robe all the time and haven't bought one of her items yet but if I did, it would be this dress.
Loved that this was flattering and easy to wear

This was such a great work dress. Really flattering and form-fitting but conservative enough for the office. It runs mostly true to size, maybe a little small. I'm between 4 and 6 and the 6 fit like a glove.

Everything by this designer is just a TEN. Stretchy with no zipper/buttons, the fit is flexible, but I like to order my smaller size in this brand for best fit. Loved the peplum on this dress, but the length was a bit longer than I'd prefer, hitting at the bottom of my knees. I was thinking about wearing to my cousin's wedding -- the main reason I'm not is because I found out the bridesmaids are wearing navy! So I wore for work instead. Rent this dress!

links_reviews_title: I sized up and it fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Nice thick stretchy fabric. The ruffle hides the pouches. The thickness of the material means you can't see every imperfection. The color is a nice navy.

This beautiful dress is a rich navy color, and fits like a glove. It's a scuba material, which sucks you in but doesn't show bumps. The peplum is so flattering around the stomach area. It's a little too formal for my office but I wore it anyways and I feel like a million ($699) bucks. Highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: Wore for a work event. Fit so perfect and is so comfy! Stretchy material and very thick. No zipper.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9. 38B and I am 180lbs! Love love this dress!

I rented this for work. I think it looked very mature, especially in the front. However, he back is a bit low cut, which made me a bit self conscious about wearing it to work, but I did anyway. The material is thin but very stretchy and sucks you in a bit, so much so, that I didn't even wear a bra underneath. I'm between a 2 and a 4 depending on the brand and I went with a 40 in this dress (RTR equivalent of a 4) and it fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit for my figure. Elegant and modest!
links_reviews_text: Fit toned down my extra curves (bust and waist) and was so comfortable for the 6+ hours I was in it.
Love love this dress-great cut and peplum detail. Stretchy, easy to wear fabric

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove. Professional but fashionable
links_reviews_text: Highly recommend. Power suit alternative

I received this new and loved wearing it. This is a good look for many body types. I felt sexy and put together but not overexposed! Perfect for a business cocktail hour and then a fancy dinner afterwards.

Great dress for work, it's a stretchy material which makes it easy to wear. I'm 5'10 so the length for me was perfect (just over the knee) but this would be pretty long on a shorter person. Will keep note of this brand because I was so comfortable but still felt pretty and well dressed.
Very beautiful dress and I will order it again when I lose about 10 lb. It's made of stretchy material so it fit but it would have looked better if it had been a bit loose

I love all things this designer and this dress is amazing too! However, I do not understand why there are never any zippers in their dresses. My rental still had tags attached, but I feel the quality will suffer after lots of people shimmy it on. But it was still an amazing dress and color and I definitely considered buying it.

links_reviews_title: It's not at all what I anticipated
links_reviews_text: Wayyyyy too tight. I mean it's like a serious bondage dress. I recommend sizing up if you want to order. I couldn't even hold on to it for an upcoming work event it was SO tight.
Fantastic for tall girls!
It is a scuba type dress that goes over your head. With not much give, it was a challenge to get it on. It looked great, but was really tight across bust and back.
Very well made and fits like a glove. Hides the stomach area well. True to size

I'm typically either a 6 or an 8. I wore a 44 but I felt it was a little large on the bottom. The 42 probably would have fit better, but it might have been too tight for work. It's a very classy dress for work.
Beautiful material! Stretchy and compliments my body type. 5’4, 170 lb athletic build.
This is a perfect dress - flattering, great fabric and fit. A total hit.
The design of this dress hides the stomach (and food babies). I didn't have to wear spanks but it still fit perfectly. The material is very thick, stretchy, and comfy.

Sophisticated and well made. Very comfortable. The peplum ruffles are flattering and the length is quite long. Ladies with narrow shoulders may notice gaping in the neckline and should consider wearing a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Awkward because of my height and short torso
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress - it's so gorgeous and the material is like spanx! So forgiving! Unfortunately it felt a little awkward in length and it made my hips feel disproportionate. So bummed!
This was too small. So I didn't wear. It would be very flattering but really form fitting.
I read the other reviews about the forgiving fabric but didn't truly understand until I put this dress on. I fell in love.
I was tempted to buy these! My first foray into a wider leg jean. Please excuse the work bathroom picture. True to size.

links_reviews_title: Very comfy and flattering pair of jeans!
links_reviews_text: Loves these!! Very high waisted but oh so comfy! Favorite pair of jeans so far!

These pants were just the thing my wardrobe needed. The style is kind of like a balloon style - smaller on the waist and ankles, and wider in the thighs/knees. High waisted makes them super flattering. I'm petite and was worried they'd be too long, but they just grazed my ankles (I rolled them on some days however). The fabric is like a thin canvas and they will 'break' in after a few hours. Wore these with a bunch of different tops, very versatile.

As other reviewers mentioned, these pants fit really well and are flattering. A few notes: - they're similar to a black denim material - they run small around the waist - size up - they stretch throughout the day, so if they feel a bit tight at first, give them an hour or so to stretch
Loved the style of these jeans and they fit me perfectly! Would have bought these if they were more of a reasonable price!
These pants were very comfortable and fit nicely. Loved wearing them on vacation, worked perfectly to walk around in all day.
Exactly what I was looking for! the perfect black cigarette pant!

The fit on these is so odd! I'm 5'4 and these were so high-waisted they came up past the bottom of my rib cage. They were also really tight in the waist but loose in the crotch area. I wanted to love them but they were just uncomfortable.
These pants ran small and had a very high inseam. I wouldn't recommend for the petite in size.
These high-waisted pants are comfortable and flattering, great for everyday.
I wore these pants constantly they are so good. High waist, structured,stylish and forgiving

The fabric was dressy / casual. Nice high waist, well fitting around the waistline, with cute button detail. However the cut from the thighs - all the way to the cuff was too generous; making my legs look much bigger as a result. The length was a little longer than I had hoped too. Nice quality - but stylistically not what I was looking for.

I liked the soft but heavy material of these pants. I probably should have gotten a 6L rather than a 4R though. I'm a beanpole with no waist to speak of and the top button was uncomfortable. If you're an hourglass these would probably look hot.

links_reviews_title: Great if you have no belly fat
links_reviews_text: I looked like a stuffed sausage in these pants. Very close fit in the waist and hip, then loose in the thigh. Nice heavy cotton material with slight give and a good cropped length with interesting shape to the leg, but these are best for hourglass types with flat tummies! Returned them without wearing.
Versatile for fun or for more dressed down. Can wear long or cuffed

links_reviews_title: Beach tote that nicely doubles as a purse
links_reviews_text: This was my powerhouse tote on my vacation. It worked as a purse for just about any outing on top of fitting everything I needed to bring along to the beach. The only thing that would be an issue is a bulky towel, but a book, headphones, sunscreen, water, cosmetics and a phone easily had a home here. In this picture, I think I also have a cardigan and lightweight towel, so it's a tad overstuffed. It doesn't zip closed but I rarely had an issue with it spilling out. @rtrjunkie
Very large beach bag! Holds everything and doesn't wear with everyday use. Super cute for a beach vacation.

links_reviews_title: This is a great beach bag but it is a little flimsy--so you cannot hold too much!
links_reviews_text: Larger than expected, good for vacation!

links_reviews_title: this bag was great for my hawaiian vacation!
links_reviews_text: Took it to the pool and beach everyday and my phone, wallet, sunscreen, glasses, towel and swim cover up fit inside, even had room for a book. Was also great for little excursions that we did because the strap was long enough to put on my shoulder. The strap is a little scratchy on bare skin, so would recommend wearing on your shoulder if its covered
Large bag I used for the beach! Super cute- got so many compliments. Very large bag and is able to hold everything you need.

links_reviews_title: Everyone compliments. Wish it was lined though.
links_reviews_text: Everyone compliments. Wish it was lined though. Would rent again.

This was bigger than I expected (but I also really didn't look at the sizing) what I didn't love is that the straps were scratchy. I rented this for vacation and would be wearing a lot of sleeveless and the material scratched my skin. I sent it back before even taking on my trip. It's cute but not comfortable!

links_reviews_title: So cute! It goes with everything and I've already received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It's very unstructured so keep that in mind, but it's perfect for summer! There is also no pockets or pouches included inside the bag.
Just fun enough to still be work appropriate! Very comfortable and stylish.

I was stopped so many times by people complimenting the dress and wondering where I got it (insert RTR rave reviews!!). The blue was between cobalt and navy which made it more interesting than your basic navy dress. I love the fit and flare style but would mention one of the horizontal stripes did hit at the widest part of my hips and made me wish my tights were spanx.... otherwise, it was perfect! If I could lose my muffin too, I would buy this dress.
Recommend for work. Great fabric and fit.

I rented this for work. It's a little playful but still work appropriate, dark but not straight black. Other pros: The material was comfortable and didn't wrinkle My bra didn't stick out, as I often find with sleeveless dresses, so I didn't need to wear a sweater
Runs a little small. I will size you to a 6/medium next time.

links_reviews_title: Cute but a bit too short for a 40 something year old to feel professional.
links_reviews_text: My hips don't lie and they didn't need the emphasis of the skirt, so my fault for not knowing what style to choose but something worth considering. I felt the length was too short to look professional and the way the two horizontal black bars are positioned I felt self conscious about my belly in between (like it was emphasized). For all of those reasons I did not wear this. If you're long and lean and not concerned about your tummy the style is cute and fabric high quality.
This dress is a quality material and great lines
Material is soft and stretchy. Not too hot, but thick enough to be substantial. Very flattering cut and the black material is placed to be very flattering. Would definitely rent again.
It looks really nice and professional but fun.

I rented this dress to wear on the day of an important work meeting, and it did not disappoint. The fabric is smooth and comfortable, the print is so cute, and the cut of the dress is incredibly flattering. I will definitely be renting this one again.
I rented this specifically for the funky cut and fun print. It fit me very well once I got used to the different design. Loved that I could wear it with flats or heels. Would rent again!

This is the only co thing I've rented that fit true to size! I'm a 6/8 and the medium was the right pick. Loved the unique pattern. There's no zipper, and the way the dress is cut was really flattering for my shape. Felt subtly sexy and cool.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a night out at theater. Runs a bit big/long on petite frame
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4" and found this to be a bit long/big for my height. That said, it was Fun and flattering and was great for a theater night out. Just may work better on taller women --
This dress is the most classic, flattering shape. A dress like this needs to be a staple in everyone's wardrobe. You can dress up or down!
Great dress for a cocktail party or more formal work event. The shape of the dress is very unique but extremely flattering and the fabric makes you feel elegant.

Loved this dress. I chose TTS, but it is perhaps the slightest bit on the "runs small" side. It would depend on your shape and chest size for sure. I'm small busted so that definitely helped. I wish there were a zipper on the side for this one. It's a pullover which I thought was odd for the shape and material, not to mention the retail price point. Overall don't let my rant dissuade you... I lovedddd this dress!!! Perfect length, shape and fun style.

links_reviews_title: The bias cut made it uncomfortable
links_reviews_text: This fit well and revived several compliments. The bias cut left me trying to "straighten" the dress all day which was quite distracting.
I loved this dress - the material is light, flowy, and comfortable. The pattern and cut are different and fun.

links_reviews_title: It was a fun print and cut! Definitely a thumbs up.
links_reviews_text: It runs long so keep in mind when you order.
This dress is modest, flattering, and light while still feeling substantial. Looked great for work and for going out to dinner after work.
The pattern is great. It's a lightweight fabric and hangs nicely. I got lots of compliments!
I really like the style of this dress. The dress is very comfortable to wear. The dress runs true to its size :)
Very cool and unusual dress. Lots of compliments. It doesn't make a lot of sense but fun for a day.

links_reviews_title: My husband kept telling me I looked beautiful, even after wearing the dress 3 days in a row!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2. The dress hit above the ankle. It's sways beautifully. It tapers where a dress should and leaves room for eating too. Wearing a regular bra works, except when the opening slides, the bra strap can show. Overall, I enjoyed wearing this dress- especially when we visited the Houston fine arts museum and looked at portraits!
This dress is so cute and unique. Thin but quality material!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress! Love the bias cut
links_reviews_text: The bias-cut made the neckline on this a little bit weird, but it doesn't really bother me and I thought it was unusual and pretty. The pattern is cute: basically hats and ladies faces in outline, but not that noticeable (sounds weird but its not). The length hit me about three inches above the ankle and I am 5-3. It was very comfortable, and it's the first time I got a brand new dress from RTR!

links_reviews_title: would be great for a slightly dressy affair with not dancing
links_reviews_text: Unique and flattering lines. Fun material. I rented this to wear to a dance. It has a very cute shape but when you raise your arms for dancing, the whole dress rises and ruins the line. I almost kept it to wear to work.

Wore this to work and it was a big hit. I think this dress is super versatile -- I'd wear it dressed down with flat sandals in summer or dresses up for a more formal event. Will definitely rent again. A few styling notes: I wore this in winter (on a mild day) with tights and boots. The combo of this fabric plus tights was staticky. So I will probably save my repeat rentals for spring and summer. I did wear a shaping tight but overall shape was flattering for a pear.
I loved the simplicity of this dress. Although black, it is thin and is light enough for summer wear. Really a fun print, too!
I was a little skeptical about the fit of this dress when I ordered it, but it was such a great fit and shape. Super flattering and loved the neckline. The pattern was fun was well!

links_reviews_title: Really big and baggy so I never wore it!
links_reviews_text: It was a really pretty dress but the top was so baggy on me I didn't wear it.

Such a cute light dress for the hot summer months in Texas. 10/10 Would rent again. I went a size up the recommended and although I could have been a medium the large was extremely flattering and comfortable.

This dress has a beautiful drape and a fun pattern. I really loved how comfortable it was. It is loose fitting and if you have some self conscious areas, covers them up well. I think sizing down as backup would be fine.
I liked this dress. I would have loved it without a weird 80s hat pattern. The fit is great for a pear shape. Silk fabric is so nice, but another pattern and this would have been a knockout!
This dress was too clingy and unflattering on me. I didn't even wear it. Yikes.
Very cute flowy dress. Was tight around my chest (even with 34Bs) and long (I'm 5'7" and it hit right above my ankles). But high quality and got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, cut so well really flattering
links_reviews_text: Love it

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. Too loose, runs low in the waist.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear it. Very loose.

Wore both to a charity event and to work. Worked well in both settings. Loved the asymmetrical neckline, the bias cut, the length - all made for a unique look. The pattern of women with hats was subtle but super fun.
Wore to a few different work events and got compliments each time. The cut was so flattering and the print makes it classy and fun.
I love the cut and the dress is comfortable. The print is different and fun.
Very flattering
Love the length and the fit! I received a ton of compliments!
I loved this dress. The pattern is unique (women in different hats). The neckline is different but flattering. I received a lot of compliments. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: It is a pretty boring dress
links_reviews_text: I'm not sure why I got a large but it was a little too loose everywhere . The cut of the neckline is awkward. The print is not interesting. The whole dress is just "fine" but RTR much more fun options.

I am tall and relatively thin (size 6) and curvy and this made my top half look enormous and not in a good way. The sleeves stick out instead of laying down so it makes you look ... wide. The length is awkward and unflattering, but a bit better in heels, which are not optional in this dress. When I asked my husband what he thought, he said, "Maybe you could just wear your jeans to dinner." 2 stars because the fabric is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Traveled great and was very comfortable. Looks classic but gets quirky when you look closer.
links_reviews_text: Was a little too flowy and long for my petite frame, would be great on someone taller. Used a belt and fitted sweater to make it work. Lovely quality.
My only complaint about this dress, which has a very chic old world, European vibe, is that it was a little clingy at the waist for me as a pregnant woman in my second trimester.
Such a cute, unique dress. Very comfy and true to size

links_reviews_title: A little different than I expected
links_reviews_text: These pants are very cute and I got a lot of compliments! I styled them with Slate & Willow balloon sleeve wrap top (size L) and black flats. The pants fabric was a silky-type material, which is not what I was expecting, and the length felt short on me. The waist was also a bit snug, so perhaps it's just a sizing issue. I would definitely try these again and size up to a 10.
0 wasn't available and the two was very big. I was able to chinch with a belt to make it work but was adjusting all day. Would rent again in a 0

Very light and silky pants with lots of movement. The pattern is beautiful, got many compliments. Pants were too long for my height (I'm 5'0 and wore 4 inch heels) and the waist was large too. Although I had to really work to get it to fit right, they were great pants for work. Likely would not rent again unless 00 or petite size offered.

I absolutely loved these pants. I could have sized down, they were pretty loose around the waist. I don't think I would have gone for these by looking on line, but my coworker wore them one day, and I obsessed immediately. Quality material and well made. Will rent again. Great for the office!

I really like these pants. They were very comfortable for me to wear all day at work. I am 5'2" and wore them with 3" heels. As others have said- they're very thin so probably best for warm weather. (please excuse my pic we're renovating our house0)

So, I said these pants are true to size, but I'm not entirely sure on that. They fit perfectly in the waist and they are flouncy wide leg trousers and I feel they fit well in all those places too. My question is on the length, I definitely had to wear some heels to keep them off the ground, but I also feel like that's part of the *look*. Unclear, but I would say right fit as long as you intend to wear heels. I loved them, they were a fun print to wear to work.
These are super comfy, almost like pajama pants but size up because they run small.

Really enjoyed wearing these - felt true to size, and mid waisted. A fun take on professional pants. They're wide legged but fall nicely. The fabric was silky and comfortable, but warning that these are fully unlined so not great for winter. I wore a full length coat, knee high socks, and tucked the pants into riding boots for my NYC commute. Wore with pointy sling backs and tucked in a black top for a polished look once I got into the office. One weird thing I noticed was that these ride up in front and back of the crotch area significantly if you walk for more than 5 min. Was a bit uncomfortable until I was able to adjust them again. Overall loved and would wear again to the office or for a work dinner/event!

The fabric and print of these pants is amazing, but they are weirdly so short... I am only 5'7 but these would only be the right length on someone 3 inches shorter than me (IN FLATS!). I loved the print so I wore them, but the length bothered me all day.

links_reviews_title: Light weight, wide legged pants with a bit of flare.
links_reviews_text: Animal print is how I work "color" into my work wardrobe :)

The fabric was lightweight and silky. The fit was comfy but they hung on me. People at work were telling me they loved my pants but were too big on me. Probably shouldn't have worn them but just loved the look and feel. I am tall and was surprised that the length even with 2 inch heels was perfect. I would rent again but in a size down.

I'm between a 2 and 4 in certain trousers. I got the 4 and they were big in the waist! Overall, loved them though. Got so many compliments. Fun but still work appreciate since they're black. I paired it with the WHITE + WARREN FINE GAUGE CREWNECK
I wore a 4 but would've been better off with the 6! They were also a little short but since I wore with sneakers it was fine. Fun to wear to a party or a nice dinner!
Too small and could be longer

What are most likely really awesome pants proved to be too tight to wear. I will rent again in at least one size up. I saw reviews suggesting to do that, but I believe that size wasn't available when I rented. No give in the pants.

links_reviews_title: gorgeous pattern - wish it fit my curvy body style better!
links_reviews_text: Tight in the hips, thin fabric prone to static cling
Soft, comfortable and they are very flattering

links_reviews_title: cute pants but have certainly been rented a lot . Seems were a little well-loved.
links_reviews_text: funky and fun
These definitely fit odd and run small through the thighs. Love the style and fabric, wish they would have worked.

links_reviews_title: They were comfortable, but thin. I was lucky that the day I wore them was warm for a Philly winter.
links_reviews_text: Loose on me in the waist, but that's the case with every pair of pants that fit my butt and thighs.

Loved the look but there were very small, I should have sized up 2 sizes for the nice wide leg look. Also, the material on these is paper-thin, think silk pajamas with no lining. I liked the style anyway but were definitely too tight to wear and still look appropriate at work.

links_reviews_title: Not sure how to wear these.
links_reviews_text: The cut and the fabric just don't seem to mesh well in my opinion... They're like PJs with a zipper. And don't get me wrong, I like the satin pants trend, I just feel like these are a little in-between.. maybe if they fit looser? They're interesting, just not for me :)

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on these pants
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, except that the waist was super tight. Like wearing pj's
I am on the large size of 10 and I was barely able to pull these over my hips (I was not even close to zipping them). Super cute though...sad I couldn't wear them.

Length was perfect with heels (I'm 5'5"), I was worried they would look too much like pajamas but they definitely did not. Paired with a cute skinny belt and striped shirt, as the subtle print allows for pattern mismatch. Great for work or dinner out.

links_reviews_title: Loved these with a bodysuit, very lightweight and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Perfect length with short heels, fun but still work appropriate.

links_reviews_title: Rented for work but didn't wear because they were a bit tight
links_reviews_text: Cute, but very thin fabric
Didn't wear it. It ran too small.
Great fabric and fit. I should have sized down though.

links_reviews_title: So these looked great, but had a bad camel toe problem.
links_reviews_text: These looked great, silky, fun. But I had to pull them much lower on my hips in order to prevent a bad camel toe problem. Probably could have been solved with the next size up. But the waist, hip, length ratios were all great otherwise. Perfect with a pair of heels. Would recommend going up a size.
These were nice but I didn't wear as they were small I the hip area. (I don't have big hips by any means) size up because the material does not have stretch.
Tight in the hips, right where the pockets hit and then gap. Too tight to wear and sit. If you have a wide rear-end, there is no give in this fabric.

links_reviews_title: I needed to size up, so could not wear but these are SO cute
links_reviews_text: thin, almost silky, material - will be sizing up and renting in the future for sure!
Had to wear these pants with 3" heels to keep hem from dragging on the ground. If you don't mind heels and are 5'3", these pants might be for you. Fun and flattering.
At the time of rental, the inseam was listed as 34 inches in the RTR description. They are so short on me so I measured and the 6R inseam is only 30 inches. Returned without wearing

links_reviews_title: I was not able to wear them.
links_reviews_text: The pants are so pretty, but for me, the fit was not good. The waist fit but the rest of the fit was too big. Maybe the size down would have worked.
Loved these! Super comfortable, great leopard print. Run a little small. I am normal a 10 and wore the 12 in these, they were even a little snug.
They are really thin. I loved wearing them. So fun. Wore with a black turtleneck
Unfortunately I was unable to enjoy these pants. The were silky soft, a fun color BUT they did not fit my shape and I was unable to enjoy them.

links_reviews_title: Love this fits an 600 page book
links_reviews_text: Used this for a weekend trip to NY and went with EVERYTHING! It fit my 600 page book, wallet, lip gloss, and sunglasses. Doesn't look too big but is a great travel bag. Will definitely rent again.
fits everything! beautiful color green that matches the JUST female green coat :-)

links_reviews_title: Best F/W bag of all time
links_reviews_text: I am absolutely in love with this bag! I get so many compliments and a couple of my friends have bought it. The color is genius and the quality of the leather is phenomenal. 5 stars!

links_reviews_title: Perfect eye catching green for fall and beyond
links_reviews_text: This purse has butter soft leather and beautiful details. Holds a full size wallet and much more. I like the slot on the back to slip things in when I don't want to open the purse flap in front. And it's a compliment magnet. Solid rental. I will keep this for a while.
Liked this a lot! Great color, especially for Christmas.
Perfect bag for everyday use. I used it in Nashville on a weekend girls trip, as well as for work at a corporate event. Perfect for anything!
Cute purse, a little bigger than I envisioned but still loved it!

links_reviews_title: So cute and the size is perfect for everyday or a date night!
links_reviews_text: LOVE the color green!

I got compliments on this bag from every person who saw it. The color is gorgeous and it will hold a decent amount of items. It can be worn with the straps doubled up for a shorter look or as a cross body. Was very tempted to keep it!
This bag was perfect as an everyday piece for the holidays. Sturdy and big enough to hold my wallet, phone, some makeup and gloves.

Love this color for the winter season! The size is great - fits EVERYTHING for everyday wear with room to spare! The quilting is also super cute - feels very luxe but not so pretentious! Love love love.
I may never return this one. It's the perfect size and the green color is so fun.

links_reviews_title: Just like the picture! Will be nice for the holidays.
links_reviews_text: Good size for everyday use, and the color matches perfectly to the picture. Super cute!

links_reviews_title: I got this bag to switch up my day to day - ended up being perfect for fall.
links_reviews_text: Great size
Great quality bag and gorgeous color. Pocket on inside of bag is great to quickly grab your phone.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up using it.
links_reviews_text: This purse is nice, but it was a bit bigger than I expected, and blingy from the gold chain on the strap, so it doesn't fit my personal style.
Too big and unflattering.
Loved the oversized look. Very warm. It is a bit itchy as others have said but not a deal breaker

Love jacket. Debating on purchasing it because I love it so much. It's the perfect oversized without making it look like your swimming in it. Only con is that it's a bit itchy, but after wearing it for a few mins it doesn't bother you anymore.
The cut is oversized and the material is itchy at first but it didn't bother me and I felt very trendy and cozy! It's warm.
Wore his hiking the Grand Canyon. Definitely recommend a long sleeved turtleneck underneath as it's very itchy. Love the colors.

links_reviews_title: This is a thick itchy jacket not a shirt! It's super cute.
links_reviews_text: Very large. It's a jacket not a shirt like I thought. Very itchy so you'll need to layer. Pretty thick too.

links_reviews_title: Awesome and stylish for any occasion
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this. It's so of the moment and cute. Very warm as well!

I rented this for a fun weekend. I love how comfy and fuzzy it is! The colors and oversized style with the beautiful texture of the fabric made me feel like I was wearing something luxurious. I did not find it scratchy at all, I did wear a turtle neck under it so maybe that's why. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: For the extra Cozy Days Off
links_reviews_text: I can't tell you enough how much I loved the fit on this shirt. Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and down if you want something more fitted. This style is cozy throughout it works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra or sports bra with this top. At 5’ 6”, the length hit just below the hips. The pattern on this top is fun and casual. Pair with designer sneakers and your favorite jeans!
Love the look! Glad I read the reviews and sized down. Really like the color and warmth this jacket provides, but it is pretty itchy.

This shirt is huuuge. Like beyond oversized. If you're tall and size down it could work. Also, you have to wear long sleeves under it, fabric is super itchy. Was hoping to wear it to the mountains, but even with rolling the sleeves I couldn't style it in a way that worked, just too large.

This runs HUGE. I couldn't wear it. The picture makes it look like a slightly heavy version of a regular version of a t-shirt. However, the material is a wool fabric maybe? and very very heavy. It is also extremely itchy.
I could not wear this as it was so itchy and though I wanted this over sized it was wayyy to large.
While cute, this top was very very itchy.
Loved this jacket/thick flannel. Wore it out with jeans and boots or over athleisurewear wear during the day. It was a little itchy but it didn't bother me.

I love this item! I only wish it was lined, because it's pretty itchy. It fits a bit oversized, but isn't super oversized so you can wear it normal. I was really hoping to love this because I wanted to buy it, but I don't think I can get past how itchy it is.

links_reviews_title: This jacket/shirt is super cute and warm its oversized look goes perfect with leggings or with jeans
links_reviews_text: A little itchy but was worn with a shirt underneath, the detailing and buttons are super cute and its a very versatile piece

links_reviews_title: I rented this as part of my monthly subscription for everyday.
links_reviews_text: This sweater looked very cool to me but it was too itchy for me to wear even once. I tried it with a turtleneck under it and I could still feel the threads bothering me through my shirt. I put on something thicker under it but then I looked like I was wearing my sleeping bag. The fit is extremely square and oversized so I was hoping to pair it with something form-fitting underneath rather than a second sweater. I wouldn't recommend this unless you are very skinny and can wear tons of layers and feel comfortable or you don't mind a little bulk.
Had a baggy fit but that's what I loved about it. It was comfortable and looked nice. Would highly recommend.
I like the versatility of this piece - it can be your shirt or worn over a cute top. Looks great with leggings and boots. Got lots of compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: I didn’t end up wearing it bc it was bulkier than I expected and very itchy
links_reviews_text: Material is very scratchy

links_reviews_title: This oversized flannel is absolutely amazing! You can easily dress this up or down-A MUST RENT
links_reviews_text: Con is that I am short so fell a little long but I ended up liking the look. Pro it was super super cute
It does run large but honestly I loved it like that and wore it as a coat/cardigan instead of a shirt. If the price wasn't so high I would have definitely purchased! Awesome for fall!
Great was to upgrade your day to day flannel

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a weekend in the mountains!
links_reviews_text: This shirt is much more of a jacket. The fur is itchy (which i read in reviews) but it works well with a sweater underneath. I couldn't take it off during my mountain vacation! If I rent again I would have gotten a size 1 as it does go down past my but and is bulky.
Cute but too big for my shorter frame
Really cute but super itchy! I had to wear a long sleeve shirt on underneath it.
Fits like a big sweater is itchy so have to wear a shirt underneath

links_reviews_title: Wore it as a jacket and was super cozy
links_reviews_text: Slightly itchy, but over a long sleeve it's super warm and I got tons of compliments for it
It was extremely itchy.

links_reviews_title: Was very warm- it's been so cold in NYC that this was the perf piece.
links_reviews_text: Liked the whole look - with jeans, white tee and heels for the office
Huge and itchy. Did not wear
This wasn't for me... perhaps better on someone very tall and thin. It was also very itchy and I took it off immediately after trying it on.

links_reviews_title: a little too big for my taste, I was swimming in it. I am usually a true size 8.
links_reviews_text: it is really boxy and itchy :(
So cute and meant to be oversized. Only downside it is a little bit itchy, but is fine over a long sleeve shirt. Overall, I loved it.
SUPER itchy/scratchy inside. Cute but you cannot wear without long sleeves underneath. A little large but about how it's shown on the model and you can make the look work

Itchy material and was very baggy even in the smallest size. Looks more like a coat than a top. Would only wear as a coat during transitional season but definitely not flattering as a top alone. Must be worn with a long sleeve underneath to survive the itchiness.

I actually really liked this, but because I'm pregnant it made me look even bigger and I've been gravitating a bit more toward form-fitting styles these days. I would totally use this if I did not have a bump. It's big, warm, and cozy, with great colors.
This was INCREDIBLY itchy. I could not wear, even with layers underneath.
Too bulky for a short, plump body and a little itchy.
